definitions.meaning_cn: 被期望做某事，通常表示责任或预测

examples.en: Employees are expected to arrive on time for meetings.
examples.cn: 员工应准时参加会议。

examples.en: The project is expected to be completed by next month.
examples.cn: 该项目预计下个月完成。

examples.en: Why don't you come along to the party with us?
examples.cn: 你为什么不和我们一起去派对？

examples.en: She came along to help with the preparations.
examples.cn: 她来帮忙准备。

examples.en: The new project is coming along nicely.
examples.cn: 新项目进展顺利。

examples.en: How is your recovery coming along after the surgery?
examples.cn: 手术后你的恢复情况如何？

examples.en: I trust you to keep a secret about my promotion.
examples.cn: 我相信你会保守我晋升的秘密。

examples.en: Can you keep a secret? I'm planning a surprise party.
examples.cn: 你能保密吗？我在计划一个惊喜派对。

examples.en: Once again, he forgot to lock the door.
examples.cn: 他又一次忘记锁门了。

examples.en: Let's try once again to solve this puzzle.
examples.cn: 让我们再试一次解决这个谜题。

examples.en: He tried to play down the importance of the mistake.
examples.cn: 他试图淡化这个错误的重要性。

examples.en: The company played down the negative news in the press release.
examples.cn: 公司在新闻稿中淡化了负面消息。

examples.en: He was hired on the spot after the interview.
examples.cn: 面试后他当场被录用。

examples.en: The police arrived on the spot within minutes.
examples.cn: 警察几分钟内就赶到了现场。

examples.en: When asked a tough question, she was put on the spot.
examples.cn: 被问到一个难题时，她陷入了困境。

examples.en: I felt on the spot during the intense negotiation.
examples.cn: 在紧张的谈判中，我感到压力很大。

definitions.meaning_cn: 基本元素，基础组成部分

examples.en: Carbon is a basic element in organic chemistry.
examples.cn: 碳是有机化学中的基本元素。

examples.en: Understanding the basic elements of grammar is essential for language learning.
examples.cn: 理解语法的基本元素对语言学习至关重要。

examples.en: Take Japan for instance, it has a unique culture.
examples.cn: 以日本为例，它有着独特的文化。

examples.en: Take this case for instance, it illustrates the point perfectly.
examples.cn: 以这个案例为例，它完美地说明了这一点。

examples.en: The doctor took a blood sample to check for infections.
examples.cn: 医生取了血液样本来检查感染。

examples.en: A blood sample is required for the laboratory test.
examples.cn: 实验室检测需要血液样本。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被敦促做某事，强烈建议

examples.en: Citizens are urged to vote in the upcoming election.
examples.cn: 敦促公民在即将到来的选举中投票。

examples.en: Employees were urged to complete the safety training.
examples.cn: 敦促员工完成安全培训。

examples.en: He has a thirst for knowledge and reads constantly.
examples.cn: 他渴望知识，不断阅读。

examples.en: The team showed a thirst for victory in the competition.
examples.cn: 团队在比赛中表现出对胜利的渴望。

examples.en: She had to let go of her old grudges to move on.
examples.cn: 她必须放下旧怨才能继续前进。

examples.en: Let go of the rope when I say so.
examples.cn: 我说放的时候就放开绳子。

examples.en: We plan to link up with other departments for the project.
examples.cn: 我们计划与其他部门联系以进行这个项目。

examples.en: The new highway will link up with the existing network.
examples.cn: 新高速公路将与现有网络连接。

definitions.meaning_cn: 通过睡觉来恢复或消除

examples.en: He decided to sleep off his headache.
examples.cn: 他决定通过睡觉来缓解头痛。

examples.en: After the party, she slept off the tiredness.
examples.cn: 派对后，她通过睡觉消除了疲劳。

examples.en: Keep an eye out for any suspicious activity.
examples.cn: 留意任何可疑活动。

examples.en: I'll keep an eye out for your package delivery.
examples.cn: 我会留意你的包裹投递。

definitions.meaning_cn: 非常忙碌，手头有很多事

examples.en: With three kids and a job, she has her hands full.
examples.cn: 有三个孩子和一份工作，她非常忙碌。

examples.en: During the holiday season, retailers have their hands full.
examples.cn: 假日季节期间，零售商们非常忙碌。

examples.en: I'll have a shot at solving this puzzle.
examples.cn: 我会尝试解决这个谜题。

examples.en: She decided to have a shot at learning Spanish.
examples.cn: 她决定尝试学习西班牙语。

examples.en: He has a shot at winning the competition.
examples.cn: 他有机会赢得比赛。

examples.en: They have a shot at getting the contract.
examples.cn: 他们有机会获得合同。

examples.en: The new evidence calls his alibi into question.
examples.cn: 新证据质疑了他的不在场证明。

examples.en: Her actions call her integrity into question.
examples.cn: 她的行为质疑了她的诚信。

examples.en: This photo doesn't do justice to the beautiful scenery.
examples.cn: 这张照片没有充分展现美丽的风景。

examples.en: He did justice to the role in the play.
examples.cn: 他充分演绎了剧中的角色。

examples.en: We need to automate the process to save time.
examples.cn: 我们需要使这个过程自动化以节省时间。

examples.en: The company automated the process of data entry.
examples.cn: 公司使数据录入过程自动化了。

examples.en: He shouted in a furious way.
examples.cn: 他以愤怒的方式大喊。

examples.en: She reacted in a furious way to the news.
examples.cn: 她对这消息反应愤怒。

examples.en: The factory uses mechanised assembly lines for car production.
examples.cn: 工厂使用机械化装配线生产汽车。

examples.en: Mechanised assembly lines improve efficiency.
examples.cn: 机械化装配线提高了效率。

examples.en: I have a sore throat and can't speak well.
examples.cn: 我喉咙痛，说话不方便。

examples.en: She has a sore throat from the cold.
examples.cn: 她因感冒喉咙痛。

examples.en: I'll ask around to find a good plumber.
examples.cn: 我会四处打听找个好水管工。

examples.en: Ask around if anyone has seen my keys.
examples.cn: 四处打听一下是否有人看到我的钥匙。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get into the swing of things

examples.en: It took a week to get into the swing of things at the new job.
examples.cn: 花了一周时间适应新工作。

examples.en: She quickly got into the swing of things at school.
examples.cn: 她很快适应了学校生活。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人显得好看或有面子

examples.en: His success makes his parents look good.
examples.cn: 他的成功让父母有面子。

examples.en: The new suit makes him look good.
examples.cn: 新西装让他显得好看。

examples.en: She went to the trouble of baking a cake for me.
examples.cn: 她不辞辛苦为我烤了蛋糕。

examples.en: He went to the trouble to help us move.
examples.cn: 他不辞辛苦帮我们搬家。

examples.en: He did the project on his own.
examples.cn: 他独自完成了这个项目。

examples.en: She learned to cook on her own.
examples.cn: 她自学了烹饪。

examples.en: It's hard to say when the rain will stop.
examples.cn: 很难说雨什么时候会停。

examples.en: It's hard to say if he will agree.
examples.cn: 很难说他是否会同意。

examples.en: At this rate, we'll finish by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 照此速度，我们明天就能完成。

examples.en: At this rate, the company will go bankrupt.
examples.cn: 照此情况，公司会破产。

examples.en: The cherry trees are in full blossom.
examples.cn: 樱花树盛开了。

examples.en: The garden is in full blossom in spring.
examples.cn: 春天花园里鲜花盛开。

examples.en: The company shifted to renewable energy.
examples.cn: 公司转向了可再生能源。

examples.en: He shifted to a new career.
examples.cn: 他转换到了新的职业。

examples.en: I wake up at 7 AM every day.
examples.cn: 我每天早上7点醒来。

examples.en: She woke up from a deep sleep.
examples.cn: 她从沉睡中醒来。

examples.en: The accident woke him up to the dangers of speeding.
examples.cn: 事故让他意识到超速的危险。

examples.en: The news woke up the public to the issue.
examples.cn: 这消息让公众意识到了这个问题。

examples.en: The police towed away the illegally parked car.
examples.cn: 警察拖走了违章停放的汽车。

examples.en: They had to tow away the broken-down truck.
examples.cn: 他们不得不拖走抛锚的卡车。

examples.en: It's little more than a rumor.
examples.cn: 这只不过是个谣言。

examples.en: He is little more than a beginner.
examples.cn: 他仅仅是个初学者。

examples.en: The sudden news took me aback.
examples.cn: 这个突如其来的消息让我大吃一惊。

examples.en: Her harsh criticism took everyone aback.
examples.cn: 她严厉的批评让所有人都感到震惊。

definitions.meaning_cn: 严格按照字面意思，丝毫不差

examples.en: Follow the instructions to the letter to avoid mistakes.
examples.cn: 严格按照说明操作以避免错误。

examples.en: He executed the plan to the letter.
examples.cn: 他丝毫不差地执行了这个计划。

examples.en: Her success made her a target of envy among her peers.
examples.cn: 她的成功使她成为同龄人嫉妒的对象。

examples.en: His luxurious car is a target of envy in the neighborhood.
examples.cn: 他的豪华汽车是邻里嫉妒的对象。

examples.en: You are supposed to finish the report by Friday.
examples.cn: 你应该在周五前完成这份报告。

examples.en: We are supposed to arrive at 8 PM.
examples.cn: 我们应该在晚上8点到达。

definitions.meaning_cn: 艰难地完成，费力地处理

examples.en: I had to slog through hundreds of pages of documentation.
examples.cn: 我不得不费力地处理数百页的文档。

examples.en: They slogged through the muddy terrain.
examples.cn: 他们艰难地穿过了泥泞的地形。

examples.en: This is the same book that I read last year.
examples.cn: 这就是我去年读的那本书。

examples.en: She wore the same dress that she had at the party.
examples.cn: 她穿了在派对上穿的那条裙子。

examples.en: All things considered, it was a successful event.
examples.cn: 总的来说，这是一次成功的活动。

examples.en: All things considered, I think we made the right decision.
examples.cn: 全面考虑后，我认为我们做出了正确的决定。

examples.en: The new policy gave rise to many complaints.
examples.cn: 新政策引起了许多投诉。

examples.en: His actions gave rise to serious concerns.
examples.cn: 他的行为引起了严重的担忧。

examples.en: Traveling abroad can broaden your horizons.
examples.cn: 出国旅行可以开阔你的视野。

examples.en: Reading diverse books helps broaden one's horizons.
examples.cn: 阅读多样化的书籍有助于开阔视野。

examples.en: She is as tough as nails and never gives up.
examples.cn: 她非常坚强，从不放弃。

examples.en: The old soldier was as tough as nails.
examples.cn: 那位老兵坚韧不拔。

examples.en: We plant trees every spring to help the environment.
examples.cn: 我们每年春天植树以帮助环境。

examples.en: The community organized an event to plant trees in the park.
examples.cn: 社区组织了一次在公园植树的活动。

examples.en: The positive effects cancel out the negative ones.
examples.cn: 积极效果抵消了消极效果。

examples.en: His apology did not cancel out the damage done.
examples.cn: 他的道歉并没有抵消所造成的损害。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's heart miss a beat

definitions.meaning_cn: 心跳漏了一拍，形容惊讶或紧张

examples.en: When I saw the surprise, my heart missed a beat.
examples.cn: 当我看到这个惊喜时，我的心跳漏了一拍。

examples.en: Her sudden appearance made his heart miss a beat.
examples.cn: 她的突然出现让他的心漏跳了一拍。

examples.en: This rule is true of all employees.
examples.cn: 这条规则适用于所有员工。

examples.en: What is true of one case may not be true of another.
examples.cn: 适用于一种情况的不一定适用于另一种情况。

examples.en: The project is going great guns since we started.
examples.cn: 自从我们开始以来，这个项目进展顺利。

examples.en: She went great guns on her new business venture.
examples.cn: 她在新的商业冒险中全力以赴。

examples.en: The discussion centred on the main issue.
examples.cn: 讨论聚焦于主要问题。

examples.en: Her research centres on environmental science.
examples.cn: 她的研究以环境科学为中心。

examples.en: They fought for their rights.
examples.cn: 他们为自己的权利而战。

examples.en: She is fighting for a better future.
examples.cn: 她正在为一个更美好的未来而奋斗。

examples.en: The situation is improving by the day.
examples.cn: 情况正在逐日改善。

examples.en: He is getting stronger by the day.
examples.cn: 他一天天地变得更加强壮。

examples.en: She completed the project by herself.
examples.cn: 她独自完成了这个项目。

examples.en: He prefers to work by himself.
examples.cn: 他更喜欢独自工作。

examples.en: Animal experiments are conducted to test the safety of new drugs.
examples.cn: 进行动物实验是为了测试新药的安全性。

examples.en: The university has strict ethical guidelines for animal experiments.
examples.cn: 该大学对动物实验有严格的伦理准则。

examples.en: He tried to get round the rules by finding a loophole.
examples.cn: 他试图通过寻找漏洞来规避规则。

examples.en: We can get round the traffic by taking the back roads.
examples.cn: 我们可以走小路来避开交通拥堵。

examples.en: She managed to get round her parents to let her go to the party.
examples.cn: 她设法说服了父母让她去参加派对。

examples.en: He's good at getting round people with his charm.
examples.cn: 他善于用魅力哄骗别人。

examples.en: News of the merger quickly got round the office.
examples.cn: 合并的消息很快在办公室里传开了。

examples.en: Rumors about the celebrity's divorce are getting round.
examples.cn: 关于这位名人离婚的谣言正在流传。

examples.en: If you don't wear a helmet, you run a risk of serious injury.
examples.cn: 如果你不戴头盔，就有严重受伤的风险。

examples.en: Investing in startups runs a risk of losing money.
examples.cn: 投资初创公司有亏钱的风险。

examples.en: Her beauty was beyond expression, leaving everyone speechless.
examples.cn: 她的美无法形容，让所有人都哑口无言。

examples.en: The joy I felt at that moment was beyond expression.
examples.cn: 那一刻我感到的喜悦难以表达。

examples.en: She portioned out the cake equally among the children.
examples.cn: 她把蛋糕平均分给了孩子们。

examples.en: We need to portion out the supplies for the week.
examples.cn: 我们需要把这周的物资分配好。

examples.en: I get along with my colleagues very well at work.
examples.cn: 我在工作中与同事们相处得非常融洽。

examples.en: It's important to get along with your neighbors.
examples.cn: 与邻居相处融洽很重要。

examples.en: How are you getting along with your new project?
examples.cn: 你的新项目进展如何？

examples.en: She's getting along fine in her new school.
examples.cn: 她在新学校过得很好。

examples.en: I enjoy outdoor activities, such as hiking and cycling.
examples.cn: 我喜欢户外活动，比如徒步和骑自行车。

examples.en: Many fruits, such as apples and oranges, are rich in vitamin C.
examples.cn: 许多水果，例如苹果和橙子，富含维生素C。

examples.en: Good city planning can reduce traffic congestion.
examples.cn: 良好的城市规划可以减少交通拥堵。

examples.en: The mayor emphasized the importance of sustainable city planning.
examples.cn: 市长强调了可持续城市规划的重要性。

examples.en: I prefer taking a non-stop flight to avoid layovers.
examples.cn: 我更喜欢乘坐直飞航班以避免中转。

examples.en: The non-stop flight from New York to London takes about 7 hours.
examples.cn: 从纽约到伦敦的直飞航班大约需要7小时。

valid_entries.original_phrase: put one's nose out of joint

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人感到不快或嫉妒

examples.en: Her promotion put his nose out of joint because he wanted the job.
examples.cn: 她的晋升让他感到不快，因为他想要那份工作。

examples.en: Don't let their success put your nose out of joint; focus on your own goals.
examples.cn: 别让他们的成功让你嫉妒，专注于你自己的目标。

examples.en: During the holiday season, hotel rooms are at a premium.
examples.cn: 在假期期间，酒店房间价格高昂。

examples.en: Fresh water is at a premium in some desert regions.
examples.cn: 在一些沙漠地区，淡水非常稀缺。

examples.en: In this company, innovation is at a premium.
examples.cn: 在这家公司，创新受到高度重视。

examples.en: She holds her privacy at a premium and rarely shares personal details.
examples.cn: 她非常珍视自己的隐私，很少分享个人细节。

examples.en: He went out of his way to help me move into my new apartment.
examples.cn: 他不辞辛劳地帮我搬进新公寓。

examples.en: She always goes out of her way to make guests feel welcome.
examples.cn: 她总是特意让客人感到受欢迎。

definitions.meaning_cn: 微小的机会，渺茫的可能性

examples.en: There's only a faint chance that it will rain tomorrow.
examples.cn: 明天下雨的可能性很小。

examples.en: He has a faint chance of winning the lottery, but he still buys tickets.
examples.cn: 他中彩票的机会渺茫，但他仍然买票。

definitions.meaning_cn: 详尽讨论，穷尽一个话题

examples.en: The professor exhausted the subject of climate change in his lecture.
examples.cn: 教授在讲座中详尽讨论了气候变化这个话题。

examples.en: We've exhausted this subject; let's move on to the next agenda item.
examples.cn: 我们已经穷尽了这个话题，让我们进入下一个议程项目。

examples.en: She's trying for a promotion at work.
examples.cn: 她正在工作中争取晋升。

examples.en: He decided to try for a scholarship to study abroad.
examples.cn: 他决定争取奖学金出国留学。

examples.en: I'll try for a better score on the next test.
examples.cn: 我会在下次考试中尝试取得更好的分数。

examples.en: They're trying for a more efficient solution to the problem.
examples.cn: 他们正在尝试寻找更有效的解决方案。

valid_entries.original_phrase: do an about face on sth.

examples.en: After hearing the evidence, he did an about face on his opinion.
examples.cn: 听到证据后，他彻底改变了自己的观点。

examples.en: The company did an about face on its policy after customer complaints.
examples.cn: 在客户投诉后，公司彻底改变了其政策。

examples.en: Mathematics and science are key areas of knowledge in education.
examples.cn: 数学和科学是教育中的关键知识领域。

examples.en: She has expertise in multiple areas of knowledge, including history and literature.
examples.cn: 她在多个知识领域有专长，包括历史和文学。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take sth. with a grain of salt

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事持保留态度，半信半疑

examples.en: You should take his promises with a grain of salt; he often doesn't follow through.
examples.cn: 你应该对他的承诺持保留态度，他经常不兑现。

examples.en: I take online reviews with a grain of salt because they can be biased.
examples.cn: 我对在线评论半信半疑，因为它们可能有偏见。

examples.en: Are you hungry? Not really, I just ate.
examples.cn: 你饿吗？不太饿，我刚吃过。

examples.en: Do you like this movie? Not really, it's a bit boring.
examples.cn: 你喜欢这部电影吗？不完全是，有点无聊。

examples.en: She always stands up for her friends when they're being bullied.
examples.cn: 当她的朋友被欺负时，她总是站出来维护他们。

examples.en: It's important to stand up for your beliefs even when it's difficult.
examples.cn: 即使困难，坚持自己的信念也很重要。

examples.en: The lawyer stood up for the defendant's rights throughout the trial.
examples.cn: 律师在整个审判过程中为被告的权利辩护。

examples.en: He stood up for his proposal with strong evidence during the meeting.
examples.cn: 他在会议上用强有力的证据为自己的提案辩护。

examples.en: The poem was written in praise of nature's beauty.
examples.cn: 这首诗是为了歌颂大自然的美丽而写的。

examples.en: He spoke in praise of the team's hard work and dedication.
examples.cn: 他发言赞扬了团队的辛勤工作和奉献精神。

examples.en: Global temperatures are on the increase due to climate change.
examples.cn: 由于气候变化，全球气温正在上升。

examples.en: The number of online shoppers is on the increase every year.
examples.cn: 网上购物者的数量每年都在增加。

examples.en: Good parenting skills include patience and effective communication.
examples.cn: 良好的育儿技能包括耐心和有效的沟通。

examples.en: She attended a workshop to improve her parenting skills.
examples.cn: 她参加了一个研讨会来提高她的育儿技能。

examples.en: He punches out at 5 PM every day after finishing his tasks.
examples.cn: 他每天完成任务后下午5点打卡下班。

examples.en: Make sure to punch out before leaving the office.
examples.cn: 离开办公室前确保打卡下班。

examples.en: The boxer managed to punch out his opponent in the third round.
examples.cn: 拳击手在第三回合击倒了对手。

examples.en: In the movie, the hero punches out the villain to save the day.
examples.cn: 在电影中，英雄击倒了反派来拯救局面。

examples.en: Don't get worked up over a small mistake; it's easily fixable.
examples.cn: 不要为一个小错误而激动，这很容易纠正。

examples.en: She tends to get worked up over deadlines at work.
examples.cn: 她往往为工作截止日期而生气。

examples.en: The speaker touched upon several key issues in his presentation.
examples.cn: 演讲者在报告中提到了几个关键问题。

examples.en: We only touched upon the topic briefly during the meeting.
examples.cn: 我们在会议上只是简要地涉及了这个话题。

examples.en: The new regulations could choke off economic growth if not implemented carefully.
examples.cn: 如果不谨慎实施，新规定可能会阻止经济增长。

examples.en: They choked off the water supply to fix the leak.
examples.cn: 他们切断了供水来修理漏水。

examples.en: The company decided to buy out the minority shareholders.
examples.cn: 公司决定买断少数股东的股份。

examples.en: He was bought out of the partnership after a disagreement.
examples.cn: 在一次分歧后，他被买断了合伙关系。

examples.en: Generally speaking, exercise is good for your health.
examples.cn: 一般来说，锻炼对健康有益。

examples.en: Generally speaking, people prefer sunny weather over rain.
examples.cn: 一般来说，人们喜欢晴天胜过雨天。

examples.en: She finally got up enough nerve to ask for a promotion.
examples.cn: 她终于鼓起勇气要求升职。

examples.en: It took him a while to get up enough nerve to speak in public.
examples.cn: 他花了一段时间才鼓起勇气在公众面前发言。

examples.en: He drove the joke into the ground by repeating it too many times.
examples.cn: 他重复太多次，把这个笑话讲烂了。

examples.en: The company drove the product into the ground with poor marketing.
examples.cn: 公司因营销不善而毁了这个产品。

examples.en: We need to sort out these files before the audit.
examples.cn: 我们需要在审计前整理这些文件。

examples.en: They sorted out their differences through a calm discussion.
examples.cn: 他们通过冷静的讨论解决了分歧。

examples.en: The holidays are just round the corner, so start planning your trip.
examples.cn: 假期即将到来，所以开始计划你的旅行吧。

examples.en: A solution to the problem is round the corner if we keep trying.
examples.cn: 如果我们继续努力，问题的解决方案即将出现。

examples.en: She currently resides with her parents while saving for a house.
examples.cn: 她目前与父母同住，同时为买房存钱。

examples.en: The students reside with host families during the exchange program.
examples.cn: 学生在交流项目期间与寄宿家庭同住。

examples.en: Please turn the page over to continue reading.
examples.cn: 请翻到下一页继续阅读。

examples.en: He turned over the management of the project to his assistant.
examples.cn: 他把项目的管理移交给了他的助手。

examples.en: The security guard held the thief down until the police arrived.
examples.cn: 保安压制住小偷直到警察到来。

examples.en: Financial difficulties can hold people down from pursuing their dreams.
examples.cn: 经济困难会限制人们追求梦想。

examples.en: Their writing styles are similar, making it hard to tell them apart.
examples.cn: 他们的写作风格相似，很难区分。

examples.en: The two recipes are similar in ingredients but differ in cooking methods.
examples.cn: 这两种食谱在成分上相似，但烹饪方法不同。

examples.en: The apartment is furnished with modern appliances and comfortable furniture.
examples.cn: 这套公寓配备有现代电器和舒适的家具。

examples.en: The office is furnished with all the necessary tools for efficient work.
examples.cn: 办公室配备有高效工作所需的所有必要工具。

examples.en: She tried to keep from laughing during the serious meeting.
examples.cn: 在严肃的会议上，她努力忍住不笑。

examples.en: He kept from eating sweets to maintain his diet.
examples.cn: 为了保持饮食，他避免吃甜食。

examples.en: They kept the news from their parents until the right moment.
examples.cn: 他们向父母隐瞒了这个消息，直到合适的时机。

examples.en: She kept the secret from her friends for years.
examples.cn: 她向朋友们隐瞒这个秘密多年。

examples.en: The fence keeps the children from wandering into the street.
examples.cn: 栅栏防止孩子们跑到街上去。

examples.en: Wearing sunscreen keeps your skin from getting sunburned.
examples.cn: 涂防晒霜可以保护皮肤不被晒伤。

examples.en: After the concert, we made our way to the nearest restaurant.
examples.cn: 音乐会结束后，我们前往最近的餐厅。

examples.en: He made his way to the office through the crowded streets.
examples.cn: 他穿过拥挤的街道走向办公室。

examples.en: She made her way to the top of the company through hard work.
examples.cn: 通过努力工作，她晋升到了公司高层。

examples.en: The team made their way to the finals after a tough season.
examples.cn: 经过一个艰难的赛季，球队成功晋级决赛。

examples.en: The hikers made their way to the summit despite the bad weather.
examples.cn: 尽管天气恶劣，徒步者们艰难地登上了山顶。

examples.en: The injured animal made its way to safety in the forest.
examples.cn: 受伤的动物缓慢地移动到森林中的安全地带。

valid_entries.original_phrase: no more likely to do sth. than ...

definitions.meaning_cn: 表示做某事的可能性不比...更大，用于比较两个事物或情况的可能性

examples.en: He is no more likely to win the lottery than I am.
examples.cn: 他中彩票的可能性不比我大。

examples.en: The new plan is no more likely to succeed than the old one.
examples.cn: 新计划成功的可能性不比旧计划大。

definitions.meaning_cn: 利用或依赖（资源、经验等）

examples.en: She drew upon her savings to buy a car.
examples.cn: 她动用了积蓄来买车。

examples.en: The writer draws upon historical events for inspiration.
examples.cn: 这位作家借鉴历史事件获取灵感。

examples.en: The study draws upon data from multiple sources.
examples.cn: 这项研究利用了多个来源的数据。

examples.en: He draws upon his childhood memories in his paintings.
examples.cn: 他在画作中汲取了童年记忆。

examples.en: I flicked through the magazine while waiting.
examples.cn: 我等待时快速翻阅了杂志。

examples.en: She flicked through the pages to find the answer.
examples.cn: 她快速翻页寻找答案。

examples.en: The new system was put into operation last week.
examples.cn: 新系统上周投入运行。

examples.en: They plan to put the policy into operation next month.
examples.cn: 他们计划下个月实施这项政策。

definitions.meaning_cn: 政治管理，指处理政治事务或领导政治活动的过程

examples.en: Effective political management requires strong communication skills.
examples.cn: 有效的政治管理需要强大的沟通技巧。

examples.en: The course covers topics in political management and strategy.
examples.cn: 这门课程涵盖政治管理和战略主题。

examples.en: I am through with my homework.
examples.cn: 我完成了作业。

examples.en: She said she is through with that project.
examples.cn: 她说那个项目已经结束了。

examples.en: They are through after the argument.
examples.cn: 争吵后他们分手了。

examples.en: He is through with his old friends.
examples.cn: 他和老朋友断绝了关系。

definitions.meaning_cn: 不再，表示过去的状态或行为现已停止

examples.en: He no longer lives in that city.
examples.cn: 他不再住在那座城市。

examples.en: The store is no longer open on Sundays.
examples.cn: 这家商店周日不再营业。

examples.en: She made short work of the difficult task.
examples.cn: 她迅速完成了这项困难的任务。

examples.en: The team made short work of the competition.
examples.cn: 团队迅速击败了竞争对手。

examples.en: He gave an off-the-cuff speech at the event.
examples.cn: 他在活动上发表了即兴演讲。

examples.en: Her off-the-cuff remarks were surprisingly insightful.
examples.cn: 她即兴的评论出人意料地有见地。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在使用中，表示某物当前正被使用

examples.en: The computer is in use right now.
examples.cn: 电脑现在正在使用中。

examples.en: This method has been in use for decades.
examples.cn: 这种方法已经使用了几十年。

definitions.meaning_cn: 事实上，用于强调或纠正之前的陈述

examples.en: As a matter of fact, I did finish the report on time.
examples.cn: 事实上，我确实按时完成了报告。

examples.en: He is, as a matter of fact, the best candidate for the job.
examples.cn: 事实上，他是这份工作的最佳人选。

definitions.meaning_cn: 人造器官，指用于医疗替代的合成或生物工程器官

examples.en: Artificial organs can save lives when transplants are not available.
examples.cn: 当无法进行移植时，人造器官可以挽救生命。

examples.en: Research on artificial organs is advancing rapidly.
examples.cn: 人造器官的研究正在迅速发展。

definitions.meaning_cn: 无限地，非常，用于强调程度

examples.en: The children enjoyed the party no end.
examples.cn: 孩子们非常喜欢这个派对。

examples.en: Her kindness has helped me no end.
examples.cn: 她的善良对我帮助极大。

definitions.meaning_cn: 免税店，指在机场等特定区域销售免税商品的商店

examples.en: We bought perfume at the duty-free shop before boarding.
examples.cn: 我们在登机前在免税店买了香水。

examples.en: Duty-free shops offer goods without local taxes.
examples.cn: 免税店提供不含地方税的商品。

definitions.meaning_cn: 发现或查明（信息、真相等）

examples.en: I need to find out when the meeting starts.
examples.cn: 我需要查明会议何时开始。

examples.en: She found out the truth about the incident.
examples.cn: 她发现了事件的真相。

examples.en: He found out that his friend was moving away.
examples.cn: 他得知朋友要搬走了。

examples.en: We found out about the cancellation too late.
examples.cn: 我们太晚才得知取消的消息。

definitions.meaning_cn: 将...与...联系起来，建立关联

examples.en: People often associate rain with sadness.
examples.cn: 人们常将雨与悲伤联系起来。

examples.en: She associates that song with her childhood.
examples.cn: 她将那首歌与童年联系起来。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在业务或社交上与...合作或交往

examples.en: The company associates with reputable suppliers.
examples.cn: 公司与信誉良好的供应商合作。

examples.en: He prefers to associate with professionals in his field.
examples.cn: 他喜欢与同领域的专业人士交往。

examples.en: He brought up the issue during the meeting.
examples.cn: 他在会议上提出了这个问题。

examples.en: She brought up her concerns with the manager.
examples.cn: 她向经理提出了她的担忧。

examples.en: They brought up their children in a loving environment.
examples.cn: 他们在充满爱的环境中抚养孩子。

examples.en: She was brought up to respect others.
examples.cn: 她被教育要尊重他人。

examples.en: Cut the apple in half.
examples.cn: 把苹果切成两半。

examples.en: The time was reduced in half for the task.
examples.cn: 这项任务的时间减少了一半。

definitions.meaning_cn: 特意做某事，强调重要性

examples.en: She makes a point of exercising every day.
examples.cn: 她特意每天锻炼。

examples.en: He made a point of thanking everyone involved.
examples.cn: 他特意感谢了所有相关人员。

examples.en: On the average, people sleep about eight hours a night.
examples.cn: 平均而言，人们每晚大约睡八小时。

examples.en: On the average, this model sells 100 units per month.
examples.cn: 平均来说，这款型号每月售出100台。

examples.en: With his small income, he can just get by each month.
examples.cn: 靠他微薄的收入，他每个月只能勉强过活。

examples.en: We managed to get by with limited resources during the trip.
examples.cn: 旅行中，我们用有限的资源凑合着过了。

examples.en: His excuse didn't get by the teacher.
examples.cn: 他的借口没能通过老师的审查。

examples.en: She tried to get by the security check with a fake ID.
examples.cn: 她试图用假身份证通过安检。

examples.en: Improving spoken English requires regular practice with native speakers.
examples.cn: 提高英语口语需要定期与母语者练习。

examples.en: Her spoken English is fluent and clear.
examples.cn: 她的英语口语流利而清晰。

examples.en: The athlete broke records in the 100-meter dash.
examples.cn: 这位运动员在100米短跑中打破了纪录。

examples.en: The company broke sales records last quarter.
examples.cn: 该公司上个季度打破了销售纪录。

examples.en: Climate change has an effect on global weather patterns.
examples.cn: 气候变化对全球天气模式有影响。

examples.en: Her advice had a positive effect on my decision.
examples.cn: 她的建议对我的决定产生了积极影响。

examples.en: The report draws attention to the issue of pollution.
examples.cn: 这份报告引起了人们对污染问题的注意。

examples.en: He drew attention to the mistake in the contract.
examples.cn: 他引起了大家对合同中错误的注意。

examples.en: The new evidence brought his alibi into question.
examples.cn: 新证据使他的不在场证明受到质疑。

examples.en: The scandal brought the company's ethics into question.
examples.cn: 丑闻使公司的道德受到质疑。

examples.en: Oil is extracted from underground reservoirs.
examples.cn: 石油是从地下储层中提取的。

examples.en: The data was extracted from the database for analysis.
examples.cn: 数据从数据库中提取出来进行分析。

examples.en: A vacation will do you good after all that hard work.
examples.cn: 在辛苦工作后，度假会对你有好处。

examples.en: Eating vegetables does your health good.
examples.cn: 吃蔬菜对你的健康有好处。

examples.en: She will participate in the marathon next month.
examples.cn: 她将参加下个月的马拉松比赛。

examples.en: Students are encouraged to participate in class discussions.
examples.cn: 鼓励学生参与课堂讨论。

examples.en: The project's success is dependent on team cooperation.
examples.cn: 项目的成功依赖于团队合作。

examples.en: Many plants are dependent on sunlight for growth.
examples.cn: 许多植物的生长依赖于阳光。

examples.en: He always calls a spade a spade, even if it's uncomfortable.
examples.cn: 他总是直言不讳，即使这让人不舒服。

examples.en: In business, it's important to call a spade a spade to avoid misunderstandings.
examples.cn: 在商业中，实话实说以避免误解很重要。

examples.en: The events that led up to the war were complex.
examples.cn: 导致战争的事件很复杂。

examples.en: Her speech led up to the announcement of the new policy.
examples.cn: 她的演讲为新政策的宣布做了准备。

examples.en: I believe in his ability to succeed.
examples.cn: 我相信他有能力成功。

examples.en: She believes in the power of positive thinking.
examples.cn: 她相信积极思考的力量。

examples.en: Many people believe in God.
examples.cn: 许多人信仰上帝。

examples.en: He believes in Buddhism and practices meditation.
examples.cn: 他信奉佛教并练习冥想。

examples.en: Scores of people attended the concert.
examples.cn: 许多人参加了音乐会。

examples.en: There are scores of books on that topic in the library.
examples.cn: 图书馆里有许多关于那个主题的书。

examples.en: She keeps her childhood memories in a photo album.
examples.cn: 她把童年回忆保存在相册里。

examples.en: We looked through the photo album from our vacation.
examples.cn: 我们翻阅了度假时的相册。

definitions.meaning_cn: 轻易逃脱惩罚，从轻发落

examples.en: He got off easy with just a warning for speeding.
examples.cn: 他超速只得到了警告，轻易逃脱了惩罚。

examples.en: The thief got off easy because it was his first offense.
examples.cn: 小偷因为是初犯而从轻发落。

examples.en: The class had a group discussion about the novel.
examples.cn: 班级就这部小说进行了小组讨论。

examples.en: Group discussions are common in team meetings.
examples.cn: 小组讨论在团队会议中很常见。

examples.en: The anthropologist conducted a field study in a remote village.
examples.cn: 人类学家在一个偏远村庄进行了实地研究。

examples.en: Field studies are essential for ecological research.
examples.cn: 实地研究对于生态研究至关重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 辛勤工作，像马一样干活

examples.en: He works like a horse to support his family.
examples.cn: 他辛勤工作以养家糊口。

examples.en: During harvest season, farmers work like horses.
examples.cn: 在收获季节，农民们像马一样辛勤工作。

examples.en: Living in a foreign country gave her a sense of isolation.
examples.cn: 在国外生活让她感到一种孤立感。

examples.en: The pandemic increased many people's sense of isolation.
examples.cn: 疫情加剧了许多人的孤独感。

examples.en: The average salary in this industry is $60,000 per year.
examples.cn: 这个行业的平均工资是每年6万美元。

examples.en: He earns above the average salary for his position.
examples.cn: 他的收入高于他职位的平均工资。

examples.en: In the short term, we need to cut costs to survive.
examples.cn: 短期内，我们需要削减成本以求生存。

examples.en: The stock may drop in the short term but recover later.
examples.cn: 股票可能在短期内下跌，但之后会回升。

examples.en: The store sells non-medical products like bandages and thermometers.
examples.cn: 这家商店销售绷带和体温计等非医疗产品。

examples.en: Regulations for non-medical products are less strict.
examples.cn: 对非医疗产品的规定不那么严格。

examples.en: At the party, he got the glad hand from all the guests.
examples.cn: 在聚会上，他受到了所有客人的热情欢迎。

examples.en: New employees often get the glad hand on their first day.
examples.cn: 新员工通常在第一天会受到热情接待。

examples.en: She passed her driving test on the first attempt.
examples.cn: 她第一次尝试就通过了驾驶考试。

examples.en: The driving test includes both theory and practical sections.
examples.cn: 驾驶考试包括理论和实践部分。

examples.en: We went to the airport to see him off on his trip.
examples.cn: 我们去机场为他送行。

examples.en: She saw her friend off at the train station.
examples.cn: 她在火车站为朋友送行。

examples.en: He received a university education in engineering.
examples.cn: 他接受了工程学的大学教育。

examples.en: Many students aspire to receive a university education abroad.
examples.cn: 许多学生渴望在国外接受大学教育。

examples.en: He had a tongue-lashing from his boss for being late.
examples.cn: 他因为迟到受到了老板的严厉斥责。

examples.en: The child had a tongue-lashing after breaking the vase.
examples.cn: 孩子打碎花瓶后受到了严厉斥责。

definitions.meaning_cn: 辞职，退位；解除戒备状态

examples.en: The CEO decided to stand down after 20 years of service.
examples.cn: CEO在服务20年后决定辞职。

examples.en: The troops were ordered to stand down after the threat passed.
examples.cn: 威胁过后，部队被命令解除戒备状态。

examples.en: The police worked hard to bring the criminal to justice.
examples.cn: 警方努力将罪犯绳之以法。

examples.en: It's important to bring corrupt officials to justice.
examples.cn: 将腐败官员绳之以法很重要。

examples.en: Traveling to Japan was a memorable experience for her.
examples.cn: 去日本旅行对她来说是一次难忘的经历。

examples.en: Graduating from college is a memorable experience for many.
examples.cn: 大学毕业对许多人来说是一次难忘的经历。

examples.en: In the long run, investing in education pays off.
examples.cn: 从长远来看，投资教育会有回报。

examples.en: Saving money now will benefit you in the long run.
examples.cn: 现在存钱最终会对你有益。

examples.en: Scientists extract the cellulose from plants for research.
examples.cn: 科学家从植物中提取纤维素进行研究。

examples.en: The process to extract the cellulose is complex and costly.
examples.cn: 提取纤维素的过程复杂且成本高。

examples.en: The couple walked hand in hand along the beach.
examples.cn: 这对情侣手拉手沿着海滩散步。

examples.en: Economic growth often goes hand in hand with technological advancement.
examples.cn: 经济增长通常与技术进步密切相关。

examples.en: She had a bright idea to solve the problem quickly.
examples.cn: 她有一个好主意来快速解决问题。

examples.en: During the meeting, he had a bright idea for the new project.
examples.cn: 会议期间，他对新项目有了一个好主意。

examples.en: In general, people prefer sunny weather over rain.
examples.cn: 总的来说，人们喜欢晴天胜过雨天。

examples.en: The report shows that, in general, sales have increased.
examples.cn: 报告显示，总的来说，销售额有所增长。

examples.en: She is at home with public speaking after years of practice.
examples.cn: 经过多年练习，她对公开演讲感到自在。

examples.en: He feels at home with advanced mathematics.
examples.cn: 他对高等数学很熟悉。

definitions.meaning_cn: 感到毛骨悚然，起鸡皮疙瘩

examples.en: That horror movie always gives me the creeps.
examples.cn: 那部恐怖电影总是让我感到毛骨悚然。

examples.en: Walking alone in the dark forest made him get the creeps.
examples.cn: 独自走在黑暗的森林里让他起鸡皮疙瘩。

examples.en: He can't run a mile, much less a marathon.
examples.cn: 他连一英里都跑不了，更不用说马拉松了。

examples.en: She doesn't have time to read a book, much less write one.
examples.cn: 她连读书的时间都没有，何况写书了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某人放肆无礼，尤指性骚扰或不当行为

examples.en: He got fresh with his coworker and was reported to HR.
examples.cn: 他对同事行为放肆，被报告给了人力资源部。

examples.en: Don't get fresh with me, or I'll end this conversation.
examples.cn: 别对我无礼，否则我就结束这次谈话。

definitions.meaning_cn: 经常，多半，在多数情况下

examples.en: As often as not, she arrives late to meetings.
examples.cn: 她开会经常迟到。

examples.en: As often as not, the simplest solution is the best one.
examples.cn: 多半情况下，最简单的解决方案是最好的。

examples.en: I'll try to finish the report by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我会努力在明天之前完成报告。

examples.en: Try to stay calm during the interview.
examples.cn: 面试时尽量保持冷静。

examples.en: He is addicted to video games and plays for hours every day.
examples.cn: 他对电子游戏上瘾，每天玩好几个小时。

examples.en: She is addicted to coffee and can't start her day without it.
examples.cn: 她对咖啡上瘾，没有咖啡就无法开始一天。

examples.en: The cost is relative to the quality of the materials used.
examples.cn: 成本相对于所用材料的质量而定。

examples.en: Success is often relative to one's effort and perseverance.
examples.cn: 成功往往与个人的努力和毅力相关。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对...大惊小怪，过分关注或抱怨

examples.en: She made a fuss over the small stain on her dress.
examples.cn: 她对裙子上的小污渍大惊小怪。

examples.en: Don't make a fuss over the minor delay; it's not a big deal.
examples.cn: 别对这点小延误大惊小怪，没什么大不了的。

examples.en: He turned around and walked back the way he came.
examples.cn: 他转身沿着来的路走回去。

examples.en: The car turned around at the end of the street.
examples.cn: 汽车在街道尽头调头。

examples.en: The new CEO managed to turn around the company's declining profits.
examples.cn: 新CEO成功扭转了公司利润下滑的局面。

examples.en: With hard work, they turned around their failing project.
examples.cn: 通过努力，他们扭转了失败的项目。

examples.en: Quite a few people attended the concert last night.
examples.cn: 昨晚有相当多的人参加了音乐会。

examples.en: She has quite a few books on her shelf.
examples.cn: 她书架上有不少书。

examples.en: The dog turned on its owner and bit him.
examples.cn: 狗突然攻击主人并咬了他。

examples.en: He turned on his friend during the argument.
examples.cn: 他在争论中突然反对他的朋友。

examples.en: That music really turns me on.
examples.cn: 那音乐真的让我很兴奋。

examples.en: Her intelligence turns him on more than her looks.
examples.cn: 她的智慧比外表更让他感兴趣。

examples.en: It's important to discriminate between facts and opinions.
examples.cn: 区分事实和观点很重要。

examples.en: The test helps discriminate between skilled and unskilled workers.
examples.cn: 这个测试有助于区分熟练和非熟练工人。

examples.en: She made a name for herself as a talented artist.
examples.cn: 她作为一名有才华的艺术家而成名。

examples.en: He worked hard to make a name for himself in the tech industry.
examples.cn: 他努力在科技行业建立声誉。

examples.en: This candidate fills the bill for the job perfectly.
examples.cn: 这位候选人完全符合这份工作的要求。

examples.en: The new software fills the bill for our data management needs.
examples.cn: 新软件适合我们的数据管理需求。

examples.en: We need to analyze the data before making a decision.
examples.cn: 我们需要在做出决定前分析数据。

examples.en: Scientists analyze the data to draw conclusions about climate change.
examples.cn: 科学家分析数据以得出关于气候变化的结论。

examples.en: Let's start with the basics before moving to advanced topics.
examples.cn: 让我们从基础开始，然后再进入高级主题。

examples.en: The meeting will start with a brief introduction.
examples.cn: 会议将以简短介绍开始。

examples.en: His success has to do with his dedication and hard work.
examples.cn: 他的成功与他的奉献和努力有关。

examples.en: The problem has to do with the software's compatibility issues.
examples.cn: 这个问题涉及软件的兼容性问题。

examples.en: The president was accompanied by his security team.
examples.cn: 总统由他的安全团队陪同。

examples.en: The storm was accompanied by strong winds and heavy rain.
examples.cn: 风暴伴随着强风和暴雨。

examples.en: He was caught off his guard by the sudden question.
examples.cn: 他被突然的问题弄得措手不及。

examples.en: The team was off its guard and lost the game in the final minutes.
examples.cn: 球队放松了警惕，在最后几分钟输掉了比赛。

definitions.meaning_cn: 独自参加社交活动，尤指男性不带女伴

examples.en: He decided to go stag to the wedding since he didn't have a date.
examples.cn: 他决定独自参加婚礼，因为没有约会对象。

examples.en: Many of the guys are going stag to the party tonight.
examples.cn: 很多男生今晚将独自参加派对。

examples.en: The apple fell off the tree and landed on the ground.
examples.cn: 苹果从树上掉下来落在地上。

examples.en: Sales have fallen off significantly this quarter.
examples.cn: 本季度销售额大幅下降。

examples.en: We had to put the project on hold due to budget constraints.
examples.cn: 由于预算限制，我们不得不暂停这个项目。

examples.en: She put her career on hold to raise her children.
examples.cn: 她搁置事业以抚养孩子。

definitions.meaning_cn: 得到应有的惩罚或报应

examples.en: The corrupt politician finally got his comeuppance when he was sentenced to prison.
examples.cn: 这位腐败的政客最终得到了应有的惩罚，被判入狱。

examples.en: After years of bullying others, she got her comeuppance when she lost her job.
examples.cn: 多年来欺负他人后，她丢了工作，得到了报应。

examples.en: They decided to make love under the stars during their romantic getaway.
examples.cn: 在浪漫的度假中，他们决定在星空下做爱。

examples.en: After a long day, they just wanted to relax and make love.
examples.cn: 漫长的一天后，他们只想放松并做爱。

examples.en: He wrote her a poem to make love to her heart.
examples.cn: 他写了一首诗向她表达爱意。

examples.en: In the old days, knights would make love to ladies with chivalrous gestures.
examples.cn: 在过去，骑士会用骑士风度向女士示爱。

examples.en: Portland is a medium-sized city known for its vibrant arts scene.
examples.cn: 波特兰是一个中等规模的城市，以其充满活力的艺术氛围而闻名。

examples.en: Living in a medium-sized city offers a balance between urban amenities and a slower pace.
examples.cn: 生活在中等规模的城市提供了城市便利和较慢生活节奏之间的平衡。

examples.en: The teacher discouraged the students from cheating on the exam.
examples.cn: 老师劝阻学生考试作弊。

examples.en: High costs often discourage people from traveling abroad.
examples.cn: 高昂的费用常常劝阻人们出国旅行。

examples.en: After the vaccine, she was immune to the flu virus.
examples.cn: 接种疫苗后，她对流感病毒免疫了。

examples.en: He seems to be immune to criticism and never gets upset.
examples.cn: 他似乎对批评免疫，从不生气。

examples.en: She supplements her diet with vitamin D during the winter months.
examples.cn: 她在冬季用维生素D补充饮食。

examples.en: The report was supplemented with additional data from recent studies.
examples.cn: 报告用最近研究中的额外数据进行了补充。

examples.en: The company is open to new ideas from all employees.
examples.cn: 公司对所有员工的新想法持开放态度。

examples.en: I am open to suggestions on how to improve the project.
examples.cn: 我愿意接受如何改进项目的建议。

examples.en: The company tried to cover up the financial scandal.
examples.cn: 公司试图掩盖财务丑闻。

examples.en: She used makeup to cover up the bruise on her face.
examples.cn: 她用化妆品掩盖脸上的瘀伤。

examples.en: The cover-up of the crime was eventually exposed by the media.
examples.cn: 犯罪的掩盖最终被媒体曝光了。

examples.en: He wore a hat as a cover-up for his bald spot.
examples.cn: 他戴帽子作为秃顶的掩饰。

definitions.meaning_cn: 没有时间做...，不耐烦对待

examples.en: I have no time for gossip and prefer to focus on work.
examples.cn: 我没有时间闲聊，更喜欢专注于工作。

examples.en: She has no time for people who are always complaining.
examples.cn: 她对总是抱怨的人没有耐心。

examples.en: The decision comes down to whether we can afford it.
examples.cn: 这个决定归结为我们是否能负担得起。

examples.en: In the end, it all comes down to trust in the relationship.
examples.cn: 最终，一切都归结为关系中的信任。

examples.en: The responsibility comes down to the team leader in times of crisis.
examples.cn: 在危机时刻，责任落到了团队领导身上。

examples.en: The inheritance came down to the eldest son.
examples.cn: 遗产落到了长子身上。

valid_entries.original_phrase: cater for the needs of travellers

examples.en: The hotel aims to cater for the needs of travellers by offering multilingual staff.
examples.cn: 这家酒店旨在通过提供多语言员工来满足旅行者的需求。

examples.en: Airports must cater for the needs of travellers with disabilities.
examples.cn: 机场必须满足残疾旅行者的需求。

examples.en: The factory workers are on strike for better wages.
examples.cn: 工厂工人正在罢工，要求更高的工资。

examples.en: Public transport was disrupted because the drivers were on strike.
examples.cn: 公共交通中断，因为司机在罢工。

examples.en: The community fought against the construction of the new highway.
examples.cn: 社区对抗新高速公路的建设。

examples.en: She has been fighting against cancer for years.
examples.cn: 她多年来一直在与癌症作斗争。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's heart in the right place

examples.en: Even though he made a mistake, he has his heart in the right place and meant well.
examples.cn: 尽管他犯了错误，但他心地善良，本意是好的。

examples.en: She may be clumsy, but she has her heart in the right place and always tries to help.
examples.cn: 她可能笨拙，但心地善良，总是尽力帮忙。

examples.en: She studied under a famous scientist during her PhD.
examples.cn: 她在博士期间在一位著名科学家的指导下学习。

examples.en: Many artists study under masters to hone their skills.
examples.cn: 许多艺术家在大师指导下学习以磨练技能。

examples.en: He turned down the job offer because it required too much travel.
examples.cn: 他拒绝了这份工作邀请，因为它需要太多出差。

examples.en: She turned down his proposal, saying she wasn't ready for marriage.
examples.cn: 她拒绝了他的求婚，说她还没准备好结婚。

examples.en: Can you turn down the music? It's too loud.
examples.cn: 你能把音乐调低吗？太吵了。

examples.en: He turned down the heat on the stove to simmer the soup.
examples.cn: 他把炉子上的火调小以炖汤。

valid_entries.original_phrase: prefer to do rather than do

examples.en: I prefer to read a book rather than watch TV in the evening.
examples.cn: 我晚上宁愿看书而不愿看电视。

examples.en: She prefers to travel by train rather than fly because it's more scenic.
examples.cn: 她宁愿坐火车旅行而不愿坐飞机，因为风景更好。

examples.en: Smartphones are common wireless devices used for communication.
examples.cn: 智能手机是用于通信的常见无线设备。

examples.en: The office is equipped with various wireless devices like routers and printers.
examples.cn: 办公室配备了各种无线设备，如路由器和打印机。

examples.en: She had a telephone interview for the remote job position.
examples.cn: 她为远程职位进行了电话面试。

examples.en: The first round of the hiring process is usually a telephone interview.
examples.cn: 招聘过程的第一轮通常是电话面试。

examples.en: The success of the project is dependent upon securing adequate funding.
examples.cn: 项目的成功取决于能否获得足够的资金。

examples.en: Many plants are dependent upon sunlight for photosynthesis.
examples.cn: 许多植物依赖阳光进行光合作用。

examples.en: He became dependent upon painkillers after the surgery.
examples.cn: 手术后他对止痛药产生了依赖性。

examples.en: Some patients are dependent upon insulin to manage their diabetes.
examples.cn: 一些患者依赖胰岛素来控制糖尿病。

examples.en: She planned to get back at her colleague for spreading rumors.
examples.cn: 她计划报复散布谣言的同事。

examples.en: He got back at his friend by playing a prank on him.
examples.cn: 他通过恶作剧报复了他的朋友。

examples.en: The decision will come down to which option is more cost-effective.
examples.cn: 决定将归结为哪个选项更具成本效益。

examples.en: It all comes down to whether you trust him or not.
examples.cn: 这一切都归结为你是否信任他。

examples.en: After negotiations, the price came down to a reasonable level.
examples.cn: 经过谈判，价格降至合理水平。

examples.en: The number of participants came down to just ten due to bad weather.
examples.cn: 由于天气恶劣，参与者人数减少到只有十人。

examples.en: The party turned out to be a huge success.
examples.cn: 派对结果非常成功。

examples.en: It turned out that he had been lying all along.
examples.cn: 结果证明他一直在撒谎。

examples.en: The factory turns out thousands of cars each month.
examples.cn: 这家工厂每月生产数千辆汽车。

examples.en: They turn out high-quality furniture using traditional methods.
examples.cn: 他们用传统方法生产高质量的家具。

examples.en: A large crowd turned out to support the local team.
examples.cn: 一大群人出动支持本地队伍。

examples.en: Many volunteers turned out to help with the cleanup effort.
examples.cn: 许多志愿者出动帮助清理工作。

examples.en: Thus far, the project has been progressing smoothly.
examples.cn: 迄今为止，项目进展顺利。

examples.en: He has not received any complaints thus far.
examples.cn: 到目前为止，他还没有收到任何投诉。

examples.en: If the new plan fails, we can always fall back on the old one.
examples.cn: 如果新计划失败，我们总可以依靠旧计划。

examples.en: She has savings to fall back on in case of emergencies.
examples.cn: 她有储蓄可以在紧急情况下依靠。

examples.en: We need to get out of the house before it starts raining.
examples.cn: 我们需要在下雨前离开房子。

examples.en: Get out of the car and check the engine.
examples.cn: 下车检查发动机。

examples.en: The secret got out and caused a scandal.
examples.cn: 秘密泄露并引发了一场丑闻。

examples.en: News of the merger got out before the official announcement.
examples.cn: 合并的消息在官方宣布前就传出了。

examples.en: He managed to get out of the burning building safely.
examples.cn: 他设法安全地逃出了燃烧的大楼。

examples.en: She wanted to get out of her boring job.
examples.cn: 她想摆脱她无聊的工作。

examples.en: His decision has nothing to do with your opinion.
examples.cn: 他的决定与你的意见无关。

examples.en: The accident had nothing to do with mechanical failure.
examples.cn: 事故与机械故障无关。

examples.en: The education system in this country emphasizes critical thinking.
examples.cn: 这个国家的教育体系强调批判性思维。

examples.en: Reforms are needed to improve the education system.
examples.cn: 需要改革来改善教育体系。

examples.en: Government action is required to address climate change.
examples.cn: 需要政府行动来应对气候变化。

examples.en: The new law is a result of government action on public safety.
examples.cn: 新法律是政府在公共安全方面采取行动的结果。

examples.en: She has a good relationship with her colleagues at work.
examples.cn: 她与工作上的同事关系良好。

examples.en: It's important to have a good relationship with your neighbors.
examples.cn: 与邻居关系良好很重要。

examples.en: I can't make heads or tails of these instructions.
examples.cn: 我无法理解这些说明。

examples.en: He tried to make heads or tails of the complex data.
examples.cn: 他试图弄明白这些复杂的数据。

examples.en: In spite of the rain, the event was well-attended.
examples.cn: 尽管下雨，活动参与人数很多。

examples.en: She succeeded in spite of many obstacles.
examples.cn: 尽管有许多障碍，她还是成功了。

examples.en: Police officers are authorized to carry firearms for protection.
examples.cn: 警察被授权携带枪支以保护自己。

examples.en: It is illegal to carry firearms in this area without a permit.
examples.cn: 未经许可在此区域携带枪支是违法的。

examples.en: It was such a beautiful day that we decided to go for a picnic.
examples.cn: 天气如此美好，以至于我们决定去野餐。

examples.en: He made such a convincing argument that everyone agreed with him.
examples.cn: 他的论点如此有说服力，以至于每个人都同意他。

definitions.meaning_cn: 适应工作环境，融入职场

examples.en: New employees need time to fit into the workplace culture.
examples.cn: 新员工需要时间来适应职场文化。

examples.en: Her skills fit well into the workplace requirements.
examples.cn: 她的技能很好地适应了职场要求。

examples.en: Proper disposal of hazardous waste is essential for environmental protection.
examples.cn: 妥善处理危险废物对环境保护至关重要。

examples.en: The factory produces hazardous waste that must be handled carefully.
examples.cn: 工厂产生必须小心处理的危险废物。

examples.en: He asked his brother to be the best man at his wedding.
examples.cn: 他请他的兄弟在他的婚礼上当伴郎。

examples.en: The best man gave a heartfelt speech during the reception.
examples.cn: 伴郎在招待会上发表了感人的演讲。

examples.en: For this difficult task, he's the best man for the job.
examples.cn: 对于这项困难的任务，他是最佳人选。

examples.en: In the team, she is considered the best man in crisis situations.
examples.cn: 在团队中，她被认为是危机情况下最得力的人。

examples.en: The refreshments were provided courtesy of the local bakery.
examples.cn: 茶点由当地面包店提供。

examples.en: This opportunity came courtesy of a generous donor.
examples.cn: 这个机会承蒙一位慷慨捐赠者的好意。

examples.en: Scientists are working hard to cure diseases like cancer.
examples.cn: 科学家们正在努力治愈癌症等疾病。

examples.en: Advances in medicine have helped cure many infectious diseases.
examples.cn: 医学的进步帮助治愈了许多传染病。

examples.en: During the crisis, it's important to keep cool and think clearly.
examples.cn: 在危机期间，保持冷静并清晰思考很重要。

examples.en: She managed to keep cool even when everyone else was panicking.
examples.cn: 即使其他人都惊慌失措，她也能保持镇定。

examples.en: Drink plenty of water to keep cool in this hot weather.
examples.cn: 在这种炎热的天气里，多喝水以保持凉爽。

examples.en: The fan helps keep the room cool during summer.
examples.cn: 风扇有助于在夏天保持房间凉爽。

definitions.meaning_cn: 坚持做某事，持续做某事

examples.en: He persists in practicing the piano every day despite the challenges.
examples.cn: 尽管有挑战，他仍坚持每天练习钢琴。

examples.en: If you persist in studying hard, you will eventually succeed.
examples.cn: 如果你坚持努力学习，最终会成功的。

examples.en: The company faces stiff competition from new startups in the market.
examples.cn: 这家公司面临市场上新创业公司的激烈竞争。

examples.en: There is stiff competition for the championship title this season.
examples.cn: 本赛季冠军头衔的竞争非常激烈。

examples.en: The meeting will last at the longest two hours.
examples.cn: 会议最多持续两个小时。

examples.en: You can borrow the book for at the longest one week.
examples.cn: 这本书你最多可以借一周。

examples.en: He was just going through the motions at work, not really putting in effort.
examples.cn: 他在工作中只是敷衍了事，并没有真正投入努力。

examples.en: She went through the motions of apologizing without meaning it.
examples.cn: 她敷衍地道歉，并非真心实意。

examples.en: The company hired a marketing consultant to improve its advertising strategy.
examples.cn: 公司聘请了一位营销顾问来改进其广告策略。

examples.en: As a marketing consultant, she advises clients on brand development.
examples.cn: 作为一名营销顾问，她就品牌发展向客户提供建议。

examples.en: Organic chemistry is the study of carbon-based compounds.
examples.cn: 有机化学是研究碳基化合物的学科。

examples.en: She excelled in organic chemistry during her university studies.
examples.cn: 她在大学学习期间在有机化学方面表现出色。

definitions.meaning_cn: 定制某物，让人制作某物

examples.en: I had a custom dress made for the wedding.
examples.cn: 我为婚礼定制了一件连衣裙。

examples.en: They had the furniture made by a local carpenter.
examples.cn: 他们让当地木匠制作了家具。

examples.en: After years of struggling, he finally gave up the ghost and quit the project.
examples.cn: 经过多年的挣扎，他终于放弃并退出了这个项目。

examples.en: The old car gave up the ghost on the highway and stopped working.
examples.cn: 那辆旧车在高速公路上报废了，停止工作了。

examples.en: She models her leadership style on her mentor's approach.
examples.cn: 她以导师的方法为榜样来塑造自己的领导风格。

examples.en: The new policy is modeled on successful practices from other countries.
examples.cn: 新政策模仿了其他国家的成功做法。

examples.en: The room was filled with laughter during the party.
examples.cn: 派对期间，房间里充满了笑声。

examples.en: Her heart is filled with gratitude for the support she received.
examples.cn: 她的心中充满了对所获支持的感激之情。

examples.en: No matter how hard it gets, don't give up on your dreams.
examples.cn: 无论多么困难，都不要放弃你的梦想。

examples.en: She will help you no matter how busy she is.
examples.cn: 无论她多忙，都会帮助你。

examples.en: He rushed to the station only to find that the train had already left.
examples.cn: 他冲到车站，结果却发现火车已经开走了。

examples.en: She studied hard for the exam only to fail by one point.
examples.cn: 她为考试努力学习，结果却以一分之差不及格。

examples.en: He cast about for a new job after being laid off.
examples.cn: 被解雇后，他四处寻找新工作。

examples.en: She cast about for ideas to solve the problem.
examples.cn: 她四处寻找解决问题的办法。

examples.en: The constant friction wears away the surface of the stone.
examples.cn: 持续的摩擦磨损了石头的表面。

examples.en: Over time, the inscription on the monument has worn away.
examples.cn: 随着时间的推移，纪念碑上的铭文已经磨损了。

examples.en: The company produces goods on a large scale to meet global demand.
examples.cn: 这家公司大规模生产商品以满足全球需求。

examples.en: The government implemented the policy on a large scale across the country.
examples.cn: 政府在全国范围内大规模实施了这项政策。

examples.en: The cost of the project is in the neighbourhood of $10,000.
examples.cn: 这个项目的成本大约为一万美元。

examples.en: She lives in the neighbourhood of the city center.
examples.cn: 她住在市中心附近。

examples.en: Take an umbrella in case it rains later.
examples.cn: 带把伞，以防晚些时候下雨。

examples.en: In case you need help, just call me.
examples.cn: 如果你需要帮助，就打电话给我。

examples.en: We need to find ways to reduce costs without sacrificing quality.
examples.cn: 我们需要找到在不牺牲质量的情况下降低成本的方法。

examples.en: She always finds ways to motivate her team.
examples.cn: 她总能找到激励团队的方法。

definitions.meaning_cn: 地位象征，指显示社会地位或财富的物品或特征

examples.en: Owning a luxury car is often seen as a status symbol in many societies.
examples.cn: 在许多社会中，拥有一辆豪车常被视为地位象征。

examples.en: In some cultures, expensive jewelry serves as a status symbol among the elite.
examples.cn: 在某些文化中，昂贵的珠宝在精英阶层中充当地位象征。

definitions.meaning_cn: 管理技能，指有效组织、领导和控制资源的能力

examples.en: Good management skills are essential for running a successful team.
examples.cn: 良好的管理技能对于成功领导团队至关重要。

examples.en: She improved her management skills through years of experience in the industry.
examples.cn: 通过多年行业经验，她提升了自己的管理技能。

definitions.meaning_cn: 面对，指在某种困难或挑战面前

examples.en: He remained calm in the face of adversity.
examples.cn: 面对逆境，他保持冷静。

examples.en: The team showed great resilience in the face of criticism.
examples.cn: 面对批评，团队表现出极大的韧性。

definitions.meaning_cn: 缺乏，指数量不足或达不到某种标准

examples.en: We are short of staff for the upcoming project.
examples.cn: 对于即将到来的项目，我们人手不足。

examples.en: The company fell short of its sales targets this quarter.
examples.cn: 公司本季度未达到销售目标。

definitions.meaning_cn: 除了，指排除某种可能性

examples.en: Short of a miracle, we cannot finish this on time.
examples.cn: 除非出现奇迹，否则我们无法按时完成。

examples.en: There's no solution short of starting over from scratch.
examples.cn: 除了从头开始，没有其他解决办法。

definitions.meaning_cn: 离开或出发，指开始移动或离去

examples.en: We need to be off by 6 AM to catch the early train.
examples.cn: 我们需要在早上6点前出发以赶上早班火车。

examples.en: She was off to the market to buy some groceries.
examples.cn: 她出发去市场买些杂货。

definitions.meaning_cn: 关闭或停止，指设备或活动不再运行

examples.en: Make sure the lights are off before you leave the room.
examples.cn: 离开房间前确保灯已关闭。

examples.en: The meeting is off due to unforeseen circumstances.
examples.cn: 由于意外情况，会议取消了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 变质或变坏，指食物或物品不再新鲜

examples.en: This milk smells like it might be off.
examples.cn: 这牛奶闻起来可能变质了。

examples.en: The meat was off, so we had to throw it away.
examples.cn: 肉变质了，所以我们不得不扔掉。

definitions.meaning_cn: 假冒产品，指模仿正品但质量低劣或非法的物品

examples.en: The market was flooded with fake products that deceived many consumers.
examples.cn: 市场上充斥着欺骗许多消费者的假冒产品。

examples.en: Authorities seized a shipment of fake products at the border.
examples.cn: 当局在边境查获了一批假冒产品。

definitions.meaning_cn: 陷入麻烦，指处于困境或受到责备

examples.en: He found himself in hot water after missing the deadline.
examples.cn: 错过截止日期后，他发现自己陷入了麻烦。

examples.en: The company is in hot water over the recent scandal.
examples.cn: 由于最近的丑闻，公司陷入了困境。

definitions.meaning_cn: 光明正大，指行为合法、诚实和透明

examples.en: All their transactions are above board and fully documented.
examples.cn: 他们所有的交易都光明正大且有完整记录。

examples.en: We ensure that our business practices are always above board.
examples.cn: 我们确保商业行为始终光明正大。

definitions.meaning_cn: 换挡，指车辆中改变齿轮以调整速度

examples.en: A smooth gear change is important for efficient driving.
examples.cn: 平稳换挡对于高效驾驶很重要。

examples.en: He struggled with the gear change when learning to drive a manual car.
examples.cn: 学习开手动车时，他在换挡上遇到了困难。

definitions.meaning_cn: 转变，指策略或方法上的重大调整

examples.en: The company made a gear change in its marketing strategy to target younger audiences.
examples.cn: 公司在营销策略上做出转变，以瞄准年轻受众。

examples.en: After the setback, they implemented a gear change in their approach.
examples.cn: 挫折之后，他们在方法上实施了转变。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在...方面，指由某人或某方负责或表现

examples.en: There was a lack of effort on the part of the team.
examples.cn: 在团队方面，努力不足。

examples.en: Any mistakes on the part of the management will be addressed promptly.
examples.cn: 管理方面的任何错误都将及时处理。

definitions.meaning_cn: 保持距离，指避免亲近或接触

examples.en: She prefers to keep strangers at a distance until she gets to know them.
examples.cn: 在了解陌生人之前，她倾向于与他们保持距离。

examples.en: It's wise to keep potential risks at a distance in business dealings.
examples.cn: 在商业交易中，与潜在风险保持距离是明智的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 以...命名，指根据某人或某物来取名

examples.en: The city is named after a famous historical figure.
examples.cn: 这座城市以一位著名的历史人物命名。

examples.en: The species was named after its discoverer.
examples.cn: 这个物种以其发现者命名。

definitions.meaning_cn: 从...出现，指从某处或某种状态中出来

examples.en: The sun emerged from behind the clouds.
examples.cn: 太阳从云层后出现。

examples.en: She emerged from the meeting with a clear plan.
examples.cn: 她从会议中出来，有了清晰的计划。

definitions.meaning_cn: 摆脱，指从困难或负面情况中恢复

examples.en: The country is slowly emerging from the economic crisis.
examples.cn: 该国正慢慢从经济危机中恢复。

examples.en: He emerged from the experience as a stronger person.
examples.cn: 他从这次经历中走出来，变得更坚强。

definitions.meaning_cn: 因此，指作为结果或后果

examples.en: He failed to submit the report on time, and as a consequence, he faced penalties.
examples.cn: 他未能按时提交报告，因此面临处罚。

examples.en: The road was closed, and as a consequence, traffic was diverted.
examples.cn: 道路封闭，因此交通改道。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对...粗鲁，指以不礼貌的方式对待他人

examples.en: It's never acceptable to be rude to customers.
examples.cn: 对顾客粗鲁是绝不可接受的。

examples.en: She apologized for being rude to her colleague during the argument.
examples.cn: 她为在争论中对同事粗鲁而道歉。

definitions.meaning_cn: 种植作物，指农业中培育植物以供收获

examples.en: Farmers cultivate crops such as wheat and corn in this region.
examples.cn: 农民在这个地区种植小麦和玉米等作物。

examples.en: They use sustainable methods to cultivate crops without harming the environment.
examples.cn: 他们使用可持续方法种植作物，不损害环境。

definitions.meaning_cn: 立即，指毫不拖延地行动

examples.en: Please respond to the email without delay.
examples.cn: 请立即回复这封邮件。

examples.en: The emergency services arrived without delay after the call.
examples.cn: 紧急服务在接到电话后立即到达。

definitions.meaning_cn: 失控，指情况变得无法管理或混乱

examples.en: The protest got out of control and turned violent.
examples.cn: 抗议失控并变得暴力。

examples.en: If you don't manage your budget, your spending can get out of control.
examples.cn: 如果不管理预算，你的支出可能会失控。

definitions.meaning_cn: 缓冲坠落，指减轻摔倒时的冲击

examples.en: He used his arms to break his fall when he slipped on the ice.
examples.cn: 在冰上滑倒时，他用胳膊缓冲了坠落。

examples.en: The soft ground helped break her fall and prevent serious injury.
examples.cn: 柔软的地面帮助缓冲了她的坠落，防止了严重受伤。

examples.en: She centered her attention on the speaker's main argument.
examples.cn: 她把注意力集中在演讲者的主要论点上。

examples.en: During meditation, try to center your attention on your breathing.
examples.cn: 冥想时，试着将注意力集中在呼吸上。

examples.en: Students benefit by participating in extracurricular activities.
examples.cn: 学生通过参加课外活动受益。

examples.en: The company will benefit by implementing new technology.
examples.cn: 公司通过实施新技术将受益。

examples.en: He fixed my computer for nothing, as a favor.
examples.cn: 他免费修好了我的电脑，作为帮忙。

examples.en: All our efforts were for nothing when the project was canceled.
examples.cn: 项目取消时，我们所有的努力都白费了。

examples.en: She got angry for nothing over a minor comment.
examples.cn: 她因为一句小评论无缘无故地生气了。

examples.en: Don't worry for nothing; everything will be fine.
examples.cn: 别无缘无故地担心；一切都会好的。

examples.en: The bird's colorful plumage is a distinctive characteristic.
examples.cn: 这只鸟色彩鲜艳的羽毛是一个显著特征。

examples.en: His sense of humor is a distinctive characteristic that everyone notices.
examples.cn: 他的幽默感是每个人都注意到的显著特征。

examples.en: Let's settle up the bill before we leave the restaurant.
examples.cn: 我们离开餐厅前把账单结清吧。

examples.en: They settled up their debts after the business deal.
examples.cn: 他们在商业交易后结清了债务。

definitions.meaning_cn: 起鸡皮疙瘩（因寒冷、恐惧或激动）

examples.en: The scary movie made me get goose bumps.
examples.cn: 那部恐怖电影让我起鸡皮疙瘩。

examples.en: Listening to her beautiful singing gave me goose bumps.
examples.cn: 听她美妙的歌声让我起鸡皮疙瘩。

examples.en: The ambitious project came to grief due to lack of funding.
examples.cn: 这个雄心勃勃的项目因缺乏资金而失败。

examples.en: He came to grief when his car skidded on the icy road.
examples.cn: 当他的车在结冰的路上打滑时，他遭遇了不幸。

examples.en: She put her language skills to use by working as a translator.
examples.cn: 她通过担任翻译来利用她的语言技能。

examples.en: We should put this old equipment to use instead of throwing it away.
examples.cn: 我们应该利用这台旧设备，而不是扔掉它。

examples.en: Members of the upper class often attend prestigious schools.
examples.cn: 上层阶级的成员通常就读于名校。

examples.en: The upper class in that society has significant political influence.
examples.cn: 那个社会的上层阶级具有重要的政治影响力。

examples.en: I made a mistake, so I need to do the assignment over.
examples.cn: 我犯了个错误，所以需要重做这个作业。

examples.en: They decided to do the experiment over to ensure accuracy.
examples.cn: 他们决定重做实验以确保准确性。

examples.en: The meeting dragged out for hours without a conclusion.
examples.cn: 会议拖延了几个小时没有结论。

examples.en: Don't drag out the decision-making process; we need to act quickly.
examples.cn: 不要拖延决策过程；我们需要迅速行动。

examples.en: He dragged out an old suitcase from the attic.
examples.cn: 他从阁楼里拉出一个旧手提箱。

examples.en: Firefighters dragged out the victims from the burning building.
examples.cn: 消防员从燃烧的建筑物中拉出受害者。

examples.en: It rained all day yesterday, so we stayed indoors.
examples.cn: 昨天下了一整天的雨，所以我们待在室内。

examples.en: She worked on the report all day without a break.
examples.cn: 她一整天都在写报告，没有休息。

examples.en: Set aside some money each month for emergencies.
examples.cn: 每月留出一些钱以备紧急情况。

examples.en: We need to set aside time to discuss this issue.
examples.cn: 我们需要留出时间来讨论这个问题。

examples.en: Let's set aside our differences and work together.
examples.cn: 让我们搁置分歧，一起工作。

examples.en: The court set aside the previous ruling due to new evidence.
examples.cn: 由于新证据，法院搁置了先前的裁决。

examples.en: Please return the book at your convenience.
examples.cn: 请在您方便的时候归还这本书。

examples.en: We can schedule the meeting at your convenience.
examples.cn: 我们可以在您方便的时候安排会议。

examples.en: He has an itching palm and is always looking for ways to make extra money.
examples.cn: 他贪财，总是在寻找赚外快的方法。

examples.en: Politicians with itching palms are often involved in corruption.
examples.cn: 贪财的政客常常涉及腐败。

definitions.meaning_cn: 走开，离开（通常用于命令或拒绝）

examples.en: If you don't like my ideas, you can take a hike.
examples.cn: 如果你不喜欢我的想法，你可以走开。

examples.en: He told the annoying salesman to take a hike.
examples.cn: 他告诉那个烦人的推销员走开。

examples.en: We decided to take a hike in the mountains this weekend.
examples.cn: 我们决定这个周末去山里远足。

examples.en: Taking a hike is a great way to enjoy nature.
examples.cn: 去远足是享受大自然的好方法。

examples.en: We need to build on our previous successes to achieve more.
examples.cn: 我们需要在以往成功的基础上发展，以取得更多成就。

examples.en: The new theory builds on earlier research in the field.
examples.cn: 新理论建立在该领域早期研究的基础上。

examples.en: The teacher was pleased with the students' progress.
examples.cn: 老师对学生的进步感到满意。

examples.en: I am pleased with the results of the project.
examples.cn: 我对项目的结果感到满意。

examples.en: The store offered a replacement for the defective product.
examples.cn: 商店为有缺陷的产品提供了替换品。

examples.en: If the item is damaged, we can offer a replacement or a refund.
examples.cn: 如果物品损坏，我们可以提供替换品或退款。

examples.en: The children threw a ball at each other in the park.
examples.cn: 孩子们在公园里互相扔球。

examples.en: He threw a stone at the window, breaking it.
examples.cn: 他向窗户扔了一块石头，打破了它。

examples.en: During the debate, candidates threw tough questions at each other.
examples.cn: 辩论期间，候选人互相提出尖锐的问题。

examples.en: The critics threw harsh comments at the new film.
examples.cn: 评论家们对这部新电影提出了严厉的批评。

examples.en: I was scared to death when I saw the spider crawling on my pillow.
examples.cn: 当我看到蜘蛛在我枕头上爬时，我吓得要死。

examples.en: The loud thunder scared the children to death during the storm.
examples.cn: 雷声大作时，孩子们被吓得要死。

examples.en: The garbage collector comes every Tuesday to pick up our trash.
examples.cn: 垃圾收集者每周二来收我们的垃圾。

examples.en: He works as a garbage collector and starts his shift at 5 AM.
examples.cn: 他是一名垃圾收集者，早上5点开始工作。

definitions.meaning_cn: 垃圾回收器（计算机科学）

examples.en: The garbage collector in Java automatically frees up unused memory.
examples.cn: Java中的垃圾回收器自动释放未使用的内存。

examples.en: A well-tuned garbage collector can improve application performance.
examples.cn: 调优良好的垃圾回收器可以提高应用程序性能。

examples.en: I need to buy a new washing machine because the old one broke down.
examples.cn: 我需要买一台新洗衣机，因为旧的坏了。

examples.en: She loaded the washing machine with dirty clothes and added detergent.
examples.cn: 她把脏衣服放进洗衣机并加了洗涤剂。

examples.en: He went overboard with the decorations and spent thousands of dollars.
examples.cn: 他在装饰上做得太过分，花了好几千美元。

examples.en: Don't go overboard with the spices, or the dish will be too spicy.
examples.cn: 别放太多香料，否则这道菜会太辣。

examples.en: The sailor went overboard during the storm and was rescued by the crew.
examples.cn: 那名水手在暴风雨中从船上掉入水中，被船员救起。

examples.en: If you go overboard, stay calm and float until help arrives.
examples.cn: 如果你从船上落水，保持冷静并漂浮直到救援到来。

examples.en: Bell-bottom pants are out of fashion now, but they were popular in the 1970s.
examples.cn: 喇叭裤现在已经过时了，但在20世纪70年代很流行。

examples.en: That hairstyle is completely out of fashion; you should try something more modern.
examples.cn: 那个发型完全过时了，你应该试试更现代的发型。

examples.en: As a full-time student, she takes at least 12 credits per semester.
examples.cn: 作为一名全日制学生，她每学期至少修12个学分。

examples.en: He works part-time while being a full-time student to pay for his tuition.
examples.cn: 他在做全日制学生的同时兼职工作来支付学费。

examples.en: They kept me in the dark about the surprise party until the last minute.
examples.cn: 他们对我隐瞒了惊喜派对的事，直到最后一刻。

examples.en: The public was left in the dark about the company's financial troubles.
examples.cn: 公众对公司的财务困境一无所知。

examples.en: The power outage left the entire building in the dark.
examples.cn: 停电使整栋大楼陷入黑暗。

examples.en: She prefers to sleep in the dark with no lights on.
examples.cn: 她喜欢在黑暗中睡觉，不开灯。

examples.en: To start with, let's review the agenda for today's meeting.
examples.cn: 首先，让我们回顾一下今天会议的议程。

examples.en: We only had $100 to start with, but we managed to grow the business.
examples.cn: 一开始我们只有100美元，但我们设法扩大了业务。

examples.en: Despite their divorce, they remain on good terms for the sake of their children.
examples.cn: 尽管离婚了，但为了孩子，他们仍然保持良好关系。

examples.en: It's important to be on good terms with your neighbors.
examples.cn: 与邻居保持良好关系很重要。

examples.en: Don't waste your money on unnecessary gadgets.
examples.cn: 别把钱浪费在不必要的小玩意上。

examples.en: He wasted three hours on a project that was later canceled.
examples.cn: 他在一个后来被取消的项目上浪费了三个小时。

examples.en: She plans to retire from teaching next year after 30 years of service.
examples.cn: 她计划在服务30年后明年从教学岗位退休。

examples.en: He retired from the military and now enjoys a quiet life in the countryside.
examples.cn: 他从军队退休，现在在乡村享受宁静的生活。

examples.en: The New York Stock Exchange is one of the largest in the world.
examples.cn: 纽约证券交易所是世界上最大的证券交易所之一。

examples.en: Companies list their shares on the stock exchange to raise capital.
examples.cn: 公司在证券交易所上市股票以筹集资金。

examples.en: The dog likes to chew on bones to keep its teeth clean.
examples.cn: 这只狗喜欢啃骨头来保持牙齿清洁。

examples.en: Make sure to chew on your food thoroughly before swallowing.
examples.cn: 确保在吞咽前彻底咀嚼食物。

examples.en: I need some time to chew on this proposal before making a decision.
examples.cn: 我需要一些时间仔细考虑这个提议再做决定。

examples.en: He chewed on the problem for days before finding a solution.
examples.cn: 他深思了这个问题好几天才找到解决方案。

examples.en: They offered the software for free to attract more users.
examples.cn: 他们免费提供该软件以吸引更多用户。

examples.en: You can download the e-book for free from the website.
examples.cn: 你可以从网站上免费下载这本电子书。

examples.en: She has a great deal of experience in marketing.
examples.cn: 她在市场营销方面有丰富的经验。

examples.en: The project requires a great deal of time and effort.
examples.cn: 这个项目需要大量的时间和精力。

valid_entries.original_phrase: be not in the mood for sth.

examples.en: I'm not in the mood for a movie tonight; let's just stay home.
examples.cn: 我今晚没心情看电影，我们就待在家里吧。

examples.en: She was not in the mood for small talk after a long day at work.
examples.cn: 工作了一整天后，她没心情闲聊。

examples.en: All employees must adhere to the company regulations regarding dress code.
examples.cn: 所有员工必须遵守公司关于着装的规定。

examples.en: The new company regulations were introduced to improve workplace safety.
examples.cn: 引入了新的公司规章制度以提高工作场所安全。

examples.en: I would sooner walk than take the bus in this traffic.
examples.cn: 在这种交通状况下，我宁愿走路也不坐公交车。

examples.en: She would sooner resign than work under such unfair conditions.
examples.cn: 她宁愿辞职也不愿在如此不公平的条件下工作。

examples.en: Let's get this straight: you are responsible for the report, not me.
examples.cn: 让我们弄清楚：你负责这份报告，不是我。

examples.en: I need to get the facts straight before I can make a decision.
examples.cn: 我需要先弄清楚事实才能做决定。

examples.en: She gave birth to a healthy baby boy last night.
examples.cn: 她昨晚生下了一个健康的男婴。

examples.en: The panda gave birth to twins at the zoo.
examples.cn: 这只熊猫在动物园产下了一对双胞胎。

examples.en: The Industrial Revolution gave birth to modern capitalism.
examples.cn: 工业革命催生了现代资本主义。

examples.en: His innovative idea gave birth to a new field of study.
examples.cn: 他的创新想法催生了一个新的研究领域。

examples.en: The committee voted in favour of the new policy.
examples.cn: 委员会投票支持新政策。

examples.en: I am in favour of reducing plastic waste.
examples.cn: 我赞成减少塑料垃圾。

examples.en: The decision was made in favour of the employees.
examples.cn: 这个决定有利于员工。

examples.en: The court ruled in favour of the plaintiff.
examples.cn: 法院作出了有利于原告的裁决。

definitions.meaning_cn: 残疾人厕所，无障碍厕所

examples.en: The building has a handicapped toilet on the ground floor.
examples.cn: 这栋楼的一楼有一个残疾人厕所。

examples.en: Please reserve the handicapped toilet for those with disabilities.
examples.cn: 请将残疾人厕所留给残障人士使用。

examples.en: After moving to the countryside, they put down roots and started a farm.
examples.cn: 搬到乡下后，他们扎根下来并开始经营农场。

examples.en: It's time to put down roots and buy a house in this city.
examples.cn: 是时候在这个城市扎根并买房子了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 建立牢固的基础或联系

examples.en: The company put down roots in the community by supporting local events.
examples.cn: 公司通过支持本地活动在社区中建立了牢固的联系。

examples.en: She put down roots in the industry through years of hard work.
examples.cn: 她通过多年的努力在行业中建立了牢固的基础。

examples.en: I'm still on the fence about whether to accept the job offer.
examples.cn: 我还在犹豫是否接受这份工作邀请。

examples.en: Many voters are on the fence before the election.
examples.cn: 许多选民在选举前持观望态度。

examples.en: Students should make notes during the lecture to review later.
examples.cn: 学生应该在讲座期间做笔记以便之后复习。

examples.en: I made notes of the key points from the meeting.
examples.cn: 我记录了会议的关键点。

examples.en: Please submit your application to the admissions office by Friday.
examples.cn: 请在周五前将你的申请提交给招生办公室。

examples.en: He submitted the report to his manager for approval.
examples.cn: 他将报告提交给经理审批。

examples.en: The country was forced to submit to the invaders.
examples.cn: 这个国家被迫屈服于入侵者。

examples.en: She submitted herself to a strict training regimen.
examples.cn: 她使自己服从于严格的训练计划。

examples.en: You need two passport photos for the visa application.
examples.cn: 申请签证需要两张护照照片。

examples.en: The passport photo must meet specific size and background requirements.
examples.cn: 护照照片必须符合特定的尺寸和背景要求。

examples.en: She had hold of the rope tightly to avoid falling.
examples.cn: 她紧紧抓住绳子以防摔倒。

examples.en: The child had hold of his mother's hand in the crowd.
examples.cn: 孩子在人群中紧紧握住妈妈的手。

examples.en: The company has hold of a large market share.
examples.cn: 这家公司掌握着很大的市场份额。

examples.en: He has hold of the situation and knows what to do.
examples.cn: 他控制着局面，知道该怎么做。

examples.en: The store specializes in selling hi-tech products like smartphones and drones.
examples.cn: 这家商店专门销售智能手机和无人机等高科技产品。

examples.en: Investing in hi-tech products can be profitable but risky.
examples.cn: 投资高科技产品可能有利可图但也有风险。

examples.en: Fans swarmed into the stadium for the concert.
examples.cn: 粉丝们蜂拥而入体育场参加音乐会。

examples.en: Tourists swarm into the city during the holiday season.
examples.cn: 游客在假日季节大量涌入这座城市。

examples.en: In the main, the project was a success despite some minor issues.
examples.cn: 大体上，尽管有一些小问题，这个项目是成功的。

examples.en: The report is accurate in the main, but needs a few corrections.
examples.cn: 这份报告大体上是准确的，但需要一些修正。

examples.en: The artist conveys emotions to the audience through her paintings.
examples.cn: 这位艺术家通过她的画作向观众传达情感。

examples.en: He conveyed his gratitude to his friends with a heartfelt speech.
examples.cn: 他用真挚的演讲向朋友们传达了他的感激之情。

examples.en: I will be away from the office next week on vacation.
examples.cn: 我下周将离开办公室去度假。

examples.en: She has been away from home for months due to work.
examples.cn: 由于工作，她已经离开家好几个月了。

examples.en: It's important to be away from negative influences.
examples.cn: 远离负面影响很重要。

examples.en: He tries to be away from conflict as much as possible.
examples.cn: 他尽可能避免冲突。

examples.en: If you don't study, you run the risk of failing the exam.
examples.cn: 如果你不学习，你就有考试不及格的风险。

examples.en: Investing in stocks runs the risk of losing money.
examples.cn: 投资股票有亏钱的风险。

examples.en: Employees are entitled to paid vacation days.
examples.cn: 员工有权享有带薪休假。

examples.en: As a citizen, you are entitled to vote in elections.
examples.cn: 作为公民，你有权在选举中投票。

examples.en: The book is entitled 'The Great Adventure'.
examples.cn: 这本书被命名为《伟大的冒险》。

examples.en: The movie is entitled to win several awards.
examples.cn: 这部电影有资格赢得多个奖项。

examples.en: The party was held in celebration of her graduation.
examples.cn: 这个派对是为庆祝她毕业而举行的。

examples.en: Fireworks are set off in celebration of the New Year.
examples.cn: 燃放烟花是为了庆祝新年。

examples.en: I am proud of my daughter for winning the competition.
examples.cn: 我为女儿赢得比赛感到自豪。

examples.en: They are proud of their country's achievements.
examples.cn: 他们为自己国家的成就感到自豪。

examples.en: She exerted herself to finish the project on time.
examples.cn: 她努力按时完成这个项目。

examples.en: Athletes exert themselves to achieve their best performance.
examples.cn: 运动员们努力达到最佳表现。

examples.en: After winning three lotteries, he felt his luck had run out when he lost his job.
examples.cn: 中了三次彩票后，他丢了工作，感觉运气已经用尽了。

examples.en: The gambler knew his luck had run out when he lost all his savings in one night.
examples.cn: 赌徒一夜之间输光了所有积蓄，知道自己的运气已经到头了。

examples.en: Keep the first aid kit at hand in case of emergencies.
examples.cn: 把急救箱放在手边，以备紧急情况使用。

examples.en: She always has a notebook at hand to jot down ideas.
examples.cn: 她总是把笔记本放在手边，以便随时记下想法。

examples.en: With the deadline at hand, the team worked overtime to finish the project.
examples.cn: 截止日期临近，团队加班完成项目。

examples.en: The holiday season is at hand, so stores are stocking up on gifts.
examples.cn: 假期即将到来，商店正在备货礼品。

definitions.meaning_cn: 下班时间，停止工作的时间

examples.en: At quitting time, employees quickly packed up and left the office.
examples.cn: 下班时间一到，员工们迅速收拾东西离开办公室。

examples.en: The factory's quitting time is 5 PM sharp every day.
examples.cn: 工厂的下班时间是每天下午5点整。

examples.en: With regard to your inquiry, we will respond within 24 hours.
examples.cn: 关于您的询问，我们将在24小时内回复。

examples.en: The report provides details with regard to the company's financial performance.
examples.cn: 这份报告提供了关于公司财务表现的详细信息。

examples.en: The entrepreneur made a pitch to investors for funding her startup.
examples.cn: 这位企业家向投资者推销，为她的初创公司争取资金。

examples.en: He made a pitch for the new product during the sales meeting.
examples.cn: 他在销售会议上为新产品的推广做了宣传。

examples.en: She made a pitch for a team-building activity to improve morale.
examples.cn: 她提出了一个团队建设活动的建议，以提高士气。

examples.en: The student made a pitch to the teacher for extending the deadline.
examples.cn: 学生向老师提出了延长截止日期的建议。

examples.en: She is in the habit of reading a book before bed every night.
examples.cn: 她习惯于每晚睡前读一本书。

examples.en: He is in the habit of checking his email first thing in the morning.
examples.cn: 他习惯于早上第一件事就是查看电子邮件。

examples.en: During the storm, we were shut in the house for safety.
examples.cn: 暴风雨期间，我们为了安全被关在房子里。

examples.en: The cat was shut in the room accidentally and meowed loudly.
examples.cn: 猫被意外关在房间里，大声喵喵叫。

examples.en: After the accident, he became more shut in and avoided social gatherings.
examples.cn: 事故发生后，他变得更加内向，避免社交聚会。

examples.en: She felt shut in by her shyness and found it hard to make friends.
examples.cn: 她因害羞而感到孤僻，发现很难交朋友。

examples.en: The bird flew out of sight behind the trees.
examples.cn: 鸟飞到了树后，看不见了。

examples.en: Keep the medicine out of sight of children to prevent accidents.
examples.cn: 把药放在孩子看不见的地方，以防意外。

examples.en: That new car is out of sight! I wish I could afford it.
examples.cn: 那辆新车太棒了！我希望我能买得起。

examples.en: Her performance in the play was out of sight, earning her a standing ovation.
examples.cn: 她在剧中的表演非常出色，赢得了起立鼓掌。

examples.en: He had to bend over to pick up the coin from the floor.
examples.cn: 他不得不弯腰从地板上捡起硬币。

examples.en: She bent over to tie her shoelaces before starting the run.
examples.cn: 她在开始跑步前弯腰系鞋带。

examples.en: The manager is always bending over to please the demanding client.
examples.cn: 经理总是卑躬屈膝地取悦苛刻的客户。

examples.en: Don't bend over backwards for them; they don't appreciate it.
examples.cn: 不要为他们过度努力，他们不领情。

examples.en: He often boasts of his wealth and expensive possessions.
examples.cn: 他经常夸耀自己的财富和昂贵的财产。

examples.en: She boasted of her academic achievements during the interview.
examples.cn: 她在面试中吹嘘了自己的学术成就。

examples.en: I can't make out the words on the sign from this distance.
examples.cn: 从这个距离我辨认不出标志上的字。

examples.en: It was hard to make out what she was saying in the noisy room.
examples.cn: 在嘈杂的房间里，很难理解她在说什么。

examples.en: Please make out the check to the company name.
examples.cn: 请将支票开具给公司名称。

examples.en: He made out a receipt for the purchase.
examples.cn: 他为这次购买开具了一张收据。

examples.en: The store will stay open until midnight during the holiday season.
examples.cn: 假日期间，商店将一直营业到午夜。

examples.en: Please leave the window stay open to let in some fresh air.
examples.cn: 请让窗户保持打开，让新鲜空气进来。

examples.en: Banks and credit unions are common types of financial institutions.
examples.cn: 银行和信用合作社是常见的金融机构类型。

examples.en: The government regulates financial institutions to ensure stability.
examples.cn: 政府监管金融机构以确保稳定。

examples.en: Visiting the theme park was a pleasurable experience for the whole family.
