examples.cn: 参观主题公园对全家人来说是一次愉快的经历。

examples.en: Reading a good book by the fireplace is always a pleasurable experience.
examples.cn: 在壁炉旁读一本好书总是一种愉快的经历。

examples.en: The investigation showed that the driver was at fault for the accident.
examples.cn: 调查显示司机对这起事故负有责任。

examples.en: If the product fails, the manufacturer may be at fault.
examples.cn: 如果产品失效，制造商可能有过错。

definitions.meaning_cn: 无权做某事，不应该做某事

examples.en: You have no business criticizing her decisions without knowing the facts.
examples.cn: 在不了解事实的情况下，你无权批评她的决定。

examples.en: He has no business entering the restricted area without permission.
examples.cn: 他未经许可无权进入限制区域。

examples.en: Whales and dolphins are examples of large marine animals.
examples.cn: 鲸鱼和海豚是大型海洋动物的例子。

examples.en: The aquarium showcases a variety of marine animals from different oceans.
examples.cn: 水族馆展示了来自不同海洋的各种海洋动物。

examples.en: This is the hottest summer on record for the region.
examples.cn: 这是该地区有记录以来最热的夏天。

examples.en: Her statement is on record with the police as evidence.
examples.cn: 她的陈述作为证据被警方正式记录在案。

examples.en: She is partial to chocolate ice cream over other flavors.
examples.cn: 她偏爱巧克力冰淇淋胜过其他口味。

examples.en: He is partial to classical music and attends concerts regularly.
examples.cn: 他特别喜欢古典音乐，定期参加音乐会。

examples.en: The new employee didn't measure up to the company's expectations.
examples.cn: 新员工没有达到公司的期望。

examples.en: This product measures up well against its competitors.
examples.cn: 这款产品在与竞争对手的比较中表现出色。

examples.en: Please measure up the room before buying furniture.
examples.cn: 购买家具前请先测量房间的尺寸。

examples.en: The tailor measured up the customer for a new suit.
examples.cn: 裁缝为顾客测量尺寸以制作新西装。

definitions.meaning_cn: 将某物拉入轨道（字面意思）

examples.en: The rocket successfully pulled the satellite into orbit.
examples.cn: 火箭成功将卫星拉入轨道。

examples.en: They plan to pull the space station into a higher orbit.
examples.cn: 他们计划将空间站拉入更高的轨道。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人或某事进入某种状态或领域

examples.en: The new policy pulled the economy into a stable orbit.
examples.cn: 新政策使经济进入了稳定状态。

examples.en: Her enthusiasm pulled the team into a productive orbit.
examples.cn: 她的热情使团队进入了高效的工作状态。

examples.en: The company had to cut back on expenses to survive the crisis.
examples.cn: 公司不得不削减开支以度过危机。

examples.en: We need to cut back our carbon emissions to protect the environment.
examples.cn: 我们需要减少碳排放以保护环境。

examples.en: It's time to cut back the roses in the garden.
examples.cn: 是时候修剪花园里的玫瑰了。

examples.en: Cutting back the bushes will help them grow better next season.
examples.cn: 修剪灌木有助于它们在下个季节更好地生长。

examples.en: The community rallied around the family after the fire.
examples.cn: 火灾后，社区团结起来支持这个家庭。

examples.en: Fans rallied around the team during their losing streak.
examples.cn: 在球队连败期间，球迷们团结起来支持他们。

examples.en: The children rallied around the teacher to hear the story.
examples.cn: 孩子们聚集在老师周围听故事。

examples.en: Protesters rallied around the city hall to demand change.
examples.cn: 抗议者聚集在市政厅周围要求变革。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人相形见绌；让某人感到羞愧

examples.en: Her excellent performance put all the other competitors to shame.
examples.cn: 她出色的表现让所有其他竞争者相形见绌。

examples.en: His generosity put my selfishness to shame.
examples.cn: 他的慷慨让我为自己的自私感到羞愧。

examples.en: I hope you can see your way clear to helping us with this project.
examples.cn: 我希望你能找到方法来帮助我们完成这个项目。

examples.en: After careful consideration, she saw her way clear to accepting the offer.
examples.cn: 经过仔细考虑，她找到了接受这个提议的方法。

examples.en: Their constant arguments drove them apart over time.
examples.cn: 他们不断的争吵最终导致他们分开了。

examples.en: Political differences can drive friends apart.
examples.cn: 政治分歧可能导致朋友之间产生隔阂。

examples.en: The building was on fire, and firefighters rushed to the scene.
examples.cn: 大楼着火了，消防员迅速赶到现场。

examples.en: Be careful with that candle, or the curtains might catch on fire.
examples.cn: 小心那支蜡烛，否则窗帘可能会着火。

examples.en: The basketball player was on fire, scoring 30 points in the first half.
examples.cn: 那位篮球运动员状态极佳，上半场就得了30分。

examples.en: Her presentation was on fire, captivating the entire audience.
examples.cn: 她的演讲非常出色，吸引了所有听众。

examples.en: Make sure your software is up to date to avoid security risks.
examples.cn: 确保你的软件是最新的，以避免安全风险。

examples.en: This report provides up-to-date information on market trends.
examples.cn: 这份报告提供了关于市场趋势的最新信息。

examples.en: She stays up to date with the latest news by reading the newspaper daily.
examples.cn: 她通过每天读报纸来了解最新新闻。

examples.en: Are you up to date on the changes to the company policy?
examples.cn: 你了解公司政策的最新变化吗？

examples.en: The new evidence sheds light on the mysterious disappearance.
examples.cn: 新证据阐明了这起神秘失踪事件。

examples.en: This study sheds light on the causes of climate change.
examples.cn: 这项研究阐明了气候变化的原因。

examples.en: After much discussion, they decided upon a plan of action.
examples.cn: 经过多次讨论，他们决定了一个行动计划。

examples.en: We need to decide upon a date for the meeting.
examples.cn: 我们需要决定一个会议日期。

valid_entries.original_phrase: to the best of one's ability

examples.en: I will complete the task to the best of my ability.
examples.cn: 我会尽我最大努力完成这项任务。

examples.en: She always performs to the best of her ability in every competition.
examples.cn: 她在每次比赛中都尽自己最大努力去表现。

definitions.meaning_cn: 迅速摆脱（某种情绪或状态）

examples.en: You need to snap out of this depression and start living again.
examples.cn: 你需要摆脱这种抑郁状态，重新开始生活。

examples.en: He snapped out of his daydream when the phone rang.
examples.cn: 电话铃响时，他迅速从白日梦中回过神来。

examples.en: The university offers a wide range of academic courses in the sciences.
examples.cn: 这所大学提供广泛的科学类学术课程。

examples.en: Students must complete certain academic courses to graduate.
examples.cn: 学生必须完成特定的学术课程才能毕业。

examples.en: The car crashed into a tree on the side of the road.
examples.cn: 汽车撞上了路边的一棵树。

examples.en: Two planes nearly crashed into each other in mid-air.
examples.cn: 两架飞机差点在空中相撞。

valid_entries.original_phrase: to be on the safe side

examples.en: Bring an umbrella, just to be on the safe side.
examples.cn: 带把伞吧，以防万一。

examples.en: To be on the safe side, we should arrive at the airport two hours early.
examples.cn: 为安全起见，我们应该提前两小时到达机场。

examples.en: Internships help students improve their practical skills in real-world settings.
examples.cn: 实习帮助学生在实际环境中提高实践技能。

examples.en: He took a course to improve his practical skills in carpentry.
examples.cn: 他参加了一门课程来提高木工实践技能。

examples.en: What should we do with all this leftover food?
examples.cn: 我们该怎么处理这些剩菜？

examples.en: I don't know what to do with this difficult situation.
examples.cn: 我不知道该如何应对这个困难局面。

examples.en: His success has a lot to do with his hard work.
examples.cn: 他的成功与他的努力有很大关系。

examples.en: What does this document have to do with our project?
examples.cn: 这份文件与我们的项目有什么关系？

examples.en: As the CEO, she calls the shots in the company.
examples.cn: 作为首席执行官，她在公司里发号施令。

examples.en: In this family, my grandmother calls the shots.
examples.cn: 在这个家庭里，我祖母说了算。

examples.en: This new restaurant is very popular with young people.
examples.cn: 这家新餐厅很受年轻人欢迎。

examples.en: The teacher is popular with students because of her engaging lessons.
examples.cn: 这位老师因其引人入胜的课程而受学生欢迎。

examples.en: She got into the habit of reading before bed.
examples.cn: 她养成了睡前阅读的习惯。

examples.en: He's trying to get into the habit of exercising daily.
examples.cn: 他正努力养成每天锻炼的习惯。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人焦虑不安或悬着心

examples.en: The suspenseful movie had us on tenterhooks until the end.
examples.cn: 这部悬疑电影让我们一直悬着心直到结束。

examples.en: The delayed results had the students on tenterhooks.
examples.cn: 延迟公布的结果让学生们焦虑不安。

definitions.meaning_cn: 公正对待；充分展现...的优点

examples.en: The photo doesn't do justice to the beauty of the sunset.
examples.cn: 这张照片没有充分展现日落的美丽。

examples.en: He did justice to the role in the play.
examples.cn: 他公正地演绎了剧中的角色。

definitions.meaning_cn: 聚集；围捕；将数字四舍五入

examples.en: The police rounded up the suspects.
examples.cn: 警察围捕了嫌疑人。

examples.en: Round up the total to the nearest dollar.
examples.cn: 将总数四舍五入到最接近的美元。

examples.en: Let's round up everyone for the meeting.
examples.cn: 让我们召集所有人开会。

examples.en: She rounded up the latest news for the report.
examples.cn: 她汇总了最新消息用于报告。

examples.en: I'm busy preparing for the exam.
examples.cn: 我正忙于准备考试。

examples.en: She was busy cooking dinner when I called.
examples.cn: 我打电话时她正忙着做晚饭。

examples.en: The dog tore apart the old newspaper.
examples.cn: 狗撕碎了旧报纸。

examples.en: The scandal tore the family apart.
examples.cn: 丑闻使这个家庭分裂了。

examples.en: The critic tore apart the new movie in his review.
examples.cn: 评论家在他的评论中严厉批评了这部新电影。

examples.en: She tore apart his argument during the debate.
examples.cn: 她在辩论中严厉批评了他的论点。

examples.en: The criminal was sentenced to death for murder.
examples.cn: 这名罪犯因谋杀被判处死刑。

examples.en: In some countries, drug traffickers can be sentenced to death.
examples.cn: 在一些国家，毒贩可能被判处死刑。

examples.en: We stand in awe of the majestic mountains.
examples.cn: 我们对雄伟的山脉感到敬畏。

examples.en: He stands in awe of his mentor's achievements.
examples.cn: 他对导师的成就感到敬畏。

examples.en: She put her success down to hard work.
examples.cn: 她把成功归因于努力工作。

examples.en: The delay was put down to bad weather.
examples.cn: 延误被归因于恶劣天气。

examples.en: The complex instructions made my head swim.
examples.cn: 复杂的说明让我头晕。

examples.en: All the technical jargon made her head swim.
examples.cn: 所有的技术术语让她感到困惑。

examples.en: He called me out of the blue after years of no contact.
examples.cn: 多年没联系后，他突然给我打了电话。

examples.en: The job offer came out of the blue.
examples.cn: 这份工作邀请来得出乎意料。

examples.en: This movie is suitable for children.
examples.cn: 这部电影适合儿童观看。

examples.en: The tool is suitable for heavy-duty tasks.
examples.cn: 这个工具适合重负荷任务。

examples.en: She counted out the coins one by one.
examples.cn: 她逐一数出了硬币。

examples.en: You can count me out of the plan.
examples.cn: 你可以把我排除在这个计划之外。

examples.en: The noise was too much for me to bear.
examples.cn: 噪音太多，我无法忍受。

examples.en: He ate too much cake and felt sick.
examples.cn: 他吃了太多蛋糕，感到恶心。

examples.en: That concert was too much!
examples.cn: 那场音乐会太棒了！

examples.en: Her new car is just too much.
examples.cn: 她的新车真是了不起。

examples.en: It's illegal to carry weapons in this area.
examples.cn: 在这个区域携带武器是违法的。

examples.en: Soldiers often carry weapons for protection.
examples.cn: 士兵通常携带武器以自卫。

examples.en: The company uses group interviews to assess teamwork skills.
examples.cn: 公司使用小组面试来评估团队合作能力。

examples.en: She felt nervous during the group interview.
examples.cn: 她在小组面试中感到紧张。

examples.en: He tangled with a difficult customer at work.
examples.cn: 他在工作中与一位难缠的顾客发生了争执。

examples.en: The vines tangled with the fence.
examples.cn: 藤蔓与篱笆纠缠在一起。

examples.en: There is strong resistance to the new policy.
examples.cn: 对新政策有强烈的抵抗。

examples.en: The material has high resistance to heat.
examples.cn: 这种材料具有很高的耐热性。

examples.en: We booked a direct flight to Paris.
examples.cn: 我们预订了直飞巴黎的航班。

examples.en: Direct flights are more convenient but often more expensive.
examples.cn: 直飞航班更方便，但通常更贵。

examples.en: The city implemented new policies to reduce traffic congestion during rush hours.
examples.cn: 该市实施了新政策以减少高峰时段的交通拥堵。

examples.en: Building more public transit options can help reduce traffic congestion in metropolitan areas.
examples.cn: 建设更多公共交通选择有助于减少大都市区的交通拥堵。

examples.en: After lying to his friend, he was filled with remorse and apologized immediately.
examples.cn: 对朋友撒谎后，他充满悔恨并立即道歉。

examples.en: She was filled with remorse for not visiting her grandmother more often.
examples.cn: 她因没有更常看望祖母而充满悔恨。

examples.en: News of the festival spread far and wide, attracting visitors from many countries.
examples.cn: 节日的消息传播得很广，吸引了许多国家的游客。

examples.en: He traveled far and wide in search of rare artifacts for his collection.
examples.cn: 他到处旅行，为他的收藏寻找稀有文物。

examples.en: Several passengers suffered injuries in the car accident and were taken to the hospital.
examples.cn: 几名乘客在车祸中受伤并被送往医院。

examples.en: Athletes often suffer injuries during intense training sessions.
examples.cn: 运动员在激烈训练中经常受伤。

examples.en: If you keep procrastinating, sooner or later you'll miss the deadline.
examples.cn: 如果你继续拖延，迟早会错过截止日期。

examples.en: Sooner or later, the truth about the scandal will come out.
examples.cn: 关于丑闻的真相迟早会水落石出。

examples.en: I need to get my book back from the library before it's overdue.
examples.cn: 我需要在逾期前从图书馆取回我的书。

examples.en: After the dispute was resolved, she managed to get her money back.
examples.cn: 争议解决后，她设法取回了她的钱。

examples.en: It took him months to get his strength back after the illness.
examples.cn: 生病后，他花了几个月才恢复体力。

examples.en: They worked hard to get their friendship back on track after the argument.
examples.cn: 争吵后，他们努力让友谊重回正轨。

examples.en: The negotiations broke off when neither side could agree on the terms.
examples.cn: 当双方无法就条款达成一致时，谈判中断了。

examples.en: He broke off in the middle of his speech to answer a phone call.
examples.cn: 他在演讲中途中断去接电话。

examples.en: The strong wind caused a branch to break off from the tree.
examples.cn: 强风导致一根树枝从树上折断。

examples.en: She carefully broke off a piece of chocolate to share with her friend.
examples.cn: 她小心地掰下一块巧克力与朋友分享。

examples.en: The employee was shouted at by his boss for making a costly mistake.
examples.cn: 这名员工因犯了一个代价高昂的错误而被老板大声呵斥。

examples.en: Children should not be shouted at as it can harm their self-esteem.
examples.cn: 不应该对孩子们大声呵斥，因为这可能损害他们的自尊心。

examples.en: They had a close call when their car skidded on the icy road but managed to avoid a crash.
examples.cn: 当他们的车在结冰的路面上打滑时，他们侥幸脱险，设法避免了撞车。

examples.en: The hiker had a close call with a bear but escaped unharmed.
examples.cn: 这名徒步旅行者与一只熊擦肩而过，但安然逃脱。

examples.en: To what extent do you agree with the new policy?
examples.cn: 你在多大程度上同意新政策？

examples.en: The success of the project depends to a large extent on team collaboration.
examples.cn: 项目的成功在很大程度上取决于团队合作。

examples.en: She requested to get time off from work to attend her sister's wedding.
examples.cn: 她请求从工作中获得休假去参加姐姐的婚礼。

examples.en: Employees can get time off from work for medical appointments with prior approval.
examples.cn: 员工在事先批准后可以从工作中获得休假去看病。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take the words out of one's mouth

examples.en: When she suggested going for pizza, he said, 'You took the words right out of my mouth!'
examples.cn: 当她建议去吃披萨时，他说：“你正好说出了我想说的话！”

examples.en: I was about to complain about the service, but my friend took the words out of my mouth.
examples.cn: 我正要抱怨服务，但我的朋友说出了我想说的话。

examples.en: The manager will be available to answer questions after the meeting.
examples.cn: 会议结束后，经理将有空回答问题。

examples.en: This software is available to all employees for free.
examples.cn: 这款软件免费供所有员工使用。

examples.en: It's important to keep an account of all business expenses for tax purposes.
examples.cn: 为了税务目的，记录所有业务开支很重要。

examples.en: She keeps an account of her daily activities in a journal.
examples.cn: 她在日记中记录她的日常活动。

examples.en: He put his success down to hard work and perseverance.
examples.cn: 他将自己的成功归因于努力工作和坚持不懈。

examples.en: The delay can be put down to bad weather conditions.
examples.cn: 延误可以归因于恶劣的天气条件。

examples.en: The activists campaigned to set free the captive dolphins.
examples.cn: 活动家们发起运动以释放被捕获的海豚。

examples.en: After serving his sentence, the prisoner was set free.
examples.cn: 服刑后，这名囚犯被释放了。

examples.en: The plan is, at best, a temporary solution to the problem.
examples.cn: 这个计划充其量只是问题的临时解决方案。

examples.en: His performance in the exam was mediocre at best.
examples.cn: 他在考试中的表现最多算是平庸。

examples.en: She tried to talk her friend out of quitting his job without another offer.
examples.cn: 她试图说服她的朋友在没有另一份工作机会的情况下不要辞职。

examples.en: The doctor talked the patient out of undergoing unnecessary surgery.
examples.cn: 医生说服患者放弃不必要的手术。

examples.en: The new regulations will be carried into effect starting next month.
examples.cn: 新规定将从下个月开始实施。

examples.en: It took years to carry the peace treaty into effect after the war.
examples.cn: 战争后，花了数年时间才实施和平条约。

examples.en: Daily prayer is an important religious practice in many faiths.
examples.cn: 每日祈祷是许多宗教中重要的宗教实践。

examples.en: The community gathers for religious practices every Sunday morning.
examples.cn: 社区每周日早晨聚集进行宗教活动。

examples.en: Fasting during Ramadan is a key religious practice for Muslims.
examples.cn: 斋月期间禁食是穆斯林关键的宗教实践。

examples.en: Her religious practice includes meditation and charitable work.
examples.cn: 她的宗教实践包括冥想和慈善工作。

examples.en: As far as I know, the meeting starts at 3 PM.
examples.cn: 据我所知，会议下午三点开始。

examples.en: As far as quality goes, this product is excellent.
examples.cn: 就质量而言，这个产品非常出色。

examples.en: We walked as far as the river before turning back.
examples.cn: 我们一直走到河边才返回。

examples.en: The road extends as far as the mountains.
examples.cn: 这条路一直延伸到山脚下。

examples.en: He tried to pass off the fake painting as an original.
examples.cn: 他试图把这幅假画冒充成真品。

examples.en: She passed off her friend's work as her own.
examples.cn: 她把朋友的作品冒充为自己的。

examples.en: The ceremony passed off without any problems.
examples.cn: 仪式顺利进行，没有任何问题。

examples.en: The meeting passed off more smoothly than expected.
examples.cn: 会议进行得比预期更顺利。

examples.en: She longs for the peaceful days of her childhood.
examples.cn: 她渴望童年那些平静的日子。

examples.en: I long for a vacation after this busy project.
examples.cn: 这个繁忙的项目结束后，我渴望去度假。

definitions.meaning_cn: 未成年的，未达到法定年龄的

examples.en: He was denied entry to the club because he was under age.
examples.cn: 他被拒绝进入俱乐部，因为他未成年。

examples.en: It's illegal to sell alcohol to anyone under age.
examples.cn: 向未成年人出售酒精是违法的。

examples.en: Let's get a head start on the project by brainstorming ideas today.
examples.cn: 我们今天通过头脑风暴来抢先开始这个项目。

examples.en: She got a head start on her homework during the weekend.
examples.cn: 她在周末提前开始了她的作业。

examples.en: Email has become a common means of communication in business.
examples.cn: 电子邮件已成为商业中常见的沟通方式。

examples.en: Sign language is an important means of communication for the deaf.
examples.cn: 手语是聋人重要的沟通方式。

definitions.meaning_cn: 第三世界国家（指发展中国家）

examples.en: Many Third World countries face challenges like poverty and lack of infrastructure.
examples.cn: 许多第三世界国家面临贫困和基础设施不足等挑战。

examples.en: Aid organizations often focus on helping Third World countries.
examples.cn: 援助组织通常专注于帮助第三世界国家。

examples.en: We have a lay over in Dubai before continuing to Sydney.
examples.cn: 我们在迪拜中途停留，然后继续前往悉尼。

examples.en: The flight includes a lay over of three hours in Tokyo.
examples.cn: 这次航班包括在东京三小时的中途停留。

examples.en: In the event that it rains, the picnic will be moved indoors.
examples.cn: 如果下雨，野餐将移到室内进行。

examples.en: In the event that you need assistance, please contact our support team.
examples.cn: 假使你需要帮助，请联系我们的支持团队。

examples.en: In retrospect, I should have studied harder for the exam.
examples.cn: 回顾起来，我本应该为考试更努力学习的。

examples.en: In retrospect, the decision to move was a good one.
examples.cn: 事后看来，搬家的决定是正确的。

examples.en: We use plastic trash bags to dispose of household waste.
examples.cn: 我们用塑料垃圾袋来处理家庭垃圾。

examples.en: Plastic trash bags are convenient but can harm the environment.
examples.cn: 塑料垃圾袋很方便，但可能对环境有害。

examples.en: I'm taking an astronomy class to learn about stars and planets.
examples.cn: 我正在上天文学课程，学习恒星和行星的知识。

examples.en: The astronomy class includes a field trip to the observatory.
examples.cn: 天文学课程包括一次去天文台的实地考察。

examples.en: Governments should promote sustainable development to protect natural resources.
examples.cn: 政府应促进可持续发展以保护自然资源。

examples.en: The company's policies aim to promote sustainable development in the region.
examples.cn: 公司的政策旨在促进该地区的可持续发展。

examples.en: Can you give me a ride to the airport tomorrow?
examples.cn: 明天你能开车送我去机场吗？

examples.en: She gave her friend a ride to the train station.
examples.cn: 她开车送她的朋友去火车站。

examples.en: He stared at the painting for a long time, admiring its beauty.
examples.cn: 他盯着那幅画看了很久，欣赏它的美。

examples.en: It's rude to stare at strangers in public.
examples.cn: 在公共场合盯着陌生人看是不礼貌的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 认为...没什么，不把...当回事

examples.en: She thinks nothing of walking five miles to work every day.
examples.cn: 她认为每天走五英里去上班没什么。

examples.en: He thinks nothing of spending large amounts of money on hobbies.
examples.cn: 他不把花大笔钱在爱好上当回事。

examples.en: The company secured a corporate loan to expand its operations.
examples.cn: 该公司获得了一笔企业贷款以扩大业务。

examples.en: Banks offer corporate loans with competitive interest rates.
examples.cn: 银行提供利率有竞争力的企业贷款。

examples.en: The waiter will serve drinks before the meal.
examples.cn: 服务员会在餐前提供饮料。

examples.en: At the party, they served drinks and snacks to the guests.
examples.cn: 在派对上，他们为客人提供饮料和小吃。

examples.en: She managed to overcome challenges in her career by staying persistent.
examples.cn: 她通过坚持不懈成功克服了职业生涯中的挑战。

examples.en: The team worked together to overcome challenges during the project.
examples.cn: 团队合作克服了项目期间的挑战。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与某人一起闲逛或社交

examples.en: He likes to run around with his friends on weekends.
examples.cn: 他喜欢在周末和朋友一起闲逛。

examples.en: She's been running around with a new group of people lately.
examples.cn: 她最近一直和一群新朋友一起社交。

examples.en: The old book started to come apart at the seams.
examples.cn: 这本旧书开始从接缝处散开。

examples.en: Their relationship came apart after the argument.
examples.cn: 争吵后，他们的关系破裂了。

examples.en: Her skills are on a par with those of a professional.
examples.cn: 她的技能与专业人士相当。

examples.en: This product is on a par with the best in the market.
examples.cn: 这款产品与市场上最好的产品同等。

examples.en: He is connected with several charitable organizations.
examples.cn: 他与几个慈善组织有关联。

examples.en: The issue is connected with environmental policies.
examples.cn: 这个问题与环境政策有关。

examples.en: The police officer is off duty and enjoying his day off.
examples.cn: 这位警察下班了，正在享受他的休息日。

examples.en: She prefers to relax when she's off duty.
examples.cn: 她下班时喜欢放松。

examples.en: Living in a small town gives her a strong sense of community.
examples.cn: 住在一个小镇给了她强烈的社区感。

examples.en: Volunteering helps build a sense of community among residents.
examples.cn: 志愿服务有助于在居民中建立归属感。

definitions.meaning_cn: 将某人理想化或过度崇拜

examples.en: He tends to set his mentors on a pedestal, ignoring their flaws.
examples.cn: 他倾向于将导师理想化，忽视他们的缺点。

examples.en: Fans often set celebrities on a pedestal.
examples.cn: 粉丝常常过度崇拜名人。

examples.en: He decided to make a play for the promotion by working extra hours.
examples.cn: 他决定通过加班来争取晋升。

examples.en: The company is making a play for a larger market share.
examples.cn: 这家公司正试图获得更大的市场份额。

examples.en: She was put to it to finish the project on time.
examples.cn: 她面临按时完成项目的挑战。

examples.en: During the crisis, everyone was put to it to find solutions.
examples.cn: 危机期间，每个人都面临寻找解决方案的困难。

examples.en: We will proceed with the meeting as scheduled.
examples.cn: 我们将按计划继续进行会议。

examples.en: Please proceed with caution when handling the equipment.
examples.cn: 处理设备时请谨慎进行。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take the wind out of one's sails

examples.en: The negative feedback took the wind out of his sails.
examples.cn: 负面反馈使他泄气了。

examples.en: Losing the game took the wind out of the team's sails.
examples.cn: 输掉比赛挫败了团队的士气。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have a penchant for doing sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 对做某事有偏好或倾向

examples.en: She has a penchant for traveling to exotic places.
examples.cn: 她对去异国旅行有偏好。

examples.en: He has a penchant for making detailed plans.
examples.cn: 他有制定详细计划的倾向。

examples.en: This model is superior to the previous one in performance.
examples.cn: 这款型号在性能上优于前一款。

examples.en: Her knowledge is superior to that of her peers.
examples.cn: 她的知识比同龄人更高级。

examples.en: Parents have a significant influence on their children's development.
examples.cn: 父母对孩子的成长有重大影响。

examples.en: Social media has an influence on public opinion.
examples.cn: 社交媒体对公众舆论有影响。

examples.en: He caught the devil from his boss for being late.
examples.cn: 他因为迟到受到了老板的严厉责备。

examples.en: If you break the rules, you'll catch the devil.
examples.cn: 如果你违反规则，你会惹上麻烦。

examples.en: I don't hold with the idea of working on weekends.
examples.cn: 我不同意周末工作的想法。

examples.en: She holds with traditional values in education.
examples.cn: 她支持教育中的传统价值观。

examples.en: The professor will deliver a lecture on climate change tomorrow.
examples.cn: 教授明天将发表关于气候变化的演讲。

examples.en: She delivered a lecture to the students about history.
examples.cn: 她向学生们讲授了历史。

examples.en: She has a head start on the project because she started earlier.
examples.cn: 她在项目上有领先优势，因为她开始得更早。

examples.en: The team has a head start on the competition due to their experience.
examples.cn: 由于经验丰富，团队在竞争中具有领先优势。

examples.en: Time seems to go by quickly when you're having fun.
examples.cn: 当你玩得开心时，时间似乎流逝得很快。

examples.en: I saw him go by the window earlier.
examples.cn: 早些时候我看到他从窗户经过。

examples.en: She managed to hold down a full-time job while studying for her degree.
examples.cn: 她在攻读学位的同时设法保住了一份全职工作。

examples.en: The government is trying to hold down inflation with new policies.
examples.cn: 政府正试图通过新政策来抑制通货膨胀。

examples.en: Hold down the button for three seconds to reset the device.
examples.cn: 按住按钮三秒钟以重置设备。

examples.en: We need to hold down the tent in this strong wind.
examples.cn: 我们需要在这强风中固定住帐篷。

examples.en: Glacial movement carved out the valleys in this region thousands of years ago.
examples.cn: 数千年前，冰川运动塑造了这个地区的山谷。

examples.en: Scientists study glacial movement to understand climate change effects.
examples.cn: 科学家研究冰川运动以了解气候变化的影响。

examples.en: The bureaucratic process had a glacial movement, frustrating everyone involved.
examples.cn: 官僚程序进展极其缓慢，让所有相关人员感到沮丧。

examples.en: Negotiations between the two countries proceeded at a glacial movement.
examples.cn: 两国之间的谈判进展极其缓慢。

examples.en: Please take out the trash before you leave.
examples.cn: 请在离开前把垃圾拿出去。

examples.en: He took out his wallet to pay for the meal.
examples.cn: 他拿出钱包来付餐费。

examples.en: He's planning to take her out for dinner this weekend.
examples.cn: 他计划这个周末带她出去吃晚餐。

examples.en: My parents took me out to celebrate my graduation.
examples.cn: 我父母带我出去庆祝我毕业。

examples.en: They decided to take out a mortgage to buy the house.
examples.cn: 他们决定申请抵押贷款来买房子。

examples.en: It's wise to take out travel insurance before going abroad.
examples.cn: 出国前购买旅行保险是明智的。

examples.en: The new smartphone model is already in stock at most retailers.
examples.cn: 新款智能手机在大多数零售商处已有现货。

examples.en: We have the item in stock and can ship it immediately.
examples.cn: 我们有该商品的库存，可以立即发货。

examples.en: Please take note of the safety instructions before starting the machine.
examples.cn: 启动机器前请注意安全说明。

examples.en: Investors should take note of the company's recent financial reports.
examples.cn: 投资者应留意公司最近的财务报告。

examples.en: She has an eye for fashion and always dresses impeccably.
examples.cn: 她对时尚有鉴赏力，总是穿着得体。

examples.en: As a curator, he has an eye for valuable artworks.
examples.cn: 作为策展人，他对有价值的艺术品有眼光。

examples.en: The course covers various research methodologies used in social sciences.
examples.cn: 这门课程涵盖了社会科学中使用的各种研究方法论。

examples.en: Her thesis includes a detailed section on research methodology.
examples.cn: 她的论文包括一个关于研究方法的详细部分。

examples.en: The new cars are equipped with advanced safety features.
examples.cn: 新车配备了先进的安全功能。

examples.en: We equipped the laboratory with the latest technology.
examples.cn: 我们为实验室配备了最新的技术。

definitions.meaning_cn: 看起来非常漂亮或精神焕发

examples.en: She looked like a million bucks in her new evening gown.
examples.cn: 她穿着新的晚礼服，看起来光彩照人。

examples.en: After his vacation, he came back looking like a million bucks.
examples.cn: 度假回来后，他看起来精神焕发。

examples.en: Please add sugar to your coffee if you like it sweet.
examples.cn: 如果你喜欢甜，请往咖啡里加糖。

examples.en: We need to add more details to the report before submitting it.
examples.cn: 在提交报告前，我们需要添加更多细节。

examples.en: Several companies are bidding for the construction contract.
examples.cn: 几家公司正在投标这个建筑合同。

examples.en: He bid for the antique vase at the auction.
examples.cn: 他在拍卖会上出价竞拍那个古董花瓶。

examples.en: The athlete is bidding for a gold medal in the upcoming Olympics.
examples.cn: 这位运动员正在争取在即将到来的奥运会上获得金牌。

examples.en: She's bidding for a promotion by taking on extra projects.
examples.cn: 她通过承担额外项目来争取晋升。

definitions.meaning_cn: 别这么无聊；找点有意义的事做（常带贬义）

examples.en: Stop obsessing over trivial things and get a life!
examples.cn: 别再纠结于琐事了，找点有意义的事做吧！

examples.en: He told his friend to get a life instead of playing video games all day.
examples.cn: 他告诉朋友别整天打游戏，找点有意义的事做。

examples.en: The United Kingdom is a constitutional monarchy with a parliamentary system.
examples.cn: 英国是一个君主立宪制国家，实行议会制。

examples.en: In a constitutional monarchy, the monarch's powers are limited by law.
examples.cn: 在君主立宪制中，君主的权力受到法律限制。

examples.en: It's easy to make friends with people who share your interests.
examples.cn: 与有共同兴趣的人交朋友很容易。

examples.en: She made friends with her new neighbors soon after moving in.
examples.cn: 搬进来后，她很快就和新邻居交上了朋友。

examples.en: He was dressed in a suit for the job interview.
examples.cn: 他穿着西装去参加求职面试。

examples.en: The children were dressed in colorful costumes for the school play.
examples.cn: 孩子们穿着色彩鲜艳的戏服参加学校戏剧表演。

examples.en: The store is having a sale with 50% off all winter clothing.
examples.cn: 这家商店正在打折，所有冬装五折。

examples.en: I bought this jacket at 50% off the original price.
examples.cn: 我以原价的五折买了这件夹克。

examples.en: Don't get fresh with me, young man!
examples.cn: 别对我无礼，年轻人！

examples.en: He got fresh and started making inappropriate comments.
examples.cn: 他变得放肆，开始发表不恰当的评论。

definitions.meaning_cn: 获取新鲜的东西（如空气、食物）

examples.en: Let's open the windows to get some fresh air in here.
examples.cn: 我们打开窗户让新鲜空气进来吧。

examples.en: I need to get fresh vegetables from the market for dinner.
examples.cn: 我需要从市场买新鲜蔬菜做晚餐。

examples.en: Investors are buying up shares in the tech company.
examples.cn: 投资者正在大量购买这家科技公司的股票。

examples.en: The corporation bought up all the available land in the area.
examples.cn: 这家公司收购了该地区所有可用的土地。

examples.en: The protest movement gained momentum after the viral social media post.
examples.cn: 抗议运动在社交媒体帖子走红后势头增强。

examples.en: Our project is finally gaining momentum with more team members joining.
examples.cn: 随着更多团队成员加入，我们的项目终于获得了动力。

examples.en: We had to make do with canned food during the camping trip.
examples.cn: 露营期间我们只能凑合吃罐头食品。

examples.en: She made do with an old laptop until she could afford a new one.
examples.cn: 她将就用一台旧笔记本电脑，直到买得起新的。

examples.en: The president will deliver a speech at the graduation ceremony.
examples.cn: 总统将在毕业典礼上发表演讲。

examples.en: She delivered a powerful speech on environmental conservation.
examples.cn: 她就环境保护发表了一场有力的演讲。

examples.en: He stopped to help the elderly woman cross the street.
examples.cn: 他停下来帮助那位老妇人过马路。

examples.en: We stopped to admire the beautiful sunset.
examples.cn: 我们停下来欣赏美丽的日落。

examples.en: The police officer signaled for the car to pull over.
examples.cn: 警察示意那辆车靠边停车。

examples.en: I need to pull over to check the map.
examples.cn: 我需要靠边停车查看地图。

examples.en: Get ready to leave in five minutes.
examples.cn: 准备好五分钟后出发。

examples.en: She got ready to present her project to the team.
examples.cn: 她准备好向团队展示她的项目。

examples.en: The elevator is under repair, so please use the stairs.
examples.cn: 电梯正在维修中，请使用楼梯。

examples.en: The road is under repair and will be closed for a week.
examples.cn: 这条路正在维修，将关闭一周。

examples.en: The guest speaker was none other than the famous author.
examples.cn: 特邀演讲者正是那位著名作家。

examples.en: It was none other than my old friend who called me.
examples.cn: 打电话给我的正是我的老朋友。

examples.en: She is suspicious of his sudden generosity.
examples.cn: 她对他突然的慷慨表示怀疑。

examples.en: The police are suspicious of the man's alibi.
examples.cn: 警方对那个人的不在场证明表示怀疑。

examples.en: Speed is calculated as a function of distance and time.
examples.cn: 速度是距离和时间的函数。

examples.en: The cost varies as a function of the quantity ordered.
examples.cn: 成本随订购数量的变化而变化。

examples.en: The study focuses on weather variations in coastal regions.
examples.cn: 这项研究关注沿海地区的天气变化。

examples.en: Farmers must adapt to seasonal weather variations.
examples.cn: 农民必须适应季节性的天气变化。

examples.en: The church bells ring out every Sunday morning.
examples.cn: 教堂的钟声每周日早上都会响起。

examples.en: A shot rang out in the quiet night.
examples.cn: 一声枪响打破了宁静的夜晚。

examples.en: The drought put a severe strain on the local water supply.
examples.cn: 干旱对当地供水造成了严重压力。

examples.en: The financial crisis put a severe strain on the company's resources.
examples.cn: 金融危机对公司的资源造成了严重压力。

examples.en: It took hours to put together the new furniture.
examples.cn: 组装新家具花了几个小时。

examples.en: She put together a report based on the data collected.
examples.cn: 她根据收集的数据整理了一份报告。

examples.en: I bought a round-trip ticket to New York.
examples.cn: 我买了一张去纽约的往返票。

examples.en: A round-trip ticket is often cheaper than two one-way tickets.
examples.cn: 往返票通常比两张单程票便宜。

examples.en: The flowers give off a pleasant fragrance.
examples.cn: 这些花散发出宜人的香味。

examples.en: The chemical reaction gives off heat.
examples.cn: 这个化学反应释放热量。

examples.en: He was found innocent of all charges.
examples.cn: 他被判所有指控均不成立。

examples.en: She is innocent of any wrongdoing in the matter.
examples.cn: 她在这件事上没有任何过错。

examples.en: People were queuing for tickets outside the theater.
examples.cn: 人们在剧院外排队买票。

examples.en: We had to queue for an hour to get into the museum.
examples.cn: 我们不得不排队一小时才能进入博物馆。

examples.en: The manager has the final word on hiring decisions.
examples.cn: 经理在招聘决定上有最终决定权。

examples.en: In our family, my father has the final word on major purchases.
examples.cn: 在我们家，父亲对大额购买有最终决定权。

examples.en: Mathematics is a required course for all engineering students.
examples.cn: 数学是所有工程专业学生的必修课。

examples.en: She completed all the required courses for her degree.
examples.cn: 她完成了学位所需的所有必修课。

examples.en: I'll write back to you as soon as I receive your letter.
examples.cn: 我一收到你的信就会给你回信。

examples.en: She wrote back immediately to confirm the meeting details.
examples.cn: 她立即回信确认会议细节。

examples.en: Above all, we must ensure the safety of our employees.
examples.cn: 最重要的是，我们必须确保员工的安全。

examples.en: He values honesty above all in his relationships.
examples.cn: 他在人际关系中最看重诚实。

examples.en: Regular practice helps build up your confidence in public speaking.
examples.cn: 定期练习有助于建立你在公开演讲中的自信。

examples.en: Positive feedback from her mentor built up her confidence in the project.
examples.cn: 导师的积极反馈增强了她在项目中的信心。

examples.en: During the earthquake, we were advised to stay put under the table.
examples.cn: 地震期间，我们被建议待在桌子下面不要动。

examples.en: The dog will stay put until its owner gives the command to move.
examples.cn: 这只狗会待在原地，直到主人发出移动的命令。

definitions.meaning_cn: 第一位教育者，通常指父母

examples.en: Parents are often considered the first educators in a child's life.
examples.cn: 父母通常被认为是孩子生命中的第一位教育者。

examples.en: As the first educator, she taught her son basic manners before he started school.
examples.cn: 作为第一位教育者，她在儿子上学前教了他基本的礼仪。

definitions.meaning_cn: 有动力去做，受到激励去做

examples.en: Employees are more motivated to do their best when they feel valued.
examples.cn: 当员工感到被重视时，他们更有动力做到最好。

examples.en: She was motivated to do volunteer work after seeing the community's needs.
examples.cn: 在看到社区的需求后，她有动力去做志愿工作。

examples.en: It took me a while to get a handle on the new software.
examples.cn: 我花了一段时间才掌握这个新软件。

examples.en: Once you get a handle on the basics, the advanced concepts become easier.
examples.cn: 一旦你掌握了基础知识，高级概念就会变得更容易。

examples.en: You can find maps and brochures at the information desk in the lobby.
examples.cn: 你可以在大厅的问讯处找到地图和小册子。

examples.en: The information desk is staffed to assist visitors with their inquiries.
examples.cn: 问讯处有工作人员协助访客咨询。

definitions.meaning_cn: 替代研究方法，非传统研究方法

examples.en: Scientists are exploring alternative methods of research to reduce animal testing.
examples.cn: 科学家正在探索替代研究方法以减少动物实验。

examples.en: This study uses alternative methods of research, such as qualitative interviews.
examples.cn: 这项研究使用了替代研究方法，如定性访谈。

examples.en: He has a tendency to do things at the last minute.
examples.cn: 他有在最后一刻做事的倾向。

examples.en: There's a growing tendency to do remote work in modern companies.
examples.cn: 现代公司中远程工作的趋势日益增长。

definitions.meaning_cn: 给某人一个好主意，启发某人

examples.en: Her suggestion gave me a bright idea for the project.
examples.cn: 她的建议给了我一个关于项目的好主意。

examples.en: Reading that book gave him a bright idea to start his own business.
examples.cn: 读那本书启发了他创业的好主意。

examples.en: Let's go over the report before submitting it.
examples.cn: 在提交之前，我们检查一下报告。

examples.en: She went over her notes to prepare for the exam.
examples.cn: 她复习笔记为考试做准备。

examples.en: The cost of the project went over the budget.
examples.cn: 项目成本超过了预算。

examples.en: He went over the fence to retrieve the ball.
examples.cn: 他越过围栏去捡球。

examples.en: Neither the manager nor the employees were satisfied with the decision.
examples.cn: 经理和员工都不满意这个决定。

examples.en: She neither confirmed nor denied the rumors.
examples.cn: 她既不确认也不否认这些传闻。

definitions.meaning_cn: 拥有最好的部分，占优势

examples.en: In the negotiation, they had the best of the deal.
examples.cn: 在谈判中，他们占了交易的优势。

examples.en: She always has the best of intentions when giving advice.
examples.cn: 她提建议时总是怀着最好的意图。

examples.en: All new students receive a copy of the student handbook at orientation.
examples.cn: 所有新生在迎新时都会收到一本学生手册。

examples.en: The student handbook outlines the school's policies and procedures.
examples.cn: 学生手册概述了学校的政策和程序。

examples.en: The police gave chase to the suspect after the robbery.
examples.cn: 抢劫后，警察追赶嫌疑人。

examples.en: The dog gave chase to the squirrel across the yard.
examples.cn: 狗在院子里追赶松鼠。

examples.en: It's important to arrive punctually for job interviews.
examples.cn: 准时到达工作面试很重要。

examples.en: She always arrives punctually at 9 AM for her meetings.
examples.cn: 她总是上午9点准时到达会议。

examples.en: Coastal areas are at risk of flooding during storms.
examples.cn: 沿海地区在风暴期间有洪水风险。

examples.en: Smokers are at risk of developing lung diseases.
examples.cn: 吸烟者有患肺部疾病的风险。

examples.en: The argument boils down to a difference in values.
examples.cn: 争论归结为价值观的差异。

examples.en: All the complex issues boil down to one simple question.
examples.cn: 所有复杂问题都简化为一个简单的问题。

examples.en: In addition to English, she speaks French fluently.
examples.cn: 除了英语，她还能流利地讲法语。

examples.en: The package includes breakfast in addition to accommodation.
examples.cn: 这个套餐除了住宿外还包括早餐。

examples.en: The laboratory is equipped with up-to-date equipment for research.
examples.cn: 实验室配备了用于研究的最新设备。

examples.en: Investing in up-to-date equipment can improve productivity.
examples.cn: 投资最新设备可以提高生产力。

examples.en: You should be familiar with the software before using it.
examples.cn: 在使用这个软件之前，你应该熟悉它。

examples.en: He is familiar with the local customs after living there for years.
examples.cn: 在那里生活多年后，他熟悉了当地的风俗。

examples.en: When you enter a new place, it's good to look around first.
examples.cn: 进入一个新地方时，最好先环顾四周。

examples.en: She looked around the room to find her keys.
examples.cn: 她环顾房间寻找她的钥匙。

examples.en: We decided to look around the mall before buying anything.
examples.cn: 我们决定在购物前先在商场里四处看看。

examples.en: He likes to look around antique shops on weekends.
examples.cn: 他喜欢在周末去古董店四处看看。

examples.en: The filter helps remove impurities from the water.
examples.cn: 这个过滤器有助于从水中去除杂质。

examples.en: They use chemicals to remove impurities from the metal.
examples.cn: 他们使用化学物质从金属中去除杂质。

examples.en: In the long term, investing in education benefits society.
examples.cn: 从长远来看，投资教育对社会有益。

examples.en: This strategy may be costly now but profitable in the long term.
examples.cn: 这个策略现在可能成本高，但从长远来看是有利可图的。

examples.en: The school is working to reduce its drop-out rate.
examples.cn: 学校正在努力降低其辍学率。

examples.en: A high drop-out rate can indicate problems in the education system.
examples.cn: 高辍学率可能表明教育系统存在问题。

examples.en: She is fond of classical music and attends concerts often.
examples.cn: 她喜欢古典音乐，经常参加音乐会。

examples.en: He is fond of his grandmother's cooking.
examples.cn: 他喜欢他祖母做的菜。

examples.en: He decided to keep the news to himself until the official announcement.
examples.cn: 他决定在官方宣布之前保守这个消息。

examples.en: It's wise to keep some personal thoughts to oneself.
examples.cn: 将一些个人想法保守秘密是明智的。

examples.en: She takes pride in her work and always does her best.
examples.cn: 她以她的工作为傲，总是尽力而为。

examples.en: They take pride in their community's achievements.
examples.cn: 他们以社区的成就为傲。

examples.en: The government plans to clamp down on illegal activities.
examples.cn: 政府计划严厉打击非法活动。

examples.en: Police are clamping down on speeding in this area.
examples.cn: 警察正在这个区域严厉打击超速行为。

examples.en: If you break the rules, you might get a licking from your parents.
examples.cn: 如果你违反规则，可能会挨父母的打。

examples.en: The team got a licking in the final game.
examples.cn: 这支队伍在决赛中受到了惩罚（指惨败）。

examples.en: Take a gander at this new car; it's amazing!
examples.cn: 瞧一瞧这辆新车；它太棒了！

examples.en: He took a gander out the window to check the weather.
examples.cn: 他朝窗外看了一眼以查看天气。

examples.en: She studied interior design and now works for a firm.
examples.cn: 她学习了室内设计，现在在一家公司工作。

examples.en: Good interior design can make a small space feel larger.
examples.cn: 好的室内设计可以让小空间感觉更大。

examples.en: The criminal will be behind bars for many years.
examples.cn: 这个罪犯将在监狱里待很多年。

examples.en: He was put behind bars after being found guilty.
examples.cn: 在被判有罪后，他被关进了监狱。

examples.en: Tune in at 8 PM for the live broadcast.
examples.cn: 晚上8点收听直播。

examples.en: Millions of people tune in to watch the championship game.
examples.cn: 数百万人收看冠军赛。

examples.en: You should tune in to the latest news for updates.
examples.cn: 你应该关注最新新闻以获取更新。

examples.en: Tune in to your feelings to understand yourself better.
examples.cn: 留意你的感受以更好地理解自己。

examples.en: The laundry started to pile up during the busy week.
examples.cn: 在忙碌的一周里，脏衣服开始堆积起来。

examples.en: Snow can pile up quickly in a blizzard.
examples.cn: 在暴风雪中，雪可以快速堆积。

examples.en: I enjoy reading books in my leisure time.
examples.cn: 我喜欢在闲暇时间读书。

examples.en: Having enough leisure time is important for relaxation.
examples.cn: 拥有足够的闲暇时间对放松很重要。

examples.en: Let me clear up any confusion about the schedule.
examples.cn: 让我澄清一下关于时间表的任何困惑。

examples.en: The manager cleared up the misunderstanding with the team.
examples.cn: 经理澄清了与团队的误解。

examples.en: We need to clear up the mess in the living room.
examples.cn: 我们需要清理客厅的混乱。

examples.en: After the party, it took hours to clear up.
examples.cn: 派对后，花了几个小时来清理。

examples.en: The sky cleared up after the rain stopped.
examples.cn: 雨停后，天空放晴了。

examples.en: Forecasters predict the weather will clear up by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 预报员预测天气将在明天放晴。

examples.en: They fell out over a disagreement about money.
examples.cn: 他们因为钱的分歧而闹翻了。

examples.en: It's sad when friends fall out and stop talking.
examples.cn: 当朋友们争吵并停止交谈时，这很可悲。

examples.en: Her hair started to fall out due to stress.
examples.cn: 由于压力，她的头发开始脱落。

examples.en: The pages fell out of the old book.
examples.cn: 旧书的页面掉出来了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 逐渐变成，模糊地过渡到

examples.en: The blue sky shades into orange at sunset.
examples.cn: 日落时，蓝天逐渐变成橙色。

examples.en: Her anger shaded into sadness as she reflected on the situation.
examples.cn: 当她反思情况时，她的愤怒逐渐变成了悲伤。

definitions.meaning_cn: 阻止犯罪，威慑犯罪行为

examples.en: Increased police presence can help deter crime in the neighborhood.
examples.cn: 增加警力可以帮助阻止社区犯罪。

examples.en: Strict laws are designed to deter crime by imposing harsh penalties.
examples.cn: 严格的法律旨在通过严厉惩罚来威慑犯罪。

examples.en: The manager always speaks highly of her team's dedication.
examples.cn: 经理总是高度赞扬她团队的奉献精神。

examples.en: He spoke highly of the new policy during the meeting.
examples.cn: 他在会议上对新政策给予了高度评价。

examples.en: Many people regard him as a hero for his bravery.
examples.cn: 许多人因他的勇敢而视他为英雄。

examples.en: She is regarded as an expert in her field.
examples.cn: 她被公认为她所在领域的专家。

examples.en: The modern architecture poses a contrast to the historic buildings nearby.
examples.cn: 现代建筑与附近的历史建筑形成鲜明对比。

examples.en: His calm demeanor poses a contrast to the chaotic situation.
examples.cn: 他冷静的举止与混乱的局面形成对比。

definitions.meaning_cn: 帮助某人做某事，搭把手

examples.en: Can you give me a hand with moving this heavy table?
examples.cn: 你能帮我搬一下这张重桌子吗？

examples.en: She gave her neighbor a hand with gardening over the weekend.
examples.cn: 周末她帮邻居打理了花园。

examples.en: He takes a delight in solving complex puzzles.
examples.cn: 他以解决复杂谜题为乐。

examples.en: She takes a delight in watching birds in her backyard.
examples.cn: 她非常喜欢在后院观鸟。

examples.en: Shortly after the meeting ended, they received an important call.
examples.cn: 会议结束后不久，他们接到了一个重要电话。

examples.en: He arrived shortly after I left the office.
examples.cn: 我离开办公室后不久他就到了。

examples.en: The company must assume obligation for any damages caused by its products.
examples.cn: 公司必须对其产品造成的任何损害承担责任。

examples.en: As a citizen, it's important to assume obligation for community service.
examples.cn: 作为公民，承担社区服务的义务很重要。

examples.en: Lions feed on other animals in the wild.
examples.cn: 狮子在野外以其他动物为食。

examples.en: Rumors often feed on people's fears and uncertainties.
examples.cn: 谣言常常依靠人们的恐惧和不确定性传播。

examples.en: He took responsibility for the mistake and apologized.
examples.cn: 他为错误承担责任并道歉了。

examples.en: Parents must take responsibility for their children's education.
examples.cn: 父母必须对孩子的教育负责。

definitions.meaning_cn: 获胜，脱颖而出，取得优势

examples.en: Despite the challenges, our team came out on top in the competition.
examples.cn: 尽管面临挑战，我们团队在比赛中获胜了。

examples.en: She always manages to come out on top in difficult situations.
examples.cn: 她总是能在困难情况下脱颖而出。

definitions.meaning_cn: 遵守社会规则，遵循社会规范

examples.en: It's important to follow social rules to maintain harmony in the community.
examples.cn: 遵守社会规则对维护社区和谐很重要。

examples.en: Children are taught to follow social rules from a young age.
examples.cn: 孩子们从小就被教导要遵守社会规则。

examples.en: I've been in contact with her since we graduated.
examples.cn: 自从毕业以来，我一直与她保持联系。

examples.en: The doctor advised staying in contact with the patient for updates.
examples.cn: 医生建议与患者保持联系以获取最新情况。

definitions.meaning_cn: 达成协议，取得一致意见

examples.en: After long negotiations, they finally reached an agreement.
examples.cn: 经过长时间谈判，他们终于达成了协议。

examples.en: The two countries reached an agreement on trade policies.
examples.cn: 两国就贸易政策达成了一致意见。

definitions.meaning_cn: 跟风，随大流，加入流行趋势

examples.en: Many companies jumped on the bandwagon of digital transformation.
examples.cn: 许多公司跟风进行了数字化转型。

examples.en: He jumped on the bandwagon and started investing in cryptocurrencies.
examples.cn: 他随大流开始投资加密货币。

examples.en: Don't stand on ceremony; just make yourself at home.
examples.cn: 别拘泥礼节，就像在自己家一样。

examples.en: In informal settings, there's no need to stand on ceremony.
examples.cn: 在非正式场合，不需要讲究客套。

examples.en: Her creativity springs from her love of nature.
examples.cn: 她的创造力源于她对自然的热爱。

examples.en: Many traditions spring from ancient customs.
examples.cn: 许多传统起源于古老的习俗。

examples.en: This model is more efficient by comparison to the old one.
examples.cn: 相比之下，这个型号比旧的更高效。

examples.en: By comparison, her performance was outstanding.
examples.cn: 相比之下，她的表现很出色。

examples.en: In recent years, the gender gap narrows in many industries.
examples.cn: 近年来，许多行业的性别差距缩小了。

examples.en: Efforts to promote equality have helped the gender gap narrows in education.
examples.cn: 促进平等的努力帮助教育领域的性别差距缩小了。

examples.en: The zoo's animal in captivity program focuses on breeding endangered species.
examples.cn: 动物园的圈养动物项目专注于繁殖濒危物种。

examples.en: Studying animal behavior in captivity helps understand their needs in the wild.
examples.cn: 研究圈养动物的行为有助于了解它们在野外的需求。

examples.en: My old TV is on the blink again, so I need to get it repaired.
examples.cn: 我的旧电视又出故障了，所以我需要找人修理。

examples.en: The printer has been on the blink all week, causing delays in the office.
examples.cn: 打印机整个星期都失灵，导致办公室工作延误。

examples.en: You can find the manual on line if you search the manufacturer's website.
examples.cn: 如果你搜索制造商的网站，可以在线找到手册。

examples.en: Many people shop on line for convenience and better prices.
examples.cn: 许多人在线购物是为了方便和更优惠的价格。

examples.en: We waited on line for over an hour to get tickets to the concert.
examples.cn: 我们排队等了一个多小时才买到音乐会的票。

examples.en: Please stand on line and wait for your turn at the counter.
examples.cn: 请排队并在柜台前等待轮到你。

examples.en: We had to put off the meeting until next week due to scheduling conflicts.
examples.cn: 由于日程冲突，我们不得不将会议推迟到下周。

examples.en: Don't put off your homework until the last minute; start early.
examples.cn: 不要把你的作业拖到最后一刻；早点开始。

examples.en: His rude behavior really put me off from wanting to work with him.
examples.cn: 他粗鲁的行为真的让我反感，不想和他一起工作。

examples.en: The smell of the food put her off, so she decided not to eat it.
examples.cn: 食物的气味让她厌恶，所以她决定不吃。

examples.en: During the hike, we paused to admire the beautiful mountain view.
examples.cn: 在徒步旅行中，我们停下来欣赏美丽的山景。

examples.en: She paused to think before answering the difficult question.
examples.cn: 她在回答这个难题之前停下来思考。

examples.en: The company decided to break away from its parent organization to become independent.
examples.cn: 公司决定脱离其母公司，成为独立的实体。

examples.en: He wanted to break away from his old habits and start a healthier lifestyle.
examples.cn: 他想摆脱旧习惯，开始更健康的生活方式。

examples.en: We ran out of milk, so I need to go to the store to buy more.
examples.cn: 我们的牛奶用完了，所以我需要去商店买更多。

examples.en: She stepped out of the car and into the bright sunlight.
examples.cn: 她从车里出来，走进明亮的阳光下。

examples.en: Out of curiosity, I asked him about his travel experiences.
examples.cn: 出于好奇，我问了他关于他的旅行经历。

examples.en: He helped her out of kindness, not expecting anything in return.
examples.cn: 他出于善意帮助她，不期望任何回报。

examples.en: Even though it was raining, we decided to go for a walk in the park.
examples.cn: 尽管在下雨，我们决定去公园散步。

examples.en: She passed the exam even though she hadn't studied much.
examples.cn: 即使她没有怎么学习，她还是通过了考试。

examples.en: The government provides subsidies to support low income families with housing costs.
examples.cn: 政府提供补贴以支持低收入家庭的住房费用。

examples.en: Many charities focus on helping low income families access education and healthcare.
examples.cn: 许多慈善机构专注于帮助低收入家庭获得教育和医疗保健。

examples.en: Before buying the new software, we decided to test it out with a free trial.
examples.cn: 在购买新软件之前，我们决定用免费试用版来测试它。

examples.en: The engineers will test out the prototype to ensure it works properly.
examples.cn: 工程师们将测试原型以确保其正常工作。

definitions.meaning_cn: 封闭储备，限制使用区域

examples.en: The rare books are kept in a closed reserve and can only be accessed by special permission.
examples.cn: 稀有书籍被保存在封闭储备中，只能通过特殊许可访问。

examples.en: The national park has a closed reserve to protect endangered wildlife from disturbance.
examples.cn: 国家公园有一个封闭储备区，以保护濒危野生动物免受干扰。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get a reputation for doing sth.

examples.en: The restaurant has gotten a reputation for serving the best pizza in town.
examples.cn: 这家餐厅因提供镇上最好的比萨而获得了名声。

examples.en: He got a reputation for being always punctual and reliable at work.
examples.cn: 他因在工作中总是准时可靠而获得了名声。

examples.en: The human body uses sweating as a method of temperature regulation in hot weather.
examples.cn: 人体在炎热天气中使用出汗作为温度调节的方法。

examples.en: The new building has advanced systems for temperature regulation to save energy.
examples.cn: 新建筑有先进的温度调节系统以节省能源。

examples.en: After being sick for a week, she worked extra hours to make up for lost time on the project.
examples.cn: 生病一周后，她加班工作以弥补项目上失去的时间。

examples.en: They traveled extensively to make up for lost time during the years they were too busy.
examples.cn: 他们广泛旅行，以弥补那些年太忙而失去的时间。

examples.en: The museum displays the original handwriting of famous authors in their letters.
examples.cn: 博物馆展示了著名作家信件中的原始笔迹。

examples.en: Experts analyzed the original handwriting to verify the authenticity of the document.
examples.cn: 专家分析了原始笔迹以验证文件的真实性。

examples.en: Scientists are working hard to invent a new drug that can cure the disease more effectively.
examples.cn: 科学家们正在努力发明一种能更有效治疗这种疾病的新药。

examples.en: It takes years of research and testing to invent a new drug and get it approved.
examples.cn: 发明一种新药并获得批准需要多年的研究和测试。

examples.en: I had to wade through hundreds of emails to find the important one.
examples.cn: 我不得不费力地处理数百封电子邮件以找到重要的那一封。

examples.en: The hikers waded through the shallow river to reach the other side.
examples.cn: 徒步旅行者涉水通过浅河到达对岸。

examples.en: The company reimburses employees for travel expenses incurred during business trips.
examples.cn: 公司报销员工在商务旅行中产生的旅行费用。

examples.en: We need to budget carefully for travel expenses like flights and accommodation.
examples.cn: 我们需要仔细预算旅行费用，如机票和住宿。

examples.en: The larger company decided to take over the smaller startup to expand its market share.
examples.cn: 较大的公司决定接管较小的初创公司以扩大其市场份额。

examples.en: She will take over the project management role while her colleague is on leave.
examples.cn: 在她的同事休假期间，她将接手项目管理角色。

examples.en: The dormitory officer is responsible for ensuring the safety and order in the student residence.
examples.cn: 宿舍管理员负责确保学生宿舍的安全和秩序。

examples.en: Students can report any issues to the dormitory officer for assistance.
examples.cn: 学生可以向宿舍管理员报告任何问题以寻求帮助。

examples.en: She makes good money as a software engineer at a tech startup.
examples.cn: 她在一家科技初创公司担任软件工程师，收入丰厚。

examples.en: If you invest wisely, you can make good money in the stock market.
examples.cn: 如果你投资明智，可以在股市赚很多钱。

examples.en: Our class project involves building a small robot from scratch.
examples.cn: 我们的课堂项目包括从头开始建造一个小型机器人。

examples.en: She spent the entire weekend working on her class project about climate change.
examples.cn: 她整个周末都在做关于气候变化的课程作业。

examples.en: I'll drop over to your place after work to return your book.
examples.cn: 下班后我会顺便去你家还你的书。

examples.en: Feel free to drop over anytime; we're usually home on weekends.
examples.cn: 随时可以来拜访，我们周末通常在家。

examples.en: The thick fog blotted out the view of the mountains.
examples.cn: 浓雾遮盖了山景。

examples.en: He tried to blot out the painful memories by keeping busy.
examples.cn: 他试图通过忙碌来抹去痛苦的回忆。

examples.en: They made a killing by selling their company at the peak of the market.
examples.cn: 他们在市场高峰期出售公司，赚了大钱。

examples.en: Investors made a killing during the cryptocurrency boom.
examples.cn: 投资者在加密货币热潮期间发大财。

examples.en: The project is on hold until we receive more funding.
examples.cn: 这个项目暂停了，直到我们获得更多资金。

examples.en: I was put on hold for twenty minutes when I called customer service.
examples.cn: 我打电话给客服时被搁置了二十分钟。

examples.en: The spy went to the meeting in disguise to avoid being recognized.
examples.cn: 间谍伪装后去参加会议，以免被认出。

examples.en: Sometimes a setback is a blessing in disguise.
examples.cn: 有时挫折是伪装的祝福。

examples.en: I had to drink coffee to stay awake during the long lecture.
examples.cn: 我不得不喝咖啡以在漫长的讲座中保持清醒。

examples.en: She stayed awake all night worrying about the exam.
examples.cn: 她整晚没睡，担心考试。

examples.en: I'll get in touch with you as soon as I have more information.
examples.cn: 我一有更多信息就会与你联系。

examples.en: It's important to get in touch with old friends from time to time.
examples.cn: 时不时与老朋友联系很重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 得到某人的倾听或关注

examples.en: As a trusted advisor, she always has the CEO's ear.
examples.cn: 作为值得信赖的顾问，她总能得到CEO的倾听。

examples.en: If you have the teacher's ear, you might be able to suggest changes to the curriculum.
examples.cn: 如果你能得到老师的关注，或许可以建议修改课程。

definitions.meaning_cn: 声音逐渐减弱，话语逐渐消失

examples.en: His voice trailed off as he realized no one was listening.
examples.cn: 当他意识到没人在听时，他的声音逐渐减弱了。

examples.en: The conversation trailed off into an awkward silence.
examples.cn: 谈话逐渐消失，陷入尴尬的沉默。

examples.en: I missed your call earlier; I'll call you back in an hour.
examples.cn: 我之前错过了你的电话，一小时后我会回电。

examples.en: The company had to call back the defective products for safety reasons.
examples.cn: 出于安全原因，公司不得不召回有缺陷的产品。

examples.en: Genetic engineering has revolutionized agriculture by creating pest-resistant crops.
examples.cn: 基因工程通过创造抗虫作物，彻底改变了农业。

examples.en: Ethical debates surround the use of genetic engineering in humans.
examples.cn: 关于在人类中使用基因工程的伦理辩论层出不穷。

examples.en: Can you send on this email to the rest of the team?
examples.cn: 你能把这封邮件转寄给团队的其他人吗？

examples.en: The post office will send on your mail to your new address.
examples.cn: 邮局会将你的邮件转寄到你的新地址。

examples.en: He couldn't look her in the face after telling the lie.
examples.cn: 说谎后，他无法直视她。

examples.en: You need to look the problem in the face and find a solution.
examples.cn: 你需要直面问题并找到解决方案。

examples.en: Watch for any changes in the patient's condition and report them immediately.
examples.cn: 留意病人状况的任何变化，并立即报告。

examples.en: We're watching for a good opportunity to invest in the market.
examples.cn: 我们正在等待投资市场的好机会。

examples.en: She bought a new digital camera for her photography hobby.
examples.cn: 她为摄影爱好买了一台新的数码相机。

examples.en: Digital cameras have largely replaced film cameras in modern photography.
examples.cn: 在现代摄影中，数码相机已很大程度上取代了胶片相机。

examples.en: Exercise is a great way to release stress after a long day at work.
examples.cn: 运动是工作一整天后释放压力的好方法。

examples.en: Meditation helps her release stress and stay calm.
examples.cn: 冥想帮助她释放压力并保持冷静。

examples.en: You need to be flexible in your approach to solve this complex problem.
examples.cn: 你需要灵活处理来解决这个复杂问题。

examples.en: Employers value employees who are flexible in adapting to new technologies.
examples.cn: 雇主看重能灵活适应新技术的员工。

examples.en: We need to build a fire to keep warm tonight.
examples.cn: 我们需要生火来保暖过夜。

examples.en: He built a fire using dry twigs and leaves.
examples.cn: 他用干树枝和树叶生了一堆火。

examples.en: Her speech built a fire in the audience's hearts.
examples.cn: 她的演讲在观众心中点燃了热情。

examples.en: The coach built a fire under the team to win the championship.
examples.cn: 教练激发了球队赢得冠军的热情。

examples.en: He gave an off-the-cuff speech that impressed everyone.
examples.cn: 他做了一次即兴演讲，给所有人留下了深刻印象。

examples.en: Her off-the-cuff remarks were surprisingly insightful.
examples.cn: 她即兴的评论出人意料地有见地。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与某人有暧昧关系或恋情

examples.en: I heard she has something going with her coworker.
examples.cn: 我听说她和同事有暧昧关系。

examples.en: They've had something going for months now.
examples.cn: 他们暧昧关系已经持续几个月了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与某人有合作或业务往来

examples.en: Our company has something going with a supplier in Germany.
examples.cn: 我们公司与德国一家供应商有业务往来。

examples.en: He has something going with investors to fund his startup.
examples.cn: 他与投资者有合作，为他的初创公司融资。

examples.en: The country is facing a severe economic crisis.
examples.cn: 该国正面临严重的经济危机。

examples.en: The 2008 economic crisis affected markets worldwide.
examples.cn: 2008年的经济危机影响了全球市场。

examples.en: Energy conservation is crucial for reducing carbon emissions.
examples.cn: 节能对于减少碳排放至关重要。

examples.en: The government promotes energy conservation through public campaigns.
examples.cn: 政府通过公共宣传活动推广节能。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某人施加压力或强迫

examples.en: The boss put the screws on him to finish the project early.
examples.cn: 老板对他施加压力，要求他提前完成项目。

examples.en: They put the screws on the suspect during the interrogation.
examples.cn: 他们在审讯中对嫌疑人施加压力。

examples.en: What lies behind his sudden decision to quit?
examples.cn: 他突然决定辞职的背后原因是什么？

examples.en: Complex social issues lie behind the rise in crime rates.
examples.cn: 复杂的社会问题是犯罪率上升的背后原因。

examples.en: The garden lies behind the house.
examples.cn: 花园位于房子的后面。

examples.en: A small path lies behind the hill.
examples.cn: 一条小路位于山丘后面。

examples.en: I stayed up late to finish my homework.
examples.cn: 我熬夜完成作业。

examples.en: They stayed up all night talking.
examples.cn: 他们通宵聊天。

examples.en: The old building managed to stay up after the earthquake.
examples.cn: 地震后，这座旧建筑设法保持未倒。

examples.en: Can this tent stay up in strong winds?
examples.cn: 这个帐篷能在强风中保持直立吗？

examples.en: Take notice of the warning signs on the road.
examples.cn: 注意路上的警告标志。

examples.en: The teacher asked the students to take notice of the new rules.
examples.cn: 老师要求学生留意新规定。

examples.en: He did me out of my inheritance with a fake will.
examples.cn: 他用假遗嘱骗走了我的遗产。

examples.en: They did the company out of millions in a scam.
examples.cn: 他们通过骗局骗走了公司数百万。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get a scholarship to the university

examples.en: She got a scholarship to the university for her academic excellence.
examples.cn: 她因学业优秀获得了大学奖学金。

examples.en: He hopes to get a scholarship to the university to study engineering.
examples.cn: 他希望获得大学奖学金学习工程学。

examples.en: I am in awe of her talent and dedication.
examples.cn: 我对她的才华和奉献精神感到敬畏。

examples.en: The tourists were in awe of the ancient temple.
examples.cn: 游客们对这座古庙感到敬畏。

examples.en: They began their work in earnest after the meeting.
examples.cn: 会议后，他们开始认真地工作。

examples.en: The negotiations started in earnest last week.
examples.cn: 谈判上周郑重地开始了。

examples.en: She gets along well with her colleagues.
examples.cn: 她和同事相处得很好。

examples.en: Do you get along with your neighbors?
examples.cn: 你和邻居相处得和睦吗？

examples.en: How are you getting along with your studies?
examples.cn: 你的学习进展如何？

examples.en: The project is getting along smoothly.
examples.cn: 项目进展顺利。

examples.en: I object to the proposed changes in the policy.
examples.cn: 我反对政策中的拟议变更。

examples.en: Many residents object to the construction of the new highway.
examples.cn: 许多居民反对修建新高速公路。

examples.en: The factory uses advanced electrical equipment for production.
examples.cn: 工厂使用先进的电气设备进行生产。

examples.en: Safety checks are essential for all electrical equipment.
examples.cn: 对所有电气设备进行安全检查至关重要。

examples.en: The sudden push caught him off balance.
examples.cn: 突然的推搡让他失去了平衡。

examples.en: She felt off balance on the icy sidewalk.
examples.cn: 她在结冰的人行道上感到失去平衡。

examples.en: The unexpected question left the speaker off balance.
examples.cn: 这个意外的问题让演讲者措手不及。

examples.en: He was off balance after hearing the bad news.
examples.cn: 听到坏消息后，他感到慌乱。

examples.en: "This weather is terrible." "You can say that again!"
examples.cn: "这天气真糟糕。" "你说得对！"

examples.en: "The movie was amazing." "You can say that again!"
examples.cn: "这部电影太棒了。" "我完全同意！"

examples.en: The large tree provides the shade we need on hot days.
examples.cn: 这棵大树在炎热的日子里提供我们所需的阴凉。

examples.en: Can this umbrella provide enough shade for everyone?
examples.cn: 这把伞能为所有人提供足够的阴凉吗？

examples.en: His influence provided the shade for the small business to grow.
examples.cn: 他的影响力为这家小企业的成长提供了保护。

examples.en: The law provides the shade against unfair competition.
examples.cn: 法律提供了对抗不公平竞争的保护。

definitions.meaning_cn: 面临严重的麻烦或后果

examples.en: If you break that antique vase, you'll have the devil to pay with your grandmother.
examples.cn: 如果你打碎那个古董花瓶，你奶奶会让你吃不了兜着走。

examples.en: He knew he'd have the devil to pay when his boss found out about the mistake.
examples.cn: 他知道老板发现这个错误后，他会有大麻烦。

definitions.meaning_cn: 闲聊或喋喋不休地说话

examples.en: They sat on the porch making chin music all afternoon.
examples.cn: 他们整个下午都坐在门廊上闲聊。

examples.en: Stop making chin music and focus on your work.
examples.cn: 别闲聊了，专心工作。

examples.en: Please inform the team of the meeting schedule changes.
examples.cn: 请通知团队会议日程的变更。

examples.en: The doctor informed her of the test results immediately.
examples.cn: 医生立即告知了她检测结果。

examples.en: I'm busy at the moment, can I call you back later?
examples.cn: 我现在很忙，稍后给你回电话好吗？

examples.en: She captured the perfect moment in her photograph.
examples.cn: 她在照片中捕捉到了完美的瞬间。

examples.en: The moment I saw her, I knew something was wrong.
examples.cn: 我一看到她，就知道出事了。

examples.en: Call me the moment you arrive at the airport.
examples.cn: 你一到机场就给我打电话。

examples.en: He decided to buy into the startup company early on.
examples.cn: 他决定早期投资这家初创公司。

examples.en: Many investors are buying into renewable energy stocks.
examples.cn: 许多投资者正在购入可再生能源股票。

examples.en: I don't buy into the conspiracy theory about the moon landing.
examples.cn: 我不相信关于登月的阴谋论。

examples.en: She bought into the idea of working remotely full-time.
examples.cn: 她接受了全职远程工作的想法。

examples.en: You need to make a payment by the end of the month to avoid late fees.
examples.cn: 你需要在月底前付款以避免滞纳金。

examples.en: I made a payment online for my utility bill yesterday.
examples.cn: 我昨天在线支付了水电费。

examples.en: Can you lead the way to the conference room? I'm not familiar with this building.
examples.cn: 你能带路去会议室吗？我不熟悉这栋楼。

examples.en: She led the way in developing new environmental policies.
examples.cn: 她在制定新环境政策方面起到了引领作用。

examples.en: Before making a decision, it's important to think through all the consequences.
examples.cn: 做决定前，仔细考虑所有后果很重要。

examples.en: He spent hours thinking through the problem before proposing a solution.
examples.cn: 他花了几个小时全面思考这个问题，然后提出了解决方案。

definitions.meaning_cn: 炸鱼薯条（一种英国传统食物）

examples.en: We had fish and chips for dinner at the seaside restaurant.
examples.cn: 我们在海边餐厅吃了炸鱼薯条当晚餐。

examples.en: Fish and chips is a popular takeaway meal in the UK.
examples.cn: 炸鱼薯条是英国流行的外卖食品。

examples.en: She took against her new neighbor after their first argument.
examples.cn: 第一次争吵后，她开始不喜欢她的新邻居了。

examples.en: He took against the proposal as soon as he heard the details.
examples.cn: 他一听到细节就开始反对这个提议。

examples.en: All citizens must obey laws to maintain social order.
examples.cn: 所有公民都必须遵守法律以维持社会秩序。

examples.en: Drivers who obey traffic laws reduce the risk of accidents.
examples.cn: 遵守交通法规的司机降低了事故风险。

examples.en: The copy is identical to the original painting.
examples.cn: 这幅复制品与原画完全相同。

examples.en: His opinion is identical to mine on this matter.
examples.cn: 在这个问题上，他的观点和我完全一致。

examples.en: The new company came into being after months of planning.
examples.cn: 经过数月的规划，新公司成立了。

examples.en: Many traditions come into being over centuries of cultural evolution.
examples.cn: 许多传统是在几个世纪的文化演变中形成的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 肌肉萎缩症（一种遗传性疾病）

examples.en: Muscular dystrophy affects muscle strength and function over time.
examples.cn: 肌肉萎缩症会随时间影响肌肉力量和功能。

examples.en: Research is ongoing to find a cure for muscular dystrophy.
examples.cn: 正在进行研究以寻找肌肉萎缩症的治疗方法。

examples.en: Don't make yourself miserable by worrying about things you can't control.
examples.cn: 别为无法控制的事情担忧而让自己痛苦。

examples.en: She made herself miserable by constantly comparing her life to others'.
examples.cn: 她不断将自己的生活与他人比较，使自己难受。

examples.en: The loud music drowned out our conversation.
examples.cn: 大声的音乐淹没了我们的谈话声。

examples.en: Cheers from the crowd drowned out the speaker's voice.
examples.cn: 人群的欢呼声盖过了演讲者的声音。

definitions.meaning_cn: 强迫性购物（一种行为障碍）

examples.en: Compulsive shopping can lead to financial problems and emotional distress.
examples.cn: 强迫性购物可能导致财务问题和情绪困扰。

examples.en: She sought therapy to address her compulsive shopping habits.
examples.cn: 她寻求治疗来解决她的强迫性购物习惯。

examples.en: The negotiation ended in a successful agreement.
examples.cn: 谈判以达成协议告终。

examples.en: Their relationship ended in a bitter breakup.
examples.cn: 他们的关系以痛苦的分手结束。

valid_entries.original_phrase: not have a leg to stand on

definitions.meaning_cn: 没有站得住脚的理由或依据

examples.en: Without evidence, you don't have a leg to stand on in court.
examples.cn: 没有证据，你在法庭上就没有站得住脚的理由。

examples.en: His argument doesn't have a leg to stand on because it's based on false assumptions.
examples.cn: 他的论点没有依据，因为它是基于错误的假设。

examples.en: The new model improves upon the previous version with better battery life.
examples.cn: 新机型改进了电池续航，比上一版更好。

examples.en: She aims to improve upon her personal best in the next race.
examples.cn: 她旨在下一场比赛中改进自己的个人最佳成绩。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被录取或允许进入（如学校、医院等）

examples.en: She was admitted to Harvard University last year.
examples.cn: 她去年被哈佛大学录取了。

examples.en: The patient was admitted to the hospital for emergency surgery.
examples.cn: 病人被送入医院进行紧急手术。

examples.en: He finally admitted to stealing the documents.
examples.cn: 他终于承认偷了文件。

examples.en: The suspect admitted to being at the scene of the crime.
examples.cn: 嫌疑人承认在犯罪现场。

definitions.meaning_cn: 提高产量（如农业或制造业）

examples.en: Using new fertilizers can increase yields in crop production.
examples.cn: 使用新肥料可以提高农作物产量。

examples.en: The factory implemented automation to increase yields by 20%.
examples.cn: 工厂实施自动化，将产量提高了20%。

definitions.meaning_cn: 增加收益或回报（如投资）

examples.en: Diversifying investments can help increase yields over time.
examples.cn: 分散投资有助于长期增加收益。

examples.en: The bond strategy aims to increase yields while minimizing risk.
examples.cn: 这种债券策略旨在增加收益，同时最小化风险。

definitions.meaning_cn: 栖息或坐在（高处或狭窄处）

examples.en: The bird perched on a branch, singing softly.
examples.cn: 鸟儿栖息在树枝上，轻声歌唱。

examples.en: He perched on the edge of the chair, looking nervous.
examples.cn: 他坐在椅子边缘，看起来很紧张。

examples.en: The small village perches on a cliff overlooking the sea.
examples.cn: 小村庄坐落在俯瞰大海的悬崖上。

examples.en: She perched on the top of the leaderboard after the competition.
examples.cn: 比赛后，她位居排行榜榜首。

examples.en: The complex math problem made my head spin.
examples.cn: 复杂的数学题让我头晕。

examples.en: All the new information made her head spin during the meeting.
examples.cn: 会议中所有的新信息让她感到困惑。

examples.en: Winning the lottery made his head spin with possibilities.
examples.cn: 中彩票让他兴奋得浮想联翩。

examples.en: The fast-paced city life can make your head spin.
examples.cn: 快节奏的城市生活能让人兴奋不已。

definitions.meaning_cn: 物有所值，得到与花费相称的价值

examples.en: I made sure to eat a lot at the buffet to get my money's worth.
examples.cn: 我在自助餐上吃了很多，以确保物有所值。

examples.en: She uses the gym daily to get her money's worth from the membership.
examples.cn: 她每天去健身房，让会员资格物有所值。

examples.en: Even if it rains, we will still go for a walk.
examples.cn: 即使下雨，我们还是会去散步。

examples.en: She will try her best even if the task seems impossible.
examples.cn: 即使任务看似不可能，她也会尽力而为。

definitions.meaning_cn: 平等接受教育的权利或机会

examples.en: The government promotes the equal access to education for all children.
examples.cn: 政府促进所有儿童平等接受教育。

examples.en: Ensuring the equal access to education is key to reducing inequality.
examples.cn: 确保平等接受教育是减少不平等的关键。

examples.en: With the company's future at stake, they made a risky decision.
examples.cn: 公司的未来岌岌可危，他们做出了一个冒险的决定。

examples.en: Lives are at stake in this emergency situation.
examples.cn: 在这种紧急情况下，生命危在旦夕。

examples.en: Millions of dollars are at stake in the negotiation.
examples.cn: 谈判中涉及数百万美元的赌注。

examples.en: His reputation is at stake if the project fails.
examples.cn: 如果项目失败，他的声誉将面临风险。

definitions.meaning_cn: 上交或提交（如作业、报告）

examples.en: Students must turn in their essays by Friday.
examples.cn: 学生必须在周五前提交论文。

examples.en: He turned in the project report to his boss.
examples.cn: 他向老板提交了项目报告。

examples.en: I'm tired, so I'm going to turn in early tonight.
examples.cn: 我累了，所以今晚要早点睡觉。

examples.en: After the long journey, they decided to turn in for the night.
examples.cn: 长途旅行后，他们决定去睡觉。

definitions.meaning_cn: 称职的，有价值的（尤指在工作或技能方面）

examples.en: Any engineer worth their salt can solve this problem.
examples.cn: 任何称职的工程师都能解决这个问题。

examples.en: She proved she was worth her salt by completing the task efficiently.
examples.cn: 她高效完成任务，证明了自己是称职的。

examples.en: The repair took ages, so we were late for the meeting.
examples.cn: 修理花了很长时间，所以我们开会迟到了。

examples.en: It takes ages to download large files on a slow internet connection.
examples.cn: 在慢速网络连接上下载大文件要花很长时间。

definitions.meaning_cn: 听到风声，得知（秘密或消息）

examples.en: The journalists got wind of the scandal before it was public.
examples.cn: 记者在丑闻公开前就听到了风声。

examples.en: He got wind of the surprise party, so it wasn't a surprise anymore.
examples.cn: 他得知了惊喜派对的消息，所以不再是个惊喜了。

examples.en: The two companies agreed to cooperate with each other on the project.
examples.cn: 两家公司同意在项目上相互合作。

examples.en: It's important to cooperate with your teammates to achieve success.
examples.cn: 与队友合作以实现成功很重要。

examples.en: The charity operates under the name of 'Hope for All'.
examples.cn: 这家慈善机构以'全民希望'的名义运作。

examples.en: He published the book under the name of a pseudonym.
examples.cn: 他以笔名出版了这本书。

examples.en: The property is registered under the name of her husband.
examples.cn: 这处房产登记在她丈夫名下。

examples.en: The account was opened under the name of the company.
examples.cn: 账户以公司名义开立。

examples.en: In the debate, our team was on the weaker side due to lack of preparation.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，由于准备不足，我们队处于劣势。

examples.en: The small business is on the weaker side compared to large corporations.
examples.cn: 与大型企业相比，这家小企业处于劣势。

examples.en: Many parents struggle to combine work and family commitments effectively.
examples.cn: 许多父母难以有效平衡工作和家庭责任。

examples.en: She uses flexible hours to combine work and family commitments.
examples.cn: 她利用弹性工作时间来平衡工作和家庭责任。

definitions.meaning_cn: 致力于，从事（某项任务或项目）

examples.en: He is working on a new novel that will be published next year.
examples.cn: 他正在写一部将于明年出版的新小说。

examples.en: The team is working on improving the software's performance.
examples.cn: 团队正在致力于提高软件的性能。

examples.en: The medicine works on reducing inflammation in the body.
examples.cn: 这种药物对减轻体内炎症起作用。

examples.en: Her speech worked on motivating the audience to take action.
examples.cn: 她的演讲对激励听众采取行动产生了影响。

examples.en: I've never baked a cake before, but I'll take a crack at it.
examples.cn: 我以前从未烤过蛋糕，但我会尝试一下。

examples.en: He decided to take a crack at solving the difficult puzzle.
examples.cn: 他决定尝试解决这个难题。

examples.en: She sat all alone in the park, thinking about her future.
examples.cn: 她独自一人坐在公园里，思考着她的未来。

examples.en: After everyone left, he was all alone in the house.
examples.cn: 所有人都离开后，他独自一人在房子里。

definitions.meaning_cn: 摆脱，甩掉（如追踪者或负担）

examples.en: The spy managed to throw off his pursuers in the crowded market.
examples.cn: 间谍在拥挤的市场中成功甩掉了追踪者。

examples.en: She threw off her worries and enjoyed the vacation.
examples.cn: 她摆脱了烦恼，享受假期。

examples.en: The sudden noise threw off my concentration during the exam.
examples.cn: 突然的噪音打乱了我考试时的注意力。

examples.en: A small mistake can throw off the entire calculation.
examples.cn: 一个小错误可能使整个计算出错。

definitions.meaning_cn: 情况越来越糟，每况愈下

examples.en: After the initial setback, the project went from bad to worse when the main investor withdrew.
examples.cn: 最初的挫折之后，当主要投资者撤资时，这个项目的情况变得越来越糟。

examples.en: His health went from bad to worse despite the doctor's best efforts.
examples.cn: 尽管医生尽了最大努力，他的健康状况还是每况愈下。

examples.en: She got the job on the strength of her impressive portfolio.
examples.cn: 她凭借令人印象深刻的履历获得了这份工作。

examples.en: The company expanded on the strength of its successful product launch.
examples.cn: 公司凭借其成功的产品发布进行了扩张。

examples.en: Regular exercise is vital to maintaining good health.
examples.cn: 定期锻炼对保持健康至关重要。

examples.en: Trust is vital to a successful partnership.
examples.cn: 信任对于成功的伙伴关系是必不可少的。

examples.en: He went for an interview at the tech company yesterday.
examples.cn: 他昨天去那家科技公司参加了面试。

examples.en: She is nervous as she goes for an interview for her dream job.
examples.cn: 她去参加梦想工作的面试时很紧张。

examples.en: As a project manager, she is responsible for managing budgets effectively.
examples.cn: 作为项目经理，她负责有效地管理预算。

examples.en: Small businesses must learn to manage budgets to survive.
examples.cn: 小企业必须学会管理预算才能生存。

examples.en: The government introduced new policies to reduce unemployment.
examples.cn: 政府推出了新政策以减少失业。

examples.en: Investing in education can help reduce unemployment in the long term.
examples.cn: 投资教育有助于长期减少失业。

examples.en: Given his hard work, his promotion came as no surprise.
examples.cn: 鉴于他的努力工作，他的晋升毫不意外。

examples.en: The team's victory came as no surprise to their fans.
examples.cn: 球队的胜利在他们的球迷意料之中。

examples.en: In the debate, she took sides with the environmentalists.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，她支持环保主义者。

examples.en: He refused to take sides with either party in the conflict.
examples.cn: 他拒绝在冲突中支持任何一方。

examples.en: Students should concentrate upon their studies during exam periods.
examples.cn: 学生在考试期间应该专注于学习。

examples.en: She concentrated upon finishing the report before the deadline.
examples.cn: 她集中精力在截止日期前完成报告。

examples.en: Investors often make a trade based on market trends.
examples.cn: 投资者经常根据市场趋势进行交易。

examples.en: He made a trade to exchange his old car for a newer model.
examples.cn: 他做了一笔交易，用旧车换了一辆更新的型号。

examples.en: The hospital provides excellent nursing care for all patients.
examples.cn: 医院为所有病人提供优质的护理。

examples.en: Elderly people may require specialized nursing care at home.
examples.cn: 老年人可能在家需要专业的看护。

examples.en: She left in a hurry to catch the early train.
examples.cn: 她匆忙离开去赶早班火车。

examples.en: He wrote the email in a hurry and made several mistakes.
examples.cn: 他匆忙写了这封邮件，犯了好几个错误。

examples.en: She took the risk of investing in a startup company.
examples.cn: 她冒了投资一家初创公司的风险。

examples.en: He didn't want to take the risk of losing his job.
examples.cn: 他不想冒失去工作的风险。

examples.en: It took him years to come to terms with his father's death.
examples.cn: 他花了多年时间才接受父亲的去世。

examples.en: The two companies came to terms with a new partnership agreement.
examples.cn: 两家公司就新的伙伴关系协议达成了妥协。

examples.en: The ceremony paid tribute to the heroes of the war.
examples.cn: 仪式向战争英雄们致敬。

examples.en: She paid tribute to her mentor in her acceptance speech.
examples.cn: 她在获奖感言中赞扬了她的导师。

examples.en: He followed his doctor's advice and started exercising regularly.
examples.cn: 他听从医生的建议，开始定期锻炼。

examples.en: If you follow my advice, you will avoid many common mistakes.
examples.cn: 如果你听从我的建议，你会避免许多常见错误。

examples.en: She kept the news to herself until she was ready to share it.
examples.cn: 她保守这个消息，直到准备好分享。

examples.en: He decided to keep his plans to himself to avoid criticism.
examples.cn: 他决定不告诉别人他的计划，以避免批评。

examples.en: He paid for the dinner with his credit card.
examples.cn: 他用信用卡支付了晚餐。

examples.en: She offered to pay for the repairs to the car.
examples.cn: 她提出支付汽车的修理费用。

examples.en: Paris and Tokyo are popular tourist destinations worldwide.
examples.cn: 巴黎和东京是全球受欢迎的旅游目的地。

examples.en: The country is developing new tourist destinations to boost its economy.
examples.cn: 该国正在开发新的旅游目的地以促进经济。

examples.en: The company compensated for the delay by offering a discount.
examples.cn: 公司通过提供折扣来补偿延误。

examples.en: Hard work can compensate for a lack of natural talent.
examples.cn: 努力工作可以弥补天赋的不足。

definitions.meaning_cn: 如此...以至于...（表示程度或结果）

examples.en: The movie was so boring that I fell asleep halfway through.
examples.cn: 这部电影太无聊了，以至于我看到一半就睡着了。

examples.en: She was so excited that she couldn't stop talking about it.
examples.cn: 她如此兴奋，以至于不停地谈论这件事。

definitions.meaning_cn: 至少可以说（用于轻描淡写地表达强烈观点）

examples.en: His performance was disappointing, to say the least.
examples.cn: 他的表现至少可以说是令人失望的。

examples.en: The weather was unpredictable, to say the least, during our trip.
examples.cn: 我们旅行期间的天气，至少可以说是变化无常的。

examples.en: At the party, everyone enjoyed themselves dancing and chatting.
examples.cn: 在派对上，每个人都跳舞聊天，玩得很开心。

examples.en: Make sure to enjoy yourself on your vacation.
examples.cn: 确保你在假期中玩得开心。

examples.en: The runner came up from behind to win the race in the final stretch.
examples.cn: 那位跑步者在最后阶段从后面赶上，赢得了比赛。

examples.en: Our team came up from behind to secure a surprising victory.
examples.cn: 我们队后来居上，取得了令人惊讶的胜利。

definitions.meaning_cn: 放任不管，忽略（错误或问题）

examples.en: He let the minor mistake slide to avoid an argument.
examples.cn: 他放任这个小错误不管，以避免争吵。

examples.en: Sometimes it's better to let small issues slide for the sake of peace.
examples.cn: 有时为了和平，最好放任小问题不管。

examples.en: The company gained a reputation for excellent customer service.
examples.cn: 这家公司因优质的客户服务而获得声誉。

examples.en: She gained a reputation for being a reliable and hardworking employee.
examples.cn: 她因可靠和勤奋而获得声誉。

examples.en: He is capable of handling complex projects under pressure.
examples.cn: 他有能力在压力下处理复杂的项目。

examples.en: This software is capable of performing multiple tasks simultaneously.
examples.cn: 这个软件有能力同时执行多个任务。

examples.en: We plan to meet up with friends for coffee this weekend.
examples.cn: 我们计划这个周末与朋友见面喝咖啡。

examples.en: She loves to meet up with friends to catch up on old times.
examples.cn: 她喜欢与朋友见面，叙叙旧。

definitions.meaning_cn: 尽自己的本分，承担应尽的责任

examples.en: In a team project, everyone needs to pull their weight to succeed.
examples.cn: 在团队项目中，每个人都需要尽自己的本分才能成功。
