examples.en: He always pulls his weight at work, so his colleagues respect him.
examples.cn: 他在工作中总是尽自己的本分，因此同事们尊重他。

examples.en: During the power outage, we had to do without electricity for a few hours.
examples.cn: 停电期间，我们不得不没有电将就几个小时。

examples.en: If you forget your umbrella, you'll have to do without it in the rain.
examples.cn: 如果你忘了带伞，下雨时你就得将就一下了。

examples.en: Employees should have a say in company policies that affect them.
examples.cn: 员工应该对影响他们的公司政策有发言权。

examples.en: In a democracy, every citizen has a say in the government.
examples.cn: 在民主国家，每个公民对政府都有发言权。

examples.en: The professor presented a case study on successful marketing strategies.
examples.cn: 教授展示了一个关于成功营销策略的案例研究。

examples.en: This book includes a case study of a company that overcame financial difficulties.
examples.cn: 这本书包括一个公司克服财务困难的案例研究。

examples.en: She jotted down the phone number on a piece of paper.
examples.cn: 她在一张纸上快速记下了电话号码。

examples.en: During the meeting, I jotted down key points for later reference.
examples.cn: 会议期间，我快速记下了关键点以供以后参考。

examples.en: The parked car was in the way, so we couldn't pass.
examples.cn: 那辆停着的车挡路了，所以我们无法通过。

examples.en: Don't leave your bag in the way; someone might trip over it.
examples.cn: 别把你的包放在挡路的地方；有人可能会被绊倒。

examples.en: He explained the problem in a way that everyone could understand.
examples.cn: 他以一种每个人都能理解的方式解释了这个问题。

examples.en: She organized the event in a very efficient way.
examples.cn: 她以一种非常高效的方式组织了这次活动。

examples.en: I missed your call earlier; I'll call you back in a few minutes.
examples.cn: 我之前错过了你的电话；我几分钟后给你回电话。

examples.en: Please ask him to call me back when he's free.
examples.cn: 请让他有空时给我回电话。

examples.en: The company had to call back the defective products for safety reasons.
examples.cn: 出于安全原因，公司不得不召回有缺陷的产品。

examples.en: The teacher called the student back to correct a mistake in the assignment.
examples.cn: 老师把学生叫回来纠正作业中的一个错误。

examples.en: The price is $100, exclusive of taxes and shipping fees.
examples.cn: 价格是100美元，不包括税费和运费。

examples.en: The report covers data from January to March, exclusive of April.
examples.cn: 这份报告涵盖一月到三月的数据，不包括四月。

examples.en: His success goes to show that hard work pays off.
examples.cn: 他的成功证明努力是有回报的。

examples.en: The experiment's results go to show the effectiveness of the new method.
examples.cn: 实验结果表明了新方法的有效性。

examples.en: Please throw the empty bottle in the garbage can.
examples.cn: 请把空瓶子扔进垃圾桶。

examples.en: The garbage can is full and needs to be emptied.
examples.cn: 垃圾桶满了，需要清空。

examples.en: Her job is her primary source of income.
examples.cn: 她的工作是她的主要收入来源。

examples.en: Investments can be a reliable source of income for retirees.
examples.cn: 投资可以是退休人员可靠的收入来源。

examples.en: I need to get a day off next week to attend my sister's wedding.
examples.cn: 我下周需要请一天假去参加我姐姐的婚礼。

examples.en: If you finish the project early, you might get a day off as a reward.
examples.cn: 如果你提前完成项目，可能会得到一天休假作为奖励。

examples.en: It's important to show respect to your elders in many cultures.
examples.cn: 在许多文化中，向长辈表示尊敬很重要。

examples.en: He always shows respect to his colleagues by listening carefully to their ideas.
examples.cn: 他总是通过认真倾听同事的想法来表示尊敬。

examples.en: The river dried up during the summer drought.
examples.cn: 在夏季干旱期间，这条河干涸了。

examples.en: Leave the paint to dry up completely before touching it.
examples.cn: 让油漆完全变干后再触摸。

examples.en: The funding for the project dried up after the budget cuts.
examples.cn: 预算削减后，该项目的资金停止了。

examples.en: He started to speak but then dried up when he saw the audience.
examples.cn: 他开始说话，但看到观众后就停住了。

examples.en: You can see the new software in action during the demo.
examples.cn: 你可以在演示中看到新软件在运行。

examples.en: The firefighters were in action within minutes of the alarm.
examples.cn: 消防员在警报响起几分钟内就行动了。

examples.en: His jokes kept the audience in stitches throughout the show.
examples.cn: 他的笑话让观众在整个演出中笑个不停。

examples.en: The comedian's story about his cat kept us all in stitches.
examples.cn: 喜剧演员关于他猫的故事让我们都笑个不停。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's back to the wall

examples.en: With the deadline approaching, she had her back to the wall and worked all night.
examples.cn: 随着截止日期临近，她背水一战，整夜工作。

examples.en: The team had their backs to the wall after losing three key players.
examples.cn: 在失去三名关键球员后，团队处于困境。

examples.en: Teachers should encourage students to ask questions in class.
examples.cn: 老师应该鼓励学生在课堂上提问。

examples.en: Her parents encouraged her to pursue her passion for art.
examples.cn: 她的父母鼓励她追求对艺术的热爱。

examples.en: Traveling allows people to experience happiness in new cultures.
examples.cn: 旅行让人们在新文化中体验幸福。

examples.en: She experienced great happiness when her book was published.
examples.cn: 当她的书出版时，她体验到了巨大的幸福。

examples.en: I have the day off tomorrow, so I'm planning to go hiking.
examples.cn: 我明天休假一天，所以计划去远足。

examples.en: Employees are allowed to have the day off on their birthdays.
examples.cn: 员工被允许在生日当天休假一天。

examples.en: The teacher drew an analogy between the human brain and a computer.
examples.cn: 老师将人脑和电脑进行了类比。

examples.en: In his essay, he draws an analogy to explain complex economic theories.
examples.cn: 在他的文章中，他进行类比来解释复杂的经济理论。

examples.en: Employees must punch in by 9 AM to start their shift.
examples.cn: 员工必须在上午9点前打卡上班开始轮班。

examples.en: She forgot to punch in this morning, so she had to report it to HR.
examples.cn: 她今早忘记打卡上班了，所以必须向人力资源部报告。

examples.en: Punch in your password to access the system.
examples.cn: 输入你的密码以访问系统。

examples.en: He punched in the coordinates into the GPS device.
examples.cn: 他将坐标输入到GPS设备中。

examples.en: Her talent as a pianist is beyond compare.
examples.cn: 她作为钢琴家的才华无与伦比。

examples.en: The beauty of the sunset over the ocean was beyond compare.
examples.cn: 海洋上日落的美丽无与伦比。

examples.en: International trade has increased significantly due to globalization.
examples.cn: 由于全球化，国际贸易显著增加。

examples.en: The company specializes in international trade of agricultural products.
examples.cn: 这家公司专门从事农产品的国际贸易。

examples.en: The report provides valuable insight into consumer behavior.
examples.cn: 这份报告提供了对消费者行为的宝贵洞察。

examples.en: Her experience gave her deep insight into the challenges of entrepreneurship.
examples.cn: 她的经历让她对创业的挑战有了深刻的洞察。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在那一点上，就那方面而言

examples.en: I agree with you on that score; we need to improve our communication.
examples.cn: 在那一点上我同意你；我们需要改进沟通。

examples.en: On that score, the project has been a success despite the delays.
examples.cn: 就那方面而言，尽管有延迟，项目还是成功的。

examples.en: He talked so much that no one could get a word in edgeways.
examples.cn: 他说得太多，以至于没人能插话。

examples.en: During the debate, she struggled to get a word in edgeways against the more vocal participants.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，她很难在更健谈的参与者面前插话。

examples.en: After completing the last assignment, we will embark on another team project next month.
examples.cn: 完成上一个任务后，我们下个月将开始另一个团队项目。

examples.en: The company decided to embark on another team project to develop a new product line.
examples.cn: 公司决定开始另一个团队项目来开发新产品线。

examples.en: I check online news every morning to stay updated on current events.
examples.cn: 我每天早上查看在线新闻以了解时事。

examples.en: She uses her phone to check online news during her commute.
examples.cn: 她在通勤期间用手机查看在线新闻。

examples.en: Many students feel stressed during exam periods.
examples.cn: 许多学生在考试期间感到压力。

examples.en: He started to feel stressed when the workload increased at his job.
examples.cn: 当工作负荷增加时，他开始感到压力。

examples.en: She always finds fault with my cooking, no matter how hard I try.
examples.cn: 无论我多努力，她总是挑剔我的厨艺。

examples.en: The manager tends to find fault with employees' reports to push for perfection.
examples.cn: 经理倾向于挑剔员工的报告，以追求完美。

examples.en: After losing three major clients, the company is on the ropes financially.
examples.cn: 失去三个大客户后，公司在财务上处于困境。

examples.en: The boxer was on the ropes in the final round, barely defending himself.
examples.cn: 拳击手在最后一轮处于困境，几乎无法自卫。

examples.en: Patients with contagious diseases are isolated from others to prevent spread.
examples.cn: 传染病患者被隔离以防止传播。

examples.en: He isolated himself from social media to focus on his studies.
examples.cn: 他脱离社交媒体以专注于学习。

examples.en: Despite the pressure, she refused to back down from her decision.
examples.cn: 尽管有压力，她拒绝从决定中退缩。

examples.en: The government backed down on the tax increase after public protests.
examples.cn: 在公众抗议后，政府在增税问题上让步了。

examples.en: We need to take steps to reduce our carbon footprint immediately.
examples.cn: 我们需要立即采取措施减少碳足迹。

examples.en: The school took steps to improve safety after the incident.
examples.cn: 事件发生后，学校采取措施提高了安全性。

examples.en: Students have access to the library database for research purposes.
examples.cn: 学生有权访问图书馆数据库进行研究。

examples.en: The new policy grants access to healthcare for all citizens.
examples.cn: 新政策授予所有公民医疗保健使用权。

examples.en: Completing the project gave her a strong sense of progress.
examples.cn: 完成项目给了她强烈的进步感。

examples.en: Regular feedback helps employees maintain a sense of progress in their work.
examples.cn: 定期反馈帮助员工在工作中保持进步感。

examples.en: Protesters chanted 'down with the government' during the rally.
examples.cn: 抗议者在集会上高呼'打倒政府'。

examples.en: Down with unfair policies that harm the environment!
examples.cn: 打倒损害环境的不公平政策！

examples.en: The ebb and flow of the stock market can be unpredictable.
examples.cn: 股市的涨落可能难以预测。

examples.en: Life has its natural ebb and flow of good and bad times.
examples.cn: 生活有其自然的起伏，有顺境也有逆境。

examples.en: I caught sight of a rare bird while hiking in the forest.
examples.cn: 在森林徒步时，我瞥见了一只稀有鸟类。

examples.en: She caught sight of her friend across the crowded room.
examples.cn: 她在拥挤的房间对面瞥见了她的朋友。

examples.en: The university invested in new teaching facilities to enhance learning.
examples.cn: 大学投资了新教学设施以提升学习效果。

examples.en: Modern teaching facilities include smart boards and computer labs.
examples.cn: 现代教学设施包括智能白板和计算机实验室。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get a dirty look from sb.

examples.en: I got a dirty look from my neighbor when I parked in his spot.
examples.cn: 当我停在他的车位时，我收到了邻居厌恶的眼神。

examples.en: She got a dirty look from the teacher for talking during class.
examples.cn: 她因上课说话收到了老师厌恶的眼神。

examples.en: He passed out from exhaustion after running the marathon.
examples.cn: 跑完马拉松后，他因疲惫昏倒了。

examples.en: The teacher will pass out the exam papers in a few minutes.
examples.cn: 老师将在几分钟内分发试卷。

examples.en: The new regulations inflict additional costs upon small businesses.
examples.cn: 新规定给小企业强加了额外成本。

examples.en: He didn't want to inflict his problems upon his friends.
examples.cn: 他不想把自己的问题强加给朋友。

examples.en: I prefer tea to coffee in the morning.
examples.cn: 早上我更喜欢茶而不是咖啡。

examples.en: She prefers reading books to watching TV for entertainment.
examples.cn: 作为娱乐，她更喜欢读书而不是看电视。

examples.en: Keep in mind that the deadline is next Friday.
examples.cn: 记住截止日期是下周五。

examples.en: When planning the trip, keep the budget in mind.
examples.cn: 计划旅行时，要考虑预算。

examples.en: He had a brush with the law when he was caught speeding.
examples.cn: 他因超速被逮时与法律有了短暂冲突。

examples.en: She had a brush with fame when her photo went viral online.
examples.cn: 当她的照片在网上疯传时，她与名声有了短暂接触。

examples.en: Do you got the time to help me with this project?
examples.cn: 你有时间帮我做这个项目吗？

examples.en: Excuse me, have you got the time? My watch stopped.
examples.cn: 打扰一下，你知道时间吗？我的表停了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 床上用品，如床单、枕套等

examples.en: The hotel provides fresh bed linen daily.
examples.cn: 酒店每天提供干净的床上用品。

examples.en: She prefers cotton bed linen for its breathability.
examples.cn: 她更喜欢棉质床上用品，因为它透气性好。

definitions.meaning_cn: 关于某事的共识或一致意见

examples.en: The team reached a consensus about the project timeline.
examples.cn: 团队就项目时间表达成了共识。

examples.en: There is a broad consensus about the need for environmental protection.
examples.cn: 关于环境保护的必要性，存在广泛的共识。

examples.en: Some people pursue material goods at the expense of personal relationships.
examples.cn: 有些人以牺牲人际关系为代价追求物质财富。

examples.en: In consumer societies, many are encouraged to pursue material goods.
examples.cn: 在消费社会中，许多人被鼓励追求物质商品。

definitions.meaning_cn: 一方面...（通常与'on the other hand'连用，表示对比）

examples.en: On the one hand, the job offers a high salary; on the other hand, it requires long hours.
examples.cn: 一方面，这份工作薪水高；另一方面，它需要长时间工作。

examples.en: On the one hand, technology improves efficiency; on the other hand, it can lead to job losses.
examples.cn: 一方面，技术提高了效率；另一方面，它可能导致失业。

definitions.meaning_cn: 用极少的钱维持生活或运营

examples.en: As a student, I had to get along on a shoestring budget.
examples.cn: 作为学生，我不得不靠极少的预算维持生活。

examples.en: The startup managed to get along on a shoestring until it secured funding.
examples.cn: 这家初创公司在获得资金前，一直用极少的钱维持运营。

definitions.meaning_cn: 倾向于做某事或有某种习惯

examples.en: Children tend to learn languages more quickly than adults.
examples.cn: 儿童往往比成年人学习语言更快。

examples.en: He tends to avoid conflict in discussions.
examples.cn: 他倾向于在讨论中避免冲突。

definitions.meaning_cn: 发生或变成什么（用于询问人或事物的结局）

examples.en: What has become of your old friend from school?
examples.cn: 你学校的老朋友后来怎么样了？

examples.en: I wonder what will become of that abandoned building.
examples.cn: 我想知道那座废弃建筑会变成什么样子。

definitions.meaning_cn: 用某事物给某人留下深刻印象

examples.en: She impressed the interviewers with her extensive knowledge.
examples.cn: 她用广博的知识给面试官留下了深刻印象。

examples.en: He impressed his guests with a gourmet meal.
examples.cn: 他用一顿美食给客人留下了深刻印象。

definitions.meaning_cn: 一些或若干（后接复数名词）

examples.en: A number of students were absent from class today.
examples.cn: 今天有一些学生缺课。

examples.en: We received a number of complaints about the service.
examples.cn: 我们收到了一些关于服务的投诉。

definitions.meaning_cn: 丝毫或一点也不（常用于否定句）

examples.en: I'm not in the least interested in that topic.
examples.cn: 我对那个话题一点也不感兴趣。

examples.en: She wasn't in the least surprised by the news.
examples.cn: 她对这消息一点也不感到惊讶。

examples.en: Don't worry, I was just pulling your leg about the test.
examples.cn: 别担心，我只是在考试的事上跟你开玩笑。

examples.en: He often pulls his friends' legs with funny stories.
examples.cn: 他经常用有趣的故事戏弄朋友。

examples.en: She gets along well with her colleagues at work.
examples.cn: 她在工作中与同事相处得很好。

examples.en: It's important to get along with your neighbors.
examples.cn: 与邻居相处融洽很重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 以折扣价或低于正常价格

examples.en: The store is selling winter coats at a discount.
examples.cn: 这家商店正在打折销售冬装外套。

examples.en: He bought the car at a discount because it was a demo model.
examples.cn: 他以折扣价买了这辆车，因为它是展示车。

examples.en: In research papers, key words help in indexing and searching.
examples.cn: 在研究论文中，关键词有助于索引和搜索。

examples.en: The key word in his speech was 'innovation'.
examples.cn: 他演讲中的关键词是'创新'。

examples.en: Keep a first aid kit on hand in case of emergencies.
examples.cn: 手边备一个急救箱，以防紧急情况。

examples.en: We have extra supplies on hand for the event.
examples.cn: 我们手边有额外的物资用于这次活动。

definitions.meaning_cn: 给电池充电或比喻休息恢复精力

examples.en: I need to recharge my phone's batteries before we leave.
examples.cn: 在我们离开前，我需要给手机电池充电。

examples.en: After a busy week, she took a vacation to recharge her batteries.
examples.cn: 忙碌一周后，她休假以恢复精力。

examples.en: The two companies came to terms on the merger deal.
examples.cn: 两家公司就合并交易达成了协议。

examples.en: It took him years to come to terms with his loss.
examples.cn: 他花了好几年才接受自己的损失。

examples.en: Boil water before drinking it to ensure it's safe.
examples.cn: 喝水前先烧开以确保安全。

examples.en: She boiled water to make a cup of tea.
examples.cn: 她烧开水泡了一杯茶。

definitions.meaning_cn: 超出某人的能力或范围

examples.en: Solving this complex problem is beyond the capability of a single person.
examples.cn: 解决这个复杂问题超出了单个人的能力。

examples.en: The advanced technology is beyond the capability of our current team.
examples.cn: 这项先进技术超出了我们当前团队的能力范围。

examples.en: Overcoming challenges helps build character in young adults.
examples.cn: 克服挑战有助于培养年轻人的品格。

examples.en: Military service is often said to build character through discipline.
examples.cn: 人们常说，通过纪律约束，服兵役可以塑造性格。

definitions.meaning_cn: 票房大卖，非常成功的电影或演出

examples.en: The new superhero movie was a box office smash, earning over $1 billion worldwide.
examples.cn: 这部新的超级英雄电影票房大卖，全球收入超过10亿美元。

examples.en: Her Broadway debut became a box office smash, with tickets selling out for months.
examples.cn: 她的百老汇首演票房大卖，门票售罄长达数月。

definitions.meaning_cn: 保持同步，了解最新情况

examples.en: As a journalist, she must keep abreast of current events to report accurately.
examples.cn: 作为一名记者，她必须了解最新事件，以便准确报道。

examples.en: He reads industry journals daily to keep abreast of technological advancements.
examples.cn: 他每天阅读行业期刊，以了解技术进展的最新情况。

examples.en: Investing in startups can run a risk of losing your entire capital.
examples.cn: 投资初创公司可能会冒损失全部资本的风险。

examples.en: If you don't wear a helmet, you run a risk of serious injury while biking.
examples.cn: 如果你不戴头盔，骑自行车时可能会冒严重受伤的风险。

examples.en: The politician did a flip-flop on the tax policy after public pressure.
examples.cn: 在公众压力下，这位政治家在税收政策上改变了立场。

examples.en: She did a flip-flop on her decision to move abroad, citing family reasons.
examples.cn: 她出尔反尔，改变了移居国外的决定，理由是家庭原因。

examples.en: The store will offer a discount of 20% on all items during the holiday sale.
examples.cn: 在假日促销期间，这家商店将对所有商品提供20%的折扣。

examples.en: To attract new customers, the company decided to offer a discount on first-time purchases.
examples.cn: 为了吸引新客户，公司决定对首次购买提供折扣。

examples.en: You can either take the bus or walk to the station; both options are available.
examples.cn: 你可以要么乘公交车，要么步行去车站；两种选择都可以。

examples.en: Either finish your homework now or you won't be allowed to watch TV later.
examples.cn: 要么现在完成作业，要么你稍后就不能看电视。

definitions.meaning_cn: 出于某种原因，不知为何

examples.en: For some reason, the computer keeps crashing whenever I open that program.
examples.cn: 出于某种原因，每当我打开那个程序时，电脑就会崩溃。

examples.en: He was late for the meeting for some reason he didn't explain.
examples.cn: 他开会迟到了，出于某种他没有解释的原因。

examples.en: Her success is rooted in years of hard work and dedication.
examples.cn: 她的成功根植于多年的辛勤工作和奉献。

examples.en: The tradition is rooted in ancient cultural practices that date back centuries.
examples.cn: 这个传统根植于可以追溯到几个世纪前的古老文化习俗。

examples.en: The prosecutor plans to bring the suspect to trial next month for the alleged crime.
examples.cn: 检察官计划下个月将嫌疑人送上法庭审判，指控其犯罪。

examples.en: After gathering enough evidence, the authorities decided to bring the corrupt official to trial.
examples.cn: 收集到足够证据后，当局决定将这名腐败官员送上法庭审判。

definitions.meaning_cn: 比喻脆弱，容易受到打击或批评

examples.en: As a public figure, he has a glass jaw and gets upset over minor criticisms.
examples.cn: 作为一名公众人物，他很容易受到打击，对轻微的批评就会感到不安。

examples.en: In boxing, a fighter with a glass jaw is likely to be knocked out easily.
examples.cn: 在拳击中，下巴脆弱的拳击手很可能容易被击倒。

examples.en: The contract terms are written in black and white, so there should be no confusion.
examples.cn: 合同条款写得黑白分明，因此不应该有任何混淆。

examples.en: She sees the world in black and white, with little room for gray areas.
examples.cn: 她看世界黑白分明，几乎没有灰色地带的余地。

examples.en: The old photographs are in black and white, capturing the era's simplicity.
examples.cn: 这些老照片是黑白的，捕捉了那个时代的简约。

examples.en: He prefers movies in black and white for their classic aesthetic.
examples.cn: 他更喜欢黑白电影，因为它们具有经典的美感。

examples.en: While traveling in a new city, it's wise to keep your eyes open for pickpockets.
examples.cn: 在新城市旅行时，明智的做法是保持警惕，留意扒手。

examples.en: Keep your eyes open for any job opportunities that might arise in the industry.
examples.cn: 留意行业中可能出现的任何工作机会。

examples.en: Parents work hard to provide for their children's education and well-being.
examples.cn: 父母努力工作，以供养孩子的教育和福祉。

examples.en: The government program aims to provide for the basic needs of low-income families.
examples.cn: 政府计划旨在为低收入家庭提供基本需求。

examples.en: The will provides for the distribution of assets among the heirs.
examples.cn: 遗嘱规定了资产在继承人之间的分配。

examples.en: The contract provides for penalties in case of late delivery.
examples.cn: 合同规定了延迟交货情况下的处罚。

examples.en: The committee reviewed the proposal to do a feasibility study on the new project.
examples.cn: 委员会审查了关于对新项目进行可行性研究的提议。

examples.en: She submitted a proposal to do volunteer work abroad during the summer break.
examples.cn: 她提交了一份在暑假期间去国外做志愿工作的提议。

definitions.meaning_cn: 恢复健康或经济状况，重新站起来

examples.en: After the surgery, it took him a few months to be back on his feet and return to work.
examples.cn: 手术后，他花了几个月时间才恢复健康并重返工作岗位。

examples.en: With some financial help, she managed to be back on her feet after losing her job.
examples.cn: 在一些经济帮助下，她在失业后设法重新站了起来。

examples.en: The manager gave the team to understand that deadlines must be met without exception.
examples.cn: 经理让团队理解，截止日期必须无一例外地满足。

examples.en: His tone gave me to understand that he was not pleased with the results.
examples.cn: 他的语气让我理解，他对结果不满意。

examples.en: The government is working to improve the living conditions in urban slums.
examples.cn: 政府正在努力改善城市贫民窟的生活条件。

examples.en: Access to clean water is a basic aspect of good living conditions.
examples.cn: 获得清洁水是良好生活条件的基本方面。

examples.en: To avoid misunderstandings, always clarify expectations in writing.
examples.cn: 为避免误解，务必以书面形式明确期望。

examples.en: She spoke slowly to avoid misunderstandings during the negotiation.
examples.cn: 她说话很慢，以避免谈判中的误解。

examples.en: His success has a lot to do with his dedication.
examples.cn: 他的成功很大程度上与他的奉献精神有关。

examples.en: This decision has nothing to do with personal feelings.
examples.cn: 这个决定与个人感情无关。

examples.en: Volunteering makes me feel like I'm part of the community.
examples.cn: 志愿服务让我感觉自己属于社区的一部分。

examples.en: Being part of a community provides a sense of belonging.
examples.cn: 作为社区的一部分能带来归属感。

examples.en: It is illegal to discriminate against someone based on their race.
examples.cn: 基于种族歧视他人是非法的。

examples.en: The company was fined for discriminating against older applicants.
examples.cn: 该公司因歧视年长申请者而被罚款。

examples.en: She learned the poem by heart for the recitation contest.
examples.cn: 她为朗诵比赛熟记了这首诗。

examples.en: He knows all the lyrics by heart and sings along perfectly.
examples.cn: 他熟记所有歌词，能完美地跟着唱。

examples.en: We're planning a trip to Europe for the summer holiday.
examples.cn: 我们计划在暑假去欧洲旅行。

examples.en: Students look forward to the summer holiday after exams.
examples.cn: 学生们在考试后期待着暑假。

examples.en: Turbidity currents can transport sediment across the ocean floor.
examples.cn: 浊流能将沉积物输送过海底。

examples.en: Scientists study turbidity currents to understand underwater landslides.
examples.cn: 科学家研究浊流以了解水下滑坡。

examples.en: Her quick-witted response saved the awkward situation.
examples.cn: 她机智的回答化解了尴尬的局面。

examples.en: A quick-witted detective can solve cases faster.
examples.cn: 机智的侦探能更快破案。

examples.en: The project has been on the shelf due to budget cuts.
examples.cn: 由于预算削减，这个项目被搁置了。

examples.en: Old books often end up on the shelf, forgotten.
examples.cn: 旧书常常被闲置在书架上，被人遗忘。

examples.en: He found it hard to part with his childhood toys.
examples.cn: 他发现很难放弃童年的玩具。

examples.en: She had to part with her savings to pay for the emergency.
examples.cn: 她不得不动用积蓄来支付紧急费用。

examples.en: She decided to take up painting as a new hobby.
examples.cn: 她决定开始学习绘画作为新爱好。

examples.en: This meeting will take up most of the afternoon.
examples.cn: 这次会议将占用下午的大部分时间。

examples.en: I saw him just now at the coffee shop.
examples.cn: 我刚才在咖啡店看到他了。

examples.en: We're busy just now, but can call back later.
examples.cn: 我们此刻很忙，但可以稍后回电。

examples.en: Her colleagues think highly of her work ethic.
examples.cn: 她的同事们高度评价她的职业道德。

examples.en: I think highly of anyone who volunteers their time.
examples.cn: 我尊重任何自愿奉献时间的人。

examples.en: Please sign in to your account to access the files.
examples.cn: 请登录您的账户以访问文件。

examples.en: Guests must sign in at the reception upon arrival.
examples.cn: 客人到达时必须在接待处签到。

examples.en: Students worked in pairs to complete the experiment.
examples.cn: 学生们两人一组完成实验。

examples.en: The dance requires participants to move in pairs.
examples.cn: 这支舞要求参与者成对移动。

examples.en: The research was conducted in collaboration with several universities.
examples.cn: 这项研究是与几所大学合作进行的。

examples.en: They launched the product in collaboration with a tech startup.
examples.cn: 他们与一家科技初创公司合作推出了这款产品。

examples.en: Moving to a new country often causes culture shock.
examples.cn: 搬到新国家常常会引起文化冲击。

examples.en: He experienced culture shock when he first arrived in Japan.
examples.cn: 他初到日本时经历了文化冲击。

examples.en: The comments were made off the record and shouldn't be published.
examples.cn: 这些评论是非正式的，不应被公开。

examples.en: Let's discuss this off the record to avoid any leaks.
examples.cn: 我们非正式地讨论这个，以避免任何泄露。

examples.en: They have something going with that new project.
examples.cn: 他们在那个新项目上有所进展。

examples.en: I think there's something going between those two coworkers.
examples.cn: 我觉得那两个同事之间有点事情。

definitions.meaning_cn: 表现出自律或遵守规则

examples.en: The athlete must show discipline in training to achieve peak performance.
examples.cn: 运动员必须在训练中表现出自律以达到最佳表现。

examples.en: Students who show discipline in their studies often earn higher grades.
examples.cn: 在学习中表现出自律的学生通常能获得更高的成绩。

examples.en: The troops were ordered to show discipline during the parade.
examples.cn: 部队被命令在阅兵期间展示纪律。

examples.en: A good leader encourages the team to show discipline in all tasks.
examples.cn: 优秀的领导者鼓励团队在所有任务中展示纪律。

definitions.meaning_cn: 采取极端或激进的行动

examples.en: The company had to take a drastic step and lay off half its workforce to survive.
examples.cn: 公司不得不采取极端措施，裁员一半以生存下去。

examples.en: To combat climate change, governments must take drastic steps to reduce emissions.
examples.cn: 为了应对气候变化，政府必须采取激进措施减少排放。

definitions.meaning_cn: 处于良好状态或表现优秀

examples.en: The tennis player is in good form and won the match easily.
examples.cn: 这位网球选手状态良好，轻松赢得了比赛。

examples.en: After a week of rest, the singer was in good form for the concert.
examples.cn: 休息一周后，歌手在音乐会上状态良好。

examples.en: With regular exercise, she is always in good form.
examples.cn: 通过定期锻炼，她总是身体健康。

examples.en: He felt in good form after a refreshing vacation.
examples.cn: 度过一个令人振奋的假期后，他感到精神饱满。

definitions.meaning_cn: 努力争取或谋求（职位、晋升等）

examples.en: She is bucking for a promotion by taking on extra projects.
examples.cn: 她通过承担额外项目来努力争取晋升。

examples.en: He has been bucking for the manager position for months.
examples.cn: 他几个月来一直在谋求经理职位。

examples.en: I have yet to finish my homework, so I can't go out.
examples.cn: 我尚未完成作业，所以不能出去。

examples.en: The results have yet to be announced by the committee.
examples.cn: 委员会尚未公布结果。

definitions.meaning_cn: 信任或相信某人或某事

examples.en: I have faith in my team's ability to win the championship.
examples.cn: 我相信我的团队有能力赢得冠军。

examples.en: Parents should have faith in their children's decisions.
examples.cn: 父母应该信任孩子的决定。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对宗教或精神信仰有信心

examples.en: She has faith in God to guide her through difficult times.
examples.cn: 她相信上帝会引导她度过困难时期。

examples.en: Many people have faith in the power of prayer.
examples.cn: 许多人相信祈祷的力量。

definitions.meaning_cn: 法学院（大学中的一个学院）

examples.en: She enrolled in the Faculty of Law to study criminal justice.
examples.cn: 她进入法学院学习刑事司法。

examples.en: The Faculty of Law at this university is renowned for its research.
examples.cn: 这所大学的法学院以其研究而闻名。

examples.en: We can't afford to buy a new car this year.
examples.cn: 我们今年买不起新车。

examples.en: He can afford to travel abroad every summer.
examples.cn: 他每年夏天都有经济能力出国旅行。

examples.en: The company cannot afford to lose any more clients.
examples.cn: 公司承担不起失去更多客户的后果。

examples.en: She can't afford to make a mistake in this important presentation.
examples.cn: 在这次重要的演讲中，她承担不起犯错的后果。

definitions.meaning_cn: 赋予某物（特定品质或意义）

examples.en: The author invested the character with great wisdom and courage.
examples.cn: 作者赋予这个角色极大的智慧和勇气。

examples.en: The ceremony invested the event with a sense of tradition.
examples.cn: 仪式赋予这个事件一种传统感。

definitions.meaning_cn: 投资某物于（某个领域或项目）

examples.en: He invested his savings with a reputable financial advisor.
examples.cn: 他将储蓄投资于一位信誉良好的财务顾问。

examples.en: The company plans to invest more resources with the new technology division.
examples.cn: 公司计划向新技术部门投入更多资源。

examples.en: The car moved in reverse to park in the tight space.
examples.cn: 汽车倒车以停入狭窄的空间。

examples.en: She read the list in reverse order, starting from the bottom.
examples.cn: 她从底部开始，以相反的顺序阅读列表。

examples.en: In reverse, the process yields different results.
examples.cn: 相反，这个过程产生不同的结果。

examples.en: The roles were played in reverse, with the student teaching the teacher.
examples.cn: 角色被颠倒，由学生教老师。

examples.en: The accountant is responsible for managing financial records accurately.
examples.cn: 会计师负责准确管理财务记录。

examples.en: Small businesses must manage financial records to track expenses and income.
examples.cn: 小企业必须管理财务记录以跟踪支出和收入。

examples.en: The sailors were at sea for three months during the voyage.
examples.cn: 水手们在航行期间在海上航行了三个月。

examples.en: The ship is currently at sea, heading towards the port.
examples.cn: 船目前正在海上，驶向港口。

examples.en: Without the instructions, I was completely at sea with the new software.
examples.cn: 没有说明书，我对新软件完全不知所措。

examples.en: During the complex discussion, he felt at sea and couldn't contribute.
examples.cn: 在复杂的讨论中，他感到困惑，无法做出贡献。

examples.en: The government attempted to cover up political scandals to avoid public outrage.
examples.cn: 政府试图掩盖政治丑闻以避免公众愤怒。

examples.en: Journalists exposed efforts to cover up political scandals involving corruption.
examples.cn: 记者揭露了掩盖涉及腐败的政治丑闻的努力。

examples.en: She knows better than to trust strangers online.
examples.cn: 她明智到不会信任网上的陌生人。

examples.en: He knows better than to skip breakfast before a long day.
examples.cn: 他明智到不会在漫长的一天前跳过早餐。

examples.en: Soldiers must survive in the hostile environment of a war zone.
examples.cn: 士兵必须在战区的敌对环境中生存。

examples.en: The plant adapted to grow in the hostile environment of the desert.
examples.cn: 这种植物适应了在沙漠的敌对环境中生长。

examples.en: The job market is competitive, with many applicants for few positions.
examples.cn: 就业市场竞争激烈，许多申请者竞争少数职位。

examples.en: Graduates are entering the job market during an economic downturn.
examples.cn: 毕业生在经济低迷时期进入就业市场。

examples.en: She peeled off the sticker from the book cover.
examples.cn: 她从书封上撕下了贴纸。

examples.en: The paint began to peel off the old wall.
examples.cn: 油漆开始从旧墙上剥落。

examples.en: One car peeled off from the convoy to take a different route.
examples.cn: 一辆车脱离车队，走了一条不同的路线。

examples.en: He peeled off from the group to explore on his own.
examples.cn: 他脱离小组，独自探索。

examples.en: The product must conform with safety regulations before sale.
examples.cn: 产品在销售前必须符合安全规定。

examples.en: Her actions conform with the company's ethical guidelines.
examples.cn: 她的行为符合公司的道德准则。

examples.en: Smoking is a major risk factor for developing laryngeal cancer.
examples.cn: 吸烟是患喉癌的主要风险因素。

examples.en: Early detection of laryngeal cancer can improve treatment outcomes.
examples.cn: 早期发现喉癌可以改善治疗结果。

examples.en: If the service is poor, you should make a complaint to the manager.
examples.cn: 如果服务不好，你应该向经理投诉。

examples.en: She made a complaint about the noisy neighbors to the landlord.
examples.cn: 她向房东投诉了吵闹的邻居。

examples.en: The company reported double-digit growth in sales this quarter.
examples.cn: 该公司报告本季度销售额实现了两位数增长。

examples.en: Inflation reached double-digit levels for the first time in years.
examples.cn: 通货膨胀多年来首次达到两位数水平。

examples.en: Athletes always warm up before a race to prevent injuries.
examples.cn: 运动员在比赛前总是热身以防止受伤。

examples.en: She warmed up with some light stretching before her workout.
examples.cn: 她在锻炼前通过轻度拉伸来热身。

examples.en: I'll warm up some soup for lunch.
examples.cn: 我会热一些汤当午餐。

examples.en: The sun warmed up the room quickly in the morning.
examples.cn: 早晨太阳很快让房间暖和起来。

examples.en: The shy child warmed up to the new teacher after a few days.
examples.cn: 几天后，那个害羞的孩子对新老师变得友好起来。

examples.en: The audience warmed up as the comedian told more jokes.
examples.cn: 随着喜剧演员讲更多笑话，观众活跃了起来。

examples.en: Can you look after my dog while I'm on vacation?
examples.cn: 我度假时你能照顾我的狗吗？

examples.en: She looks after her elderly parents with great care.
examples.cn: 她非常细心地照顾年迈的父母。

examples.en: He was accused of stealing money from the company.
examples.cn: 他被指控从公司偷钱。

examples.en: The politician was accused of corruption by the media.
examples.cn: 这位政治家被媒体指控腐败。

examples.en: We need to get ready for the big exam next week.
examples.cn: 我们需要为下周的大考做准备。

examples.en: She's getting ready for her wedding day.
examples.cn: 她正在为婚礼日做准备。

examples.en: At the buffet, you can eat to your heart's content.
examples.cn: 在自助餐上，你可以尽情地吃。

examples.en: She read books to her heart's content during the holiday.
examples.cn: 假期里她尽情地读书。

examples.en: They decided to give away old clothes to charity.
examples.cn: 他们决定把旧衣服捐赠给慈善机构。

examples.en: The company will give away free samples at the event.
examples.cn: 公司将在活动中分发免费样品。

examples.en: His nervous smile gave away the fact that he was lying.
examples.cn: 他紧张的微笑暴露了他在说谎的事实。

examples.en: Don't give away the surprise party details to her.
examples.cn: 别把惊喜派对的细节泄露给她。

examples.en: I have classes every morning from 9 to 12.
examples.cn: 我每天早上9点到12点有课。

examples.en: Do you have classes on weekends?
examples.cn: 你周末有课吗？

examples.en: Please enter the website address in the browser to access the page.
examples.cn: 请在浏览器中输入网址以访问该页面。

examples.en: I forgot the website address for the online store.
examples.cn: 我忘了那个在线商店的网址。

examples.en: The mountain village is far off from the city.
examples.cn: 那个山村离城市很遥远。

examples.en: A solution to the problem seems far off at the moment.
examples.cn: 目前看来，问题的解决方案还很遥远。

examples.en: She stood on the hill, drinking in the beautiful sunset.
examples.cn: 她站在山上，尽情欣赏美丽的日落。

examples.en: He drank in every word of the inspiring speech.
examples.cn: 他吸收了那场鼓舞人心演讲的每一个字。

examples.en: It's important to complete work on time to meet deadlines.
examples.cn: 按时完成工作以满足截止日期很重要。

examples.en: She always manages to complete work on time, even under pressure.
examples.cn: 即使在压力下，她也总能按时完成工作。

examples.en: He had a close shave when the car almost hit him.
examples.cn: 汽车差点撞到他时，他侥幸脱险。

examples.en: We had a close shave with missing our flight by just a few minutes.
examples.cn: 我们差点错过航班，只差几分钟，真是侥幸。

examples.en: The police tracked down the suspect after a week-long search.
examples.cn: 经过一周的搜寻，警察追踪找到了嫌疑人。

examples.en: I finally tracked down that rare book in an online store.
examples.cn: 我终于在一家网店搜寻到了那本稀有书籍。

examples.en: Please keep off the grass to protect the lawn.
examples.cn: 请远离草坪以保护草地。

examples.en: He kept off sugary foods to improve his health.
examples.cn: 他避开含糖食物以改善健康。

examples.en: She decided to take up painting as a hobby.
examples.cn: 她决定开始学习绘画作为爱好。

examples.en: He took up the challenge of learning a new language.
examples.cn: 他接受了学习一门新语言的挑战。

examples.en: This project will take up most of my time this month.
examples.cn: 这个项目将占用我这个月的大部分时间。

examples.en: The new sofa takes up too much space in the living room.
examples.cn: 新沙发在客厅占用了太多空间。

examples.en: My friend is going to sleep over at my house tonight.
examples.cn: 今晚我的朋友要在我家过夜。

examples.en: We had a sleepover party with movies and snacks.
examples.cn: 我们举办了一个有电影和零食的过夜派对。

examples.en: The damages were in excess of $10,000.
examples.cn: 损失超过10,000美元。

examples.en: The temperature rose in excess of 40 degrees Celsius.
examples.cn: 温度上升到超过40摄氏度。

examples.en: It's time to put our new ideas into practice.
examples.cn: 是时候把我们的新想法付诸实践了。

examples.en: She put the training she received into practice at work.
examples.cn: 她在工作中实施了所接受的培训。

examples.en: The charity is raising money for disaster relief.
examples.cn: 该慈善机构正在为救灾筹集资金。

examples.en: We need to raise money to expand our business.
examples.cn: 我们需要筹集资金来扩展业务。

examples.en: The school raised money by selling handmade crafts.
examples.cn: 学校通过销售手工制品来募捐。

examples.en: They raised money for the local animal shelter.
examples.cn: 他们为当地动物收容所募捐。

examples.en: I need to get this secret off my chest; it's been bothering me for years.
examples.cn: 我需要把这个秘密说出来，它困扰我多年了。

examples.en: After getting his worries off his chest, he felt much lighter.
examples.cn: 倾诉完他的担忧后，他感觉轻松多了。

examples.en: She walked away with the first prize in the competition.
examples.cn: 她轻松赢得了比赛的一等奖。

examples.en: The team walked away with the championship trophy.
examples.cn: 该队轻松获得了冠军奖杯。

examples.en: He walked away with the book he borrowed from the library.
examples.cn: 他带着从图书馆借的书离开了。

examples.en: Don't just walk away with my umbrella!
examples.cn: 别带着我的伞就走！

examples.en: To her delight, she received a promotion at work.
examples.cn: 令她高兴的是，她在工作中获得了晋升。

examples.en: To our delight, the weather cleared up for the picnic.
examples.cn: 令我们高兴的是，天气转晴适合野餐。

examples.en: Scientists are developing a new type of fuel that reduces carbon emissions.
examples.cn: 科学家正在开发一种减少碳排放的新型燃料。

examples.en: This car runs on a new type of fuel made from algae.
examples.cn: 这辆车使用一种由藻类制成的新型燃料。

examples.en: What can I do for you today?
examples.cn: 今天我能为您做些什么？

examples.en: She did a lot for the community by volunteering.
examples.cn: 她通过志愿服务为社区做了很多。

examples.en: The heavy rain did for our garden plants.
examples.cn: 大雨毁掉了我们的花园植物。

examples.en: That mistake could do for his career.
examples.cn: 那个错误可能会毁掉他的职业生涯。

examples.en: Please set down your bags and take a seat.
examples.cn: 请放下你的包，坐下。

examples.en: He set down his thoughts in a journal.
examples.cn: 他在日记中记下了自己的想法。

examples.en: The committee set down new guidelines for safety.
examples.cn: 委员会制定了新的安全准则。

examples.en: The law sets down strict penalties for fraud.
examples.cn: 法律对欺诈行为制定了严厉的惩罚。

examples.en: Can you spell out your plan so everyone understands?
examples.cn: 你能详细说明你的计划，让大家都明白吗？

examples.en: The teacher asked the student to spell out the difficult word.
examples.cn: 老师让学生拼写出那个难词。

examples.en: We'll stop off in Paris on our way to Rome.
examples.cn: 我们在去罗马的途中会在巴黎停留。

examples.en: He stopped off at a café for a quick coffee.
examples.cn: 他在一家咖啡馆中途停留，快速喝了杯咖啡。

examples.en: We've got the contract sewed up, so we can relax now.
examples.cn: 我们已经搞定了合同，现在可以放松了。

examples.en: She got the promotion sewed up with her excellent performance.
examples.cn: 她凭借出色的表现确保了晋升。

examples.en: The store offers a full refund if you're not satisfied.
examples.cn: 如果您不满意，该店提供全额退款。

examples.en: I requested a full refund for the defective product.
examples.cn: 我为有缺陷的产品要求了全额退款。

examples.en: Come off it, you know that's not true!
examples.cn: 别胡说了，你知道那不是真的！

examples.en: Oh, come off it, you can't expect me to believe that.
examples.cn: 哦，算了吧，你别指望我相信那个。

examples.en: The company needs to tighten up its security measures.
examples.cn: 公司需要加强其安全措施。

examples.en: We should tighten up the budget to save money.
examples.cn: 我们应该收紧预算以节省资金。

examples.en: The coach told the team to tighten up their defense.
examples.cn: 教练告诉队伍要加强防守。

examples.en: She tightened up her presentation to make it more concise.
examples.cn: 她收紧了她的演示，使其更简洁。

examples.en: To find the area, multiply the length by the width.
examples.cn: 要找到面积，将长度乘以宽度。

examples.en: If you multiply 5 by 3, you get 15.
examples.cn: 如果你将5乘以3，得到15。

valid_entries.original_phrase: face a high risk of extinction

examples.en: Many species face a high risk of extinction due to habitat loss.
examples.cn: 许多物种因栖息地丧失而面临高度灭绝风险。

examples.en: Polar bears face a high risk of extinction because of climate change.
examples.cn: 北极熊因气候变化而面临高度灭绝风险。

examples.en: She is able to speak three languages fluently.
examples.cn: 她能够流利地说三种语言。

examples.en: Will you be able to attend the meeting tomorrow?
examples.cn: 你明天能参加会议吗？

examples.en: I was out of pocket after paying for the repairs.
examples.cn: 支付维修费用后，我自掏腰包了。

examples.en: The business venture left him out of pocket by thousands.
examples.cn: 这次商业冒险让他亏损了数千元。

examples.en: He's out of pocket while traveling abroad.
examples.cn: 他在国外旅行时无法联系上。

examples.en: Sorry, I was out of pocket and missed your call.
examples.cn: 抱歉，我无法联系上，错过了你的电话。

examples.en: After paying off some debts, I finally have my head above water.
examples.cn: 还清一些债务后，我终于勉强维持了。

examples.en: With this new job, she can keep her head above water financially.
examples.cn: 有了这份新工作，她能在财务上勉强维持。

definitions.meaning_cn: 掌握某人的把柄或不利信息

examples.en: The journalist managed to get something on the politician to pressure him.
examples.cn: 记者设法掌握了那位政治家的把柄来施压。

examples.en: If you get something on your rival, you can use it in negotiations.
examples.cn: 如果你掌握了对手的把柄，可以在谈判中加以利用。

examples.en: Can you get something on John from the store? He needs a new pen.
examples.cn: 你能从商店给约翰带点东西吗？他需要一支新笔。

examples.en: I'll get something on my way home for dinner tonight.
examples.cn: 我回家路上会买点东西当今晚的晚餐。

examples.en: As far as I know, the meeting is still scheduled for tomorrow.
examples.cn: 据我所知，会议仍定于明天举行。

examples.en: He hasn't arrived yet, as far as I know.
examples.cn: 据我所知，他还没到。

examples.en: The new policy is subject to approval by the board.
examples.cn: 新政策需经董事会批准。

examples.en: Prices are subject to change without notice.
examples.cn: 价格如有变动，恕不另行通知。

examples.en: This area is subject to flooding during heavy rains.
examples.cn: 这个区域在大雨时易受洪水影响。

examples.en: She is subject to allergies in the spring.
examples.cn: 她在春天容易过敏。

examples.en: Employees earn salaries based on their experience and performance.
examples.cn: 员工根据经验和表现赚取薪水。

examples.en: In this company, managers earn higher salaries than assistants.
examples.cn: 在这家公司，经理比助理赚更高的薪水。

examples.en: The school provides students with textbooks at the beginning of the year.
examples.cn: 学校在年初为学生提供教科书。

examples.en: Can you provide me with more details about the project?
examples.cn: 你能提供更多关于这个项目的细节吗？

examples.en: Scientists are researching into the causes of climate change.
examples.cn: 科学家们正在深入研究气候变化的原因。

examples.en: Her thesis involves researching into ancient Roman history.
examples.cn: 她的论文涉及对古罗马历史的深入研究。

examples.en: I often dream about flying when I sleep.
examples.cn: 我睡觉时经常梦见飞翔。

examples.en: She dreamed about her childhood home last night.
examples.cn: 她昨晚梦见了童年的家。

examples.en: Many people dream about winning the lottery.
examples.cn: 许多人梦想中彩票。

examples.en: He dreams about becoming a famous musician one day.
examples.cn: 他梦想有一天成为著名的音乐家。

examples.en: The ethics of artificial intelligence is a complicated question.
examples.cn: 人工智能的伦理是一个复杂的问题。

examples.en: Solving climate change involves many complicated questions.
examples.cn: 解决气候变化涉及许多复杂的问题。

definitions.meaning_cn: 把某物粘贴或附着在...上

examples.en: Please stick the label on the package before shipping.
examples.cn: 请在发货前把标签贴在包裹上。

examples.en: Kids love to stick stickers on their notebooks.
examples.cn: 孩子们喜欢把贴纸贴在笔记本上。

examples.en: If you stick on your studies, you'll succeed in the exam.
examples.cn: 如果你坚持学习，考试就会成功。

examples.en: He stuck on the task until it was completed.
examples.cn: 他坚持完成任务直到完成。

valid_entries.original_phrase: go in one ear and out the other

examples.en: When I give him advice, it goes in one ear and out the other.
examples.cn: 我给他建议时，他总是左耳进右耳出。

examples.en: The teacher's instructions went in one ear and out the other for the distracted student.
examples.cn: 老师的话对那个分心的学生来说左耳进右耳出。

examples.en: The job requires applicants to have a master's degree.
examples.cn: 这份工作要求申请者拥有硕士学位。

examples.en: The law requires drivers to wear seat belts.
examples.cn: 法律要求司机系安全带。

examples.en: This recipe requires you to preheat the oven.
examples.cn: 这个食谱需要你预热烤箱。

examples.en: Success requires hard work and dedication.
examples.cn: 成功需要努力工作和奉献。

examples.en: The museum offers free entry on Sundays.
examples.cn: 博物馆周日提供免费入场。

examples.en: There is free entry to the concert for children under 12.
examples.cn: 12岁以下儿童可免费入场音乐会。

examples.en: The park has free entry for all visitors.
examples.cn: 公园对所有游客自由开放。

examples.en: Ensure free entry to the building during business hours.
examples.cn: 确保在营业时间内自由进入大楼。

examples.en: Tourists descend on the beach town every summer.
examples.cn: 每年夏天游客大量涌入这个海滩小镇。

examples.en: Reporters descended on the scene after the accident.
examples.cn: 事故发生后，记者们蜂拥而至现场。

examples.en: Darkness descended on the valley as the sun set.
examples.cn: 太阳落山时，黑暗降临山谷。

examples.en: A sense of calm descended on the room after the argument.
examples.cn: 争论过后，一种平静感降临房间。

examples.en: The bright colors of the painting drew my attention immediately.
examples.cn: 画作的鲜艳色彩立刻吸引了我的注意力。

examples.en: She raised her hand to draw the teacher's attention.
examples.cn: 她举手以吸引老师的注意力。

examples.en: The nurse will attend to the patient's needs shortly.
examples.cn: 护士将很快处理病人的需求。

examples.en: Please attend to this matter as soon as possible.
examples.cn: 请尽快处理此事。

examples.en: You should attend to the details in the contract.
examples.cn: 你应该关注合同中的细节。

examples.en: He didn't attend to what I was saying.
examples.cn: 他没有注意我在说什么。

examples.en: The dog came at me barking loudly.
examples.cn: 那只狗大声吠叫着冲向我。

examples.en: He came at his opponent with a fierce punch.
examples.cn: 他用一记猛拳攻击对手。

definitions.meaning_cn: 以某种方式处理或看待

examples.en: You need to come at this problem from a different angle.
examples.cn: 你需要从不同角度处理这个问题。

examples.en: How do you come at the issue of climate change?
examples.cn: 你如何看待气候变化问题？

examples.en: I learned of his promotion through a company email.
examples.cn: 我通过公司邮件得知了他的晋升。

examples.en: She learned of the accident from the news report.
examples.cn: 她从新闻报道中获悉了事故。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被浪费掉，未被充分利用

examples.en: Don't let all that food go to waste; we can donate it to a shelter.
examples.cn: 别让那些食物浪费掉，我们可以捐给收容所。

examples.en: His talent went to waste because he never pursued his passion for music.
examples.cn: 他的才华被浪费了，因为他从未追求自己对音乐的热爱。

examples.en: She decided to vote against the proposal due to its environmental impact.
examples.cn: 由于环境影响，她决定投票反对这项提案。

examples.en: Many senators voted against the bill, leading to its failure.
examples.cn: 许多参议员投票反对该法案，导致其失败。

definitions.meaning_cn: 严厉惩罚某人，让某人吃苦头

examples.en: If you break that vase, Mom will have your hide!
examples.cn: 如果你打碎那个花瓶，妈妈会狠狠惩罚你的！

examples.en: The boss said he'd have our hides if we missed the deadline again.
examples.cn: 老板说如果我们再错过截止日期，他会让我们吃不了兜着走。

examples.en: The advanced physics lecture went right over my head.
examples.cn: 那场高级物理讲座完全超出了我的理解范围。

examples.en: Her explanation of the stock market was over my head; I couldn't grasp it.
examples.cn: 她对股市的解释我理解不了，我无法掌握。

definitions.meaning_cn: 越过某人直接向上级汇报

examples.en: He went over his manager's head to complain to the CEO.
examples.cn: 他越过经理直接向CEO投诉。

examples.en: It's not advisable to go over your boss's head without discussing it first.
examples.cn: 未经事先讨论就越过老板向上级汇报是不明智的。

examples.en: By studying extra hours, she managed to get an edge on her classmates.
examples.cn: 通过额外学习几个小时，她成功获得了对同学的优势。

examples.en: The new technology gave our company an edge on the competition.
examples.cn: 这项新技术使我们公司在竞争中获得了优势。

examples.en: The cat's hunting instincts kicked in when it saw a mouse.
examples.cn: 猫看到老鼠时，它的狩猎本能被激发了。

examples.en: Wolves rely on their hunting instincts to survive in the wild.
examples.cn: 狼依靠狩猎本能在野外生存。

definitions.meaning_cn: 比喻强烈的竞争或追求欲望

examples.en: In business, he has sharp hunting instincts for new opportunities.
examples.cn: 在商业中，他对新机会有着敏锐的竞争本能。

examples.en: Her hunting instincts for success drive her to work tirelessly.
examples.cn: 她对成功的强烈追求驱使她不倦地工作。

examples.en: The advent of the internet revolutionized communication.
examples.cn: 互联网的出现彻底改变了通信方式。

examples.en: With the advent of spring, flowers began to bloom everywhere.
examples.cn: 随着春天的到来，到处都开始开花。

examples.en: I need to ask for leave next week to attend a family event.
examples.cn: 我下周需要请假参加一个家庭活动。

examples.en: She asked for leave due to illness and provided a doctor's note.
examples.cn: 她因病请假，并提供了医生证明。

examples.en: We should cut down on sugar to improve our health.
examples.cn: 我们应该减少糖的摄入以改善健康。

examples.en: The company plans to cut down expenses by 10% this year.
examples.cn: 公司计划今年削减10%的开支。

examples.en: They had to cut down the old tree because it was diseased.
examples.cn: 他们不得不砍倒那棵老树，因为它生病了。

examples.en: Illegal logging involves cutting down trees without permission.
examples.cn: 非法伐木涉及未经许可砍伐树木。

examples.en: The weather conditions are favorable to outdoor activities today.
examples.cn: 今天的天气条件有利于户外活动。

examples.en: The new policy is favorable to small businesses.
examples.cn: 新政策对小企业有利。

examples.en: The city's public transport system includes buses, subways, and trams.
examples.cn: 这座城市的公共交通系统包括公交车、地铁和有轨电车。

examples.en: Investing in the public transport system can reduce traffic congestion.
examples.cn: 投资公共交通系统可以减少交通拥堵。

examples.en: The company will release news about its new product next week.
examples.cn: 公司将于下周发布关于其新产品的新闻。

examples.en: Journalists rushed to release news of the election results.
examples.cn: 记者们急忙发布选举结果的新闻。

definitions.meaning_cn: 身体状况不佳，不在状态

examples.en: After the long break, the athlete felt out of condition for the race.
examples.cn: 长假过后，这位运动员感觉状态不佳，不适合比赛。

examples.en: He's been out of condition lately due to lack of exercise.
examples.cn: 他最近由于缺乏锻炼，身体状况不佳。

examples.en: Global temperatures are on the increase due to climate change.
examples.cn: 由于气候变化，全球气温正在上升。

examples.en: Crime rates in the area have been on the increase over the past year.
examples.cn: 过去一年，该地区的犯罪率一直在增加。

examples.en: She started learning piano at the age of five.
examples.cn: 她在五岁时开始学习钢琴。

examples.en: At the age of 18, he moved out to live independently.
examples.cn: 在18岁时，他搬出去独立生活。

examples.en: We plan to make a trip to Japan next summer.
examples.cn: 我们计划明年夏天去日本旅行。

examples.en: He made a trip to the grocery store to buy some milk.
examples.cn: 他去了一趟杂货店买牛奶。

examples.en: There is no substitute for hard work when it comes to success.
examples.cn: 在成功方面，没有什么可以替代努力工作。

examples.en: Fresh ingredients are no substitute for in cooking delicious meals.
examples.cn: 新鲜食材是烹饪美味佳肴无法替代的。

examples.en: There are several restaurants in the vicinity of the hotel.
examples.cn: 酒店附近有几家餐厅。

examples.en: The project cost is in the vicinity of $1 million.
examples.cn: 项目成本大约在100万美元左右。

examples.en: After visiting the museum, she developed a serious interest in ancient history.
examples.cn: 参观博物馆后，她对古代历史产生了浓厚兴趣。

examples.en: He developed a serious interest in photography during his college years.
examples.cn: 他在大学期间对摄影产生了浓厚兴趣。

examples.en: After the recent thefts, the security team is on their guard at all times.
examples.cn: 最近发生盗窃案后，安保团队时刻保持警惕。

examples.en: She was on her guard when walking alone at night in the unfamiliar city.
examples.cn: 她独自一人在陌生城市夜间行走时非常警惕。

examples.en: This report is concerned with the environmental impact of the new factory.
examples.cn: 这份报告涉及新工厂对环境的影响。

examples.en: As a teacher, she is deeply concerned with her students' well-being.
examples.cn: 作为一名教师，她非常关心学生的福祉。

examples.en: Please keep the dog out of the kitchen while I'm cooking.
examples.cn: 我做饭时请把狗挡在厨房外面。

examples.en: The fence is designed to keep intruders out of the property.
examples.cn: 栅栏的设计是为了防止入侵者进入该物业。

examples.en: A rumor about the company's merger is going the rounds in the office.
examples.cn: 关于公司合并的谣言在办公室里流传。

examples.en: The doctor goes the rounds of the hospital wards every morning.
examples.cn: 医生每天早上在医院病房巡回查房。

examples.en: All employees must attend the meeting, and the manager is no exception.
examples.cn: 所有员工都必须参加会议，经理也不例外。

examples.en: The rule applies to everyone, with no exception.
examples.cn: 这条规则适用于所有人，没有例外。

definitions.meaning_cn: 进入高速运转状态，加速进行

examples.en: The project got into high gear after the funding was approved.
examples.cn: 资金获批后，项目进入了高速运转状态。

examples.en: As the deadline approaches, the team is getting into high gear to finish the report.
examples.cn: 随着截止日期临近，团队正在加速完成报告。

examples.en: He ran up a large credit card bill during his vacation.
examples.cn: 他在度假期间积累了一大笔信用卡账单。

examples.en: The temperature ran up to 40 degrees Celsius in the afternoon.
examples.cn: 下午温度快速上升到40摄氏度。

examples.en: She ran up the stairs to answer the phone.
examples.cn: 她跑上楼去接电话。

examples.en: They ran up the flag at dawn.
examples.cn: 他们在黎明时升起了旗帜。

examples.en: It's hard to get a start in the competitive job market.
examples.cn: 在竞争激烈的就业市场中很难获得开端。

examples.en: The new business got a start with a small loan from the bank.
examples.cn: 新业务从银行获得一笔小额贷款后开始了。

examples.en: The loud noise made me get a start.
examples.cn: 巨大的噪音吓了我一跳。

examples.en: She got a start when she saw the spider on her desk.
examples.cn: 看到桌上的蜘蛛时，她吃了一惊。

examples.en: The bubble economy of the 1990s led to a severe recession when it burst.
examples.cn: 1990年代的泡沫经济破裂后导致了严重的经济衰退。

examples.en: Experts warn that the current housing market might be a bubble economy.
examples.cn: 专家警告当前的房地产市场可能是一种泡沫经济。

examples.en: Her speech was imbued with passion and conviction.
examples.cn: 她的演讲充满了激情和信念。

examples.en: The old house is imbued with a sense of history.
examples.cn: 这所老房子充满了历史感。

examples.en: The team won three games in a row.
examples.cn: 这个队连续赢了三场比赛。

examples.en: The students sat in a row during the assembly.
examples.cn: 学生们在集会时坐成一排。

examples.en: She finally has a car of her own after years of saving.
examples.cn: 经过多年储蓄，她终于有了属于自己的车。

examples.en: Every child should have a room of their own for privacy.
examples.cn: 每个孩子都应该有一个属于自己的房间以保护隐私。

definitions.meaning_cn: 狂欢，放纵（尤指饮酒或购物）

examples.en: After the exams, the students went on a binge to celebrate.
examples.cn: 考试结束后，学生们去狂欢庆祝。

examples.en: He went on a shopping binge and spent all his savings.
examples.cn: 他疯狂购物，花光了所有积蓄。

examples.en: The temperature dropped down to freezing overnight.
examples.cn: 夜间温度下降到了冰点。

examples.en: She dropped down from the tree branch safely.
examples.cn: 她从树枝上安全地落了下来。

examples.en: Why don't you drop down for a cup of tea sometime?
examples.cn: 你什么时候顺道过来喝杯茶吧？

examples.en: He dropped down to see his grandparents on his way home.
examples.cn: 他在回家路上顺道去看望了祖父母。

examples.en: The company plans to send up a new satellite next month.
examples.cn: 公司计划下个月发射一颗新卫星。

examples.en: They sent up a distress signal when their boat started sinking.
examples.cn: 船开始下沉时，他们发出了求救信号。

examples.en: The comedy show sent up the politician's speech perfectly.
examples.cn: 喜剧节目完美地模仿取笑了那位政治家的演讲。

examples.en: He loves to send up his boss's mannerisms in private.
examples.cn: 他喜欢私下里模仿取笑老板的习性。

examples.en: The police took off after the speeding car.
examples.cn: 警察追赶那辆超速行驶的汽车。

examples.en: She took off after her dog when it ran into the street.
examples.cn: 她的狗跑到街上时，她追了上去。

examples.en: You needn't have bought tickets in advance; there were plenty available at the door.
examples.cn: 你本不必提前买票；门口有很多票。

examples.en: She needn't have worried about the exam; she passed with flying colors.
examples.cn: 她本不必担心考试；她以优异成绩通过了。

examples.en: The government provides special benefits for the elderly.
examples.cn: 政府为老年人提供特殊福利。

examples.en: It's important to show respect and care for the elderly in our community.
examples.cn: 对我们社区的老年人表示尊重和关怀很重要。

definitions.meaning_cn: 将自己限制在某个范围或领域内

examples.en: She decided to confine herself to studying only the most relevant chapters.
examples.cn: 她决定只学习最相关的章节。

examples.en: During the pandemic, many people had to confine themselves to their homes.
examples.cn: 疫情期间，许多人不得不将自己限制在家中。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为某事向某人表示祝贺

examples.en: I congratulated him on his promotion at work.
examples.cn: 我祝贺他工作晋升。

examples.en: They congratulated the team on winning the championship.
examples.cn: 他们祝贺团队赢得冠军。

definitions.meaning_cn: 社会认可，指个人或团体在社会中获得承认和尊重

examples.en: Achieving social recognition often requires consistent positive contributions to the community.
examples.cn: 获得社会认可通常需要对社区做出持续的积极贡献。

examples.en: The artist gained social recognition after her work was featured in a major exhibition.
examples.cn: 这位艺术家在她的作品在大型展览中展出后获得了社会认可。

definitions.meaning_cn: 到处寻找，形容搜索得非常彻底

examples.en: I looked for my keys high and low but couldn't find them.
examples.cn: 我到处找我的钥匙，但找不到。

examples.en: They looked for the missing document high and low throughout the office.
examples.cn: 他们在办公室里到处寻找那份丢失的文件。

examples.en: There are lots of books on the shelf.
examples.cn: 书架上有许多书。

examples.en: She has lots of friends from different countries.
examples.cn: 她有许多来自不同国家的朋友。

definitions.meaning_cn: 账面价值，指资产在会计记录上的价值

examples.en: The company's assets have a book value of $1 million.
examples.cn: 该公司的资产账面价值为100万美元。

examples.en: Investors often compare the market price to the book value of a stock.
examples.cn: 投资者经常将市场价格与股票的账面价值进行比较。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使适应或朝向某个方向或目标

examples.en: The new employee training program is designed to orient staff to company policies.
examples.cn: 新员工培训计划旨在使员工适应公司政策。

examples.en: We need to orient our strategy to meet changing market demands.
examples.cn: 我们需要调整策略以适应不断变化的市场需求。

definitions.meaning_cn: 遵守社会规范，行为符合社会普遍接受的标准

examples.en: In many cultures, people are expected to conform to social norms regarding dress.
examples.cn: 在许多文化中，人们被期望遵守关于着装的社会规范。

examples.en: Teenagers sometimes rebel against the pressure to conform to social norms.
examples.cn: 青少年有时会反抗遵守社会规范的压力。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's heart go out to sb.

definitions.meaning_cn: 同情某人，对某人感到怜悯

examples.en: My heart goes out to the families affected by the natural disaster.
examples.cn: 我同情受自然灾害影响的家庭。

examples.en: She had her heart go out to the homeless people she met on the street.
examples.cn: 她同情在街上遇到的无家可归者。

examples.en: The project is as good as finished; we just need to add the final touches.
examples.cn: 这个项目差不多完成了；我们只需要做最后的润色。

examples.en: With that mistake, his chances of winning are as good as gone.
examples.cn: 犯了那个错误，他获胜的机会几乎没有了。

examples.en: The key point of the argument was that sustainability must be prioritized.
examples.cn: 这个论点的关键点是必须优先考虑可持续性。

examples.en: In her presentation, she highlighted the key points for successful project management.
examples.cn: 在她的演示中，她强调了成功项目管理的关键点。

examples.en: After a long day at work, he likes to lie down and relax.
examples.cn: 在漫长的一天工作后，他喜欢躺下放松。

examples.en: The doctor advised her to lie down if she felt dizzy.
examples.cn: 医生建议她如果感到头晕就躺下。

examples.en: I look forward to meeting you next week.
examples.cn: 我期待下周见到你。

examples.en: Children often look forward to their birthdays with great excitement.
examples.cn: 孩子们常常非常兴奋地期待他们的生日。

examples.en: Please turn on the lights; it's getting dark.
examples.cn: 请打开灯；天变黑了。

examples.en: He turned on the computer to start his work.
examples.cn: 他打开电脑开始工作。

examples.en: That kind of music really turns me on.
examples.cn: 那种音乐真的让我兴奋。

examples.en: Her intelligence and humor turn him on.
examples.cn: 她的智慧和幽默让他感兴趣。

examples.en: I'm not sure what you're driving at with that comment.
examples.cn: 我不确定你那个评论是什么意思。

examples.en: Her long explanation was driving at the need for more funding.
examples.cn: 她冗长的解释是在暗示需要更多资金。

examples.en: You need to make your mind up about which college to attend.
examples.cn: 你需要决定上哪所大学。

examples.en: After much thought, she made her mind up to quit her job and travel.
examples.cn: 经过深思熟虑，她决定辞职去旅行。

definitions.meaning_cn: 把某人或某物包括在内

examples.en: If you're planning a trip, count me in!
examples.cn: 如果你计划旅行，算我一个！

examples.en: We should count all expenses in when calculating the total cost.
examples.cn: 计算总成本时，我们应该包括所有费用。

definitions.meaning_cn: 生态灾难，指对自然环境造成严重破坏的事件

examples.en: The oil spill was an ecological disaster for the marine life in the area.
examples.cn: 石油泄漏对该地区的海洋生物是一场生态灾难。

examples.en: Deforestation can lead to ecological disasters such as soil erosion and loss of biodiversity.
examples.cn: 森林砍伐可能导致土壤侵蚀和生物多样性丧失等生态灾难。

examples.en: It took a few minutes for the engine to start up in the cold weather.
examples.cn: 在寒冷的天气里，发动机花了几分钟才启动。

examples.en: She plans to start up a new business next year.
examples.cn: 她计划明年创办一家新企业。

examples.en: Many tech start-ups are based in Silicon Valley.
examples.cn: 许多科技初创企业都位于硅谷。

examples.en: Investing in a start-up can be risky but potentially rewarding.
examples.cn: 投资初创企业可能有风险，但潜在回报高。

examples.en: No wonder you're tired—you've been working all day.
examples.cn: 难怪你累了——你已经工作了一整天。

examples.en: It's no wonder she won the award with such talent.
examples.cn: 她有如此才华，难怪赢得了奖项。

examples.en: After the accident, he lost his sight completely.
examples.cn: 事故后，他完全失明了。

examples.en: She feared losing her sight due to the disease.
examples.cn: 她担心因疾病而丧失视力。

examples.en: The company specializes in renewable energy solutions.
examples.cn: 这家公司专门从事可再生能源解决方案。

examples.en: She decided to specialize in pediatric medicine.
examples.cn: 她决定专攻儿科医学。

examples.en: The old song brought back fond memories of my childhood.
examples.cn: 这首老歌唤起了我童年的美好回忆。

examples.en: Visiting the park always brings back fond memories of family trips.
examples.cn: 参观这个公园总是唤起家庭旅行的美好回忆。

definitions.meaning_cn: 以某人的名誉担保，郑重承诺

examples.en: Upon my honour, I will keep this secret safe.
examples.cn: 以我的名誉担保，我会保守这个秘密。

examples.en: He swore upon his honour to tell the truth.
examples.cn: 他郑重承诺说实话。

examples.en: We spent the day at a famous theme park with roller coasters.
examples.cn: 我们在一个有过山车的著名主题公园度过了一天。

examples.en: The new theme park features attractions based on popular movies.
examples.cn: 这个新主题公园设有基于热门电影的景点。

examples.en: In the midst of the storm, we found shelter.
examples.cn: 在暴风雨中，我们找到了避难所。

examples.en: She remained calm in the midst of chaos.
examples.cn: 她在混乱中保持冷静。

examples.en: She plans to get married to her longtime partner next year.
examples.cn: 她计划明年与她的长期伴侣结婚。

examples.en: They got married to each other in a small ceremony.
examples.cn: 他们在一个小型仪式上结婚了。

examples.en: Regardless of the weather, the event will proceed.
examples.cn: 不管天气如何，活动将继续进行。

examples.en: He pursued his dreams regardless of the obstacles.
examples.cn: 他不顾障碍追求自己的梦想。

examples.en: Kelp is a common ocean plant found in coastal waters.
examples.cn: 海带是沿海水域常见的海洋植物。

examples.en: Ocean plants play a crucial role in marine ecosystems.
examples.cn: 海洋植物在海洋生态系统中起着至关重要的作用。

examples.en: The time difference between New York and London is five hours.
examples.cn: 纽约和伦敦之间的时差是五个小时。

examples.en: Adjusting to the time difference can be challenging for travelers.
examples.cn: 适应时差对旅行者来说可能具有挑战性。

examples.en: Our team has an advantage over the others due to more experience.
examples.cn: 由于经验更丰富，我们团队比其他团队有优势。

examples.en: She has an advantage over her competitors in the market.
examples.cn: 她在市场上比竞争对手有优势。

examples.en: The company aims to grow business by expanding into new markets.
examples.cn: 该公司旨在通过扩展到新市场来发展业务。

examples.en: They used innovative strategies to grow business rapidly.
examples.cn: 他们使用创新策略快速扩大生意。

examples.en: I like to chat with my friends over coffee.
examples.cn: 我喜欢和朋友们边喝咖啡边聊天。

examples.en: She chatted with the customer to resolve the issue.
examples.cn: 她与客户聊天以解决问题。

examples.en: Strawberries often use vegetative reproduction through runners.
examples.cn: 草莓通常通过匍匐茎进行营养繁殖。

examples.en: Vegetative reproduction is common in many plant species.
examples.cn: 营养繁殖在许多植物物种中很常见。

examples.en: She blew out the candles and made a wish on her birthday.
examples.cn: 她吹灭蜡烛，在生日时许了个愿。

examples.en: Make a wish when you see a shooting star.
examples.cn: 当你看到流星时，许个愿吧。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get the short end of the stick

examples.en: In the deal, he felt he got the short end of the stick.
examples.cn: 在这笔交易中，他觉得自己吃亏了。

examples.en: She always gets the short end of the stick in group projects.
examples.cn: 在小组项目中，她总是处于不利地位。

examples.en: With support from family, he managed to pull through the illness.
examples.cn: 在家人的支持下，他设法渡过了疾病难关。

examples.en: The company pulled through the financial crisis successfully.
examples.cn: 该公司成功渡过了金融危机。

examples.en: Industrial waste is a major cause of water pollution.
examples.cn: 工业废物是水污染的主要原因。

examples.en: Efforts to reduce water pollution are crucial for public health.
examples.cn: 减少水污染的努力对公共健康至关重要。

examples.en: After the holidays, I put on weight from all the festive meals.
examples.cn: 假期过后，我因为节日大餐而体重增加了。

examples.en: She put on weight during her pregnancy, which is completely normal.
examples.cn: 她在怀孕期间体重增加了，这完全正常。

examples.en: Please listen to the instructions carefully before starting the test.
examples.cn: 在开始测试前，请仔细听说明。

examples.en: I love to listen to classical music while I work.
examples.cn: 我喜欢在工作时听古典音乐。

examples.en: Early education lays the foundation for lifelong learning.
examples.cn: 早期教育为终身学习奠定基础。

examples.en: This research lays the foundation for future medical breakthroughs.
examples.cn: 这项研究为未来的医学突破奠定了基础。

examples.en: The company opened a new distribution center to improve delivery times.
examples.cn: 公司开设了一个新的配送中心以改善交货时间。

examples.en: Goods are sorted and shipped from the distribution center to retail stores.
examples.cn: 货物从分销中心分拣并运送到零售店。

examples.en: I'm dying for a cup of coffee after that long meeting.
examples.cn: 在那次漫长的会议后，我非常想喝杯咖啡。

examples.en: She's dying for a vacation to escape the stress of work.
examples.cn: 她非常渴望休假以逃离工作压力。

examples.en: Many students live off campus to have more independence.
examples.cn: 许多学生住在校外以获得更多独立性。

examples.en: The event will be held off campus at a local community center.
examples.cn: 活动将在校外的当地社区中心举行。

examples.en: He turned a deaf ear to the warnings and continued with his risky plan.
examples.cn: 他对警告充耳不闻，继续执行他的冒险计划。

examples.en: The government turned a deaf ear to the public's concerns about pollution.
examples.cn: 政府对公众关于污染的担忧置之不理。

examples.en: I owe my success to the support of my family and friends.
examples.cn: 我的成功归功于家人和朋友的支持。

examples.en: She owes a lot of money to the bank from her student loans.
examples.cn: 她因学生贷款欠银行很多钱。

examples.en: Without proper guidance, young people can easily go astray.
examples.cn: 没有适当的指导，年轻人很容易误入歧途。

examples.en: The package went astray during delivery and arrived at the wrong address.
examples.cn: 包裹在配送过程中走错了路，送到了错误的地址。

examples.en: If you keep spending recklessly, you'll wind up in debt.
examples.cn: 如果你继续挥霍无度，最终会负债累累。

examples.en: The meeting wound up earlier than expected due to technical issues.
examples.cn: 由于技术问题，会议比预期提前结束了。

examples.en: He realized that material possessions don't bring true happiness.
examples.cn: 他意识到物质财富并不能带来真正的幸福。

examples.en: In some cultures, accumulating material possessions is seen as a sign of success.
examples.cn: 在一些文化中，积累物质财富被视为成功的标志。

valid_entries.original_phrase: on the one hand ... on the other

examples.en: On the one hand, the job offers a high salary; on the other, it requires long hours.
examples.cn: 一方面，这份工作提供高薪；另一方面，它需要长时间工作。

examples.en: On the one hand, technology improves efficiency; on the other, it can lead to job losses.
examples.cn: 一方面，技术提高效率；另一方面，它可能导致失业。

examples.en: She's very particular about the quality of ingredients she uses in cooking.
examples.cn: 她对烹饪中使用的食材质量非常讲究。

examples.en: He's particular about his appearance and always dresses neatly.
examples.cn: 他对自己的外表很挑剔，总是穿着整洁。

examples.en: The committee will enquire into the allegations of misconduct.
examples.cn: 委员会将调查行为不当的指控。

examples.en: Scientists are enquiring into the causes of climate change.
examples.cn: 科学家们正在探究气候变化的原因。

examples.en: He apologized publicly to save face after the embarrassing mistake.
examples.cn: 他在尴尬的错误后公开道歉以保全面子。

examples.en: In negotiations, both sides often make concessions to save face.
examples.cn: 在谈判中，双方经常做出让步以保全面子。

examples.en: The hikers were in danger when a storm suddenly hit the mountain.
examples.cn: 当暴风雨突然袭击山区时，徒步旅行者处于危险中。

examples.en: Many species are in danger of extinction due to habitat loss.
examples.cn: 由于栖息地丧失，许多物种处于灭绝的危险中。

examples.en: He laid claim to the inheritance based on the will.
examples.cn: 他根据遗嘱声称拥有继承权。

examples.en: The country lays claim to the disputed territory in the region.
examples.cn: 该国声称拥有该地区有争议的领土。

examples.en: She is a key person in the project, responsible for coordinating all teams.
examples.cn: 她是项目的关键人物，负责协调所有团队。

examples.en: The CEO is often seen as the key person in a company's success.
examples.cn: 首席执行官通常被视为公司成功的关键人物。

examples.en: She looks down her nose at people who don't have a college degree.
examples.cn: 她瞧不起没有大学学位的人。

examples.en: Some elites look down their noses at popular culture as being inferior.
examples.cn: 一些精英轻视流行文化，认为其低劣。

examples.en: Please put away your toys after playing.
examples.cn: 玩完后请把你的玩具收拾好。

examples.en: He put away the groceries in the kitchen cabinets.
examples.cn: 他把杂货放进厨房橱柜里。

examples.en: His research is related to climate change.
examples.cn: 他的研究与气候变化有关。

examples.en: The symptoms are related to stress.
examples.cn: 这些症状与压力有关。

examples.en: She is related to the famous author.
examples.cn: 她与那位著名作家有亲属关系。

examples.en: Are you related to the Smith family?
examples.cn: 你和史密斯家族有亲属关系吗？

definitions.meaning_cn: 向某人施加压力或勒索

examples.en: The mob tried to put the bite on the shopkeeper for protection money.
examples.cn: 黑帮试图向店主勒索保护费。

examples.en: He put the bite on his friend to lend him money.
examples.cn: 他向朋友施压借钱。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在...中扮演角色或起作用

examples.en: Technology plays a part in modern education.
examples.cn: 技术在现代教育中起着作用。

examples.en: She played a part in organizing the event.
examples.cn: 她在组织活动中扮演了角色。

examples.en: Everyone played a part in the project's success.
examples.cn: 每个人都为项目的成功做出了贡献。

examples.en: He played a part in the decision-making process.
examples.cn: 他参与了决策过程。

examples.en: Reading books helps expand knowledge.
examples.cn: 读书有助于扩展知识。

examples.en: Traveling can expand your knowledge of different cultures.
examples.cn: 旅行可以增加你对不同文化的了解。

examples.en: The evidence proved his guilt beyond doubt.
examples.cn: 证据确凿无疑地证明了他的罪行。

examples.en: Her talent is beyond doubt.
examples.cn: 她的才华是毫无疑问的。

examples.en: I bought this shirt dirt cheap at the sale.
examples.cn: 我在促销时以极低的价格买了这件衬衫。

examples.en: The rent is dirt cheap in that area.
examples.cn: 那个地区的租金非常便宜。

examples.en: I have a few friends coming over.
examples.cn: 我有几个朋友要过来。

examples.en: She read a few pages before bed.
examples.cn: 她睡前读了几页书。

examples.en: The ship will call at several ports.
examples.cn: 这艘船将停靠几个港口。

examples.en: I called at her office to drop off the documents.
examples.cn: 我去了她的办公室送文件。

examples.en: Please call at this number for assistance.
examples.cn: 请拨打这个号码寻求帮助。

examples.en: He called at the hotel to confirm his reservation.
examples.cn: 他打电话到酒店确认预订。

examples.en: He's between jobs and looking for new opportunities.
examples.cn: 他目前失业，正在寻找新机会。

examples.en: She took a break between jobs to travel.
examples.cn: 她在失业期间休息去旅行了。

examples.en: We need to find a way to reduce costs.
examples.cn: 我们需要找到降低成本的方法。

examples.en: She found a way to finish the project on time.
examples.cn: 她找到了按时完成项目的方法。

examples.en: The negotiations culminated in a successful agreement.
examples.cn: 谈判以达成成功协议告终。

examples.en: The festival culminated in a fireworks display.
examples.cn: 节日以烟花表演达到高潮。

examples.en: The missile shot down the enemy aircraft.
examples.cn: 导弹击落了敌机。

examples.en: They shot down the drone over the border.
examples.cn: 他们在边境击落了无人机。

definitions.meaning_cn: 严厉批评或否决（想法等）

examples.en: The manager shot down my proposal immediately.
examples.cn: 经理立即否决了我的提议。

examples.en: He shot down her argument with facts.
examples.cn: 他用事实严厉批评了她的论点。

examples.en: Many students from less well-off families receive scholarships.
examples.cn: 许多来自不太富裕家庭的学生获得了奖学金。

examples.en: He grew up in a neighborhood with children from less well-off families.
examples.cn: 他在一个有许多来自不太富裕家庭孩子的社区长大。

examples.en: I have no interest in watching sports.
examples.cn: 我对观看体育比赛不感兴趣。

examples.en: She has no interest in politics.
examples.cn: 她对政治不感兴趣。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使某人感到紧张或害怕

examples.en: That horror movie gave me the willies.
examples.cn: 那部恐怖电影让我感到害怕。

examples.en: The dark alley gave him the willies.
examples.cn: 那条黑暗的小巷让他感到紧张。

examples.en: If you don't study, you run the risk of failing the exam.
examples.cn: 如果你不学习，你就有考试不及格的风险。

examples.en: He ran the risk of losing his job by speaking out.
examples.cn: 他冒着失业的风险直言不讳。

examples.en: She turned her back on her family when they needed her.
examples.cn: 当家人需要她时，她背弃了他们。

examples.en: He turned his back on his old friends after becoming successful.
examples.cn: 成功后，他背弃了老朋友。

examples.en: Don't turn your back on the problems in your community.
examples.cn: 不要忽视你社区中的问题。

examples.en: The government turned its back on the environmental crisis.
examples.cn: 政府不理睬环境危机。

examples.en: The company is liable for any damages caused.
examples.cn: 公司对造成的任何损害负有法律责任。

examples.en: You are liable for the debt if you sign the contract.
examples.cn: 如果你签署合同，你对债务负有法律责任。

examples.en: The job offers flexible working hours to accommodate parents.
examples.cn: 这份工作提供弹性工作时间以适应父母的需求。

examples.en: Many companies now provide flexible working hours for better work-life balance.
examples.cn: 许多公司现在提供弹性工作时间以实现更好的工作与生活平衡。

examples.en: His behavior was rude in the extreme.
examples.cn: 他的行为极其粗鲁。

examples.en: The weather was hot in the extreme during the summer.
examples.cn: 夏天天气非常炎热。

examples.en: Can you stay with me until I feel better?
examples.cn: 你能陪着我直到我感觉好些吗？

examples.en: He decided to stay with his grandparents for the weekend.
examples.cn: 他决定周末和祖父母待在一起。

examples.en: Stay with the plan, and we'll succeed.
examples.cn: 坚持计划，我们会成功的。

examples.en: I'll stay with this old car until it breaks down.
examples.cn: 我会继续用这辆旧车直到它坏掉。

examples.en: Thanks for your help with the project.
examples.cn: 感谢你在项目上的帮助。

examples.en: Thanks for coming to my party.
examples.cn: 感谢你来参加我的派对。

examples.en: They negotiated the contract in good faith.
examples.cn: 他们真诚地谈判了合同。

examples.en: I made the offer in good faith, hoping for a fair deal.
examples.cn: 我善意地提出报价，希望达成公平交易。

definitions.meaning_cn: 生活在物质主义的世界里

examples.en: Many people feel pressured to live in a materialistic world.
examples.cn: 许多人感到生活在物质主义世界里有压力。

examples.en: It's challenging to find spiritual meaning when you live in a materialistic world.
examples.cn: 当你生活在物质主义世界里时，很难找到精神意义。

examples.en: The thief robbed him of his wallet.
examples.cn: 小偷抢走了他的钱包。

examples.en: The scam robbed the elderly couple of their savings.
examples.cn: 骗局抢走了那对老年夫妇的积蓄。

examples.en: The illness robbed her of her ability to walk.
examples.cn: 疾病剥夺了她行走的能力。

examples.en: The harsh criticism robbed him of his confidence.
examples.cn: 严厉的批评剥夺了他的信心。

examples.en: His lies eventually came home to roost when he was caught.
examples.cn: 他的谎言最终自食其果，被抓住了。

examples.en: The company's unethical practices came home to roost with a massive lawsuit.
examples.cn: 公司的不道德行为自食其果，面临大规模诉讼。

examples.en: There is an excess charge for luggage over the weight limit.
examples.cn: 行李超重有额外费用。

examples.en: The hotel added an excess charge for late checkout.
examples.cn: 酒店对延迟退房加了额外费用。

examples.en: Please sweep up the broken glass from the floor.
examples.cn: 请把地板上的碎玻璃清扫干净。

examples.en: She swept up the leaves in the garden.
examples.cn: 她把花园里的叶子清扫干净了。

examples.en: The new product swept up all the awards at the competition.
examples.cn: 新产品在比赛中迅速赢得了所有奖项。

examples.en: He swept up the votes in the election.
examples.cn: 他在选举中迅速收集了选票。

examples.en: Can you assist with the preparation for the meeting?
examples.cn: 你能协助准备会议吗？

examples.en: She assisted with the research project by collecting data.
examples.cn: 她通过收集数据协助了研究项目。

examples.en: Keep in mind that the deadline is next Friday.
examples.cn: 记住截止日期是下周五。

examples.en: Always keep in mind the safety rules when operating machinery.
examples.cn: 操作机器时始终牢记安全规则。

examples.en: Staying home is preferable to going out in bad weather.
examples.cn: 坏天气时待在家里比出门更可取。

examples.en: A quiet evening is preferable to a noisy party for me.
examples.cn: 对我来说，安静的夜晚比嘈杂的派对更可取。

examples.en: The seconds ticked by as we waited for the results.
examples.cn: 我们等待结果时，秒针滴答流逝。

examples.en: Time ticks by quickly when you're having fun.
examples.cn: 当你玩得开心时，时间滴答流逝得很快。

examples.en: Please slow down when driving through the school zone.
examples.cn: 开车经过学校区域时请减速。

examples.en: He slowed down his pace to match hers.
examples.cn: 他放慢步伐以配合她。

examples.en: You need to slow down and take a break from work.
examples.cn: 你需要放松一下，从工作中休息。

examples.en: The economy is slowing down due to reduced consumer spending.
examples.cn: 由于消费者支出减少，经济正在放缓。

examples.en: He always sticks his oar in when we're discussing family matters.
examples.cn: 我们讨论家庭事务时，他总是多管闲事。

examples.en: Don't stick your oar in; this is between me and my friend.
examples.cn: 别多管闲事，这是我和我朋友之间的事。

examples.en: English is often considered a global language for business.
examples.cn: 英语常被认为是商业的全球语言。

examples.en: The spread of the internet has promoted the use of global languages.
examples.cn: 互联网的传播促进了全球语言的使用。

examples.en: We'll see how the new strategy pans out over the next few months.
examples.cn: 我们看看新策略在未来几个月结果如何。

examples.en: His plan didn't pan out as expected, so he had to adjust.
examples.cn: 他的计划没有如预期发展，所以他不得不调整。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have a reputation for doing sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 以做某事而闻名，有...的名声

examples.en: The company has a reputation for producing high-quality products.
examples.cn: 这家公司以生产高质量产品而闻名。

examples.en: She has a reputation for being punctual in all her meetings.
examples.cn: 她以在所有会议上准时而有名声。

examples.en: The fans cheered on their team during the championship game.
examples.cn: 粉丝们在冠军赛中为他们的队伍加油。

examples.en: We cheered her on as she ran the marathon.
examples.cn: 她跑马拉松时，我们为她加油。

examples.en: Learning to cope with stress is important for mental health.
examples.cn: 学会应对压力对心理健康很重要。

examples.en: She uses meditation to cope with stress at work.
examples.cn: 她用冥想来应对工作压力。

definitions.meaning_cn: 意识到或了解（某事，尤指欺骗或不诚实的行为）

examples.en: He finally got wise to their scam and reported it to the police.
examples.cn: 他终于意识到他们的骗局，并向警方报告了。

examples.en: It took me a while to get wise to the fact that she was lying.
examples.cn: 我花了一段时间才意识到她在撒谎。

examples.en: Her cooking skills have improved significantly after taking a culinary course.
examples.cn: 参加烹饪课程后，她的烹饪技能显著提高了。

examples.en: Good cooking skills are essential for preparing healthy meals at home.
examples.cn: 良好的烹饪技能对于在家准备健康餐食至关重要。

examples.en: After the war, the country lived in peace for decades.
examples.cn: 战争结束后，这个国家和平地生活了几十年。

examples.en: She wanted to be left alone to read her book in peace.
examples.cn: 她想独自一人安宁地读她的书。

definitions.meaning_cn: 施加压力或强迫（某人做某事）

examples.en: The boss put the screws on the team to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 老板向团队施加压力，要求他们按时完成。

examples.en: They put the screws on him to reveal the secret.
examples.cn: 他们强迫他透露秘密。

definitions.meaning_cn: 大峡谷（美国亚利桑那州的著名自然景观）

examples.en: We visited the Grand Canyon during our road trip across the USA.
examples.cn: 我们在穿越美国的公路旅行中参观了大峡谷。

examples.en: The Grand Canyon is known for its stunning geological formations.
examples.cn: 大峡谷以其令人惊叹的地质构造而闻名。

examples.en: She saved money in order that she could buy a new car.
examples.cn: 她存钱是为了能买一辆新车。

examples.en: He studied hard in order that he might pass the exam.
examples.cn: 他努力学习是为了能通过考试。

examples.en: Access to the building is restricted to authorized personnel only.
examples.cn: 进入大楼仅限于授权人员。

examples.en: The discussion was restricted to topics related to the project.
examples.cn: 讨论仅限于与项目相关的话题。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为...祈祷好运或希望成功

examples.en: I'm keeping my fingers crossed for her job interview tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我为她明天的求职面试祈祷好运。

examples.en: Keep your fingers crossed for good weather on our wedding day.
examples.cn: 为我们的婚礼日有好天气祈祷吧。

definitions.meaning_cn: 长篇大论地谈论或演讲

examples.en: He held forth on politics for over an hour at the dinner party.
examples.cn: 在晚宴上，他就政治话题长篇大论地讲了一个多小时。

examples.en: She loves to hold forth about her travels to anyone who will listen.
examples.cn: 她喜欢向任何愿意听的人长篇大论地谈论她的旅行。

examples.en: The company came into existence in 1995.
examples.cn: 这家公司成立于1995年。

examples.en: New species come into existence through evolutionary processes.
examples.cn: 新物种通过进化过程形成。

examples.en: After much debate, they settled on a blue color for the living room walls.
examples.cn: 经过多次辩论，他们决定将客厅墙壁涂成蓝色。

examples.en: We need to settle on a date for the meeting as soon as possible.
examples.cn: 我们需要尽快决定会议的日期。
