definitions.meaning_cn: 某某人（用于指代不具体的人）

examples.en: I heard from so and so that the party was cancelled.
examples.cn: 我从某某人那里听说派对取消了。

examples.en: So and so told me you're looking for a new job.
examples.cn: 某某人告诉我你在找新工作。

examples.en: It took him five years to pay off all his student loan debts.
examples.cn: 他花了五年时间偿还了所有的学生贷款债务。

examples.en: She worked extra hours to pay off her credit card debts.
examples.cn: 她加班工作以偿还信用卡债务。

examples.en: Public hospitals often provide care to low-income patients.
examples.cn: 公立医院通常为低收入患者提供医疗服务。

examples.en: The government is investing more funds into public hospitals.
examples.cn: 政府正在向公立医院投入更多资金。

examples.en: A wave of nostalgia swept over her when she visited her childhood home.
examples.cn: 当她参观童年故居时，一股怀旧之情席卷了她。

examples.en: Panic swept over the crowd when they heard the loud noise.
examples.cn: 当他们听到巨响时，恐慌席卷了人群。

examples.en: The dog broke loose from its leash and ran into the park.
examples.cn: 狗挣脱了皮带，跑进了公园。

examples.en: Chaos broke loose when the fire alarm went off.
examples.cn: 火警响起时，混乱爆发了。

examples.en: The hotel charges a laundry fee for washing guests' clothes.
examples.cn: 酒店为清洗客人衣物收取洗衣费。

examples.en: Students must pay a laundry fee to use the dormitory's washing machines.
examples.cn: 学生必须支付洗衣费才能使用宿舍的洗衣机。

definitions.meaning_cn: 名牌大学，享有盛誉的大学

examples.en: Harvard and Oxford are examples of prestigious universities.
examples.cn: 哈佛和牛津是名牌大学的例子。

examples.en: Graduating from a prestigious university can enhance your career prospects.
examples.cn: 从名牌大学毕业可以提升你的职业前景。

examples.en: There is plenty of food at the buffet, so help yourself.
examples.cn: 自助餐有大量的食物，所以请自便。

examples.en: She has plenty of experience in managing large teams.
examples.cn: 她在管理大型团队方面有丰富的经验。

examples.en: Let's head over to the café for a quick coffee.
examples.cn: 我们去咖啡馆喝杯咖啡吧。

examples.en: After work, I'll head over to the gym to exercise.
examples.cn: 下班后，我会去健身房锻炼。

examples.en: Poor planning can result in project delays.
examples.cn: 计划不周可能导致项目延误。

examples.en: Eating too much sugar may result in health problems.
examples.cn: 摄入过多糖分可能导致健康问题。

examples.en: Recognition from peers can be a good motivator for employees.
examples.cn: 同事的认可可以是员工的一个良好激励因素。

examples.en: Setting clear goals acts as a good motivator to stay focused.
examples.cn: 设定明确的目标是保持专注的良好激励因素。

valid_entries.original_phrase: give sb. a hand with sth.

examples.en: Can you give me a hand with moving this heavy furniture?
examples.cn: 你能帮我搬一下这件沉重的家具吗？

examples.en: She offered to give him a hand with his homework.
examples.cn: 她主动提出帮助他做作业。

examples.en: Running for 30 minutes can burn a lot of calories.
examples.cn: 跑步30分钟可以燃烧大量卡路里。

examples.en: To lose weight, you need to burn more calories than you consume.
examples.cn: 要减肥，你需要燃烧比摄入更多的卡路里。

examples.en: Precise measurement is crucial in scientific experiments.
examples.cn: 在科学实验中，精确测量至关重要。

examples.en: The engineer used tools for precise measurement of the components.
examples.cn: 工程师使用工具对部件进行精确测量。

examples.en: The news media plays a vital role in informing the public.
examples.cn: 新闻媒体在告知公众方面起着至关重要的作用。

examples.en: Social media has changed how traditional news media operates.
examples.cn: 社交媒体改变了传统新闻媒体的运作方式。

examples.en: The Grand Canyon is a breathtaking natural sight.
examples.cn: 大峡谷是一个令人叹为观止的自然景观。

examples.en: Tourists flock to see the natural sights of the national park.
examples.cn: 游客蜂拥而至，观看国家公园的自然景观。

examples.en: If you break your promise, people may lose trust in you.
examples.cn: 如果你违背诺言，人们可能会失去对你的信任。

examples.en: He felt guilty after breaking his promise to his friend.
examples.cn: 违背了对朋友的承诺后，他感到内疚。

examples.en: The police decided to stake out the suspect's house overnight.
examples.cn: 警方决定整夜监视嫌疑人的房子。

examples.en: Detectives often stake out locations to gather evidence.
examples.cn: 侦探经常监视地点以收集证据。

examples.en: The explorers staked out a campsite in the forest.
examples.cn: 探险者在森林中划定了一个露营地。

examples.en: Before the event, they staked out the area for security.
examples.cn: 活动前，他们划定了区域以确保安全。

examples.en: Learning effective job-search techniques can improve your chances of getting hired.
examples.cn: 学习有效的求职技巧可以提高你被录用的机会。

examples.en: Workshops often teach job-search techniques like networking and resume writing.
examples.cn: 研讨会经常教授如建立人脉和简历写作等求职技巧。

definitions.meaning_cn: 临床经验（医学或心理学领域）

examples.en: Medical students gain clinical experience by working in hospitals.
examples.cn: 医学生通过在医院工作获得临床经验。

examples.en: Her clinical experience helped her diagnose the patient accurately.
examples.cn: 她的临床经验帮助她准确诊断了病人。

examples.en: Many people aspire to have a high-paying job to improve their lifestyle.
examples.cn: 许多人渴望拥有一份高薪工作来改善生活方式。

examples.en: A high-paying job often requires specialized skills or education.
examples.cn: 高薪工作通常需要专业技能或教育背景。

examples.en: He responded to the emergency on the instant.
examples.cn: 他立即对紧急情况做出了回应。

examples.en: The decision was made on the instant without hesitation.
examples.cn: 决定立即做出，没有犹豫。

examples.en: Policies should consider each person's individual circumstance.
examples.cn: 政策应考虑每个人的个人情况。

examples.en: Her success was influenced by her unique individual circumstance.
examples.cn: 她的成功受到她独特的个人情况的影响。

examples.en: In contrast to last year, sales have increased significantly.
examples.cn: 与去年相比，销售额显著增长。

examples.en: Her calm demeanor was in contrast to the chaotic situation.
examples.cn: 她冷静的举止与混乱的局面形成对比。

examples.en: This issue merits attention from policymakers.
examples.cn: 这个问题值得政策制定者关注。

examples.en: His innovative ideas merit attention in the industry.
examples.cn: 他的创新想法在行业中值得关注。

definitions.meaning_cn: 由某人决定，取决于某人

examples.en: Whether we go out tonight is up to you.
examples.cn: 今晚是否出去由你决定。

examples.en: The final decision is up to the manager.
examples.cn: 最终决定取决于经理。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have a rough idea of sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事有个大致的了解

examples.en: I have a rough idea of how the project will proceed.
examples.cn: 我对项目如何进行有个大致的了解。

examples.en: She has a rough idea of the budget needed for the trip.
examples.cn: 她对旅行所需的预算有个大致的了解。

examples.en: The meeting was held for the purpose of discussing new strategies.
examples.cn: 会议是为了讨论新策略的目的而举行的。

examples.en: Data is collected for the purpose of analysis and improvement.
examples.cn: 收集数据是为了分析和改进的目的。

examples.en: The kids often make fun of his accent.
examples.cn: 孩子们经常取笑他的口音。

examples.en: It's not nice to make fun of someone's mistakes.
examples.cn: 取笑别人的错误是不好的。

examples.en: They decided to break up after five years together.
examples.cn: 在一起五年后，他们决定分手。

examples.en: The argument caused them to break up.
examples.cn: 争吵导致他们分手了。

examples.en: The police had to break up the protest.
examples.cn: 警察不得不驱散抗议活动。

examples.en: She used a hammer to break up the ice.
examples.cn: 她用锤子把冰打碎。

examples.en: I was going to go out, but I changed my mind and stayed home.
examples.cn: 我本来要出去，但改变主意待在家里了。

examples.en: After hearing the news, she quickly changed her mind.
examples.cn: 听到消息后，她很快改变了主意。

examples.en: Before the speech, I had butterflies in my stomach.
examples.cn: 演讲前，我感到紧张不安。

examples.en: She always has butterflies in her stomach before a big exam.
examples.cn: 每次大考前，她总是忐忑不安。

examples.en: He is incapable of telling a lie.
examples.cn: 他不会说谎。

examples.en: The old machine is incapable of handling heavy loads.
examples.cn: 这台旧机器无法处理重负荷。

examples.en: It was so cold that the lake froze.
examples.cn: 天气如此寒冷，以至于湖面结冰了。

examples.en: She was so tired that she fell asleep immediately.
examples.cn: 她如此疲惫，以至于立刻睡着了。

examples.en: Please tie up the boat securely.
examples.cn: 请把船系牢。

examples.en: He tied up the package with string.
examples.cn: 他用绳子把包裹捆好。

examples.en: The meeting tied up my whole morning.
examples.cn: 会议占用了我的整个上午。

examples.en: Don't tie up the phone line for too long.
examples.cn: 别占用电话线太久。

examples.en: The accident brought traffic to a halt.
examples.cn: 事故使交通停止了。

examples.en: The strike brought production to a halt.
examples.cn: 罢工使生产中止了。

examples.en: I always carry bottled water when I travel.
examples.cn: 旅行时我总是带着瓶装水。

examples.en: Bottled water is convenient but can be expensive.
examples.cn: 瓶装水很方便，但可能很贵。

examples.en: The alarm clock went off at 6 AM.
examples.cn: 闹钟在早上6点响了。

examples.en: The bomb went off without warning.
examples.cn: 炸弹毫无预警地爆炸了。

examples.en: The milk has gone off; don't drink it.
examples.cn: 牛奶变质了，别喝。

examples.en: If you leave meat out, it will go off quickly.
examples.cn: 如果把肉放在外面，它会很快变坏。

examples.en: Technology is advancing so fast that it's hard to keep pace with.
examples.cn: 技术发展如此之快，很难跟上。

examples.en: She runs to keep pace with her younger brother.
examples.cn: 她跑步以跟上她弟弟的步伐。

examples.en: The labour market is competitive for recent graduates.
examples.cn: 对刚毕业的学生来说，劳动力市场竞争激烈。

examples.en: Changes in technology affect the labour market.
examples.cn: 技术变化影响劳动力市场。

examples.en: She decided to take up painting as a hobby.
examples.cn: 她决定开始画画作为爱好。

examples.en: This project will take up a lot of my time.
examples.cn: 这个项目会占用我很多时间。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对情感需求有反应，体贴情感需求

examples.en: A good therapist is responsive to emotional needs.
examples.cn: 一个好的治疗师对情感需求很体贴。

examples.en: Parents should be responsive to their children's emotional needs.
examples.cn: 父母应该对孩子的情绪需求有反应。

examples.en: He struck upon a brilliant idea while walking.
examples.cn: 走路时他突然想到了一个绝妙的主意。

examples.en: They struck upon an old map in the attic.
examples.cn: 他们在阁楼里偶然发现了一张旧地图。

examples.en: The criminal received a life sentence for murder.
examples.cn: 罪犯因谋杀被判无期徒刑。

examples.en: In some countries, a life sentence means imprisonment until death.
examples.cn: 在一些国家，无期徒刑意味着终身监禁。

examples.en: She looked him up and down before speaking.
examples.cn: 说话前，她上下打量了他。

examples.en: The guard looked up and down the street for any suspicious activity.
examples.cn: 警卫上下打量街道，寻找可疑活动。

examples.en: It was nothing more than a simple mistake.
examples.cn: 这不过是一个简单的错误。

examples.en: He is nothing more than a beginner in this field.
examples.cn: 在这个领域，他不过是个初学者。

examples.en: She loves to grow plants in her garden.
examples.cn: 她喜欢在花园里种植植物。

examples.en: It's important to know how to grow plants properly.
examples.cn: 知道如何正确种植植物很重要。

examples.en: He always speaks in a friendly manner to customers.
examples.cn: 他总是以友好的方式对顾客说话。

examples.en: Try to speak in a friendly manner to avoid conflicts.
examples.cn: 试着以友好的方式说话以避免冲突。

examples.en: Please make sure the door is locked before you leave.
examples.cn: 离开前请确保门已锁好。

examples.en: I'll make sure to call you when I arrive.
examples.cn: 我到达后一定会给你打电话。

definitions.meaning_cn: 为了...的利益，出于...的考虑

examples.en: The policy was changed in the interests of public safety.
examples.cn: 为了公共安全，政策被修改了。

examples.en: In the interests of fairness, we should hear both sides.
examples.cn: 为了公平起见，我们应该听取双方的意见。

examples.en: She helped me move, and in return, I cooked her dinner.
examples.cn: 她帮我搬家，作为回报，我给她做了晚饭。

examples.en: He offered his support in return for a favor.
examples.cn: 他提供支持以换取一个帮助。

examples.en: The mediator helped smooth away the disagreements between the parties.
examples.cn: 调解员帮助消除了各方之间的分歧。

examples.en: She used diplomacy to smooth away the tensions in the meeting.
examples.cn: 她运用外交手段消除了会议中的紧张气氛。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与...紧密相关，与...有密切联系

examples.en: Economic growth is closely linked to technological innovation.
examples.cn: 经济增长与技术创新紧密相关。

examples.en: His success is closely linked to his hard work and dedication.
examples.cn: 他的成功与他的努力和奉献精神密切相关。

examples.en: The magazine launched a new campaign to expand its readership among young adults.
examples.cn: 该杂志发起了一项新活动，以扩大其在年轻成年人中的读者群。

examples.en: By offering digital subscriptions, they hope to expand their readership globally.
examples.cn: 通过提供数字订阅，他们希望在全球范围内扩大读者群。

examples.en: The Grand Canyon is a popular scenic spot for tourists.
examples.cn: 大峡谷是游客喜爱的热门景点。

examples.en: We visited several scenic spots during our trip to the mountains.
examples.cn: 我们在山区旅行期间参观了几个景点。

examples.en: The bouncer kicked the troublemaker out of the club.
examples.cn: 保安把闹事者赶出了俱乐部。

examples.en: She was kicked out of the meeting for being disruptive.
examples.cn: 她因扰乱会议而被赶了出去。

definitions.meaning_cn: 有私心，有个人目的或偏见

examples.en: He always criticizes the new policy because he has an axe to grind with the management.
examples.cn: 他总是批评新政策，因为他与管理层有私怨。

examples.en: Be careful of her advice; she might have an axe to grind in this matter.
examples.cn: 小心她的建议；她在这件事上可能有私心。

definitions.meaning_cn: 思想开明的，愿意接受新观念的

examples.en: She is very open-minded and always listens to different opinions.
examples.cn: 她思想非常开明，总是听取不同的意见。

examples.en: Being open-minded helps in adapting to new cultures.
examples.cn: 思想开明有助于适应新文化。

definitions.meaning_cn: 受自身利益驱动，自私的

examples.en: His actions are often driven by self-interest rather than altruism.
examples.cn: 他的行为常常受自身利益驱动，而非利他主义。

examples.en: The decision was driven by self-interest, ignoring the community's needs.
examples.cn: 这个决定是受自身利益驱动，忽视了社区的需求。

examples.en: In the end, they decided to cancel the project due to budget issues.
examples.cn: 最终，由于预算问题，他们决定取消这个项目。

examples.en: After much debate, in the end, we reached a compromise.
examples.cn: 经过多次辩论，最终我们达成了妥协。

examples.en: The technology was originally developed for military use.
examples.cn: 这项技术最初是为军事用途开发的。

examples.en: Strict regulations control the military use of certain chemicals.
examples.cn: 严格的规定控制某些化学品的军事用途。

examples.en: He managed to get out of a mess by apologizing sincerely.
examples.cn: 他通过真诚道歉成功摆脱了困境。

examples.en: With some clever thinking, she got out of a messy situation at work.
examples.cn: 凭借一些聪明的想法，她摆脱了工作中的困境。

examples.en: The fugitive has been on the run from the police for months.
examples.cn: 逃犯已逃避警方追捕数月。

examples.en: With her busy schedule, she's always on the run between meetings.
examples.cn: 由于日程繁忙，她总是在会议之间奔波。

examples.en: Despite the pressure, she held her ground and refused to compromise.
examples.cn: 尽管有压力，她坚守立场，拒绝妥协。

examples.en: In the negotiation, it's important to hold your ground on key issues.
examples.cn: 在谈判中，在关键问题上坚守立场很重要。

examples.en: She has a good grasp of advanced mathematics.
examples.cn: 她很好地掌握了高等数学。

examples.en: To succeed in this job, you need to have a grasp of the latest technology.
examples.cn: 要胜任这份工作，你需要掌握最新技术。

examples.en: He looked about for his keys but couldn't find them.
examples.cn: 他四处寻找钥匙，但没找到。

examples.en: We need to look about for a new office space as our lease is ending.
examples.cn: 由于租约即将到期，我们需要四处寻找新的办公空间。

examples.en: I will agree to the deal only if the terms are fair.
examples.cn: 只有在条款公平的情况下，我才会同意这笔交易。

examples.en: You can borrow my car only if you promise to drive carefully.
examples.cn: 只有你答应小心驾驶，才能借我的车。

definitions.meaning_cn: 人为干扰，人类活动引起的扰乱

examples.en: Human-caused disturbances, such as deforestation, threaten wildlife habitats.
examples.cn: 人为干扰，如森林砍伐，威胁着野生动物的栖息地。

examples.en: The study focuses on the impact of human-caused disturbances on coastal ecosystems.
examples.cn: 这项研究关注人为干扰对沿海生态系统的影响。

definitions.meaning_cn: 让某人自行其是；放任不管

examples.en: The teacher left the students to their own devices during the project, and they came up with creative solutions.
examples.cn: 老师在做项目时让学生们自行其是，他们想出了有创意的解决方案。

examples.en: After the instructions, he was left to his own devices to complete the task.
examples.cn: 在指示之后，他被放任自行完成任务。

examples.en: Risk is inherent in any investment, so it's important to diversify your portfolio.
examples.cn: 风险是任何投资固有的，因此分散投资组合很重要。

examples.en: The flaws inherent in the system became apparent after years of use.
examples.cn: 系统内在的缺陷在使用多年后变得明显。

examples.en: She decided to give up smoking for her health.
examples.cn: 她为了健康决定戒烟。

examples.en: Don't give up on your dreams, even when it gets tough.
examples.cn: 即使困难，也不要放弃你的梦想。

examples.en: After hours of negotiation, the enemy finally gave up and surrendered.
examples.cn: 经过数小时谈判，敌人最终投降了。

examples.en: In the chess match, he had to give up when he was checkmated.
examples.cn: 在国际象棋比赛中，他被将死后不得不认输。

examples.en: He had to give up his seat to an elderly passenger on the bus.
examples.cn: 他不得不在公交车上把座位让给一位老年乘客。

examples.en: The suspect gave up the stolen goods to the police.
examples.cn: 嫌疑人向警方交出了被盗物品。

examples.en: The fire spread quickly and was soon out of control.
examples.cn: 火势迅速蔓延，很快就失控了。

examples.en: His spending habits are getting out of control, leading to debt.
examples.cn: 他的消费习惯正变得失控，导致债务。

definitions.meaning_cn: 深入细节；处理实质性问题

examples.en: Let's stop discussing general ideas and get down to the nitty-gritty of the contract.
examples.cn: 我们别再讨论一般想法了，深入合同的细节吧。

examples.en: After the introductions, the team got down to the nitty-gritty of planning the project.
examples.cn: 介绍之后，团队开始处理项目规划的实质性问题。

examples.en: Her jewelry is considered a personal possession and is not part of the shared assets.
examples.cn: 她的珠宝被视为个人财产，不属于共有资产。

examples.en: He keeps his passport as a personal possession in a safe place.
examples.cn: 他把护照作为私人物品保存在安全的地方。

examples.en: She is regarded as an expert in her field due to her extensive research.
examples.cn: 由于广泛的研究，她被视为所在领域的专家。

examples.en: This ancient artifact is regarded as a national treasure.
examples.cn: 这件古代文物被视为国宝。

examples.en: The company invested in new technology to improve efficiency.
examples.cn: 公司投资新技术以提高效率。

examples.en: New technology has revolutionized the way we communicate.
examples.cn: 新技术彻底改变了我们的交流方式。

examples.en: If you're not coming, in that case, I'll go alone.
examples.cn: 如果你不来，那样的话，我就一个人去。

examples.en: The weather forecast predicts rain; in that case, we should bring umbrellas.
examples.cn: 天气预报预测有雨；既然如此，我们应该带伞。

valid_entries.original_phrase: bring sb. down a peg or two

definitions.meaning_cn: 挫某人的锐气；让某人谦虚一点

examples.en: His arrogant behavior needed to be addressed, so his friends brought him down a peg or two.
examples.cn: 他傲慢的行为需要处理，所以朋友们挫了他的锐气。

examples.en: After winning the award, a little criticism brought her down a peg or two.
examples.cn: 获奖后，一点批评让她谦虚了一点。

examples.en: This tool is meant to simplify the process, not complicate it.
examples.cn: 这个工具旨在简化过程，而不是使其复杂化。

examples.en: You are meant to arrive on time for the meeting.
examples.cn: 你应该准时参加会议。

examples.en: Some believe that everything happens as it is meant to be.
examples.cn: 有些人相信一切事情的发生都是注定的。

examples.en: The letter was meant to encourage her during difficult times.
examples.cn: 这封信意图在她困难时期鼓励她。

definitions.meaning_cn: 或类似的东西；诸如此类

examples.en: I think I left my keys on the table or something.
examples.cn: 我想我把钥匙落在桌子上了或类似的地方。

examples.en: She said she'd be late because of traffic or something.
examples.cn: 她说她会因为交通或诸如此类的原因迟到。

examples.en: He offered his services in exchange for free accommodation.
examples.cn: 他提供服务以换取免费住宿。

examples.en: The company provided funding in exchange for a share of the profits.
examples.cn: 公司提供资金以换取一部分利润。

examples.en: I need to deposit money in a bank to save for my vacation.
examples.cn: 我需要在银行存款来为度假存钱。

examples.en: She deposits money in a bank every month to build her savings.
examples.cn: 她每月在银行存款以积累储蓄。

examples.en: As a citizen, it is important to do one's duty by voting in elections.
examples.cn: 作为公民，通过投票选举来履行职责很重要。

examples.en: The soldier did his duty by protecting his country.
examples.cn: 士兵通过保护国家来尽他的义务。

examples.en: This software is compatible with both Windows and Mac operating systems.
examples.cn: 这个软件与Windows和Mac操作系统都兼容。

examples.en: Her values are compatible with the company's mission, making her a good fit.
examples.cn: 她的价值观与公司的使命一致，使她很适合。

examples.en: As far as I am concerned, the decision is final.
examples.cn: 就我而言，这个决定是最终的。

examples.en: As far as the budget is concerned, we need to cut costs.
examples.cn: 至于预算，我们需要削减成本。

examples.en: The evidence doesn't match up with his alibi, raising suspicions.
examples.cn: 证据与他的不在场证明不符，引起了怀疑。

examples.en: Her skills match up with the job requirements perfectly.
examples.cn: 她的技能与工作要求完美匹配。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get a rough idea about sth.

examples.en: After reading the summary, I got a rough idea about the book's plot.
examples.cn: 读完摘要后，我对这本书的情节有了个大致的了解。

examples.en: Can you give me a quick overview so I can get a rough idea about the project?
examples.cn: 你能给我一个快速概述，让我对项目有个大致了解吗？

definitions.meaning_cn: 有确凿证据证明某人犯罪或做错事

examples.en: The police had him dead to rights with the security footage.
examples.cn: 警方通过监控录像掌握了他确凿的犯罪证据。

examples.en: She had her coworker dead to rights for stealing office supplies.
examples.cn: 她掌握了同事偷窃办公用品的铁证。

definitions.meaning_cn: 获取内幕消息或详细情况

examples.en: I need to get the lowdown on the new project before the meeting.
examples.cn: 开会前我需要了解这个新项目的内情。

examples.en: He got the lowdown on the company's financial troubles from a reliable source.
examples.cn: 他从可靠来源得知了公司财务问题的内幕。

definitions.meaning_cn: 课程反馈表，用于收集学生对课程的评价

examples.en: Please complete the course feedback form to help improve the curriculum.
examples.cn: 请填写课程反馈表以帮助改进课程设置。

examples.en: The university requires students to submit a course feedback form at the end of each semester.
examples.cn: 大学要求学生在每学期末提交课程反馈表。

examples.en: Regular exercise and a balanced diet can help improve our health.
examples.cn: 定期锻炼和均衡饮食有助于改善我们的健康。

examples.en: We should adopt healthier habits to improve our health over time.
examples.cn: 我们应该养成更健康的习惯来逐步改善健康状况。

examples.en: She took to painting as a hobby after retirement.
examples.cn: 退休后她开始喜欢上绘画作为爱好。

examples.en: The puppy quickly took to its new owner.
examples.cn: 小狗很快就喜欢上了它的新主人。

examples.en: The thieves took to the hills to avoid capture.
examples.cn: 小偷们逃往山区以躲避抓捕。

examples.en: We took to the road early in the morning to avoid traffic.
examples.cn: 我们一大早就上路以避开交通拥堵。

examples.en: Please clear away the dishes after dinner.
examples.cn: 晚餐后请把盘子收拾干净。

examples.en: We need to clear away the clutter before the guests arrive.
examples.cn: 客人到来前我们需要清理杂物。

examples.en: The fog should clear away by midday.
examples.cn: 雾应该在中午前消散。

examples.en: His doubts cleared away after hearing the explanation.
examples.cn: 听完解释后，他的疑虑消失了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 因担忧或压力而长白头发，比喻操心

examples.en: Managing this project is going to make me get gray hair.
examples.cn: 管理这个项目会让我操心到长白头发。

examples.en: Parents often get gray hair worrying about their children.
examples.cn: 父母常因担心孩子而操心到长白头发。

examples.en: He couldn't resist taking a dig at his rival during the speech.
examples.cn: 他在演讲中忍不住挖苦了他的对手。

examples.en: She often takes a dig at her brother for being messy.
examples.cn: 她经常挖苦她哥哥邋遢。

definitions.meaning_cn: 非常规措施，非传统方法

examples.en: The company adopted unconventional measures to boost sales during the crisis.
examples.cn: 公司在危机期间采取了非常规措施来提升销售额。

examples.en: Sometimes unconventional measures are necessary to solve complex problems.
examples.cn: 有时解决复杂问题需要采取非常规措施。

examples.en: According to the weather forecast, it will rain tomorrow.
examples.cn: 根据天气预报，明天会下雨。

examples.en: The report was written according to the guidelines provided.
examples.cn: 这份报告是按照提供的指南撰写的。

examples.en: In any case, we should prepare for the worst.
examples.cn: 无论如何，我们都应该做最坏的准备。

examples.en: He might not come, but in any case, we'll start the meeting on time.
examples.cn: 他可能不来，但不管怎样，我们会准时开始会议。

definitions.meaning_cn: 一致或同质，属于同一类

examples.en: His actions are of a piece with his previous behavior.
examples.cn: 他的行为与他之前的表现是一致的。

examples.en: The new policy is of a piece with the company's overall strategy.
examples.cn: 新政策与公司的整体战略是一致的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在...中有发言权或影响力

examples.en: Employees should have a say in decisions that affect their work.
examples.cn: 员工应该在影响他们工作的决策中有发言权。

examples.en: As a shareholder, she has a say in the company's major policies.
examples.cn: 作为股东，她在公司重大政策上有发言权。

examples.en: He plunged into the cold water without hesitation.
examples.cn: 他毫不犹豫地跳进了冷水中。

examples.en: The country plunged into an economic crisis after the war.
examples.cn: 战后该国陷入了经济危机。

examples.en: She plunged into her studies with great enthusiasm.
examples.cn: 她以极大的热情投入了学习。

examples.en: After graduation, he plunged into a career in journalism.
examples.cn: 毕业后，他投身于新闻事业。

definitions.meaning_cn: 抢先某人一步，占得先机

examples.en: We got the jump on our competitors by launching the product early.
examples.cn: 我们通过提前推出产品抢占了竞争对手的先机。

examples.en: He always tries to get the jump on others in negotiations.
examples.cn: 在谈判中，他总是试图抢先别人一步。

definitions.meaning_cn: 装出样子，掩饰真实感受

examples.en: She put up a front of confidence even though she was nervous.
examples.cn: 尽管紧张，她还是装出自信的样子。

examples.en: He put up a front to hide his disappointment from his friends.
examples.cn: 他装出样子向朋友掩饰自己的失望。

examples.en: Access to a clean water supply is essential for public health.
examples.cn: 获得清洁的供水对公共卫生至关重要。

examples.en: The village built a new system to ensure a clean water supply.
examples.cn: 村庄新建了一个系统以确保清洁的供水。

examples.en: He was ashamed of his rude behavior at the party.
examples.cn: 他为在派对上粗鲁的行为感到羞愧。

examples.en: She is ashamed of not helping her friend when needed.
examples.cn: 她为在朋友需要时没有提供帮助而感到惭愧。

definitions.meaning_cn: 做鬼脸，露出不满的表情

examples.en: The child made a face when given vegetables to eat.
examples.cn: 给孩子蔬菜吃时，他做了个鬼脸。

examples.en: She made a face at the boring presentation.
examples.cn: 她对无聊的演讲露出了不满的表情。

examples.en: The government provides financial support to small businesses.
examples.cn: 政府为小企业提供财务支持。

examples.en: She received financial support from her family to pursue her studies.
examples.cn: 她得到家人的资金援助以继续学业。

examples.en: Please take your seat before the meeting begins.
examples.cn: 请在会议开始前就座。

examples.en: The audience was asked to take their seats for the performance.
examples.cn: 观众被要求就座观看演出。

examples.en: I am acquainted with the new software after the training.
examples.cn: 培训后我熟悉了这款新软件。

examples.en: She is well acquainted with the local customs.
examples.cn: 她非常熟悉当地的风俗习惯。

examples.en: During the power outage, we had to go without electricity for hours.
examples.cn: 停电期间，我们不得不忍受几个小时没有电。

examples.en: He can go without coffee in the morning if necessary.
examples.cn: 必要时，他早上可以不喝咖啡。

examples.en: Her speech inspired the students to pursue their dreams.
examples.cn: 她的演讲激励学生们去追求梦想。

examples.en: The coach inspired the team to train harder.
examples.cn: 教练激励队伍更加努力训练。

examples.en: Never mind, I can fix the mistake myself.
examples.cn: 没关系，我可以自己改正这个错误。

examples.en: Never mind what others think, just do your best.
examples.cn: 别在意别人怎么想，尽力就好。

examples.en: Mechanised farming has increased crop yields significantly.
examples.cn: 机械化农业显著提高了作物产量。

examples.en: The farm adopted mechanised farming to reduce labor costs.
examples.cn: 农场采用机械化农业以降低劳动力成本。

examples.en: The university allows credit transfer from other institutions.
examples.cn: 这所大学允许从其他机构转移学分。

examples.en: He completed a credit transfer to move funds between accounts.
examples.cn: 他完成了信用转账，将资金在账户间转移。

examples.en: She decided to keep quiet about the incident to avoid trouble.
examples.cn: 她决定对这件事保持沉默以避免麻烦。

examples.en: Please keep quiet about the surprise party until the day.
examples.cn: 请对惊喜派对保密直到那天。

examples.en: It took him a while to fit in at the new school.
examples.cn: 他花了一段时间才融入新学校。

examples.en: She tries to fit in with her colleagues by joining social events.
examples.cn: 她通过参加社交活动来适应同事。

examples.en: Can we fit in a meeting tomorrow morning?
examples.cn: 我们明天早上能安排一个会议吗？

examples.en: I'll try to fit in a quick workout before dinner.
examples.cn: 我会试着在晚餐前挤进一个快速锻炼。

examples.en: The children take turns at cleaning the classroom.
examples.cn: 孩子们轮流打扫教室。

examples.en: We take turns at driving on long road trips.
examples.cn: 我们在长途公路旅行中轮流开车。

examples.en: The government will take action against illegal logging.
examples.cn: 政府将对非法伐木采取行动。

examples.en: The company decided to take action against the copyright infringement.
examples.cn: 公司决定对版权侵权采取行动。

definitions.meaning_cn: 引起某人对某事的注意

examples.en: The teacher drew the students' attention to the important details.
examples.cn: 老师引起了学生们对重要细节的注意。

examples.en: He drew my attention to the error in the report.
examples.cn: 他引起了我的注意，指出了报告中的错误。

examples.en: The museum charges admission fees to fund its operations.
examples.cn: 博物馆收取入场费以资助其运营。

examples.en: They decided to charge admission fees for the charity concert.
examples.cn: 他们决定为慈善音乐会收取入场费。

examples.en: The new policy will impact on small businesses significantly.
examples.cn: 新政策将显著影响小企业。

examples.en: Climate change has a major impact on global ecosystems.
examples.cn: 气候变化对全球生态系统有重大影响。

examples.en: She picked up the book from the floor.
examples.cn: 她从地板上捡起了书。

examples.en: Can you pick up the phone? It's ringing.
examples.cn: 你能接一下电话吗？它在响。

examples.en: He picked up Spanish quickly while living in Spain.
examples.cn: 他在西班牙生活时很快学会了西班牙语。

examples.en: I picked up some cooking skills from watching videos.
examples.cn: 我通过看视频掌握了一些烹饪技巧。

examples.en: I'll pick you up from the airport at 5 PM.
examples.cn: 我下午5点去机场接你。

examples.en: The bus picks up passengers at every stop.
examples.cn: 公交车在每个站点搭载乘客。

examples.en: In so far as I know, the project is on schedule.
examples.cn: 就我所知，项目按计划进行。

examples.en: The agreement is valid in so far as both parties comply.
examples.cn: 只要双方遵守，协议就有效。

examples.en: She cuts her hair short every summer.
examples.cn: 她每年夏天都把头发剪短。

examples.en: I need to cut my hair before the job interview.
examples.cn: 我需要在工作面试前剪头发。

examples.en: The train arrived on time despite the bad weather.
examples.cn: 尽管天气恶劣，火车还是准时到达。

examples.en: Please submit your report on time to avoid penalties.
examples.cn: 请准时提交报告以避免处罚。

examples.en: The two political parties are in opposition on most major issues.
examples.cn: 这两个政党在大多数重大问题上都处于对立状态。

examples.en: She found herself in opposition to her colleagues' proposal.
examples.cn: 她发现自己反对同事们的提议。

examples.en: The party has been in opposition for the past decade.
examples.cn: 该党在过去十年里一直处于在野状态。

examples.en: While in opposition, they developed new policies.
examples.cn: 在野期间，他们制定了新政策。

examples.en: When the food arrived, we all dove in without hesitation.
examples.cn: 食物一上来，我们都毫不犹豫地开吃了。

examples.en: She dove into the new project with great enthusiasm.
examples.cn: 她以极大的热情投入了这个新项目。

examples.en: On a hot day, he dove into the pool to cool off.
examples.cn: 炎热的一天，他跳入泳池凉快一下。

examples.en: The children dove in the lake from the dock.
examples.cn: 孩子们从码头上跳入湖中。

examples.en: We used honey in place of sugar in the recipe.
examples.cn: 我们在食谱中用蜂蜜代替了糖。

examples.en: He attended the meeting in place of his manager.
examples.cn: 他代替经理参加了会议。

examples.en: After hours of shopping, she came away empty-handed.
examples.cn: 逛了几个小时后，她空手而归。

examples.en: The negotiators came away empty-handed from the talks.
examples.cn: 谈判人员从会谈中一无所获。

examples.en: Can you think of a good name for the new product?
examples.cn: 你能为新产品想个好名字吗？

examples.en: I often think of my childhood friends.
examples.cn: 我经常想起儿时的朋友。

examples.en: What do you think of the new policy?
examples.cn: 你认为新政策怎么样？

examples.en: She thinks highly of her mentor.
examples.cn: 她非常尊敬她的导师。

examples.en: He decided to quit smoking for his health.
examples.cn: 为了健康，他决定戒烟。

examples.en: It's challenging to quit smoking without support.
examples.cn: 没有支持，戒烟很有挑战性。

examples.en: The company came under fire for its environmental practices.
examples.cn: 该公司因其环保做法受到抨击。

examples.en: The proposal came under scrutiny from the committee.
examples.cn: 该提案受到委员会的审查。

examples.en: This issue comes under the jurisdiction of the federal government.
examples.cn: 这个问题归属于联邦政府的管辖范围。

examples.en: The new regulations come under the health department.
examples.cn: 新规定在卫生部门的管理之下。

examples.en: From a historical viewpoint, this event was a turning point.
examples.cn: 从历史观点来看，这个事件是一个转折点。

examples.en: Her book offers a unique historical viewpoint on the war.
examples.cn: 她的书提供了关于这场战争的独特历史视角。

examples.en: Please keep quiet during the movie.
examples.cn: 看电影时请保持安静。

examples.en: He kept quiet about the secret to avoid trouble.
examples.cn: 他对这个秘密保持沉默以避免麻烦。

examples.en: On the eve of the election, tensions were high.
examples.cn: 在选举前夕，气氛非常紧张。

examples.en: They celebrated on the eve of the new year.
examples.cn: 他们在新年前夕庆祝。

examples.en: The new building blends in with the historic neighborhood.
examples.cn: 新建筑融入了历史街区。

examples.en: She tried to blend in with the crowd to avoid attention.
examples.cn: 她试图融入人群以避免注意。

examples.en: Please come in and have a seat.
examples.cn: 请进来坐。

examples.en: The train comes in at 3 PM.
examples.cn: 火车下午3点到达。

examples.en: New fashion trends come in every season.
examples.cn: 每个季节都有新的时尚潮流流行起来。

examples.en: The latest model will come in next month.
examples.cn: 最新型号下个月将上市。

examples.en: I spend two hours doing homework every day.
examples.cn: 我每天花两个小时做作业。

examples.en: They spent the weekend doing gardening.
examples.cn: 他们周末都在做园艺。

examples.en: The interplay between genetics and environment affects health.
examples.cn: 遗传和环境之间的相互作用影响健康。

examples.en: Economists study the interplay between supply and demand.
examples.cn: 经济学家研究供需之间的相互作用。

examples.en: His efforts are worthy of recognition.
examples.cn: 他的努力值得认可。

examples.en: This book is worthy of a careful read.
examples.cn: 这本书值得仔细阅读。

examples.en: This tradition dates from the 18th century.
examples.cn: 这个传统始于18世纪。

examples.en: The building dates from the Roman era.
examples.cn: 这座建筑可以追溯到罗马时代。

definitions.meaning_cn: 把某人理想化；过分崇拜

examples.en: Fans often place celebrities on a pedestal.
examples.cn: 粉丝们常常把名人理想化。

examples.en: She placed her mentor on a pedestal, ignoring his flaws.
examples.cn: 她把导师过分崇拜，忽略了他的缺点。

definitions.meaning_cn: 个人陈述（如申请学校或工作）

examples.en: She wrote a compelling personal statement for her college application.
examples.cn: 她为大学申请写了一篇有说服力的个人陈述。

examples.en: The job requires a personal statement outlining your goals.
examples.cn: 这份工作要求一份概述你目标的个人陈述。

examples.en: He had to dash off to catch the bus.
examples.cn: 他不得不匆忙离开去赶公交车。

examples.en: She dashed off a quick email before the meeting.
examples.cn: 她在会议前快速写了一封电子邮件。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get sth. out in the open

examples.en: Let's get this issue out in the open so we can resolve it.
examples.cn: 让我们公开讨论这个问题以便解决。

examples.en: She finally got her feelings out in the open during the meeting.
examples.cn: 她终于在会议上公开表达了自己的感受。

examples.en: This photo doesn't do the beautiful scenery justice.
examples.cn: 这张照片没有充分展现这美丽的风景。

examples.en: He did justice to the role in the play with his excellent performance.
examples.cn: 他通过出色的表演公正地诠释了剧中的角色。

examples.en: He was arrested for committing a crime of theft.
examples.cn: 他因犯盗窃罪而被捕。

examples.en: Committing a crime can lead to severe legal consequences.
examples.cn: 犯罪可能导致严重的法律后果。

examples.en: It's important to stay abreast of the latest industry trends.
examples.cn: 跟上最新的行业趋势很重要。

examples.en: She reads daily news to stay abreast of current events.
examples.cn: 她阅读每日新闻以了解时事。

examples.en: The two companies negotiated on equal terms.
examples.cn: 两家公司在平等条件下进行谈判。

examples.en: All participants should compete on equal terms.
examples.cn: 所有参与者应在同等条件下竞争。

examples.en: This wood can be made into beautiful furniture.
examples.cn: 这种木材可以被制成漂亮的家具。

examples.en: The story was made into a successful movie.
examples.cn: 这个故事被改编成了一部成功的电影。

examples.en: Overconsumption can deplete all natural resources quickly.
examples.cn: 过度消费可能迅速耗尽所有自然资源。

examples.en: We must avoid practices that deplete all natural resources.
examples.cn: 我们必须避免耗尽所有自然资源的做法。

examples.en: The new fashion trend is starting to catch on among teenagers.
examples.cn: 新的时尚趋势开始在青少年中流行起来。

examples.en: It took him a while to catch on to the new software.
examples.cn: 他花了一段时间才理解这个新软件。

examples.en: She decided to take the lead in organizing the event.
examples.cn: 她决定带头组织这次活动。

examples.en: Our team took the lead in the competition early on.
examples.cn: 我们队在比赛中早早领先。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在婚礼上将新娘交给新郎

examples.en: Her father will give the bride away at the wedding ceremony.
examples.cn: 她的父亲将在婚礼仪式上将新娘交给新郎。

examples.en: Traditionally, the bride's father gives the bride away.
examples.cn: 传统上，由新娘的父亲将新娘交给新郎。

examples.en: He decided to resign from his position as manager.
examples.cn: 他决定辞去经理的职位。

examples.en: She resigned from the company after ten years of service.
examples.cn: 她在公司服务十年后辞职了。

examples.en: Please calm down and tell me what happened.
examples.cn: 请冷静下来告诉我发生了什么。

examples.en: It took him a few minutes to calm down after the argument.
examples.cn: 争论后他花了几分钟才冷静下来。

examples.en: I need to reply to this email as soon as possible.
examples.cn: 我需要尽快回复这封邮件。

examples.en: She always replies to messages promptly.
examples.cn: 她总是及时回复消息。

examples.en: The doctor ordered several medical tests to diagnose the condition.
examples.cn: 医生要求进行几项医学检查以诊断病情。

examples.en: Regular medical tests are important for maintaining good health.
examples.cn: 定期医学检查对保持健康很重要。

examples.en: He made no bones about it and told her exactly what he thought.
examples.cn: 他直言不讳，告诉了她他的真实想法。

examples.en: She made no bones about her dislike for the new policy.
examples.cn: 她毫不掩饰对新政策的不满。

examples.en: Let's put our heads together to solve this problem.
examples.cn: 让我们集思广益来解决这个问题。

examples.en: We put our heads together and came up with a great plan.
examples.cn: 我们共同商量，想出了一个好计划。

examples.en: Please wipe off the dust from the table.
examples.cn: 请擦掉桌子上的灰尘。

examples.en: He used a cloth to wipe off the mud from his shoes.
examples.cn: 他用布擦掉了鞋子上的泥。

examples.en: It's always best to tell the truth in any situation.
examples.cn: 在任何情况下说实话总是最好的。

examples.en: She decided to tell the truth about what happened.
examples.cn: 她决定说出事情的真相。

examples.en: Students often need to learn facts by heart for exams.
examples.cn: 学生通常需要为考试熟记事实。

examples.en: He learned all the historical dates by heart.
examples.cn: 他熟记了所有的历史日期。

examples.en: She put in many hours to finish the project.
examples.cn: 她投入了许多小时来完成这个项目。

examples.en: He put in a lot of effort to learn the new language.
examples.cn: 他投入了很多努力来学习这门新语言。

examples.en: We need to put in a new window in the kitchen.
examples.cn: 我们需要在厨房安装一个新窗户。

examples.en: Put in the USB drive before starting the computer.
examples.cn: 在启动电脑前插入USB驱动器。

examples.en: He put in a request for a day off next week.
examples.cn: 他提出了下周请一天假的请求。

examples.en: They put in an application for the grant last month.
examples.cn: 他们上个月提交了资助申请。

definitions.meaning_cn: 用饮料送服（食物或药物）

examples.en: He washed down the pill with a glass of water.
examples.cn: 他用一杯水送服了药片。

examples.en: Wash down the spicy food with some cold beer.
examples.cn: 用一些冰啤酒来送服辛辣食物。

examples.en: She washed down the car after the long trip.
examples.cn: 长途旅行后，她冲洗了汽车。

examples.en: Wash down the walls before painting them.
examples.cn: 在粉刷墙壁前先清洗一下。

definitions.meaning_cn: 突然停止（尤指在行动或说话中）

examples.en: He stopped short when he saw the accident ahead.
examples.cn: 当他看到前方的事故时，他突然停了下来。

examples.en: She stopped short of revealing the secret.
examples.cn: 她差点就泄露了秘密，但突然停住了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 未能达到（某个程度或目标）

examples.en: The project stopped short of its funding goal.
examples.cn: 这个项目未能达到其资金目标。

examples.en: He stopped short of accusing her directly.
examples.cn: 他没有直接指责她。

examples.en: In his speech, he referred to the recent economic changes.
examples.cn: 在他的演讲中，他提到了最近的经济变化。

examples.en: The book refers to several historical events.
examples.cn: 这本书涉及了几个历史事件。

examples.en: Please refer to the manual for instructions.
examples.cn: 请参考手册获取说明。

examples.en: Students should refer to the textbook for more details.
examples.cn: 学生应查阅教科书以获取更多细节。

definitions.meaning_cn: 将...转交给（某人或某机构）

examples.en: The doctor referred the patient to a specialist.
examples.cn: 医生将病人转诊给了一位专家。

examples.en: She referred the complaint to the manager.
examples.cn: 她将投诉转交给了经理。

examples.en: He often thinks aloud while solving problems.
examples.cn: 他经常在解决问题时自言自语。

examples.en: She was thinking aloud about her vacation plans.
examples.cn: 她在自言自语地谈论她的假期计划。

examples.en: They made fun of his new haircut.
examples.cn: 他们取笑他的新发型。

examples.en: It's not nice to make fun of someone's mistakes.
examples.cn: 取笑别人的错误是不好的。

examples.en: The news about the storm aroused her anxiety.
examples.cn: 关于风暴的消息引起了她的焦虑。

examples.en: His uncertain future arouses my anxiety.
examples.cn: 他不确定的未来引起了我的焦虑。

examples.en: She exercises on a daily basis to stay healthy.
examples.cn: 她每天锻炼以保持健康。

examples.en: We check the inventory on a daily basis.
examples.cn: 我们每天检查库存。

examples.en: He devotes time to volunteering every weekend.
examples.cn: 他每个周末都投入时间做志愿者。

examples.en: She devotes time to learning new skills.
examples.cn: 她投入时间学习新技能。

examples.en: Can I take away the leftovers?
examples.cn: 我可以带走剩菜吗？

examples.en: The police took away the evidence.
examples.cn: 警察拿走了证据。

examples.en: Take away five from ten, and you get five.
examples.cn: 十减去五等于五。

examples.en: The discount takes away 20% from the price.
examples.cn: 折扣从价格中减去了20%。

examples.en: We ordered pizza to take away.
examples.cn: 我们点了披萨外卖。

examples.en: Do you offer take away service?
examples.cn: 你们提供外卖服务吗？

definitions.meaning_cn: 管好你自己的事（用于告诉别人不要多管闲事）

examples.en: When he asked about my salary, I told him to mind his own business.
examples.cn: 当他问起我的薪水时，我告诉他管好自己的事。

examples.en: She should mind her own business instead of gossiping.
examples.cn: 她应该管好自己的事，而不是说闲话。

examples.en: The workers decided to go out on strike for better wages.
examples.cn: 工人们决定举行罢工以争取更好的工资。

examples.en: They went out on strike last week.
examples.cn: 他们上周举行了罢工。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某人有影响力或关系

examples.en: He has pull with the manager, so he can get things done quickly.
examples.cn: 他对经理有影响力，所以能快速办成事情。

examples.en: She has pull with the local authorities.
examples.cn: 她对当地当局有影响力。

definitions.meaning_cn: 斜眼看某人（表示怀疑、不满或困惑）

examples.en: She looked cross-eyed at him when he made the silly suggestion.
examples.cn: 当他提出愚蠢的建议时，她斜眼看着他。

examples.en: He looked cross-eyed at the strange noise.
examples.cn: 他对奇怪的声音斜眼看去。

examples.en: In truth, he was not as confident as he seemed.
examples.cn: 实际上，他并不像看起来那么自信。

examples.en: In truth, the project was more difficult than expected.
examples.cn: 事实上，这个项目比预期的更难。

definitions.meaning_cn: 彻底击败或欺骗某人（尤指在财务上）

examples.en: In the lawsuit, they took him to the cleaners.
examples.cn: 在诉讼中，他们彻底击败了他。

examples.en: The scam took many people to the cleaners.
examples.cn: 这个骗局让许多人损失惨重。

examples.en: Pollution is harming the aquatic environment.
examples.cn: 污染正在损害水生环境。

examples.en: Fish thrive in a healthy aquatic environment.
examples.cn: 鱼在健康的水生环境中茁壮成长。

examples.en: He fell for her at first sight.
examples.cn: 他对她一见钟情。

examples.en: She fell for his charming personality.
examples.cn: 她迷恋上了他迷人的个性。

examples.en: Don't fall for that old trick.
examples.cn: 别上那个老把戏的当。

examples.en: He fell for the scam and lost money.
examples.cn: 他上了骗局的当，损失了钱。

examples.en: She decided to take on the challenging project at work.
examples.cn: 她决定承担工作中的这个挑战性项目。

examples.en: He took on extra responsibilities after the promotion.
examples.cn: 晋升后，他承担了额外的责任。

examples.en: The company plans to take on new staff next month.
examples.cn: 公司计划下个月雇用新员工。

examples.en: They took on a consultant to improve efficiency.
examples.cn: 他们雇用了一名顾问来提高效率。

examples.en: The team is ready to take on their rivals in the final.
examples.cn: 这支队伍准备在决赛中对抗他们的对手。

examples.en: He took on the champion in a boxing match.
examples.cn: 他在一场拳击比赛中挑战了冠军。

examples.en: There are twice as many students in this class compared to last year.
examples.cn: 这个班的学生数量是去年的两倍。

examples.en: She bought twice as many apples as she needed.
examples.cn: 她买的苹果数量是她需要的两倍。

examples.en: The loan was approved on condition that he provides collateral.
examples.cn: 贷款被批准的条件是他提供抵押品。

examples.en: She agreed to help on condition of anonymity.
examples.cn: 她同意帮助，条件是不透露她的身份。

examples.en: Volunteers give of themselves to help the community.
examples.cn: 志愿者们奉献自己来帮助社区。

examples.en: He gives of himself tirelessly to support his family.
examples.cn: 他不懈地奉献自己来支持他的家庭。

examples.en: He took the rap for the mistake even though it wasn't his fault.
examples.cn: 他承担了这个错误的责备，尽管这不是他的错。

examples.en: She took the rap for the team's failure to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 她为团队未能按时完成而承担责任。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事表示反对或不满

examples.en: She took exception to his rude comments during the meeting.
examples.cn: 她对他会议期间的粗鲁评论表示不满。

examples.en: He took exception to the unfair treatment he received.
examples.cn: 他对他受到的不公平待遇表示反对。

examples.en: Parents have a significant influence on their children's development.
examples.cn: 父母对孩子的成长有重大影响。

examples.en: Social media has a strong influence on public opinion.
examples.cn: 社交媒体对公众舆论有很强的影响。

examples.en: The government launched programs to get rid of poverty in rural areas.
examples.cn: 政府启动了消除农村地区贫困的项目。

examples.en: International aid aims to help countries get rid of poverty.
examples.cn: 国际援助旨在帮助国家消除贫困。

examples.en: She runs a successful business in the tech industry.
examples.cn: 她在科技行业经营一家成功的企业。

examples.en: To run a successful business, you need good management skills.
examples.cn: 要经营一家成功的企业，你需要良好的管理技能。

examples.en: It's better to communicate face to face to avoid misunderstandings.
examples.cn: 最好面对面交流以避免误解。

examples.en: They decided to communicate face to face to discuss the sensitive issue.
examples.cn: 他们决定面对面交流来讨论这个敏感问题。

examples.en: Can you look over this report before I submit it?
examples.cn: 你能在我提交前检查一下这份报告吗？

examples.en: She looked over the contract carefully before signing.
examples.cn: 她在签署前仔细审阅了合同。

examples.en: From the hill, you can look over the entire city.
examples.cn: 从山上，你可以俯瞰整个城市。

examples.en: The balcony looks over a beautiful garden.
examples.cn: 阳台俯瞰着一个美丽的花园。

examples.en: Raising social awareness about environmental issues is crucial.
examples.cn: 提高对环境问题的社会意识至关重要。

examples.en: Schools should promote social awareness among students.
examples.cn: 学校应该促进学生之间的社会意识。

examples.en: After the hike, he had a strong appetite and ate a big meal.
examples.cn: 徒步后，他有强烈的食欲，吃了一顿大餐。

examples.en: Children often have a strong appetite for sweets.
examples.cn: 孩子们通常对甜食有强烈的食欲。

examples.en: She has a strong appetite for learning new languages.
examples.cn: 她对学习新语言有强烈的欲望。

examples.en: Investors showed a strong appetite for risk in the stock market.
examples.cn: 投资者在股市中表现出对风险的强烈兴趣。

examples.en: Traditional crafts must adapt to fit into the modern world.
examples.cn: 传统手工艺必须适应以融入现代世界。

examples.en: He struggled to fit into the modern world after retiring.
examples.cn: 退休后，他努力适应现代世界。

examples.en: He made no attempt to apologize for his mistake.
examples.cn: 他没有尝试为他的错误道歉。

examples.en: She made no attempt to hide her disappointment.
examples.cn: 她没有尝试掩饰她的失望。

examples.en: Graduates in computer science have excellent job prospects.
examples.cn: 计算机科学专业的毕业生有极好的就业前景。

examples.en: The economic downturn affected job prospects in many industries.
examples.cn: 经济衰退影响了许多行业的就业前景。

examples.en: A market economy relies on supply and demand to set prices.
examples.cn: 市场经济依靠供需来设定价格。

examples.en: Many countries have transitioned to a market economy in recent decades.
examples.cn: 近几十年来，许多国家已过渡到市场经济。

examples.en: She studies with enthusiasm because she loves the subject.
examples.cn: 她热情地学习，因为她喜欢这个科目。

examples.en: To succeed, you need to study with enthusiasm and dedication.
examples.cn: 要成功，你需要热情和专注地学习。

examples.en: Let's get the ball rolling on this project by scheduling a meeting.
examples.cn: 让我们通过安排会议来启动这个项目。

examples.en: He got the ball rolling by submitting the initial proposal.
examples.cn: 他通过提交初步提案来推动进程。

examples.en: Our supplies are running low, so we need to restock soon.
examples.cn: 我们的补给快用完了，所以我们需要尽快补充。

examples.en: Patience runs low when dealing with constant delays.
examples.cn: 处理不断的延误时，耐心会减少。

examples.en: Between you and me, I think the manager is planning to resign.
examples.cn: 私下跟你说，我觉得经理打算辞职了。

examples.en: This is just between you and me—don't tell anyone else.
examples.cn: 这事就咱俩知道，别告诉别人。

examples.en: Make sure your software is up to date to avoid security risks.
examples.cn: 确保你的软件是最新的，以避免安全风险。

examples.en: She always keeps up to date with the latest fashion trends.
examples.cn: 她总是紧跟最新的时尚潮流。

examples.en: We need to create a detailed financial plan for our retirement.
examples.cn: 我们需要为退休制定一个详细的财务计划。

examples.en: A good financial plan can help you achieve your long-term goals.
examples.cn: 一个好的理财规划能帮助你实现长期目标。

definitions.meaning_cn: 通过正规渠道，按程序办事

examples.en: If you have a complaint, you must go through channels and speak to your supervisor first.
examples.cn: 如果你有投诉，必须通过正规渠道，先和你的主管谈。

examples.en: All requests for funding need to go through channels for approval.
examples.cn: 所有资金申请都需要按程序审批。

examples.en: Planting more trees can help alleviate pollution in urban areas.
examples.cn: 多种树有助于减轻城市地区的污染。

examples.en: Governments are implementing policies to alleviate pollution from factories.
examples.cn: 政府正在实施政策以减轻工厂造成的污染。

examples.en: She will graduate from Harvard University next year.
examples.cn: 她明年将从哈佛大学毕业。

examples.en: He graduated from high school with honors.
examples.cn: 他以优异成绩从高中毕业。

examples.en: Try to speak at natural speed so people can understand you better.
examples.cn: 试着以自然语速说话，这样别人能更好地理解你。

examples.en: In language exams, it's important to speak at natural speed to sound fluent.
examples.cn: 在语言考试中，以自然语速说话对于听起来流利很重要。

examples.en: I know it's not my area, but let me put my two cents in on the marketing strategy.
examples.cn: 我知道这不是我的领域，但让我对营销策略发表一下意见。

examples.en: He always puts his two cents in during meetings, even when it's not necessary.
examples.cn: 他总是在会议上插嘴，即使没必要。

examples.en: You need to loosen up a bit and enjoy the party.
examples.cn: 你需要放松一点，享受派对。

examples.en: After a long day at work, I like to loosen up by listening to music.
examples.cn: 工作一整天后，我喜欢听音乐来放松。

examples.en: The comedian's jokes brought the house down at the theater.
examples.cn: 那位喜剧演员的笑话在剧院引起了轰动。

examples.en: Her performance was so amazing that it brought the house down.
examples.cn: 她的表演太精彩了，博得了满堂彩。

examples.en: In the debate, she turned the tables on her opponent with a strong argument.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，她用有力的论点扭转了局势，反败为胜。

examples.en: The underdog team turned the tables on the champions in the final match.
examples.cn: 那支弱队在决赛中扭转局势，反败为胜击败了冠军。

examples.en: He prefers a single-speed cycle for commuting in the city because it's simple and low-maintenance.
examples.cn: 他更喜欢用单速自行车在城市通勤，因为它简单且维护成本低。

examples.en: Single-speed cycles are popular among urban cyclists for their minimalist design.
examples.cn: 单速自行车因其极简设计在城市骑行者中很受欢迎。

examples.en: Many students choose to study overseas to gain international experience.
examples.cn: 许多学生选择海外留学以获得国际经验。

examples.en: She plans to study overseas in Canada next year.
examples.cn: 她计划明年去加拿大海外留学。

examples.en: The stadium was packed with excited fans during the concert.
examples.cn: 音乐会期间，体育场挤满了兴奋的粉丝。

examples.en: This book is packed with useful tips for beginners.
examples.cn: 这本书充满了对初学者有用的建议。

examples.en: The defendant pleaded for mercy in court.
examples.cn: 被告在法庭上恳求宽恕。

examples.en: She pleaded for help when she got lost in the forest.
examples.cn: 她在森林里迷路时请求帮助。

examples.en: I got a lot out of that workshop; it really improved my skills.
examples.cn: 我从那个工作坊中获益良多；它确实提高了我的技能。

examples.en: Students who participate actively get a lot out of their education.
examples.cn: 积极参与的学生从教育中获益良多。

examples.en: It took me a while to take in all the information from the lecture.
examples.cn: 我花了一些时间来理解讲座中的所有信息。

examples.en: She couldn't take in the news of her friend's sudden death.
examples.cn: 她无法接受朋友突然去世的消息。

examples.en: They decided to take in a stray cat and give it a home.
examples.cn: 他们决定收留一只流浪猫，给它一个家。

examples.en: The shelter takes in homeless people during the winter.
examples.cn: 这个收容所在冬季接纳无家可归的人。

examples.en: We're trying to pay down our mortgage as quickly as possible.
examples.cn: 我们正试图尽快偿还我们的抵押贷款。

examples.en: It's wise to pay down high-interest debt first.
examples.cn: 先偿还高息债务是明智的。

examples.en: He keeps his colleagues at a distance to maintain professionalism.
examples.cn: 他与同事保持距离以维持专业性。

examples.en: It's best to keep at a distance from people who spread negativity.
examples.cn: 最好与传播负面情绪的人保持距离。

definitions.meaning_cn: 以旧换新，用旧物折价购买新物

examples.en: I decided to trade in my old car for a newer model.
examples.cn: 我决定用我的旧车折价换一辆更新的车型。

examples.en: You can trade in your old phone when buying the latest smartphone.
examples.cn: 购买最新款智能手机时，你可以用旧手机折价。

examples.en: The dealership offered a generous trade-in value for my vehicle.
examples.cn: 经销商为我的车辆提供了慷慨的以旧换新价值。

examples.en: We have a trade-in program for electronics to encourage upgrades.
examples.cn: 我们有一个电子产品的以旧换新计划，以鼓励升级。

examples.en: It's important to make good friends who support you through life's challenges.
examples.cn: 结交能在生活挑战中支持你的好朋友很重要。

examples.en: She managed to make good friends quickly after moving to the new city.
examples.cn: 搬到新城市后，她很快结交了好朋友。

examples.en: Please spread out the documents on the table so we can all see them.
examples.cn: 请把文件在桌子上展开，以便我们都能看到。

examples.en: The crowd spread out across the park during the festival.
examples.cn: 节日期间，人群在公园里分散开来。

examples.en: The city has spread out into the surrounding countryside over the years.
examples.cn: 多年来，这座城市已扩展到周围的乡村地区。

examples.en: The forest spreads out for miles in every direction.
examples.cn: 这片森林向各个方向延伸数英里。

examples.en: We should use environmentally friendly products to reduce pollution.
examples.cn: 我们应该使用环保产品以减少污染。

examples.en: This company is known for its environmentally friendly practices.
examples.cn: 这家公司以其环保实践而闻名。

definitions.meaning_cn: 用某物激励或启发某人

examples.en: The teacher inspired the students with stories of great scientists.
examples.cn: 老师用伟大科学家的故事激励了学生们。

examples.en: He inspired his team with a powerful vision for the future.
examples.cn: 他用一个强大的未来愿景激励了他的团队。

examples.en: She committed herself to learning a new language this year.
examples.cn: 她今年致力于学习一门新语言。

examples.en: He committed himself to the project with full dedication.
examples.cn: 他全身心投入到这个项目中。

examples.en: The company committed itself to reducing carbon emissions by 2030.
examples.cn: 公司承诺到2030年减少碳排放。

examples.en: They committed themselves to supporting the charity for five years.
examples.cn: 他们承诺支持这家慈善机构五年。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's cake and eat it too

definitions.meaning_cn: 鱼与熊掌兼得，想同时拥有两个互斥的好处

examples.en: You can't have your cake and eat it too; you must choose between a high salary and flexible hours.
examples.cn: 你不能鱼与熊掌兼得；你必须在高薪和灵活工作时间之间做出选择。

examples.en: He wants to travel the world without spending money, but you can't have your cake and eat it too.
examples.cn: 他想不花钱环游世界，但鱼与熊掌不可兼得。

examples.en: The spy operated under cover for years without being detected.
examples.cn: 这名间谍秘密行动多年未被发现。

examples.en: They conducted the investigation under cover to avoid alerting the suspects.
examples.cn: 他们秘密进行调查，以免惊动嫌疑人。

examples.en: We stayed under cover during the rainstorm to keep dry.
examples.cn: 暴雨期间，我们待在遮盖物下以保持干燥。

examples.en: The plants are kept under cover in the greenhouse during winter.
examples.cn: 冬季，这些植物被放在温室里受保护。

examples.en: His actions are at odds with his stated principles.
examples.cn: 他的行为与他声明的原则不一致。

examples.en: The two departments are at odds with each other over the budget allocation.
examples.cn: 这两个部门在预算分配上存在分歧。

examples.en: They decided to make an offer on the house after viewing it.
examples.cn: 看完房子后，他们决定提出报价。

examples.en: The company made an offer to buy out its competitor.
examples.cn: 公司提出收购其竞争对手的提议。

examples.en: She puts her children to bed at 8 PM every night.
examples.cn: 她每晚8点安顿孩子们睡觉。

examples.en: After reading a story, he put the baby to bed.
examples.cn: 读完故事后，他安顿婴儿睡觉。

definitions.meaning_cn: 完成，解决（尤指工作或问题）

examples.en: We finally put the project to bed after months of hard work.
examples.cn: 经过数月的努力，我们终于完成了这个项目。

examples.en: Let's put this issue to bed so we can move on to the next agenda item.
examples.cn: 让我们解决这个问题，以便进入下一个议程项目。

examples.en: The room relies on artificial light since it has no windows.
examples.cn: 这个房间没有窗户，依赖人造光。

examples.en: Artificial light from street lamps illuminates the city at night.
examples.cn: 夜晚，街灯的人造光照亮了城市。

examples.en: Fax machines were commonly used for document transmission before email became popular.
examples.cn: 在电子邮件普及之前，传真机常用于文件传输。

examples.en: Many offices still keep fax machines for legal or formal communications.
examples.cn: 许多办公室仍保留传真机用于法律或正式通讯。

examples.en: Higher education includes universities and colleges that offer degrees.
examples.cn: 高等教育包括提供学位的大学和学院。

examples.en: Pursuing higher education can lead to better career opportunities.
examples.cn: 追求高等教育可以带来更好的职业机会。

valid_entries.original_phrase: give as good as one gets

definitions.meaning_cn: 以牙还牙，在争论或冲突中不示弱

examples.en: In the debate, she gave as good as she got, matching every argument point for point.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，她以牙还牙，逐点回应每一个论点。

examples.en: He's not afraid to give as good as he gets in a tough negotiation.
examples.cn: 在艰难的谈判中，他不怕以牙还牙。

examples.en: I need to check with my manager before approving this expense.
examples.cn: 在批准这笔费用之前，我需要与我的经理核实。

examples.en: Please check with the team to see if they are available for the meeting.
examples.cn: 请与团队核实他们是否有空参加会议。

examples.en: We experienced a spell of hot weather last summer.
examples.cn: 去年夏天，我们经历了一段炎热天气。

examples.en: He went through a spell of unemployment before finding a new job.
examples.cn: 在找到新工作之前，他经历了一段失业期。

examples.en: Are you for real? I can't believe you won the lottery!
examples.cn: 你是认真的吗？我不敢相信你中了彩票！

examples.en: This time, he's for real about quitting his job and traveling the world.
examples.cn: 这次，他是真的打算辞职去环游世界。

examples.en: She received a pay raise after her annual performance review.
examples.cn: 年度绩效评估后，她获得了加薪。

examples.en: Employees are requesting a pay raise due to increased living costs.
examples.cn: 由于生活成本上涨，员工们正在要求加薪。

examples.en: He decided to lay aside his personal projects to focus on work.
examples.cn: 他决定搁置个人项目，专注于工作。

examples.en: Let's lay aside our differences and work together on this issue.
examples.cn: 让我们搁置分歧，共同解决这个问题。

examples.en: She lays aside a portion of her salary each month for emergencies.
examples.cn: 她每月存一部分工资以备紧急情况。

examples.en: It's wise to lay aside some money for future investments.
examples.cn: 为未来投资存一些钱是明智的。

examples.en: Go easy on the salt when cooking for guests.
examples.cn: 为客人做饭时少放点盐。

examples.en: The teacher went easy on the students who tried their best.
examples.cn: 老师对那些尽力了的学生很宽容。

examples.en: We need to go easy on the water during the drought.
examples.cn: 干旱期间我们需要节约用水。

examples.en: Go easy on the printer paper; it's expensive.
examples.cn: 节省点打印纸，它很贵。

examples.en: Students who cheat in exams risk severe penalties.
examples.cn: 考试作弊的学生面临严厉处罚。

examples.en: He was caught cheating in exams using a hidden device.
examples.cn: 他使用隐藏设备考试作弊被抓。

valid_entries.original_phrase: make sth. up out of whole cloth

examples.en: His excuse was made up out of whole cloth to avoid trouble.
examples.cn: 他的借口完全是编造的，为了逃避麻烦。

examples.en: The story she told was made up out of whole cloth; none of it happened.
examples.cn: 她讲的故事纯属虚构，没一件是真的。

examples.en: The police caught the thief red handed with the stolen goods.
examples.cn: 警察当场抓获了小偷和赃物。

examples.en: She was caught red handed cheating on the test.
examples.cn: 她考试作弊被当场抓住。

examples.en: I need to get a new phone because mine is broken.
examples.cn: 我需要买部新手机，因为我的坏了。

examples.en: Did you get the package I sent you?
examples.cn: 你收到我寄的包裹了吗？

examples.en: I don't get why she's so upset about it.
examples.cn: 我不明白她为什么对此这么生气。

examples.en: It took me a while to get the joke.
examples.cn: 我花了一会儿才理解这个笑话。

examples.en: We should get to the airport by 3 PM.
examples.cn: 我们应该在下午3点前到达机场。

examples.en: How do I get to the nearest subway station?
examples.cn: 我怎么去最近的地铁站？

examples.en: Driving under the influence breaks laws and endangers others.
examples.cn: 酒驾违法并危及他人。

examples.en: Companies that break environmental laws face heavy fines.
examples.cn: 违反环境法的公司面临重罚。

examples.en: I'll treat you to dinner to celebrate your promotion.
examples.cn: 我请你吃饭庆祝你升职。

examples.en: She treated her friends to a movie after work.
examples.cn: 她下班后请朋友看了场电影。

examples.en: You should treat this document with confidentiality.
examples.cn: 你应该保密处理这份文件。

examples.en: The doctor will treat the patient to alleviate the symptoms.
examples.cn: 医生将治疗病人以缓解症状。

examples.en: She argued against the proposal, citing high costs.
examples.cn: 她以成本过高为由反对这个提议。

examples.en: He argued against changing the policy without evidence.
examples.cn: 他辩驳说没有证据不应改变政策。

examples.en: Industrial waste can contaminate water supplies if not properly managed.
examples.cn: 工业废物处理不当会污染供水。

examples.en: The oil spill contaminated water in the river, harming wildlife.
examples.cn: 石油泄漏污染了河水，危害野生动物。

examples.en: You need a password to gain access to the secure database.
examples.cn: 你需要密码才能访问安全数据库。

examples.en: The hacker gained unauthorized access to the network.
examples.cn: 黑客未经授权访问了网络。

examples.en: The scholarship helped her gain access to higher education.
examples.cn: 奖学金帮助她获得了高等教育的机会。

examples.en: Networking can gain you access to job opportunities.
examples.cn: 人际网络能帮你获取工作机会。

examples.en: Please return the form at your convenience.
examples.cn: 请在您方便时归还表格。

examples.en: We can schedule the meeting at your convenience.
examples.cn: 我们可以根据您方便的时间安排会议。

examples.en: The insurance will cover the cost of the repairs.
examples.cn: 保险将支付维修费用。

examples.en: The grant covers the cost of tuition for low-income students.
examples.cn: 助学金支付低收入学生的学费。

examples.en: She poured out a glass of water for the guest.
examples.cn: 她为客人倒了一杯水。

examples.en: Be careful not to pour out too much milk.
examples.cn: 小心别倒太多牛奶。

examples.en: He poured out his feelings to his best friend.
examples.cn: 他向最好的朋友倾诉了他的感受。

examples.en: She poured out her worries about the future.
examples.cn: 她倾诉了对未来的担忧。

examples.en: You can try out the new software before buying it.
examples.cn: 你可以在购买前试用新软件。

examples.en: I'm going to try out this recipe for dinner.
examples.cn: 我打算晚餐试试这个食谱。

examples.en: He tried out for the basketball team last week.
examples.cn: 他上周参加了篮球队的选拔。

examples.en: She's trying out for the lead role in the play.
examples.cn: 她正在试镜戏剧的主角。

examples.en: Employees get paid every two weeks.
examples.cn: 员工每两周领一次工资。

examples.en: Freelancers often get paid upon project completion.
examples.cn: 自由职业者通常在项目完成后获得报酬。

examples.en: The government launched awareness campaigns about recycling.
examples.cn: 政府发起了关于回收的宣传活动。

examples.en: NGOs often launch awareness campaigns for social issues.
examples.cn: 非政府组织常为社会问题发起宣传活动。

examples.en: Lions prey on antelopes in the savanna.
examples.cn: 狮子在草原上捕食羚羊。

examples.en: Some birds prey on insects for food.
examples.cn: 一些鸟类捕食昆虫。

examples.en: Scammers often prey on elderly people.
examples.cn: 骗子常利用老年人。

examples.en: Bullies prey on weaker students at school.
examples.cn: 欺凌者在学校侵害较弱的学生。

examples.en: To all appearances, the deal was successful, but there were hidden problems.
examples.cn: 从表面看，交易成功了，但有隐藏问题。

examples.en: He seemed happy to all appearances, but was actually stressed.
examples.cn: 从表面看他很快乐，但实际上压力很大。

examples.en: I'll take a whack at fixing the car, though I'm not an expert.
examples.cn: 我会试试修车，虽然我不是专家。

examples.en: She took a whack at learning Spanish last year.
examples.cn: 她去年尝试学习西班牙语。

examples.en: The critic took a whack at the new movie in his review.
examples.cn: 评论家在他的评论中抨击了这部新电影。

examples.en: He took a whack at the piñata during the party.
examples.cn: 他在派对上击打了皮纳塔。

examples.en: The food package must list all ingredients clearly.
examples.cn: 食品包装必须清楚列出所有成分。

examples.en: Recyclable food packages are better for the environment.
examples.cn: 可回收的食品包装对环境更好。

examples.en: The charity distributed food packages to families in need.
examples.cn: 慈善机构向有需要的家庭分发食品包裹。

examples.en: Each food package contains enough supplies for a week.
examples.cn: 每个食品包裹包含一周的供应。

examples.en: They decided to go to court over the property dispute.
examples.cn: 他们决定就财产纠纷提起诉讼。

examples.en: If you don't pay the fine, you may have to go to court.
examples.cn: 如果你不支付罚款，可能得出庭。

examples.en: I need to go to court to file some documents.
examples.cn: 我需要去法院提交一些文件。

examples.en: She went to court to get a marriage license.
examples.cn: 她去法院领取结婚证。

examples.en: She stood up to the bully and told him to stop.
examples.cn: 她勇敢面对霸凌者，让他停止。

examples.en: The small country stood up to the invasion for months.
examples.cn: 这个小国抵抗入侵数月。

examples.en: This material stands up to extreme weather conditions.
examples.cn: 这种材料能经受极端天气条件。

examples.en: His argument didn't stand up to scrutiny.
examples.cn: 他的论点经不起推敲。

examples.en: The population of the town is on the decline.
examples.cn: 这个城镇的人口正在减少。

examples.en: His health has been on the decline since last year.
examples.cn: 自去年以来，他的健康状况一直在衰退。

examples.en: Sales are on the decline due to increased competition.
examples.cn: 由于竞争加剧，销售额在下降。

examples.en: The quality of the product is on the decline.
examples.cn: 产品质量在下降。

examples.en: In his speech, he made a reference to recent economic data.
examples.cn: 在他的演讲中，他引用了最近的经济数据。

examples.en: The article makes a reference to a study from 2020.
examples.cn: 这篇文章引用了2020年的一项研究。

examples.en: She made a reference to his past mistakes without naming him.
examples.cn: 她影射了他过去的错误，但没有点名。

examples.en: The joke made a reference to a popular movie.
examples.cn: 这个笑话影射了一部热门电影。

examples.en: The concert tickets sold out in minutes.
examples.cn: 音乐会门票几分钟内就售罄了。

examples.en: The new product sold out on the first day.
examples.cn: 新产品第一天就售罄了。

examples.en: He sold out and joined the corporate world.
examples.cn: 他背叛了理想，加入了企业界。

examples.en: Many fans think the band sold out when they signed with a major label.
examples.cn: 许多粉丝认为乐队签约大厂牌是出卖了自己。

examples.en: They danced to the rhythm of the drums.
examples.cn: 他们随着鼓的节奏跳舞。

examples.en: She loves to dance to pop music.
examples.cn: 她喜欢随着流行音乐跳舞。

examples.en: He dances to his boss's tune.
examples.cn: 他听从老板的指挥。

examples.en: The company dances to the demands of the market.
examples.cn: 公司服从市场需求。

examples.en: She mopped up the spilled milk with a towel.
examples.cn: 她用毛巾擦干了洒出的牛奶。

examples.en: After the flood, they had to mop up the water.
examples.cn: 洪水过后，他们得清理积水。

examples.en: The soldiers mopped up the last enemy resistance.
examples.cn: 士兵们清除了最后的敌人抵抗。

examples.en: We need to mop up the final details of the project.
examples.cn: 我们需要完成项目的最后细节。

examples.en: During the pandemic, freedom is restricted to prevent spread.
examples.cn: 疫情期间，自由受到限制以防止传播。

examples.en: In some countries, freedom is restricted by strict laws.
examples.cn: 在一些国家，自由受到严格法律的限制。

examples.en: With this new technology, we can get an edge over our competitors.
examples.cn: 有了这项新技术，我们可以获得对竞争对手的优势。

examples.en: She got an edge over him by studying harder.
examples.cn: 她通过更努力学习获得了对他的优势。

examples.en: I deleted the file by mistake.
examples.cn: 我错误地删除了文件。

examples.en: He took my bag by mistake at the airport.
examples.cn: 他在机场无意中拿错了我的包。

definitions.meaning_cn: 向某人提出或讨论某事

examples.en: I'll take up the issue with the manager.
examples.cn: 我会向经理提出这个问题。

examples.en: She took up her complaint with customer service.
examples.cn: 她向客服提出了投诉。

examples.en: They broke off negotiations due to disagreements.
examples.cn: 由于分歧，他们中断了谈判。

examples.en: He broke off the conversation to answer the phone.
examples.cn: 他中断谈话去接电话。

examples.en: She broke off a piece of chocolate to share.
examples.cn: 她掰下一块巧克力分享。

examples.en: The branch broke off in the storm.
examples.cn: 树枝在风暴中折断了。

examples.en: She is pursuing a degree in engineering.
examples.cn: 她正在攻读工程学位。

examples.en: He decided to pursue a degree abroad.
examples.cn: 他决定在国外攻读学位。

examples.en: The store's opening time is 9 AM.
examples.cn: 商店的营业时间是上午9点。

examples.en: Check the museum's opening time before you visit.
examples.cn: 参观前查看博物馆的开放时间。

examples.en: He burned out after working 80-hour weeks.
examples.cn: 他每周工作80小时后精疲力竭。

examples.en: Many nurses burn out due to stress.
examples.cn: 许多护士因压力而耗尽精力。

examples.en: The fire burned out after several hours.
examples.cn: 火几小时后烧尽了。

examples.en: The candle burned out during the night.
examples.cn: 蜡烛在夜间熄灭了。

examples.en: In order to succeed, you must work hard.
examples.cn: 为了成功，你必须努力工作。

examples.en: She saved money in order to buy a car.
examples.cn: 她存钱是为了买车。

examples.en: The company uses sustainable materials in its products.
examples.cn: 公司在产品中使用可持续材料。

examples.en: Building with sustainable materials reduces environmental impact.
examples.cn: 使用可持续材料建筑减少环境影响。

examples.en: I wonder if it will rain tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我想知道明天是否会下雨。

examples.en: She wonders if he will come to the party.
examples.cn: 她想知道他是否会来参加派对。

definitions.meaning_cn: 问候或询问某人的情况

examples.en: He inquired after her health during the call.
examples.cn: 他在电话中问候她的健康。

examples.en: She inquired after the well-being of his family.
examples.cn: 她询问了他家人的安康。

examples.en: Farmers grow hemp for its fibers and seeds.
examples.cn: 农民种植大麻以获取纤维和种子。

examples.en: It is legal to grow hemp in some regions for industrial use.
examples.cn: 在一些地区，为工业用途种植大麻是合法的。

examples.en: She is on vacation in Hawaii for two weeks.
examples.cn: 她在夏威夷度假两周。

examples.en: The office is closed because the staff are on vacation.
examples.cn: 办公室关闭了，因为员工都在休假。

definitions.meaning_cn: 不仅...而且...，用于连接两个并列成分，强调后者

examples.en: She is not only intelligent but also very hardworking.
examples.cn: 她不仅聪明，而且非常勤奋。

examples.en: The movie was not only entertaining but also thought-provoking.
examples.cn: 这部电影不仅娱乐性强，而且发人深省。

definitions.meaning_cn: 曾经，一度，指过去某个时期

examples.en: At one time, this town was a bustling port.
examples.cn: 这个城镇曾经是一个繁忙的港口。

examples.en: He was at one time the CEO of a major company.
examples.cn: 他曾一度是一家大公司的首席执行官。

definitions.meaning_cn: 医疗产品，包括药品、器械等

examples.en: The company specializes in manufacturing medical products like bandages and syringes.
examples.cn: 这家公司专门生产绷带和注射器等医疗产品。

examples.en: Regulations ensure the safety of medical products on the market.
examples.cn: 法规确保市场上医疗产品的安全性。

definitions.meaning_cn: 溢出，洒出，指液体或物品从容器中流出

examples.en: Be careful not to let the milk spill out of the cup.
examples.cn: 小心别让牛奶从杯子里溢出来。

examples.en: The crowd spilled out into the street after the concert.
examples.cn: 音乐会结束后，人群涌到了街上。

definitions.meaning_cn: 泄露，透露，指信息或情感无意中表达出来

examples.en: He accidentally spilled out the secret during the conversation.
examples.cn: 他在谈话中不小心泄露了秘密。

examples.en: Her emotions spilled out in a flood of tears.
examples.cn: 她的情感如泪水般倾泻而出。

definitions.meaning_cn: 利用...获利，从...中赚钱，常指利用机会或趋势

examples.en: The company cashed in on the holiday season by launching a new product.
examples.cn: 这家公司通过推出新产品在假日季节获利。

examples.en: He cashed in on his fame by writing a bestselling book.
examples.cn: 他利用自己的名气写了一本畅销书来赚钱。

examples.en: The driver slowed up as he approached the intersection.
examples.cn: 司机在接近十字路口时减速了。

examples.en: Production has slowed up due to supply chain issues.
examples.cn: 由于供应链问题，生产速度放慢了。

examples.en: I'll call you back straight away after the meeting.
examples.cn: 会议结束后我立刻给你回电话。

examples.en: She started working on the project straight away.
examples.cn: 她立刻开始着手这个项目。

examples.en: I need to look for my keys; I can't find them anywhere.
examples.cn: 我需要找我的钥匙，哪儿都找不到。

examples.en: She is looking for a new job in the tech industry.
examples.cn: 她正在科技行业寻找新工作。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使...保持距离，防止...接近或发生

examples.en: Regular exercise helps keep illnesses at bay.
examples.cn: 定期锻炼有助于防止疾病发生。

examples.en: The security system keeps intruders at bay.
examples.cn: 安全系统使入侵者无法接近。

examples.en: I often think back to my childhood summers.
examples.cn: 我经常回想童年的夏天。

examples.en: When I think back on that day, I realize how much has changed.
examples.cn: 当我回想那一天时，我意识到变化有多大。

definitions.meaning_cn: 家庭预算，家庭收支计划

examples.en: We need to create a household budget to manage our expenses better.
examples.cn: 我们需要制定一个家庭预算来更好地管理开支。

examples.en: Sticking to a household budget can help save money for emergencies.
examples.cn: 坚持家庭预算有助于为紧急情况存钱。

definitions.meaning_cn: 收工，结束一天的工作或活动

examples.en: After working for ten hours, we decided to call it a day.
examples.cn: 工作了十小时后，我们决定收工。

examples.en: Let's call it a day and continue tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我们今天到此为止，明天继续。

examples.en: She is studying hard in preparation for the exam.
examples.cn: 她正在努力学习，为考试做准备。

examples.en: The team trained rigorously in preparation for the competition.
examples.cn: 团队为比赛进行了严格的训练准备。

examples.en: We plan to go surfing at the beach this weekend.
examples.cn: 我们计划这个周末去海滩冲浪。

examples.en: He learned to go surfing during his vacation in Australia.
examples.cn: 他在澳大利亚度假期间学会了冲浪。

examples.en: You can't just sit by while injustice happens.
examples.cn: 当不公正发生时，你不能只是袖手旁观。

examples.en: He sat by and watched as the argument escalated.
examples.cn: 他袖手旁观，看着争论升级。

examples.en: Keep this news under your hat until we make an official announcement.
examples.cn: 在我们正式宣布之前，请对这个消息保密。

examples.en: She kept the surprise party under her hat for weeks.
examples.cn: 她为惊喜派对保密了好几周。

definitions.meaning_cn: 家务劳动，家庭内的工作

examples.en: She manages all the domestic work in the household.
examples.cn: 她管理家庭中的所有家务劳动。

examples.en: Domestic work includes cleaning, cooking, and childcare.
examples.cn: 家务劳动包括清洁、烹饪和照顾孩子。

definitions.meaning_cn: 解决失业问题，应对失业

examples.en: The government is implementing policies to tackle unemployment.
examples.cn: 政府正在实施政策来解决失业问题。

examples.en: We need innovative solutions to tackle unemployment in the region.
examples.cn: 我们需要创新的解决方案来应对该地区的失业问题。

examples.en: Her unique talent sets her apart from other candidates.
examples.cn: 她独特的才能使她与其他候选人区分开来。

examples.en: The special edition features set this book apart from the regular version.
examples.cn: 特别版的特点使这本书与普通版不同。

examples.en: We set apart some funds for emergency expenses.
examples.cn: 我们预留了一些资金用于紧急开支。

examples.en: He sets apart time each day for meditation.
examples.cn: 他每天留出时间进行冥想。

examples.en: It's just a matter of time before they announce the merger.
examples.cn: 他们宣布合并只是时间问题。

examples.en: With his dedication, success is only a matter of time.
examples.cn: 以他的奉献精神，成功只是时间问题。

examples.en: They went to bed with each other on their first date.
examples.cn: 他们在第一次约会时就发生了关系。

examples.en: He admitted going to bed with his colleague.
examples.cn: 他承认与同事发生了性关系。

definitions.meaning_cn: 与某人同床睡觉（字面意思）

examples.en: The children often go to bed with their parents during thunderstorms.
examples.cn: 雷雨天气时，孩子们经常和父母一起睡觉。

examples.en: She was so scared that she went to bed with her sister.
examples.cn: 她太害怕了，所以和姐姐一起睡觉。

examples.en: The old building is in need of urgent repairs.
examples.cn: 这栋旧建筑急需维修。

examples.en: He is in need of financial assistance to complete his studies.
examples.cn: 他需要经济援助来完成学业。

examples.en: You can always count on her to keep a secret.
examples.cn: 你总是可以指望她保守秘密。

examples.en: We're counting on good weather for the outdoor event.
examples.cn: 我们指望天气好能举办户外活动。

examples.en: Count on at least two hours for the drive in traffic.
examples.cn: 预计交通中开车至少需要两小时。

examples.en: When budgeting, count on unexpected expenses.
examples.cn: 做预算时，要把意外开支算进去。

examples.en: The basement has been converted into a recreation room with a pool table.
examples.cn: 地下室被改造成了一个有台球桌的娱乐室。

examples.en: Students gather in the recreation room to play video games.
examples.cn: 学生们聚集在娱乐室玩电子游戏。

definitions.meaning_cn: 宁可过于...；偏向于...以防万一

examples.en: It's better to err on the side of caution when dealing with sensitive data.
examples.cn: 处理敏感数据时，宁可过于谨慎。

examples.en: The doctor erred on the side of prescribing extra tests.
examples.cn: 医生偏向于多开一些检查以防万一。

examples.en: She remarked on how beautiful the sunset was.
examples.cn: 她评论说日落多么美丽。

examples.en: He didn't remark on the changes in the office layout.
examples.cn: 他没有评论办公室布局的变化。

examples.en: The effort is worth doing if it leads to success.
examples.cn: 如果努力能带来成功，那就值得做。

examples.en: Visiting that museum is worth doing for its historical artifacts.
examples.cn: 参观那个博物馆因其历史文物而值得。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get one's foot in the door

definitions.meaning_cn: 获得初步机会；迈出第一步

examples.en: Internships help students get their foot in the door of the industry.
examples.cn: 实习帮助学生获得进入该行业的初步机会。

examples.en: He got his foot in the door by networking at the conference.
examples.cn: 通过在会议上建立人脉，他迈出了第一步。

definitions.meaning_cn: 任意字符（如计算机中的）

examples.en: The password must not contain arbitrary characters like symbols.
examples.cn: 密码不能包含像符号这样的任意字符。

examples.en: In programming, an arbitrary character can be any letter or number.
examples.cn: 在编程中，任意字符可以是任何字母或数字。

definitions.meaning_cn: 武断的性格；随意的特性

examples.en: His arbitrary character often leads to unpredictable decisions.
examples.cn: 他武断的性格常常导致不可预测的决定。

examples.en: The policy was criticized for its arbitrary character.
examples.cn: 该政策因其随意性而受到批评。

examples.en: Public opinion is set against the new tax proposal.
examples.cn: 公众舆论反对新的税收提案。

examples.en: The scandal set him against his former allies.
examples.cn: 丑闻使他与以前的盟友对立。

examples.en: The flowers were set against a blue sky in the painting.
examples.cn: 画中花朵以蓝天为背景。

examples.en: Her achievements are set against years of hard work.
examples.cn: 她的成就是以多年的辛勤工作为背景的。

examples.en: In view of the recent developments, we must reconsider our strategy.
examples.cn: 鉴于最近的发展，我们必须重新考虑我们的策略。

examples.en: The meeting was postponed in view of the bad weather.
examples.cn: 考虑到恶劣天气，会议被推迟了。

examples.en: Employees often groan about the long working hours.
examples.cn: 员工经常抱怨工作时间长。

examples.en: He groaned about having to do the dishes again.
examples.cn: 他抱怨又得洗碗了。

examples.en: I go jogging every morning to stay fit.
examples.cn: 我每天早上慢跑来保持健康。

examples.en: They decided to go jogging in the park after work.
examples.cn: 他们决定下班后去公园慢跑。

definitions.meaning_cn: 学生中心；学生活动中心

examples.en: The student center has a cafeteria and study rooms.
examples.cn: 学生中心有自助餐厅和学习室。

examples.en: Clubs often hold meetings at the student center.
examples.cn: 社团经常在学生中心举行会议。

examples.en: The dog ran after the ball in the park.
examples.cn: 狗在公园里追赶球。

examples.en: He's always running after the latest fashion trends.
examples.cn: 他总是追求最新的时尚潮流。

examples.en: She runs after her kids all day, taking them to activities.
examples.cn: 她整天忙于带孩子参加活动。

examples.en: As a manager, he runs after multiple projects simultaneously.
examples.cn: 作为经理，他同时奔波于多个项目。

examples.en: I intend to finish the report by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我打算明天前完成报告。

examples.en: They intend to travel abroad next summer.
examples.cn: 他们计划明年夏天出国旅行。

definitions.meaning_cn: 核心家庭（通常指父母和子女）

examples.en: The nuclear family consists of parents and their children.
examples.cn: 核心家庭由父母和他们的子女组成。

examples.en: In modern societies, the nuclear family is common.
examples.cn: 在现代社会，核心家庭很常见。

examples.en: Good communication is one of the key leadership qualities.
examples.cn: 良好的沟通是关键领导素质之一。

examples.en: She demonstrated strong leadership qualities during the crisis.
examples.cn: 她在危机期间展现了强大的领导才能。

examples.en: She is attracted to intelligent people.
examples.cn: 她被聪明的人所吸引。

examples.en: Many tourists are attracted to the historical sites.
examples.cn: 许多游客被历史遗迹所吸引。

examples.en: Opposite magnetic poles are attracted to each other.
examples.cn: 相反的磁极相互吸引。

examples.en: The particles are attracted to the charged surface.
examples.cn: 粒子被带电表面吸引。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在一定程度上，部分同意

examples.en: I agree with you up to a point, but not entirely.
examples.cn: 我在一定程度上同意你，但不是完全同意。

examples.en: The plan works up to a point, but needs adjustments.
examples.cn: 这个计划在一定程度上有效，但需要调整。

examples.en: He came down with a cold last week.
examples.cn: 他上周感冒了。

examples.en: Many students came down with the flu during winter.
examples.cn: 许多学生在冬天患上了流感。

examples.en: The politician is under fire for his recent comments.
examples.cn: 这位政治家因最近的言论受到批评。

examples.en: The company came under fire from environmental groups.
