examples.cn: 这家公司受到环保组织的抨击。

examples.en: Soldiers were under fire during the battle.
examples.cn: 士兵们在战斗中处于枪林弹雨之下。

examples.en: The troops advanced while under fire.
examples.cn: 部队在火力下前进。

examples.en: The manager called the dogs off after the employee apologized.
examples.cn: 员工道歉后，经理停止了批评。

examples.en: He asked the media to call the dogs off the celebrity.
examples.cn: 他要求媒体停止对这位名人的攻击。

examples.en: Fans cheered the team on during the match.
examples.cn: 球迷们在比赛中为球队加油。

examples.en: We cheered her on as she ran the marathon.
examples.cn: 我们为她跑马拉松加油鼓劲。

examples.en: He lost his temper when the computer crashed.
examples.cn: 电脑崩溃时，他发脾气了。

examples.en: Try not to lose your temper during the discussion.
examples.cn: 讨论时尽量不要发脾气。

examples.en: We decided to hold off the meeting until next week.
examples.cn: 我们决定将会议推迟到下周。

examples.en: Hold off making a decision until you have more information.
examples.cn: 在获得更多信息之前，暂缓做决定。

examples.en: The army held off the enemy attack.
examples.cn: 军队抵挡住了敌人的进攻。

examples.en: She held off the salesperson with a firm no.
examples.cn: 她坚决地拒绝了推销员。

examples.en: This photo is used by courtesy of the photographer.
examples.cn: 这张照片承蒙摄影师的允许使用。

examples.en: The event was sponsored by courtesy of a local company.
examples.cn: 这次活动承蒙一家本地公司的赞助。

examples.en: Many residents object to the new construction project.
examples.cn: 许多居民反对这个新的建设项目。

examples.en: She objected to his rude behavior at the meeting.
examples.cn: 她反对他在会议上的粗鲁行为。

examples.en: His business venture came a cropper due to poor planning.
examples.cn: 由于计划不周，他的商业冒险失败了。

examples.en: She came a cropper in the exam because she didn't study.
examples.cn: 她因为没学习，考试栽了跟头。

examples.en: We need to cut back on expenses to save money.
examples.cn: 我们需要削减开支来省钱。

examples.en: He cut back on sugar to improve his health.
examples.cn: 他减少糖的摄入以改善健康。

examples.en: I would love to visit Japan someday.
examples.cn: 我很想有一天去日本旅游。

examples.en: She would love to help you with the project.
examples.cn: 她非常愿意帮助你完成这个项目。

examples.en: The fire is now under control.
examples.cn: 火势现在已得到控制。

examples.en: Keep your emotions under control during the negotiation.
examples.cn: 在谈判中保持情绪受控。

examples.en: Students are encouraged to study independently.
examples.cn: 鼓励学生独立学习。

examples.en: He studied independently to prepare for the exam.
examples.cn: 他独立学习以准备考试。

examples.en: The government pushed through the new law despite opposition.
examples.cn: 尽管有反对，政府还是强行通过了新法律。

examples.en: She pushed through the project to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 她强行完成了项目以赶上截止日期。

examples.en: He pushed through the crowd to get to the front.
examples.cn: 他挤过人群来到前面。

examples.en: The car pushed through the heavy traffic.
examples.cn: 汽车穿过了拥堵的交通。

examples.en: He finally got a break in his acting career.
examples.cn: 他终于在演艺事业上得到了机会。

examples.en: Let's get a break and have some coffee.
examples.cn: 让我们休息一下，喝点咖啡。

examples.en: She got a break when she won the lottery.
examples.cn: 她中彩票时交了好运。

examples.en: Sometimes you need to get a break to succeed.
examples.cn: 有时你需要交好运才能成功。

examples.en: He works at a commercial bank in the city.
examples.cn: 他在城市的一家商业银行工作。

examples.en: Commercial banks offer various financial services.
examples.cn: 商业银行提供各种金融服务。

examples.en: I need to fix an appointment with the manager to discuss the project.
examples.cn: 我需要与经理约定时间讨论这个项目。

examples.en: She fixed an appointment with the dentist for next Tuesday.
examples.cn: 她与牙医约定了下周二的时间。

definitions.meaning_cn: 历史视角，从历史背景看待事物的观点

examples.en: Understanding the historical perspective helps us learn from past mistakes.
examples.cn: 理解历史视角有助于我们从过去的错误中学习。

examples.en: The book offers a historical perspective on the development of democracy.
examples.cn: 这本书提供了民主发展的历史视角。

examples.en: I need some time to chew over the job offer before making a decision.
examples.cn: 我需要一些时间仔细考虑这个工作机会再做决定。

examples.en: Let's chew over the proposal and discuss it tomorrow.
examples.cn: 让我们反复思考这个提议，明天再讨论。

examples.en: I'm not tired at all after the long walk.
examples.cn: 长途步行后我一点也不累。

examples.en: She did not understand the instructions at all.
examples.cn: 她完全没理解这些说明。

examples.en: With the new project, I have a pretty heavy workload this month.
examples.cn: 由于新项目，我这个月的工作量相当重。

examples.en: The team is managing a pretty heavy workload during the holiday season.
examples.cn: 团队在假日期间管理着相当重的工作量。

definitions.meaning_cn: 适应新环境或情况，安顿下来

examples.en: It took a few weeks to settle into the new apartment.
examples.cn: 花了几个星期才适应新公寓。

examples.en: She quickly settled into her role as team leader.
examples.cn: 她很快适应了团队领导的角色。

valid_entries.original_phrase: resources at our disposal on the Internet

definitions.meaning_cn: 我们在互联网上可用的资源

examples.en: We have many resources at our disposal on the Internet for research.
examples.cn: 我们在互联网上有许多可用于研究的资源。

examples.en: The resources at our disposal on the Internet make learning more accessible.
examples.cn: 互联网上可用的资源使学习更容易获取。

definitions.meaning_cn: 开架式书库，允许读者直接取阅图书的图书馆区域

examples.en: The library's open stacks allow students to browse books freely.
examples.cn: 图书馆的开架式书库允许学生自由浏览图书。

examples.en: I found the reference book in the open stacks on the second floor.
examples.cn: 我在二楼的开架式书库找到了参考书。

examples.en: We need to book in at the hotel before 6 PM.
examples.cn: 我们需要在下午6点前到酒店登记入住。

examples.en: I'll book in for the conference next week.
examples.cn: 我将预订下周的会议。

examples.en: She flagged down a taxi to get to the airport.
examples.cn: 她挥手示意一辆出租车停下以去机场。

examples.en: We flagged down a bus when we missed the earlier one.
examples.cn: 当我们错过早一班车时，我们挥手示意一辆公交车停下。

definitions.meaning_cn: 误解某事，错误地理解（通常指冒犯）

examples.en: I hope you don't take my comment the wrong way; I meant it as advice.
examples.cn: 我希望你不要误解我的评论；我是想提建议。

examples.en: He took her joke the wrong way and got upset.
examples.cn: 他误解了她的玩笑并感到不安。

examples.en: We can discuss the details later on in the meeting.
examples.cn: 我们可以在会议稍后讨论细节。

examples.en: I'll call you later on to confirm the plans.
examples.cn: 我稍后会打电话给你确认计划。

definitions.meaning_cn: 眼冒金星（因头部受击或震惊）

examples.en: When he hit his head, he saw stars for a moment.
examples.cn: 当他撞到头时，他眼冒金星了一会儿。

examples.en: The sudden fall made her see stars.
examples.cn: 突然的摔倒让她眼冒金星。

examples.en: It's important to maintain balance while riding a bicycle.
examples.cn: 骑自行车时保持平衡很重要。

examples.en: She practices yoga to maintain balance in her life.
examples.cn: 她练习瑜伽以保持生活平衡。

examples.en: Nerve cells transmit signals throughout the body.
examples.cn: 神经细胞在全身传递信号。

examples.en: Damage to nerve cells can affect movement and sensation.
examples.cn: 神经细胞损伤会影响运动和感觉。

examples.en: After the injury, the doctor advised him to take it slow with exercise.
examples.cn: 受伤后，医生建议他锻炼时慢慢来。

examples.en: We decided to take it slow in our new relationship.
examples.cn: 我们决定在我们的新关系中慢慢来。

examples.en: He achieved success at the cost of his health.
examples.cn: 他以健康为代价取得了成功。

examples.en: The company expanded rapidly at the cost of quality control.
examples.cn: 公司以质量控制为代价迅速扩张。

definitions.meaning_cn: 随意使用或对待（常指未经允许）

examples.en: He made free with my belongings without asking.
examples.cn: 他未经允许随意使用我的物品。

examples.en: She made free with the office supplies, which annoyed her colleagues.
examples.cn: 她随意使用办公用品，这惹恼了她的同事。

definitions.meaning_cn: 遗产建筑，具有历史或文化价值的建筑

examples.en: The old church is a protected heritage building.
examples.cn: 这座老教堂是受保护的遗产建筑。

examples.en: Many heritage buildings in the city are open to tourists.
examples.cn: 城市里的许多遗产建筑对游客开放。

examples.en: We are short of time to complete the project.
examples.cn: 我们缺乏时间来完成这个项目。

examples.en: The hospital is short of medical supplies.
examples.cn: 这家医院缺乏医疗用品。

definitions.meaning_cn: 原始森林，未经人类开发的森林

examples.en: The Amazon contains vast areas of virgin forest that have never been logged.
examples.cn: 亚马逊拥有大片从未被砍伐过的原始森林。

examples.en: Conservationists are fighting to protect the last remaining virgin forests in Europe.
examples.cn: 环保主义者正在努力保护欧洲最后剩余的原始森林。

examples.en: The parliamentary session turned into a tedious debate about procedural rules.
examples.cn: 议会会议变成了一场关于程序规则的冗长乏味的辩论。

examples.en: After three hours of tedious debate, the committee still hadn't reached a decision.
examples.cn: 经过三小时冗长乏味的辩论后，委员会仍未做出决定。

examples.en: The farmers celebrated a good harvest after the favorable growing season.
examples.cn: 在有利的生长季节后，农民们庆祝丰收。

examples.en: A good harvest this year should help stabilize food prices in the region.
examples.cn: 今年的丰收应有助于稳定该地区的食品价格。

examples.en: She was exhausted to the point of collapsing after running the marathon.
examples.cn: 跑完马拉松后，她累得几乎要晕倒。

examples.en: His dedication to his work is to the point of neglecting his family.
examples.cn: 他对工作的投入程度到了忽视家庭的地步。

examples.en: Parents often worry about who their teenagers associate with.
examples.cn: 父母常常担心他们的青少年子女与谁交往。

examples.en: In business, it's important to associate with reputable partners.
examples.cn: 在商业中，与信誉良好的伙伴交往很重要。

examples.en: Many people associate the smell of cinnamon with Christmas.
examples.cn: 许多人将肉桂的香味与圣诞节联想在一起。

examples.en: We naturally associate certain colors with specific emotions.
examples.cn: 我们自然会将某些颜色与特定的情感联想在一起。

examples.en: This was one of the coldest winters in the history of the state.
examples.cn: 这是该州历史上最寒冷的冬天之一。

examples.en: In the history of space exploration, the moon landing remains a landmark achievement.
examples.cn: 在太空探索的历史上，登月仍然是一个里程碑式的成就。

examples.en: After years of saving, they can now live comfortably in retirement.
examples.cn: 经过多年的储蓄，他们现在可以在退休后舒适地生活。

examples.en: With his new job, he earns enough to live comfortably in the city.
examples.cn: 有了新工作，他赚的钱足够在城里舒适地生活。

definitions.meaning_cn: 志愿者大军，大批志愿者

examples.en: An army of volunteers helped clean up the park after the festival.
examples.cn: 一支志愿者大军在节日后帮助清理公园。

examples.en: The disaster relief effort was supported by an army of volunteers from across the country.
examples.cn: 救灾工作得到了来自全国各地大批志愿者的支持。

examples.en: She's been in a good mood ever since she got the promotion.
examples.cn: 自从升职以来，她一直心情很好。

examples.en: The sunny weather put everyone in a good mood.
examples.cn: 阳光明媚的天气让每个人都心情愉快。

examples.en: The company's stock took a nose dive after the scandal was revealed.
examples.cn: 丑闻曝光后，该公司的股票急剧下跌。

examples.en: Sales have gone into a nose dive since the new competitor entered the market.
examples.cn: 自从新竞争对手进入市场以来，销售额急剧下降。

examples.en: The plane began to nose dive before the pilot regained control.
examples.cn: 飞机开始俯冲，之后飞行员重新控制了飞机。

examples.en: During the air show, the stunt plane will nose dive from a great height.
examples.cn: 在航空展上，特技飞机将从高空俯冲下来。

examples.en: Please note down the main points from the meeting.
examples.cn: 请记下会议的主要要点。

examples.en: I always note down interesting ideas when they come to me.
examples.cn: 当有趣的想法出现时，我总是把它们记下来。

examples.en: The mother tried to draw away the child's attention from the broken toy.
examples.cn: 母亲试图将孩子的注意力从坏掉的玩具上引开。

examples.en: The decoy was used to draw away the enemy forces.
examples.cn: 诱饵被用来引开敌军。

examples.en: As they grew older, the friends began to draw away from each other.
examples.cn: 随着年龄增长，朋友们开始逐渐疏远。

examples.en: He felt his colleagues draw away after the controversy.
examples.cn: 在争议之后，他感到同事们逐渐疏远了他。

examples.en: I usually get up at 6:30 AM on weekdays.
examples.cn: 我平时工作日通常在早上6:30起床。

examples.en: It's hard to get up early when you've stayed up late.
examples.cn: 熬夜后很难早起。

examples.en: After falling, it took him a moment to get up.
examples.cn: 摔倒后，他花了一会儿才站起来。

examples.en: Please get up when the judge enters the courtroom.
examples.cn: 法官进入法庭时请起立。

examples.en: They managed to get up a charity event in just two weeks.
examples.cn: 他们设法在短短两周内组织了一场慈善活动。

examples.en: We need to get up a committee to address this issue.
examples.cn: 我们需要筹备一个委员会来解决这个问题。

examples.en: The evidence proved his guilt beyond a doubt.
examples.cn: 证据确凿地证明了他的罪行。

examples.en: She is, beyond a doubt, the most qualified candidate for the position.
examples.cn: 毫无疑问，她是这个职位最有资格的候选人。

examples.en: The factory was fined for improperly disposing of toxic chemicals.
examples.cn: 该工厂因不当处理有毒化学品而被罚款。

examples.en: Exposure to toxic chemicals can have serious health consequences.
examples.cn: 接触有毒化学品可能对健康造成严重后果。

definitions.meaning_cn: 感到紧张，心里七上八下

examples.en: I always get butterflies in my stomach before giving a speech.
examples.cn: 演讲前我总是感到紧张。

examples.en: She got butterflies in her stomach when she saw her crush approaching.
examples.cn: 当她看到暗恋对象走近时，心里七上八下的。

examples.en: The student has made great progress in mathematics this semester.
examples.cn: 这学期这名学生在数学方面取得了巨大进步。

examples.en: Our research team has made great progress toward finding a cure.
examples.cn: 我们的研究团队在寻找治疗方法方面取得了巨大进展。

examples.en: I'd like a coffee to go, please.
examples.cn: 请给我一杯外带咖啡。

examples.en: We ordered pizza to go because we wanted to eat at home.
examples.cn: 我们点了外卖披萨，因为想在家吃。

examples.en: There are only two days to go before the deadline.
examples.cn: 距离截止日期只剩下两天了。

examples.en: With three miles to go, the runners were beginning to tire.
examples.cn: 还有三英里要跑，跑步者们开始感到疲劳了。

examples.en: It's time to go; we'll be late if we don't leave now.
examples.cn: 该走了；如果我们现在不离开，就会迟到。

examples.en: I need to go to the store to buy some groceries.
examples.cn: 我需要去商店买些食品杂货。

examples.en: The embassy will hold a reception to welcome the new ambassador.
examples.cn: 大使馆将举行招待会欢迎新大使。

examples.en: After the wedding ceremony, they held a reception at a nearby hotel.
examples.cn: 婚礼仪式后，他们在附近的一家酒店举行了招待会。

examples.en: He backed out of the deal at the last minute.
examples.cn: 他在最后一刻退出了这笔交易。

examples.en: She promised to help but backed out when it got difficult.
examples.cn: 她答应帮忙，但在事情变得困难时却食言了。

examples.en: You need to back out of the driveway carefully.
examples.cn: 你需要小心地从车道上倒车出来。

examples.en: The truck backed out of the loading bay.
examples.cn: 卡车从装卸区倒车出来。

examples.en: If you start this project, you should go all the way and finish it.
examples.cn: 如果你开始这个项目，就应该全力以赴完成它。

examples.en: They went all the way to win the championship.
examples.cn: 他们全力以赴赢得了冠军。

examples.en: They decided to go all the way on their third date.
examples.cn: 他们在第三次约会时决定发生性关系。

examples.en: He wasn't ready to go all the way yet.
examples.cn: 他还没准备好发生性关系。

examples.en: The coach motivated the team to train harder.
examples.cn: 教练激励队伍更加努力地训练。

examples.en: Her success motivated me to pursue my own goals.
examples.cn: 她的成功激励我去追求自己的目标。

examples.en: It's important to do social activities to meet new people.
examples.cn: 参与社交活动以结识新朋友很重要。

examples.en: They do social activities every weekend to relax.
examples.cn: 他们每个周末都参与社交活动来放松。

examples.en: The company is trying to reduce the cost of operation.
examples.cn: 公司正试图降低运营成本。

examples.en: High energy prices increased the cost of operation.
examples.cn: 高能源价格增加了运营成本。

examples.en: Please mark off the items you have completed.
examples.cn: 请标记出你已经完成的项目。

examples.en: They marked off the area for the new garden.
examples.cn: 他们划出了新花园的区域。

examples.en: Let's mark off the occasion with a party.
examples.cn: 让我们用派对来庆祝这个场合。

examples.en: We marked off her birthday with a special dinner.
examples.cn: 我们用一顿特别的晚餐来庆祝她的生日。

examples.en: Universal education is a key goal for many developing countries.
examples.cn: 普及教育是许多发展中国家的关键目标。

examples.en: The government promotes universal education for all children.
examples.cn: 政府推广所有儿童的普及教育。

examples.en: It's important for children to receive a good education.
examples.cn: 孩子们接受良好教育很重要。

examples.en: She received a good education at a prestigious university.
examples.cn: 她在一所著名大学接受了良好教育。

examples.en: He is enrolled in a computer science course.
examples.cn: 他注册了一门计算机科学课程。

examples.en: She is enrolled in the local high school.
examples.cn: 她在当地高中入学。

examples.en: The situation cries out for immediate action.
examples.cn: 这种情况迫切需要立即行动。

examples.en: The old building cries out for renovation.
examples.cn: 这栋旧建筑迫切需要翻新。

examples.en: He cried out for help when he fell.
examples.cn: 他摔倒时大声呼喊求助。

examples.en: The child cried out for his mother.
examples.cn: 孩子大声呼喊他的母亲。

examples.en: She refused to comment on the rumors.
examples.cn: 她拒绝评论这些谣言。

examples.en: The expert will comment on the new policy.
examples.cn: 专家将评论这项新政策。

examples.en: The museum is definitely worth a visit.
examples.cn: 这个博物馆绝对值得一游。

examples.en: This small town is worth a visit for its historic sites.
examples.cn: 这个小镇因其历史遗迹值得一游。

examples.en: Please keep a civil tongue during the debate.
examples.cn: 请在辩论中说话礼貌。

examples.en: He was told to keep a civil tongue in his head.
examples.cn: 他被要求说话要礼貌。

examples.en: We need to go back home before it gets dark.
examples.cn: 我们需要在天黑前回家。

examples.en: He decided to go back to his old job.
examples.cn: 他决定回到他的旧工作。

examples.en: This tradition goes back centuries.
examples.cn: 这个传统可以追溯到几个世纪前。

examples.en: Their friendship goes back to childhood.
examples.cn: 他们的友谊可以追溯到童年。

examples.en: I feel sorry for being late.
examples.cn: 我为迟到感到抱歉。

examples.en: She felt sorry for her mistake.
examples.cn: 她为自己的错误感到抱歉。

examples.en: I feel sorry for the homeless people in winter.
examples.cn: 我同情冬天里的无家可归者。

examples.en: He felt sorry for the injured animal.
examples.cn: 他同情那只受伤的动物。

examples.en: She woke up to the importance of saving money.
examples.cn: 她意识到了存钱的重要性。

examples.en: They woke up to the reality of the situation.
examples.cn: 他们意识到了情况的现实。

examples.en: I woke up to the sound of rain.
examples.cn: 我被雨声唤醒。

examples.en: He woke up to his alarm clock.
examples.cn: 他被闹钟唤醒。

examples.en: She lost her balance and fell on the ice.
examples.cn: 她失去平衡，摔倒在冰上。

examples.en: He lost his balance while climbing the ladder.
examples.cn: 他在爬梯子时失去了平衡。

examples.en: Under pressure, he lost his balance and made a mistake.
examples.cn: 在压力下，他失去镇定并犯了一个错误。

examples.en: The sudden news caused her to lose her balance.
examples.cn: 突然的消息导致她失去镇定。

examples.en: The bank is next to the post office.
examples.cn: 银行在邮局旁边。

examples.en: She sat next to me in class.
examples.cn: 她在课堂上坐在我旁边。

examples.en: It's next to impossible to finish this in one day.
examples.cn: 在一天内完成这几乎是不可能的。

examples.en: He has next to no experience in this field.
examples.cn: 他在这个领域几乎没有经验。

examples.en: This tool is fit for the job.
examples.cn: 这个工具适合这项工作。

examples.en: She is fit for the leadership role.
examples.cn: 她适合领导角色。

examples.en: After training, he is fit for the marathon.
examples.cn: 训练后，他身体健康适合跑马拉松。

examples.en: The doctor said she is fit for work.
examples.cn: 医生说她的身体健康适合工作。

definitions.meaning_cn: 一...就...，表示两个动作紧接着发生

examples.en: No sooner had I arrived than the meeting started.
examples.cn: 我一到，会议就开始了。

examples.en: No sooner did she finish her work than she went to bed.
examples.cn: 她一完成工作就去睡觉了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 灭绝的物种，指在地球上已消失的生物种类

examples.en: The dodo is an extinct species that once lived on Mauritius.
examples.cn: 渡渡鸟是一种曾生活在毛里求斯的灭绝物种。

examples.en: Scientists are working to prevent more animals from becoming extinct species.
examples.cn: 科学家们正在努力防止更多动物成为灭绝物种。

definitions.meaning_cn: 抱怨或诉说（尤指身体不适或问题）

examples.en: The patient complained of a headache and dizziness.
examples.cn: 病人抱怨头痛和头晕。

examples.en: She complained of poor service at the restaurant.
examples.cn: 她抱怨那家餐厅的服务很差。

definitions.meaning_cn: 到目前为止，迄今（常用于否定句或疑问句）

examples.en: As yet, we have not received any response from the company.
examples.cn: 到目前为止，我们还没有收到公司的任何回复。

examples.en: Is there any news as yet about the project's approval?
examples.cn: 关于项目批准，迄今有任何消息吗？

definitions.meaning_cn: 移民到（某国），指永久移居到另一个国家

examples.en: They decided to immigrate to Canada for better job opportunities.
examples.cn: 他们决定移民到加拿大以寻求更好的工作机会。

examples.en: Many people immigrate to the United States in search of a new life.
examples.cn: 许多人移民到美国寻找新生活。

definitions.meaning_cn: 穿得暖和，多穿衣服以保暖

examples.en: It's cold outside, so bundle up before you go out.
examples.cn: 外面很冷，出门前穿暖和点。

examples.en: The children bundled up in coats and scarves for the winter walk.
examples.cn: 孩子们穿上外套和围巾，为冬季散步保暖。

examples.en: In the final race, the athlete decided to go the limit to win.
examples.cn: 在决赛中，运动员决定全力以赴去赢得比赛。

examples.en: When working on this project, we need to go the limit to ensure success.
examples.cn: 在这个项目上，我们需要全力以赴以确保成功。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在现场，实地（指实际地点或情况）

examples.en: Reporters on the ground provided live updates from the disaster area.
examples.cn: 现场的记者从灾区提供了实时更新。

examples.en: The general assessed the situation on the ground before making a decision.
examples.cn: 将军在做出决定前评估了现场情况。

examples.en: This new model is similar to the previous one but with improved features.
examples.cn: 这个新模型与之前的相似，但功能有所改进。

examples.en: Her writing style is similar to that of famous authors.
examples.cn: 她的写作风格类似于著名作家。

examples.en: The hotel is a stone's throw away from the beach, making it very convenient.
examples.cn: 酒店离海滩很近，非常方便。

examples.en: My office is just a stone's throw away from the train station.
examples.cn: 我的办公室离火车站只有一箭之遥。

definitions.meaning_cn: 预料到，指望（常用于否定句，表示意外）

examples.en: I didn't bargain for such bad weather during our vacation.
examples.cn: 我没预料到假期期间天气会这么糟糕。

examples.en: They got more than they bargained for when the project became very complex.
examples.cn: 当项目变得非常复杂时，他们得到的比预料的要多。

valid_entries.original_phrase: hold one's nose to the grindstone

examples.en: During exam week, students have to hold their noses to the grindstone to study.
examples.cn: 考试周期间，学生们必须埋头苦干地学习。

examples.en: He held his nose to the grindstone to finish the report on time.
examples.cn: 他埋头苦干，按时完成了报告。

definitions.meaning_cn: 既然，由于（表示原因或条件）

examples.en: Now that you're here, we can start the meeting.
examples.cn: 既然你来了，我们可以开始会议了。

examples.en: Now that the rain has stopped, we can go for a walk.
examples.cn: 既然雨停了，我们可以去散步了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 垂直线，与水平面垂直的线

examples.en: In geometry, a vertical line goes straight up and down.
examples.cn: 在几何学中，垂直线是直上直下的。

examples.en: The artist drew a vertical line to divide the painting into two parts.
examples.cn: 艺术家画了一条垂直线将画作分成两部分。

examples.en: The car is in excellent condition after the repair.
examples.cn: 修理后，这辆车处于极佳状态。

examples.en: The patient is in stable condition following the surgery.
examples.cn: 手术后，病人处于稳定状态。

definitions.meaning_cn: 听候差遣，为您服务（礼貌用语）

examples.en: The hotel staff is at your service 24 hours a day.
examples.cn: 酒店员工24小时听候您的差遣。

examples.en: If you need any help, I am at your service.
examples.cn: 如果您需要任何帮助，我随时为您服务。

examples.en: Hold on to the railing when walking down the stairs.
examples.cn: 下楼梯时紧紧抓住扶手。

examples.en: She decided to hold on to her old photos for sentimental reasons.
examples.cn: 出于情感原因，她决定保留她的旧照片。

definitions.meaning_cn: 失去...的踪迹，忘记或跟不上

examples.en: I lost track of time while reading that interesting book.
examples.cn: 读那本有趣的书时，我忘记了时间。

examples.en: It's easy to lose track of expenses if you don't keep a budget.
examples.cn: 如果不做预算，很容易忘记开支。

examples.en: This material is resistant to water and heat.
examples.cn: 这种材料耐水和耐热。

examples.en: Some bacteria are resistant to antibiotics, making infections hard to treat.
examples.cn: 一些细菌对抗生素有抵抗力，使得感染难以治疗。

definitions.meaning_cn: 非法利润，通过违法手段获得的收益

examples.en: The company was fined for making illegal profits from fraudulent activities.
examples.cn: 该公司因从欺诈活动中获取非法利润而被罚款。

examples.en: Authorities are cracking down on businesses that earn illegal profits.
examples.cn: 当局正在打击获取非法利润的企业。

examples.en: Michael Jordan is considered the greatest basketball player of all time.
examples.cn: 迈克尔·乔丹被认为是有史以来最伟大的篮球运动员。

examples.en: This is my favorite movie of all time.
examples.cn: 这是我有史以来最喜欢的电影。

examples.en: How soon can you finish the report?
examples.cn: 你多久能完成这份报告？

examples.en: I wonder how soon the package will arrive.
examples.cn: 我想知道包裹多久能到。

examples.en: He always wears a suit to important meetings.
examples.cn: 他总是穿西装参加重要会议。

examples.en: You should wear a suit for the job interview.
examples.cn: 你应该穿西装去参加求职面试。

examples.en: You need to make an application for a visa at the embassy.
examples.cn: 你需要在大使馆申请签证。

examples.en: She made an application to join the club.
examples.cn: 她申请加入俱乐部。

examples.en: After the illness, he was out of condition for weeks.
examples.cn: 生病后，他身体状况不佳了好几周。

examples.en: If you're out of condition, you shouldn't try to run a marathon.
examples.cn: 如果你身体状况不佳，就不应该尝试跑马拉松。

examples.en: We visited the art gallery to see the new exhibition.
examples.cn: 我们参观了美术馆看新展览。

examples.en: The local art gallery features works by regional artists.
examples.cn: 当地美术馆展出地区艺术家的作品。

examples.en: Many companies do business internationally.
examples.cn: 许多公司在国际上做生意。

examples.en: It's important to trust the people you do business with.
examples.cn: 信任与你做生意的人很重要。

examples.en: Work deadlines are a major source of stress for many people.
examples.cn: 工作截止日期是许多人的主要压力来源。

examples.en: Financial problems can be a significant source of stress.
examples.cn: 财务问题可能是一个重要的压力来源。

examples.en: I'll look in on my way home from work.
examples.cn: 我下班回家时会顺便拜访一下。

examples.en: Can you look in on the baby while I'm out?
examples.cn: 我不在的时候你能顺便看看宝宝吗？

examples.en: The students were distracted by the noise outside.
examples.cn: 学生们被外面的噪音分心了。

examples.en: Don't be distracted by social media while working.
examples.cn: 工作时不要被社交媒体分心。

examples.en: Feel free to drop in anytime you're in the neighborhood.
examples.cn: 你任何时候在附近都可以顺便来拜访。

examples.en: She dropped in for a cup of coffee yesterday.
examples.cn: 她昨天顺便来喝了杯咖啡。

examples.en: The flight was canceled due to bad weather.
examples.cn: 由于恶劣天气，航班被取消了。

examples.en: His success is largely due to hard work.
examples.cn: 他的成功很大程度上是由于努力工作。

examples.en: Tourists stream into the city during the summer.
examples.cn: 夏季游客涌入这座城市。

examples.en: Sunlight streamed into the room through the window.
examples.cn: 阳光透过窗户流入房间。

examples.en: Poor communication can lead to misunderstandings.
examples.cn: 沟通不畅可能导致误解。

examples.en: Regular exercise leads to better health.
examples.cn: 定期锻炼能带来更好的健康。

examples.en: Her approach is distinct from traditional methods.
examples.cn: 她的方法有别于传统方法。

examples.en: The two species are distinct from each other.
examples.cn: 这两个物种彼此不同。

examples.en: They decided to move away from the city for a quieter life.
examples.cn: 他们决定搬离城市去过更安静的生活。

examples.en: Please move away from the edge of the platform.
examples.cn: 请从站台边缘移开。

examples.en: He was forced to sign the contract against his will.
examples.cn: 他被迫违背自己的意愿签署了合同。

examples.en: It's illegal to detain someone against their will.
examples.cn: 违背他人意愿拘留他人是违法的。

examples.en: She took a sip of her coffee before answering.
examples.cn: 她喝了一小口咖啡才回答。

examples.en: He took a sip of water to clear his throat.
examples.cn: 他喝了一小口水清嗓子。

examples.en: We should all strive for excellence in our work.
examples.cn: 我们都应该在工作中力求卓越。

examples.en: The team strives for perfection in every project.
examples.cn: 团队在每个项目中都力求完美。

examples.en: I didn't mean to hurt your feelings.
examples.cn: 我不是有意伤害你的感情。

examples.en: What do you mean to do about the problem?
examples.cn: 你打算怎么处理这个问题？

examples.en: The dog began to show aggression when the stranger approached.
examples.cn: 当陌生人靠近时，狗开始表现出攻击性。

examples.en: In negotiations, it's unwise to show aggression too early.
examples.cn: 在谈判中，过早表现出攻击性是不明智的。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在体育或竞争中展现强势

examples.en: The team needs to show aggression on the field to win this match.
examples.cn: 球队需要在球场上展现强势才能赢得这场比赛。

examples.en: He showed aggression in the debate, dominating the conversation.
examples.cn: 他在辩论中展现出攻击性，主导了对话。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take the liberty of doing sth.

definitions.meaning_cn: 冒昧地做某事，通常用于礼貌地表示未经允许的行动

examples.en: I took the liberty of booking a table for us at the restaurant.
examples.cn: 我冒昧地在餐厅为我们预订了一张桌子。

examples.en: She took the liberty of correcting the error in the report without asking.
examples.cn: 她未经允许就冒昧地纠正了报告中的错误。

definitions.meaning_cn: 稳定的职业，指工作安全、收入可靠

examples.en: Many people seek a stable career in government jobs.
examples.cn: 许多人寻求在政府工作中获得稳定的职业。

examples.en: After years of freelancing, she wanted a stable career with benefits.
examples.cn: 经过多年的自由职业，她想要一份有福利的稳定职业。

examples.en: After hours of arguing, he finally gave in and agreed to her terms.
examples.cn: 经过数小时的争论，他终于屈服并同意了她的条件。

examples.en: Don't give in to peer pressure; stand by your principles.
examples.cn: 不要屈服于同辈压力，坚持你的原则。

examples.en: Please give in your assignments by Friday.
examples.cn: 请在周五前提交你的作业。

examples.en: He gave in his resignation letter yesterday.
examples.cn: 他昨天提交了辞职信。

examples.en: The police ran him in for speeding.
examples.cn: 警察因超速逮捕了他。

examples.en: They ran the suspect in after finding evidence at the scene.
examples.cn: 在现场找到证据后，他们逮捕了嫌疑人。

valid_entries.original_phrase: work one's fingers to the bone

definitions.meaning_cn: 非常努力地工作，通常指体力劳动

examples.en: She worked her fingers to the bone to support her family.
examples.cn: 她非常努力地工作来养家糊口。

examples.en: Farmers often work their fingers to the bone during harvest season.
examples.cn: 农民在收获季节常常非常努力地工作。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对...造成损害或负面影响

examples.en: The stress of the job is taking its toll on his health.
examples.cn: 工作的压力正在损害他的健康。

examples.en: Years of neglect have taken their toll on the old building.
examples.cn: 多年的疏忽对这栋旧建筑造成了损害。

examples.en: The new product line is expected to create revenues for the company.
examples.cn: 新产品线预计将为公司创造收入。

examples.en: Innovative strategies can help create revenues in a competitive market.
examples.cn: 创新策略可以在竞争激烈的市场中帮助创造收入。

examples.en: The government aims to regulate spending to reduce the budget deficit.
examples.cn: 政府旨在控制支出以减少预算赤字。

examples.en: Families should regulate spending to avoid debt.
examples.cn: 家庭应控制支出以避免债务。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get a load off one's mind

definitions.meaning_cn: 卸下心理负担，感到轻松

examples.en: After finishing the project, he got a load off his mind.
examples.cn: 完成项目后，他卸下了心理负担。

examples.en: Talking to a friend can help get a load off your mind.
examples.cn: 与朋友交谈可以帮助你卸下心理负担。

valid_entries.original_phrase: go to the trouble to do sth.

examples.en: She went to the trouble to bake a cake for the party.
examples.cn: 她不辞辛苦地为聚会烤了一个蛋糕。

examples.en: He went to the trouble to research all the options before deciding.
examples.cn: 他在决定前不辞辛苦地研究了所有选项。

definitions.meaning_cn: 借出，通常指物品或人员暂时离开原处

examples.en: The book is out on loan and will be back next week.
examples.cn: 这本书已借出，下周归还。

examples.en: The player is out on loan to another team for the season.
examples.cn: 这名球员本赛季被租借到另一支球队。

examples.en: She made a great impression at the job interview.
examples.cn: 她在工作面试中留下了很好的印象。

examples.en: His speech made a lasting impression on the audience.
examples.cn: 他的演讲给观众留下了持久的印象。

definitions.meaning_cn: 春假，通常指学校在春季的假期

examples.en: Many students travel during spring break.
examples.cn: 许多学生在春假期间旅行。

examples.en: The university will be closed for spring break next week.
examples.cn: 大学下周将因春假关闭。

examples.en: Be prepared for bad weather during the hike.
examples.cn: 为徒步旅行期间的恶劣天气做好准备。

examples.en: She was prepared for any questions in the meeting.
examples.cn: 她为会议中的任何问题做好了准备。

examples.en: He got a bright idea to solve the problem quickly.
examples.cn: 他想到一个好主意来快速解决问题。

examples.en: While brainstorming, she got a bright idea for the project.
examples.cn: 在头脑风暴时，她为项目想到了一个好主意。

definitions.meaning_cn: 不活跃的生活方式，缺乏运动

examples.en: An inactive lifestyle can lead to health problems like obesity.
examples.cn: 不活跃的生活方式可能导致健康问题，如肥胖。

examples.en: He changed from an inactive lifestyle to exercising regularly.
examples.cn: 他从不活跃的生活方式改为定期锻炼。

examples.en: Check the weather report before planning your outdoor activities.
examples.cn: 在计划户外活动前查看天气预报。

examples.en: The weather report predicts rain for tomorrow.
examples.cn: 天气预报预测明天下雨。

examples.en: The parliament is responsible for making laws in the country.
examples.cn: 议会负责制定国家的法律。

examples.en: It takes time and debate to make laws that are fair and effective.
examples.cn: 制定公平有效的法律需要时间和辩论。

definitions.meaning_cn: 愿意做某事，表示乐意或准备做某事

examples.en: She is willing to help with the project.
examples.cn: 她愿意帮忙做这个项目。

examples.en: Are you willing to relocate for the job?
examples.cn: 你愿意为这份工作搬家吗？

definitions.meaning_cn: 寻求，追求，为了寻找某物或达到某个目标

examples.en: They set out in quest of adventure.
examples.cn: 他们出发去寻求冒险。

examples.en: He traveled in quest of knowledge.
examples.cn: 他旅行以追求知识。

definitions.meaning_cn: 从容应对，轻松处理困难或意外情况

examples.en: She took the criticism in her stride.
examples.cn: 她从容地接受了批评。

examples.en: He takes setbacks in his stride and keeps going.
examples.cn: 他轻松应对挫折并继续前进。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在...的时候，表示某个特定时间点

examples.en: At the time of the accident, he was at home.
examples.cn: 事故发生时，他在家。

examples.en: She was young at the time of her first book.
examples.cn: 她出版第一本书时还很年轻。

definitions.meaning_cn: 偶然遇到或发现，不期而遇

examples.en: I ran across an old friend at the mall.
examples.cn: 我在商场偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

examples.en: She ran across some interesting facts in her research.
examples.cn: 她在研究中偶然发现了一些有趣的事实。

definitions.meaning_cn: 育儿风格，指父母抚养孩子的方式或方法

examples.en: Different parenting styles can affect child development.
examples.cn: 不同的育儿风格会影响儿童发展。

examples.en: Authoritative parenting styles are often recommended.
examples.cn: 权威型育儿风格常被推荐。

definitions.meaning_cn: 感到紧张或害怕，通常指因恐惧或不安而产生的感觉

examples.en: That horror movie gave me the willies.
examples.cn: 那部恐怖电影让我感到害怕。

examples.en: Walking alone at night gets me the willies.
examples.cn: 晚上独自走路让我感到紧张。

definitions.meaning_cn: 破产，倒闭，指企业或项目失败

examples.en: The company went bust after the financial crisis.
examples.cn: 金融危机后，这家公司破产了。

examples.en: Many startups go bust within the first year.
examples.cn: 许多初创公司在第一年内倒闭。

examples.en: She prefers to work at home to avoid commuting.
examples.cn: 她更喜欢在家工作以避免通勤。

examples.en: Many people work at home due to the pandemic.
examples.cn: 由于疫情，许多人在家工作。

examples.en: That face looks familiar, but I can't place it.
examples.cn: 那张脸看起来很熟悉，但我记不起来。

examples.en: Does this street look familiar to you?
examples.cn: 这条街对你来说看起来熟悉吗？

definitions.meaning_cn: 行星形成，指行星从宇宙尘埃和气体中诞生的过程

examples.en: Scientists study planet formation in young star systems.
examples.cn: 科学家研究年轻恒星系统中的行星形成。

examples.en: Planet formation involves accretion of material.
examples.cn: 行星形成涉及物质的吸积。

definitions.meaning_cn: 划出，标记出，指定或区分某物

examples.en: They marked out the boundaries of the property.
examples.cn: 他们划出了财产的边界。

examples.en: His talent marks him out as a future leader.
examples.cn: 他的才能使他脱颖而出，成为未来的领导者。

definitions.meaning_cn: 将...与...比较，指出相似或差异

examples.en: Compare this model with the older version.
examples.cn: 将这个型号与旧版本进行比较。

examples.en: She compared her results with the national average.
examples.cn: 她将自己的结果与全国平均水平进行了比较。

definitions.meaning_cn: 做某事有困难，难以完成某事

examples.en: I have trouble sleeping at night.
examples.cn: 我晚上难以入睡。

examples.en: He has trouble understanding complex instructions.
examples.cn: 他难以理解复杂的指示。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take one's hat off to sb.

definitions.meaning_cn: 向某人致敬，表示钦佩或尊重

examples.en: I take my hat off to her for her dedication.
examples.cn: 我向她的奉献精神致敬。

examples.en: We take our hats off to the volunteers.
examples.cn: 我们向志愿者们致敬。

definitions.meaning_cn: 结识某人，与某人初次见面

examples.en: I made his acquaintance at a conference.
examples.cn: 我在一次会议上结识了他。

examples.en: She was pleased to make your acquaintance.
examples.cn: 她很高兴认识你。

definitions.meaning_cn: 倒计时，倒数时间直到某个事件发生

examples.en: We count down to New Year's Eve.
examples.cn: 我们倒计时到新年前夜。

examples.en: The team counted down the seconds until launch.
examples.cn: 团队倒数秒数直到发射。

definitions.meaning_cn: 提升到，晋升到某个职位或地位

examples.en: His elevation to CEO was announced yesterday.
examples.cn: 他晋升为CEO的消息昨天宣布了。

examples.en: The elevation to a higher rank requires hard work.
examples.cn: 晋升到更高职位需要努力工作。

definitions.meaning_cn: 代表，代理，为某人或某组织行事

examples.en: The lawyer will act for the defendant in court.
examples.cn: 律师将在法庭上代表被告。

examples.en: She acts for several clients in real estate deals.
examples.cn: 她在房地产交易中代表几位客户。

definitions.meaning_cn: 坚守阵地，保持立场，不退缩

examples.en: The soldiers held the line against the attack.
examples.cn: 士兵们坚守阵地抵御攻击。

examples.en: We must hold the line on our principles.
examples.cn: 我们必须坚守我们的原则。

examples.en: She tries to balance work and family commitments by working flexible hours.
examples.cn: 她通过弹性工作时间来平衡工作和家庭责任。

examples.en: Many professionals struggle to balance work and family commitments effectively.
examples.cn: 许多专业人士难以有效平衡工作和家庭责任。

examples.en: I hope you get well soon after your surgery.
examples.cn: 我希望你手术后能尽快康复。

examples.en: She sent a card to wish him to get well quickly.
examples.cn: 她寄了一张卡片，祝他早日康复。

examples.en: As manager, she has the authority to approve budget requests.
examples.cn: 作为经理，她有权批准预算请求。

examples.en: Only the CEO has the authority to sign such contracts.
examples.cn: 只有首席执行官有权签署此类合同。

definitions.meaning_cn: 坚持自己的权利或观点，自信地表达自己

examples.en: In meetings, he learned to assert himself to ensure his ideas were heard.
examples.cn: 在会议中，他学会了坚持自己以确保自己的想法被听到。

examples.en: She needed to assert herself more in negotiations to get a better deal.
examples.cn: 她需要在谈判中更自信地表达自己以获得更好的交易。

examples.en: Please take notice of the safety instructions before starting the machine.
examples.cn: 启动机器前，请注意安全说明。

examples.en: The government should take notice of public opinion on this issue.
examples.cn: 政府应关注公众对此问题的意见。

definitions.meaning_cn: 解雇通知（尤指粉红色的解雇单）

examples.en: He received a pink slip after the company downsized.
examples.cn: 公司裁员后，他收到了解雇通知。

examples.en: Many employees fear getting a pink slip during economic downturns.
examples.cn: 许多员工在经济低迷时期害怕收到解雇通知。

examples.en: She has had a crush on her classmate since high school.
examples.cn: 她从高中起就一直暗恋她的同学。

examples.en: He admitted to having a crush on the new intern at work.
examples.cn: 他承认迷恋上了公司的新实习生。

valid_entries.original_phrase: give sth. a lick and a promise

definitions.meaning_cn: 草草了事，马马虎虎地做一下

examples.en: He gave the car a lick and a promise instead of a proper wash.
examples.cn: 他只是马马虎虎地擦了一下车，没有好好清洗。

examples.en: She gave her homework a lick and a promise, so it was full of errors.
examples.cn: 她草草完成了作业，所以错误百出。

definitions.meaning_cn: 根本，完全（用于否定句或疑问句强调）

examples.en: I don't understand this concept at all.
examples.cn: 我完全不明白这个概念。

examples.en: Are you interested in this topic at all?
examples.cn: 你对这个话题有一点兴趣吗？

examples.en: Darkness fell upon the village as the sun set.
examples.cn: 太阳落山时，黑暗降临了村庄。

examples.en: Misfortune fell upon the family after the accident.
examples.cn: 事故后，不幸降临到了这个家庭。

examples.en: While hiking, we fell upon a beautiful hidden waterfall.
examples.cn: 徒步时，我们偶然发现了一个美丽的隐藏瀑布。

examples.en: She fell upon an old diary in the attic.
examples.cn: 她在阁楼上偶然发现了一本旧日记。

examples.en: He will go for the interview tomorrow morning at 10 AM.
examples.cn: 他明天上午10点将去参加面试。

examples.en: Make sure to prepare well before you go for the interview.
examples.cn: 去参加面试前，一定要好好准备。

examples.en: He prefers driving a car with manual gear for better control.
examples.cn: 他更喜欢开手动挡的车，以便更好地控制。

examples.en: Learning to use manual gear can be challenging for new drivers.
examples.cn: 学习使用手动挡对新司机来说可能很有挑战性。

examples.en: Parents should keep a close watch on their children's online activities.
examples.cn: 家长应密切监视孩子的在线活动。

examples.en: The police are keeping a close watch on the suspect's movements.
examples.cn: 警方正在密切监视嫌疑人的动向。

examples.en: I had to cancel my reservation at the hotel due to a change in plans.
examples.cn: 由于计划变更，我不得不取消酒店的预订。

examples.en: Please call to cancel your reservation at least 24 hours in advance.
examples.cn: 请至少提前24小时打电话取消您的预订。

examples.en: The city plans to broaden roads to reduce traffic congestion.
examples.cn: 该市计划拓宽道路以减少交通拥堵。

examples.en: Broadening roads can improve safety and flow for vehicles.
examples.cn: 拓宽道路可以提高车辆的安全性和流动性。

examples.en: I often mistake her for her twin sister because they look so similar.
examples.cn: 我经常把她误认为是她的双胞胎姐妹，因为她们长得太像了。

examples.en: Don't mistake his silence for agreement; he might be thinking.
examples.cn: 不要把他的沉默误认为是同意；他可能在思考。

examples.en: We had a productive meeting and resolved all the key issues.
examples.cn: 我们开了一个富有成效的会议，解决了所有关键问题。

examples.en: A productive meeting should result in clear action items.
examples.cn: 一个富有成效的会议应该产生明确的行事项目。

examples.en: Please fill out the application form and submit it by the deadline.
examples.cn: 请填写申请表并在截止日期前提交。

examples.en: The job application form requires details about your work experience.
examples.cn: 工作申请表需要你提供工作经历的详细信息。

examples.en: The book fell out of my bag while I was running.
examples.cn: 我跑步时，书从包里掉了出来。

examples.en: He fell out of favor with his boss after the mistake.
examples.cn: 犯错后，他失去了老板的青睐。

examples.en: She fell out of the habit of exercising daily.
examples.cn: 她不再保持每天锻炼的习惯了。

examples.en: Many people fall out of touch with old friends over time.
examples.cn: 随着时间的推移，许多人与老朋友失去了联系。

examples.en: The baby spit out the mashed peas immediately.
examples.cn: 婴儿立刻把豌豆泥吐了出来。

examples.en: He spit out the bitter medicine with a grimace.
examples.cn: 他苦着脸把苦药吐了出来。

examples.en: She spit out the angry words before she could stop herself.
examples.cn: 她没来得及阻止自己就愤怒地脱口而出。

examples.en: He spit out the answer under pressure during the quiz.
examples.cn: 在测验的压力下，他快速说出了答案。

definitions.meaning_cn: 推荐某人或某物适合某个职位或用途

examples.en: I recommend this book for beginners in programming.
examples.cn: 我推荐这本书给编程初学者。

examples.en: She recommended him for the manager position due to his leadership skills.
examples.cn: 由于他的领导能力，她推荐他担任经理职位。

definitions.meaning_cn: 建议采取某种行动或措施

examples.en: The doctor recommended rest for a speedy recovery.
examples.cn: 医生建议休息以快速康复。

examples.en: They recommended caution for investors in the volatile market.
examples.cn: 他们建议投资者在波动市场中保持谨慎。

examples.en: The project's success was a result of our joint effort.
examples.cn: 项目的成功是我们共同努力的结果。

examples.en: International joint effort is needed to tackle climate change.
examples.cn: 应对气候变化需要国际共同努力。

definitions.meaning_cn: 因惊讶或困惑而再看一眼

examples.en: I did a double-take when I saw my teacher at the concert.
examples.cn: 当我在音乐会上看到我的老师时，我惊讶地又看了一眼。

examples.en: She did a double-take at the unexpected news.
examples.cn: 她对这意外的消息感到困惑，又看了一遍。

examples.en: The children take turns playing with the toy.
examples.cn: 孩子们轮流玩这个玩具。

examples.en: We take turns driving on long road trips.
examples.cn: 在长途公路旅行中，我们轮流开车。

examples.en: He is sick with the flu and needs to rest.
examples.cn: 他患了流感，需要休息。

examples.en: She was sick with anxiety before the exam.
examples.cn: 考试前她焦虑得生病了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 因某事而感到恶心或厌恶

examples.en: I am sick with worry about my missing cat.
examples.cn: 我担心我失踪的猫，感到恶心。

examples.en: He was sick with guilt after the mistake.
examples.cn: 犯错后，他因内疚而感到不适。

examples.en: The fire is now under control thanks to the firefighters.
examples.cn: 多亏了消防员，火势现在已得到控制。

examples.en: Keep your emotions under control during the negotiation.
examples.cn: 在谈判期间保持情绪受控。

examples.en: The prosecutor is assembling a case against the suspect.
examples.cn: 检察官正在收集证据以起诉嫌疑人。

examples.en: They assembled a strong case against the company for fraud.
examples.cn: 他们收集了强有力的证据起诉该公司欺诈。

examples.en: She gained a reputation as a reliable employee.
examples.cn: 她获得了可靠员工的名声。

examples.en: The restaurant gained a reputation as the best in town.
examples.cn: 这家餐厅获得了镇上最佳的名声。

definitions.meaning_cn: 度过有意义的时光，通常与家人或朋友一起

examples.en: We spend quality time together every weekend.
examples.cn: 我们每个周末都一起度过有意义的时光。

examples.en: He makes sure to spend quality time with his children.
examples.cn: 他确保与孩子们度过有意义的时光。

examples.en: He decided to join the army after high school.
examples.cn: 高中毕业后，他决定参军。

examples.en: Many young people join the army to serve their country.
examples.cn: 许多年轻人参军以报效国家。

examples.en: Keep your spending in check to save money.
examples.cn: 控制你的开支以节省金钱。

examples.en: The manager keeps the team's progress in check.
examples.cn: 经理控制团队的进展。

examples.en: The resort is open all year round for tourists.
examples.cn: 这个度假村全年对游客开放。

examples.en: She works hard all year round to achieve her goals.
examples.cn: 她全年努力工作以实现目标。

definitions.meaning_cn: 加入某人的事业或支持某人的观点，通常指跟风

examples.en: Many politicians got on the environmental bandwagon after the protests.
examples.cn: 抗议后，许多政治家加入了环保的潮流。

examples.en: Don't just get on his bandwagon without thinking critically.
examples.cn: 不要不加批判地跟风支持他的观点。

definitions.meaning_cn: 基因库，一个种群中所有基因的集合

examples.en: Conservation efforts aim to protect the gene pool of endangered species.
examples.cn: 保护工作旨在保护濒危物种的基因库。

examples.en: A diverse gene pool helps populations adapt to changes.
examples.cn: 多样化的基因库有助于种群适应变化。

examples.en: Reducing greenhouse gas emissions is crucial to combat climate change.
examples.cn: 减少温室气体排放对应对气候变化至关重要。

examples.en: The report highlights the increase in greenhouse gas emissions from industries.
examples.cn: 报告强调了工业温室气体排放的增加。

examples.en: The thief ran away with the valuable painting.
examples.cn: 小偷带着珍贵的画逃跑了。

examples.en: They ran away with each other to start a new life.
examples.cn: 他们私奔以开始新生活。

examples.en: The team ran away with the championship trophy.
examples.cn: 这个队轻易赢得了冠军奖杯。

examples.en: She ran away with first place in the race.
examples.cn: 她在比赛中轻松获得第一名。

examples.en: Please go on with your presentation despite the interruption.
examples.cn: 尽管有干扰，请继续你的演示。

examples.en: He decided to go on with his studies abroad.
examples.cn: 他决定继续在国外学习。

definitions.meaning_cn: 初次尝试某事，涉足新领域

examples.en: I'm getting my feet wet in the stock market by investing a small amount.
examples.cn: 我通过投资一小笔钱来初次尝试股市。

examples.en: She got her feet wet in journalism by writing for the school newspaper.
examples.cn: 她通过为校报写作来涉足新闻业。

examples.en: Take this advice as a guideline for your project.
examples.cn: 将这个建议视为你项目的指导方针。

examples.en: I take his silence as agreement.
examples.cn: 我将他的沉默视为同意。

definitions.meaning_cn: 接受某物作为报酬或补偿

examples.en: He took the job as a stepping stone to his career.
examples.cn: 他接受这份工作作为职业生涯的垫脚石。

examples.en: She took the apology as enough and forgave him.
examples.cn: 她接受道歉作为足够补偿并原谅了他。

examples.en: She made a thing of the small stain on her dress.
examples.cn: 她对裙子上的小污渍小题大做。

examples.en: Don't make a thing of it; it was just a minor mistake.
examples.cn: 别小题大做，这只是个小错误。

definitions.meaning_cn: 使成为重要事件或仪式

examples.en: They made a thing of celebrating their anniversary every year.
examples.cn: 他们把每年的周年纪念日都办得很隆重。

examples.en: He made a thing of his morning coffee routine.
examples.cn: 他把早上的咖啡习惯搞得像仪式一样。

examples.en: Scientists extract DNA from blood samples.
examples.cn: 科学家从血液样本中提取DNA。

examples.en: She extracted a key piece of information from the report.
examples.cn: 她从报告中提取了一个关键信息。

examples.en: The author extracted a quote from Shakespeare's play.
examples.cn: 作者从莎士比亚的戏剧中引用了一段话。

examples.en: He extracted several paragraphs from the document for his presentation.
examples.cn: 他从文件中摘录了几段用于他的演示。

examples.en: She has the ability to speak three languages fluently.
examples.cn: 她有流利说三种语言的能力。

examples.en: The ability to adapt is crucial in today's fast-paced world.
examples.cn: 在当今快节奏的世界中，适应能力至关重要。

examples.en: For all his wealth, he is not happy.
examples.cn: 尽管他很有钱，但他并不快乐。

examples.en: For all her efforts, she still failed the exam.
examples.cn: 尽管她努力了，考试还是没及格。

examples.en: This park is open for all visitors.
examples.cn: 这个公园对所有游客开放。

examples.en: The charity event is for all who wish to contribute.
examples.cn: 这次慈善活动面向所有愿意贡献的人。

examples.en: Everyone joined in the singing at the party.
examples.cn: 派对上每个人都加入了唱歌。

examples.en: Feel free to join in the discussion if you have ideas.
examples.cn: 如果你有想法，请随时加入讨论。

examples.en: I can visualize him winning the race.
examples.cn: 我可以想象他赢得比赛。

examples.en: She visualized her team completing the project successfully.
examples.cn: 她想象她的团队成功完成了项目。

examples.en: He won't take that insult lying down.
examples.cn: 他不会默默忍受那种侮辱。

examples.en: She refused to take the unfair treatment lying down.
examples.cn: 她拒绝逆来顺受地接受不公平待遇。

examples.en: My opinion differs from yours on this matter.
examples.cn: 在这个问题上，我的意见与你的不同。

examples.en: The new model differs from the old one in several ways.
examples.cn: 新模型在几个方面与旧模型不同。

examples.en: The driver was at fault for the accident.
examples.cn: 司机对这起事故负有责任。

examples.en: If the machine breaks, who is at fault?
examples.cn: 如果机器坏了，谁有过错？

examples.en: The city has seen a rise in youth crimes recently.
examples.cn: 最近该市的青少年犯罪有所增加。

examples.en: Programs are in place to prevent youth crimes in the community.
examples.cn: 社区有项目旨在预防青少年犯罪。

examples.en: He must have taken leave of his senses to quit such a good job.
examples.cn: 他一定是失去理智了，才会辞掉这么好的工作。

examples.en: If you think that's a good idea, you've taken leave of your senses.
examples.cn: 如果你认为那是个好主意，你就是发疯了。

examples.en: She decided to major in biology at university.
examples.cn: 她决定在大学主修生物学。

examples.en: He majored in computer science and now works as a software engineer.
examples.cn: 他主修计算机科学，现在是一名软件工程师。

examples.en: She is without doubt the best candidate for the job.
examples.cn: 她毫无疑问是这份工作的最佳人选。

examples.en: This is without doubt the most beautiful place I've ever seen.
examples.cn: 这毫无疑问是我见过的最美的地方。

examples.en: Her attitude toward work is very positive.
examples.cn: 她对工作的态度非常积极。

examples.en: We need to change our attitude toward environmental issues.
examples.cn: 我们需要改变对环境问题的态度。

examples.en: The old factory has been out of use for years.
examples.cn: 这家旧工厂已经废弃多年了。

examples.en: This software is out of use due to security issues.
examples.cn: 由于安全问题，这个软件已不再使用。

examples.en: The children made faces at each other during class.
examples.cn: 孩子们在课上互相做鬼脸。

examples.en: He made a funny face to cheer her up.
examples.cn: 他做了个滑稽的鬼脸来让她高兴起来。

examples.en: The plants are grown in an artificial environment to control conditions.
examples.cn: 这些植物在人工环境中种植以控制条件。

examples.en: Scientists study animal behavior in artificial environments.
examples.cn: 科学家在人工环境中研究动物行为。

examples.en: After the setback, the company managed to bounce back quickly.
examples.cn: 遭遇挫折后，公司迅速恢复了。

examples.en: She bounced back from her illness and returned to work.
examples.cn: 她从疾病中恢复过来，回到了工作岗位。

examples.en: He spilled the drink on purpose to get attention.
examples.cn: 他故意打翻饮料以引起注意。

examples.en: She ignored him on purpose because she was angry.
examples.cn: 她因为生气故意不理他。

examples.en: A host of problems arose during the project.
examples.cn: 项目期间出现了大量问题。

examples.en: She received a host of compliments on her performance.
examples.cn: 她的表演收到了许多赞扬。

examples.en: He lost face when he failed the exam in front of his peers.
examples.cn: 他在同龄人面前考试不及格，丢了脸。

examples.en: The company lost face after the scandal was exposed.
examples.cn: 丑闻曝光后，公司失掉了面子。

examples.en: They set sail for the Caribbean at dawn.
examples.cn: 他们在黎明时分启航前往加勒比海。

examples.en: The ship set sail from the harbor yesterday.
examples.cn: 这艘船昨天从港口开船了。

examples.en: The decision was based upon thorough research.
examples.cn: 这个决定是基于彻底的研究。

examples.en: Her theory is based upon years of observation.
examples.cn: 她的理论是基于多年的观察。

examples.en: How old is your daughter?
examples.cn: 你女儿多大了？

examples.en: I wonder how old that building is.
examples.cn: 我想知道那栋建筑有多老了。

examples.en: She met with her advisor to discuss the project.
examples.cn: 她与导师会面讨论项目。

examples.en: The plan met with strong opposition from the community.
examples.cn: 这个计划遭遇了社区的强烈反对。

examples.en: The main point at issue is the budget allocation.
examples.cn: 争论的主要焦点是预算分配。

examples.en: Her qualifications are not at issue; it's her attitude that concerns us.
examples.cn: 她的资格没有争议；我们担心的是她的态度。

examples.en: I'm on my way to the airport to pick up a friend.
examples.cn: 我在去机场接朋友的路上。

examples.en: She stopped for coffee on her way to work.
examples.cn: 她在去上班的路上停下来喝了咖啡。

examples.en: He managed to finish the report on time despite the distractions.
examples.cn: 尽管有干扰，他还是设法按时完成了报告。

examples.en: They managed to secure funding for the new project.
examples.cn: 他们设法为新项目争取到了资金。

examples.en: She worked her way through the difficult textbook chapter by chapter.
examples.cn: 她一章一章地努力完成了那本难懂的教科书。

examples.en: He worked his way through the crowd to reach the stage.
examples.cn: 他努力穿过人群到达舞台。

examples.en: You need a parking permit to park in this lot overnight.
examples.cn: 你需要停车许可证才能在这个停车场过夜停车。

examples.en: The university issues parking permits to students and staff.
examples.cn: 大学向学生和员工发放停车许可证。

examples.en: She threw herself into her studies and graduated with honors.
examples.cn: 她全力以赴地学习，以优异成绩毕业。

examples.en: After the loss, he threw himself into his work to cope.
examples.cn: 失败后，他投身于工作来应对。

examples.en: I found a parking place near the entrance of the mall.
examples.cn: 我在商场入口附近找到了一个停车位。

examples.en: The city has designated new parking places for electric vehicles.
examples.cn: 城市为电动汽车指定了新的停车位。

examples.en: His actions run counter to the company's ethical guidelines.
examples.cn: 他的行为与公司的道德准则相违背。

examples.en: The new policy runs counter to public opinion.
examples.cn: 新政策与公众意见相反。

examples.en: The company amassed debt during the economic downturn.
examples.cn: 公司在经济衰退期间积累了债务。

examples.en: He amassed debt from multiple credit cards and loans.
examples.cn: 他从多张信用卡和贷款中积累了债务。

examples.en: The king sent forth his army to defend the borders.
examples.cn: 国王派遣军队保卫边境。

examples.en: The organization sends forth volunteers to assist in disaster areas.
examples.cn: 该组织派遣志愿者协助灾区。

examples.en: She changed the old dress into a stylish skirt.
examples.cn: 她把旧连衣裙变成了一条时尚的裙子。

examples.en: The magician changed the rabbit into a dove.
examples.cn: 魔术师把兔子变成了鸽子。

examples.en: I finally set my hand on that rare book I've been searching for.
examples.cn: 我终于找到了我一直在寻找的那本稀有书籍。

examples.en: He set his hand on a great investment opportunity last year.
examples.cn: 他去年获得了一个很好的投资机会。

examples.en: She takes after her mother in both looks and personality.
examples.cn: 她在长相和性格上都像她的母亲。

examples.en: He takes after his grandfather, who was also a talented musician.
examples.cn: 他像他的祖父，也是一位有才华的音乐家。

examples.en: She called out her colleague for taking credit for her work.
examples.cn: 她公开指责同事窃取她的工作成果。

examples.en: The manager called out the team's lack of preparation.
examples.cn: 经理公开批评团队准备不足。

examples.en: He called out the fire department when he saw smoke.
examples.cn: 他看到烟时召唤了消防部门。

examples.en: The teacher called out for volunteers to help with the event.
examples.cn: 老师请求志愿者帮忙组织活动。

examples.en: The loud noise called out the neighbors from their homes.
examples.cn: 巨大的噪音使邻居们从家里出来。

examples.en: The investigation called out the truth about the incident.
examples.cn: 调查揭露了事件的真相。

valid_entries.original_phrase: get sth. into one's thick head

definitions.meaning_cn: 让某人理解或记住某事（常用于表达不耐烦）

examples.en: I've told him three times, but he can't get it into his thick head.
examples.cn: 我已经告诉他三次了，但他就是记不住。

examples.en: She needs to get the safety rules into her thick head before starting the job.
examples.cn: 她需要在开始工作前理解安全规则。

examples.en: There is an extra cost for shipping to remote areas.
examples.cn: 运送到偏远地区有额外费用。

examples.en: The hotel charges an extra cost for late check-out.
examples.cn: 酒店对延迟退房收取额外费用。

examples.en: She took a fancy to the antique vase in the shop.
examples.cn: 她喜欢上了店里的古董花瓶。

examples.en: He took a fancy to learning French after his trip to Paris.
examples.cn: 巴黎之行后，他对学习法语产生了兴趣。

examples.en: You should see doctors if you have persistent symptoms.
examples.cn: 如果症状持续，你应该去看医生。

examples.en: She sees doctors regularly for her chronic condition.
examples.cn: 她因慢性病定期就医。

examples.en: Efforts to preserve language diversity are crucial for cultural heritage.
examples.cn: 保护语言多样性的努力对文化遗产至关重要。

examples.en: The organization works to preserve language diversity in indigenous communities.
examples.cn: 该组织致力于保护土著社区的语言多样性。

examples.en: He buys items in bulk and sells them on at a profit.
examples.cn: 他批量购买物品并转售获利。

examples.en: The company sells on its products through various online platforms.
examples.cn: 公司通过多个在线平台继续销售其产品。

examples.en: She sold him on the idea of investing in renewable energy.
examples.cn: 她说服他投资可再生能源。

examples.en: The presentation sold the team on the new strategy.
examples.cn: 演示使团队相信了新策略。

definitions.meaning_cn: 拥有...的访问权或使用权

examples.en: Employees have access to confidential files.
examples.cn: 员工有权访问机密文件。

examples.en: Students have access to the library's online resources.
examples.cn: 学生可以使用图书馆的在线资源。

examples.en: Italy is famous for its delicious cuisine.
examples.cn: 意大利以其美味佳肴而闻名。

examples.en: She is famous for her contributions to science.
examples.cn: 她因对科学的贡献而闻名。

examples.en: Climate change has a significant impact on global ecosystems.
examples.cn: 气候变化对全球生态系统有重大影响。

examples.en: The new policy will have a significant impact on the economy.
examples.cn: 新政策将对经济产生重大影响。

examples.en: He saved money so as to buy a new car.
examples.cn: 他存钱是为了买一辆新车。

examples.en: She studied hard so as to pass the exam.
examples.cn: 她努力学习以便通过考试。

examples.en: They played a joke on their friend by hiding his keys.
examples.cn: 他们通过藏起朋友的钥匙来开他的玩笑。

examples.en: She loves to play jokes on her siblings.
examples.cn: 她喜欢开兄弟姐妹的玩笑。

examples.en: Please check the flight schedule for any delays.
examples.cn: 请查看航班时刻表以了解是否有延误。

examples.en: The airline updated its flight schedule for the holiday season.
examples.cn: 航空公司更新了假日季节的航班时刻表。

examples.en: He established a reputation as a reliable consultant.
examples.cn: 他建立了作为可靠顾问的声誉。

examples.en: The company established a reputation as an innovator in technology.
examples.cn: 公司建立了作为技术革新者的声誉。

examples.en: They engage in volunteer work every weekend.
examples.cn: 他们每个周末都参与志愿工作。

examples.en: The countries agreed to engage in peaceful negotiations.
examples.cn: 各国同意进行和平谈判。

examples.en: I took him for a tourist because of his camera.
examples.cn: 我因为他的相机误认为他是游客。

examples.en: She took the new employee for an intern at first.
examples.cn: 她起初误认为新员工是实习生。

examples.en: He took his children for a walk in the park.
examples.cn: 他带孩子们去公园散步。

examples.en: She took her friend for dinner at a fancy restaurant.
examples.cn: 她带朋友去一家高档餐厅吃饭。

valid_entries.original_phrase: give a good account of oneself

definitions.meaning_cn: 表现出色或为自己争光

examples.en: In the competition, she gave a good account of herself and won a medal.
examples.cn: 在比赛中，她表现出色并赢得了一枚奖牌。

examples.en: He gave a good account of himself during the job interview.
examples.cn: 他在工作面试中为自己争光。

examples.en: He decided to stay on at the company for another year.
examples.cn: 他决定在公司再待一年。

examples.en: The light stayed on all night by mistake.
examples.cn: 灯误开了一整夜。

examples.en: She stayed on the task until it was completed.
examples.cn: 她继续做任务直到完成。

examples.en: The team stayed on the project despite challenges.
examples.cn: 尽管有挑战，团队继续推进项目。

examples.en: A man by the name of John called for you.
examples.cn: 一个名叫约翰的男人打电话找你。

examples.en: She met a artist by the name of Picasso in Paris.
examples.cn: 她在巴黎遇到了一位名叫毕加索的艺术家。

examples.en: We need to get moving if we want to arrive on time.
examples.cn: 如果我们想准时到达，就需要开始行动了。

examples.en: Get moving, or you'll be late for school!
examples.cn: 动身吧，否则你上学要迟到了！

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事有发言权或参与决策

examples.en: Employees should have a voice in company policies.
examples.cn: 员工应在公司政策上有发言权。

examples.en: Citizens want to have a voice in local government decisions.
examples.cn: 公民希望在地方政府决策中有发言权。

examples.en: Time seems to slip by when you're having fun.
examples.cn: 当你玩得开心时，时间似乎悄悄流逝。

examples.en: The thief managed to slip by the security guard unnoticed.
examples.cn: 小偷设法悄悄溜过保安，未被察觉。

examples.en: Don't let this opportunity slip by; it's rare.
examples.cn: 不要让这个机会溜走；它很罕见。

examples.en: I let the deadline slip by because I was too busy.
examples.cn: 我错过了截止日期，因为我太忙了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 旅行支票，一种用于旅行的预付票据

examples.en: She used traveller's cheques to pay for her hotel in Europe.
examples.cn: 她用旅行支票支付了在欧洲的酒店费用。

examples.en: Traveller's cheques are safer than carrying large amounts of cash.
examples.cn: 旅行支票比携带大量现金更安全。

examples.en: The mountain looks beautiful at a distance.
examples.cn: 那座山在远处看起来很美丽。

examples.en: Keep at a distance from the wild animals for safety.
examples.cn: 为了安全，与野生动物保持距离。

examples.en: After the argument, they kept each other at a distance.
examples.cn: 争吵后，他们彼此保持距离。

examples.en: He prefers to observe social issues at a distance.
examples.cn: 他更喜欢从远处观察社会问题。

examples.en: Please arrange the files in sequence by date.
examples.cn: 请按日期顺序排列文件。

examples.en: The numbers should be listed in sequence from 1 to 10.
examples.cn: 数字应按从1到10的顺序列出。

examples.en: Can you tidy up your room before guests arrive?
examples.cn: 你能在客人到来前整理好你的房间吗？

examples.en: She tidied up the kitchen after cooking dinner.
examples.cn: 她做完晚餐后整理了厨房。

valid_entries.original_phrase: cooperate with sb. in doing sth.

examples.en: We need to cooperate with our partners in launching the new product.
examples.cn: 我们需要与合作伙伴合作推出新产品。

examples.en: The two companies cooperated in developing the software.
examples.cn: 两家公司合作开发了这款软件。

examples.en: He had a dispute with his neighbor over the property line.
examples.cn: 他与邻居就财产界线发生了争执。

examples.en: The union is in dispute with management about wages.
examples.cn: 工会与管理层就工资问题发生争执。

definitions.meaning_cn: 人际交往能力，处理人际关系的技巧

examples.en: Good interpersonal skills are essential for a team leader.
examples.cn: 良好的人际交往能力对团队领导至关重要。

examples.en: She improved her interpersonal skills through communication workshops.
examples.cn: 她通过沟通研讨会提高了人际交往能力。

examples.en: The manager called a meeting to discuss the project deadline.
examples.cn: 经理召集会议讨论项目截止日期。

examples.en: We need to call a meeting to address the budget issues.
examples.cn: 我们需要召集会议解决预算问题。

examples.en: We went to the airport to send off our friend who was moving abroad.
examples.cn: 我们去机场送别移居国外的朋友。

examples.en: The team sent off their coach with a farewell party.
examples.cn: 团队用告别派对送别了他们的教练。

examples.en: Please send off the package by express mail.
examples.cn: 请用快递寄出包裹。

examples.en: He sent off the application form yesterday.
examples.cn: 他昨天寄出了申请表。

examples.en: The spy entered the country under the disguise of a tourist.
examples.cn: 间谍以游客的伪装进入该国。

examples.en: He criticized the policy under the disguise of offering advice.
examples.cn: 他以提供建议为名批评了这项政策。

examples.en: The new clinic provides easier access to medical services for rural residents.
examples.cn: 新诊所为农村居民提供了更容易的医疗服务。

examples.en: Telemedicine offers easier access to medical services from home.
examples.cn: 远程医疗提供了在家更容易获得医疗服务的方式。

examples.en: I need a couple of minutes to finish this task.
examples.cn: 我需要几分钟来完成这个任务。

examples.en: She bought a couple of apples at the market.
examples.cn: 她在市场买了几个苹果。

examples.en: To save money, he denied himself the luxury of eating out.
examples.cn: 为了省钱，他克制了自己外出就餐的奢侈。

examples.en: She denied herself sweets to maintain a healthy diet.
examples.cn: 她为了保持健康饮食放弃了甜食。

examples.en: Can you give me a hand with moving this furniture?
examples.cn: 你能帮我搬一下这件家具吗？

examples.en: She always gives a hand to her neighbors in need.
examples.cn: 她总是帮助有需要的邻居。

examples.en: It's important to keep a record of all business transactions.
examples.cn: 记录所有商业交易很重要。

examples.en: She keeps a record of her daily expenses in a notebook.
examples.cn: 她在笔记本上记录每日开支。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被诱惑做某事，很想做某事

examples.en: I was tempted to buy the expensive dress, but I resisted.
examples.cn: 我很想买那件昂贵的裙子，但我忍住了。

examples.en: He is tempted to skip work and go to the beach.
examples.cn: 他很想翘班去海滩。

examples.en: After he helped me fix my car, I felt I was in his debt.
examples.cn: 他帮我修车后，我觉得欠他一个人情。

examples.en: She is in her friend's debt for the loan during hard times.
examples.cn: 她因困难时期的朋友贷款而欠债。

definitions.meaning_cn: 误解某事，对某事感到不快

examples.en: I hope you won't take my criticism amiss; I only meant to help.
examples.cn: 我希望你不会误解我的批评；我只是想帮忙。

examples.en: She took his joke amiss and didn't speak to him for days.
examples.cn: 她误解了他的玩笑，好几天没和他说话。

examples.en: Many customers are dissatisfied with the slow service at the restaurant.
examples.cn: 许多顾客对餐厅的缓慢服务不满意。

examples.en: He was dissatisfied with his performance in the exam and decided to study harder.
examples.cn: 他对自己的考试成绩不满意，决定更加努力学习。

examples.en: She takes care of her elderly parents every day.
examples.cn: 她每天照顾年迈的父母。

examples.en: I'll take care of the paperwork while you handle the meeting.
examples.cn: 你处理会议时，我会处理文书工作。

examples.en: Our team will take care of all the logistics for the event.
examples.cn: 我们的团队将负责活动的所有后勤工作。

examples.en: He took care of the payment so we could proceed with the project.
examples.cn: 他负责付款，这样我们才能继续项目。

definitions.meaning_cn: 了解某人的底细或意图

examples.en: After working with him for years, I have his number and know when he's bluffing.
examples.cn: 与他共事多年后，我了解他的底细，知道他在虚张声势。

examples.en: The detective had the suspect's number and quickly solved the case.
examples.cn: 侦探了解嫌疑人的底细，迅速破案。

examples.en: He got the old heave-ho from his job after missing too many deadlines.
examples.cn: 他因错过太多截止日期而被解雇。

examples.en: The noisy partygoers got the old heave-ho from the hotel manager.
examples.cn: 吵闹的派对参与者被酒店经理赶了出去。

examples.en: At the start of the movie, the main character is introduced.
examples.cn: 电影开始时，主角被介绍出场。

examples.en: We met at the start of the conference and became friends.
examples.cn: 我们在会议开始时相遇并成为朋友。

examples.en: Plants need sunlight during daylight hours to grow properly.
examples.cn: 植物在白天需要阳光才能正常生长。

examples.en: We prefer to travel during daylight hours for safety reasons.
examples.cn: 出于安全考虑，我们更喜欢在白天旅行。

examples.en: I came across an old photo album while cleaning the attic.
examples.cn: 我在清理阁楼时偶然发现了一本旧相册。

examples.en: She came across a rare book in the library.
examples.cn: 她在图书馆偶然发现了一本稀有书籍。

examples.en: He comes across as very confident in interviews.
examples.cn: 他在面试中给人非常自信的印象。

examples.en: The new policy comes across as unfair to many employees.
examples.cn: 新政策给许多员工留下了不公平的印象。

definitions.meaning_cn: 园艺技能，擅长种植植物

examples.en: My grandmother has a green thumb; her garden is always full of flowers.
examples.cn: 我祖母有园艺技能；她的花园总是开满鲜花。

examples.en: With his green thumb, he can grow vegetables even in poor soil.
examples.cn: 凭借他的园艺技能，他即使在贫瘠的土壤中也能种出蔬菜。

examples.en: The loud noise scared off the birds from the tree.
examples.cn: 巨大的噪音吓跑了树上的鸟。

examples.en: High prices might scare off potential buyers.
examples.cn: 高价格可能会吓跑潜在买家。

examples.en: The hurricane wiped out entire villages along the coast.
examples.cn: 飓风彻底摧毁了沿海的整个村庄。

examples.en: The disease wiped out a large portion of the population.
examples.cn: 这种疾病消灭了大部分人口。

examples.en: The long hike wiped me out, and I slept for hours.
examples.cn: 长途徒步让我筋疲力尽，我睡了几个小时。

examples.en: Working two jobs can wipe you out quickly.
examples.cn: 做两份工作很快就会让你筋疲力尽。

definitions.meaning_cn: 语言实验室，用于语言学习的设施

examples.en: Students practice pronunciation in the language lab every week.
examples.cn: 学生每周在语言实验室练习发音。

examples.en: The university upgraded its language lab with new computers and software.
examples.cn: 大学用新电脑和软件升级了语言实验室。

definitions.meaning_cn: 悄悄离开，避免引人注意

examples.en: When the argument started, he made himself scarce to avoid trouble.
examples.cn: 争论开始时，他悄悄离开以避免麻烦。

examples.en: She made herself scarce during the boring meeting.
examples.cn: 在无聊的会议期间，她悄悄离开了。

examples.en: I need some advice on how to improve my resume.
examples.cn: 我需要一些关于如何改进简历的建议。

examples.en: She gave me excellent advice on investing in stocks.
examples.cn: 她给了我关于投资股票的绝佳建议。

examples.en: She is both intelligent and hardworking.
examples.cn: 她既聪明又勤奋。

examples.en: The movie was both entertaining and thought-provoking.
examples.cn: 这部电影既娱乐又发人深省。

examples.en: I bumped into an old friend at the supermarket yesterday.
examples.cn: 我昨天在超市偶然遇见了一位老朋友。

examples.en: We bumped into each other at the conference and had a nice chat.
examples.cn: 我们在会议上偶然相遇，愉快地聊了聊。

examples.en: He wasn't looking and bumped into the door.
examples.cn: 他没看路，撞到了门上。

examples.en: The car bumped into a tree but no one was hurt.
examples.cn: 汽车撞到了一棵树，但没人受伤。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have them rolling in the aisles

examples.en: The comedian's jokes had them rolling in the aisles all night.
examples.cn: 喜剧演员的笑话让观众整晚捧腹大笑。

examples.en: His funny story had everyone rolling in the aisles at the party.
examples.cn: 他有趣的故事让派对上的每个人都捧腹大笑。

examples.en: She made no bones about her dislike for the new policy.
examples.cn: 她直言不讳地表达了对新政策的不满。

examples.en: He made no bones about wanting a promotion as soon as possible.
examples.cn: 他毫不掩饰地想尽快获得晋升。

examples.en: Please pay attention to the safety instructions before starting the machine.
examples.cn: 启动机器前，请注意安全说明。

examples.en: Teachers should pay attention to each student's individual needs.
examples.cn: 老师应关注每个学生的个体需求。

examples.en: I wouldn't trade my family for the world.
examples.cn: 我无论如何都不会用我的家庭做交易。

examples.en: She wouldn't reveal the secret for the world.
examples.cn: 她绝对不会泄露这个秘密。

examples.en: They are working for the world's peace.
examples.cn: 他们正在为世界和平而努力。

examples.en: This charity aims to provide clean water for the world.
examples.cn: 这个慈善机构旨在为全世界提供清洁用水。

examples.en: The country is experiencing a severe economic recession.
examples.cn: 该国正在经历严重的经济衰退。

examples.en: Many businesses closed during the economic recession.
examples.cn: 许多企业在经济衰退期间倒闭了。

examples.en: He is very fussy about his food.
examples.cn: 他对食物非常挑剔。

examples.en: She is fussy about the cleanliness of her house.
examples.cn: 她对房子的清洁度很讲究。

examples.en: We faced obstacles at every turn.
examples.cn: 我们处处都遇到障碍。

examples.en: He was criticized at every turn for his decisions.
examples.cn: 他的决定每次都受到批评。

examples.en: Children love blowing soap bubbles.
examples.cn: 孩子们喜欢吹肥皂泡。

examples.en: The soap bubble popped when it touched the ground.
examples.cn: 肥皂泡碰到地面就破了。

examples.en: His dreams were like soap bubbles, beautiful but fleeting.
examples.cn: 他的梦想就像肥皂泡，美丽但短暂。

examples.en: The economic boom turned out to be a soap bubble.
examples.cn: 经济繁荣结果只是一个肥皂泡。

examples.en: She was buzzing about the office all morning.
examples.cn: 她整个上午都在办公室里四处奔走。

examples.en: The workers buzzed about to finish the project on time.
examples.cn: 工人们忙碌着按时完成项目。

examples.en: People are buzzing about the new policy.
examples.cn: 人们对新政策议论纷纷。

examples.en: The town buzzed about the celebrity's visit.
examples.cn: 镇上对这位名人的来访议论纷纷。

examples.en: The guide led on the tourists through the forest.
examples.cn: 导游带领游客穿过森林。

examples.en: He led on the team to victory.
examples.cn: 他带领团队走向胜利。

examples.en: She felt he had led her on with false promises.
examples.cn: 她觉得他用虚假的承诺欺骗了她。

examples.en: Don't lead on your friends with lies.
examples.cn: 不要用谎言误导你的朋友。

examples.en: The program matches interests of students with suitable courses.
examples.cn: 这个项目将学生的兴趣与合适的课程匹配。

examples.en: We try to match interests in our dating service.
examples.cn: 在我们的约会服务中，我们尝试匹配兴趣。

examples.en: Regular exercise can boost our health significantly.
examples.cn: 定期锻炼可以显著促进我们的健康。

examples.en: Eating fruits and vegetables helps boost our health.
examples.cn: 吃水果和蔬菜有助于促进我们的健康。

examples.en: The company aims to foster innovation among its employees.
examples.cn: 该公司旨在培养员工的创新精神。

examples.en: Schools should foster innovation in students.
examples.cn: 学校应该培养学生的创新精神。

examples.en: Government intervention is necessary in times of crisis.
examples.cn: 在危机时期，政府干预是必要的。

examples.en: The market was stabilized by government intervention.
examples.cn: 市场通过政府干预得以稳定。

examples.en: She will attend the conference next week.
examples.cn: 她下周将参加会议。

examples.en: Many experts attended the conference on climate change.
examples.cn: 许多专家参加了气候变化会议。

examples.en: The medication has some side effects like dizziness.
examples.cn: 这种药物有一些副作用，比如头晕。

examples.en: He experienced side effects after the treatment.
examples.cn: 他在治疗后出现了副作用。

examples.en: A side effect of the new policy was increased traffic.
examples.cn: 新政策的一个附带影响是交通增加。

examples.en: The economic plan had unintended side effects.
examples.cn: 经济计划产生了意想不到的附带影响。

examples.en: He grabbed at the rope to save himself.
examples.cn: 他试图抓住绳子以自救。

examples.en: The child grabbed at the toy on the shelf.
examples.cn: 孩子试图抓住架子上的玩具。

examples.en: She grabbed at the chance to study abroad.
examples.cn: 她急切地接受了出国留学的机会。

examples.en: They grabbed at the offer without hesitation.
examples.cn: 他们毫不犹豫地急切接受了这个提议。

examples.en: He had his dander up when he heard the news.
examples.cn: 他听到这个消息时生气了。

examples.en: Don't get your dander up over small things.
examples.cn: 不要为小事发怒。

examples.en: She is engaged in research at the university.
examples.cn: 她在大学从事研究工作。

examples.en: They are engaged in a heated discussion.
examples.cn: 他们正在进行激烈的讨论。

examples.en: People think he has bats in his belfry because of his odd behavior.
examples.cn: 人们认为他行为古怪，疯疯癫癫的。

examples.en: She must have bats in her belfry to believe such stories.
examples.cn: 她一定是疯疯癫癫的才会相信这样的故事。

examples.en: The boss gave him the old heave-ho for being late.
examples.cn: 老板因为他迟到而解雇了他。

examples.en: She got the old heave-ho from her job yesterday.
examples.cn: 她昨天被工作开除了。

examples.en: He gave his girlfriend the old heave-ho after the argument.
examples.cn: 争吵后，他甩掉了他的女朋友。

examples.en: She decided to give her lazy roommate the old heave-ho.
examples.cn: 她决定抛弃她懒惰的室友。

examples.en: Our company is in cooperation with several international partners on this project.
examples.cn: 我们公司在这个项目上与几家国际合作伙伴合作。

examples.en: The university is in cooperation with local industries to provide internships.
examples.cn: 这所大学与当地产业合作提供实习机会。

examples.en: I'll get back to you with the details by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我明天会回复你详细情况。

examples.en: Can you get back to me after the meeting?
examples.cn: 会议结束后你能回复我吗？

examples.en: After the vacation, it's hard to get back to work.
examples.cn: 假期后很难回到工作状态。

examples.en: She wants to get back to painting after her injury heals.
examples.cn: 她希望在伤愈后重新开始绘画。

examples.en: I like to hang out with my friends on weekends.
examples.cn: 我喜欢在周末和朋友们一起闲逛。

examples.en: He hangs out with his colleagues after work sometimes.
examples.cn: 他有时下班后和同事们一起消磨时间。

examples.en: The police held back the crowd from entering the building.
examples.cn: 警察阻止人群进入大楼。

examples.en: She held back her tears during the sad movie.
examples.cn: 在看悲伤电影时，她抑制住了眼泪。

examples.en: Don't hold back any information during the investigation.
examples.cn: 在调查期间不要隐瞒任何信息。

examples.en: He held back his opinion until everyone had spoken.
examples.cn: 他保留了自己的意见，直到每个人都发言完毕。

examples.en: No one was happy with the decision, least of all the employees.
examples.cn: 没有人对这个决定感到满意，尤其是员工们。

examples.en: I don't like any of these options, least of all the most expensive one.
examples.cn: 我不喜欢这些选项中的任何一个，尤其不喜欢最贵的那个。

examples.en: The library has a wide range of reference materials for researchers.
examples.cn: 图书馆为研究人员提供了广泛的参考资料。

examples.en: Please consult the reference materials before writing your report.
examples.cn: 在写报告之前，请查阅参考资料。

examples.en: The factory produces goods in quantity to meet demand.
examples.cn: 工厂大量生产商品以满足需求。

examples.en: We buy supplies in quantity to get a discount.
examples.cn: 我们大批购买物资以获得折扣。

examples.en: I used to play soccer when I was younger.
examples.cn: 我年轻时常常踢足球。

examples.en: She used to live in New York before moving here.
examples.cn: 在搬到这里之前，她过去住在纽约。

examples.en: He is used to waking up early for work.
examples.cn: 他习惯于早起工作。

examples.en: They are used to the cold weather after living here for years.
examples.cn: 在这里住了多年后，他们习惯了寒冷的天气。

examples.en: He is every inch a professional in his field.
examples.cn: 他在自己的领域完全是个专业人士。

examples.en: The room was decorated every inch with care.
examples.cn: 这个房间被彻底精心装饰过。

examples.en: It's rude to jump a queue at the supermarket.
examples.cn: 在超市插队是很粗鲁的。

examples.en: He tried to jump the queue, but the people behind him complained.
examples.cn: 他试图插队，但后面的人抱怨了。

examples.en: Let's square up the bill before we leave the restaurant.
examples.cn: 我们离开餐厅前把账单结清吧。

examples.en: He squared up his debts with the bank last month.
examples.cn: 他上个月与银行结清了债务。

examples.en: The two boxers squared up in the ring.
examples.cn: 两位拳击手在拳击台上摆好了打斗姿势。

examples.en: They squared up to each other after the argument.
examples.cn: 争论后，他们摆好姿势准备打架。

examples.en: The new evidence bears directly on the outcome of the trial.
examples.cn: 新证据直接关系到审判的结果。

examples.en: Economic factors bear heavily on consumer spending.
examples.cn: 经济因素严重影响消费者支出。

definitions.meaning_cn: 给某人一个机会，放过某人

examples.en: Give him a break; he's new to the job.
examples.cn: 给他一个机会吧；他对这份工作还不熟悉。

examples.en: The teacher gave the student a break and didn't punish him.
examples.cn: 老师放过了那个学生，没有惩罚他。

examples.en: I need to give myself a break from all this stress.
examples.cn: 我需要从所有这些压力中休息一下。

examples.en: Give your eyes a break from the computer screen.
examples.cn: 让你的眼睛从电脑屏幕上休息一下。

examples.en: Can you translate this document into French?
examples.cn: 你能把这份文件翻译成法语吗？

examples.en: She translates novels from English into Chinese.
examples.cn: 她把英文小说翻译成中文。

examples.en: We need to translate our ideas into action.
examples.cn: 我们需要把想法转化为行动。

examples.en: The company aims to translate research into commercial products.
examples.cn: 公司旨在将研究转化为商业产品。

examples.en: I'm on my way to the airport now.
examples.cn: 我现在正在去机场的路上。

examples.en: She called to say she's on her way home.
examples.cn: 她打电话说她正在回家的路上。

examples.en: The project is on its way to completion.
examples.cn: 这个项目即将完成。

examples.en: He is on his way to becoming a successful entrepreneur.
examples.cn: 他即将成为一名成功的企业家。

valid_entries.original_phrase: prevention is more important than the cure

examples.en: In healthcare, prevention is more important than the cure to avoid diseases.
examples.cn: 在医疗保健中，预防胜于治疗以避免疾病。

examples.en: For environmental issues, prevention is more important than the cure to reduce pollution.
examples.cn: 对于环境问题，预防胜于治疗以减少污染。

examples.en: The book treats of various philosophical topics in depth.
examples.cn: 这本书深入论述了各种哲学主题。

examples.en: His lecture treated of the history of ancient civilizations.
examples.cn: 他的讲座讨论了古代文明的历史。

examples.en: The kids get ants in their pants before a school trip.
examples.cn: 孩子们在学校旅行前坐立不安。

examples.en: He had ants in his pants waiting for the exam results.
examples.cn: 他在等待考试结果时焦躁不安。

examples.en: Outside of work, she enjoys hiking and reading.
examples.cn: 工作之外，她喜欢徒步和阅读。

examples.en: We have no plans outside of the scheduled meetings.
examples.cn: 除了预定的会议，我们没有其他计划。

examples.en: Many consumers buy more than they need during sales, leading to waste.
examples.cn: 许多消费者在促销期间购买超过所需，导致浪费。

examples.en: To save money, avoid buying more than they need for daily essentials.
examples.cn: 为了省钱，避免购买超过日常必需品所需的数量。

examples.en: Companies sometimes buy more than they need to secure bulk discounts.
examples.cn: 公司有时会过度采购以获得批量折扣。

examples.en: It's inefficient to buy more than they need, as it ties up capital in inventory.
examples.cn: 过度采购效率低下，因为它将资金困在库存中。

examples.en: Please shut down the computer before leaving the office.
examples.cn: 离开办公室前请关闭电脑。

examples.en: The factory had to shut down temporarily for maintenance.
examples.cn: 工厂不得不暂时关闭进行维护。

examples.en: The small business was forced to shut down due to financial losses.
examples.cn: 这家小企业因财务亏损被迫停止运营。

examples.en: The event was shut down early because of bad weather.
examples.cn: 由于恶劣天气，活动提前停止。

examples.en: He shut down the critic with a well-reasoned argument.
examples.cn: 他用一个有理有据的论点让批评者闭嘴。

examples.en: She quickly shut down the rumor by providing evidence.
examples.cn: 她通过提供证据迅速平息了谣言。

examples.en: Students are required to attend courses regularly to pass the semester.
examples.cn: 学生需要定期参加课程才能通过学期。

examples.en: She plans to attend courses online to improve her skills.
examples.cn: 她计划在线参加课程以提高技能。

examples.en: After the announcement, stock prices went through the roof.
examples.cn: 公告发布后，股价急剧上升。

examples.en: Demand for the new product went through the roof during the holiday season.
