examples.cn: 假日期间，新产品的需求急剧上升。

examples.en: When he heard the news, his temper went through the roof.
examples.cn: 当他听到这个消息时，他的脾气失控了。

examples.en: She went through the roof after finding out about the mistake.
examples.cn: 发现错误后，她非常愤怒。

definitions.meaning_cn: 祝一切顺利（告别或祝福语）

examples.en: All the best in your new job!
examples.cn: 祝你在新工作中一切顺利！

examples.en: I wish you all the best for your future endeavors.
examples.cn: 我祝你未来一切顺利。

examples.en: She enrolled in a statistics course to better analyze data for her research.
examples.cn: 她报名了统计学课程，以便更好地分析研究数据。

examples.en: The statistics course covers topics like probability and regression analysis.
examples.cn: 统计学课程涵盖概率和回归分析等主题。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take the bull by the horns

examples.en: He decided to take the bull by the horns and address the issue directly.
examples.cn: 他决定勇敢面对，直接解决这个问题。

examples.en: To succeed, you must take the bull by the horns and overcome obstacles.
examples.cn: 要成功，你必须勇敢面对并克服障碍。

examples.en: We need to tie the marketing campaign in to the product launch date.
examples.cn: 我们需要将营销活动与产品发布日期联系起来。

examples.en: The report ties the findings in to broader industry trends.
examples.cn: 报告将发现与更广泛的行业趋势整合起来。

examples.en: She tied her schedule in to the team's deadlines.
examples.cn: 她将自己的日程与团队的截止日期协调一致。

examples.en: The new policy is tied in to environmental regulations.
examples.cn: 新政策与环境法规协调一致。

examples.en: After the fall, his shoulder was out of joint and required medical attention.
examples.cn: 摔倒后，他的肩膀脱臼了，需要医疗护理。

examples.en: The doctor said the bone is out of joint and needs to be reset.
examples.cn: 医生说骨头脱臼了，需要复位。

examples.en: The recent changes have thrown the entire system out of joint.
examples.cn: 最近的变化使整个系统陷入混乱。

examples.en: His priorities seem out of joint with the company's goals.
examples.cn: 他的优先事项似乎与公司的目标不一致。

examples.en: Strong research skills are essential for writing a credible thesis.
examples.cn: 强大的研究技能对于撰写可信的论文至关重要。

examples.en: The job requires candidates to demonstrate excellent research skills.
examples.cn: 这份工作要求候选人展示出色的研究技能。

examples.en: In future, please submit reports by the deadline.
examples.cn: 将来，请按时提交报告。

examples.en: We plan to expand our services in future.
examples.cn: 我们计划未来扩展我们的服务。

examples.en: Rapid technological change is transforming industries worldwide.
examples.cn: 快速的技术变革正在改变全球产业。

examples.en: Companies must adapt to technological change to stay competitive.
examples.cn: 公司必须适应技术变革以保持竞争力。

examples.en: The project will take two weeks at the most.
examples.cn: 这个项目最多需要两周时间。

examples.en: We expect at the most ten participants for the workshop.
examples.cn: 我们预计最多有十名参与者参加研讨会。

examples.en: He supported her all the way through the difficult process.
examples.cn: 在整个困难过程中，他一直支持她。

examples.en: We drove all the way from New York to California.
examples.cn: 我们从纽约一直开车到加利福尼亚。

examples.en: She went all the way and finished the marathon despite the pain.
examples.cn: 尽管疼痛，她彻底完成了马拉松。

examples.en: I agree with you all the way on this decision.
examples.cn: 在这个决定上，我完全同意你。

examples.en: Feel free to drop by my office if you have any questions.
examples.cn: 如果你有任何问题，随时可以顺便来我办公室。

examples.en: I'll drop by the store on my way home to pick up some groceries.
examples.cn: 我回家路上会顺便去商店买些杂货。

examples.en: She is busy with her homework and can't join us tonight.
examples.cn: 她忙于做作业，今晚不能加入我们。

examples.en: The team is busy with preparations for the upcoming conference.
examples.cn: 团队正忙于准备即将到来的会议。

examples.en: After getting approval, we can go ahead with the project.
examples.cn: 获得批准后，我们可以继续进行这个项目。

examples.en: Despite the risks, they decided to go ahead with the plan.
examples.cn: 尽管有风险，他们决定继续进行这个计划。

examples.en: He studied hard to improve his grade in math.
examples.cn: 他努力学习以提高数学成绩。

examples.en: Extra tutoring helped her improve her grade from a B to an A.
examples.cn: 额外的辅导帮助她将成绩从B提高到A。

examples.en: She volunteers at the shelter year in and year out.
examples.cn: 她年复一年地在收容所做志愿者。

examples.en: The company has been profitable year in and year out for decades.
examples.cn: 几十年来，公司年复一年地盈利。

examples.en: You need to open a bank account to receive your salary.
examples.cn: 你需要开设一个银行账户来接收工资。

examples.en: She opened a bank account with a local branch yesterday.
examples.cn: 她昨天在当地分行开了一个银行账户。

examples.en: I usually get off work at 6 PM.
examples.cn: 我通常下午6点下班。

examples.en: He got off work early to attend his daughter's recital.
examples.cn: 他提前下班去参加女儿的演奏会。

examples.en: The government plans to enact laws to protect the environment.
examples.cn: 政府计划颁布法律来保护环境。

examples.en: Parliament enacted new laws to regulate online commerce.
examples.cn: 议会颁布了新法律来规范在线商务。

examples.en: The patient managed to sit up in bed after the surgery.
examples.cn: 手术后，病人设法在床上坐了起来。

examples.en: She sat up straight to pay attention during the meeting.
examples.cn: 她在会议期间坐直了身子以集中注意力。

examples.en: We sat up late talking about our future plans.
examples.cn: 我们熬夜谈论未来的计划。

examples.en: He sat up all night studying for the exam.
examples.cn: 他整晚熬夜准备考试。

examples.en: The law prohibits minors from purchasing alcohol.
examples.cn: 法律禁止未成年人购买酒精饮料。

examples.en: The company prohibits employees from using personal devices at work.
examples.cn: 公司禁止员工在工作时使用个人设备。

examples.en: He was ignorant of the new regulations and got fined.
examples.cn: 他对新规定一无所知，结果被罚款了。

examples.en: She is ignorant of the cultural differences in that country.
examples.cn: 她对那个国家的文化差异一无所知。

examples.en: Many people fall prey to online scams every year.
examples.cn: 每年都有很多人成为网络诈骗的牺牲品。

examples.en: The company fell prey to aggressive competition and went bankrupt.
examples.cn: 这家公司成为激烈竞争的牺牲品，最终破产了。

examples.en: Taking the train is your best bet to avoid traffic.
examples.cn: 乘坐火车是避免交通拥堵的最佳选择。

examples.en: Her best bet for a job is to apply to local companies.
examples.cn: 她找工作的最佳选择是申请本地公司。

examples.en: The government is trying to root out corruption in the system.
examples.cn: 政府正试图根除系统中的腐败。

examples.en: We need to root out the source of the problem to fix it permanently.
examples.cn: 我们需要根除问题的根源以永久解决它。

examples.en: I am only too happy to help you with your project.
examples.cn: 我非常乐意帮助你完成项目。

examples.en: She was only too aware of the risks involved.
examples.cn: 她极其清楚所涉及的风险。

examples.en: It's important to connect with your audience during a presentation.
examples.cn: 在演讲中与观众建立联系很重要。

examples.en: He connected with old friends through social media.
examples.cn: 他通过社交媒体与老朋友取得了联系。

examples.en: I really connect with the themes in this novel.
examples.cn: 我真的很能理解这部小说的主题。

examples.en: The music connected with her on a deep emotional level.
examples.cn: 这音乐在情感深处与她产生了共鸣。

examples.en: The project cost no less than $1 million.
examples.cn: 这个项目的成本不少于100万美元。

examples.en: She received no less than three job offers in one week.
examples.cn: 她一周内收到了多达三个工作邀请。

examples.en: I can't get that song out of my mind.
examples.cn: 我无法把那首歌从脑海中赶走。

examples.en: He needs to get the failure out of his mind and move on.
examples.cn: 他需要忘记失败，继续前进。

examples.en: The process of learning a new language can be challenging.
examples.cn: 学习一门新语言的过程可能很有挑战性。

examples.en: We are in the process of renovating our house.
examples.cn: 我们正在翻新房子的过程中。

examples.en: You shouldn't trifle with her feelings; she's very sensitive.
examples.cn: 你不应该玩弄她的感情；她非常敏感。

examples.en: He trifled with the rules and faced serious consequences.
examples.cn: 他轻视规则，结果面临了严重后果。

examples.en: The hotel room has a beautiful sea view.
examples.cn: 酒店房间有美丽的海景。

examples.en: They bought a house with a sea view for their retirement.
examples.cn: 他们为退休买了一栋有海景的房子。

examples.en: The suspect is on trial for theft.
examples.cn: 嫌疑人因盗窃罪受审。

examples.en: She was put on trial after being accused of fraud.
examples.cn: 她被指控欺诈后受审。

examples.en: The new software is on trial for a month before we decide to buy it.
examples.cn: 新软件试用一个月，然后我们决定是否购买。

examples.en: He is on trial at the company to see if he fits the role.
examples.cn: 他在公司试用，看看是否适合这个职位。

examples.en: They plan to pull down the old building to make space for a park.
examples.cn: 他们计划拆除旧建筑，为公园腾出空间。

examples.en: The city pulled down the unsafe structure.
examples.cn: 城市拆除了不安全的建筑。

examples.en: The bad news really pulled her down.
examples.cn: 坏消息真的让她情绪低落。

examples.en: Constant criticism can pull down anyone's morale.
examples.cn: 持续的批评会让任何人的士气低落。

examples.en: They made love to each other under the stars.
examples.cn: 他们在星空下做爱。

examples.en: He wanted to make love to her to express his deep affection.
examples.cn: 他想与她做爱以表达深深的爱意。

examples.en: The company will go through the changes in management next month.
examples.cn: 公司下个月将经历管理层的变化。

examples.en: She had to go through the changes in her personal life after moving abroad.
examples.cn: 移居国外后，她不得不经历个人生活的变化。

examples.en: Please go through the changes in the document before finalizing it.
examples.cn: 在最终确定之前，请仔细检查文档中的变更。

examples.en: The team needs to go through the changes in the software update.
examples.cn: 团队需要仔细检查软件更新中的变更。

examples.en: After the rapid growth, the market began to level off.
examples.cn: 快速增长后，市场开始趋于平稳。

examples.en: The temperature is expected to level off by the weekend.
examples.cn: 预计到周末温度将趋于平稳。

examples.en: They used a roller to level off the ground for the new building.
examples.cn: 他们用压路机平整地面以建造新建筑。

examples.en: You should level off the cake batter before baking.
examples.cn: 在烘烤前，你应该把蛋糕面糊弄平。

examples.en: The UN agreed to mediate in the peace talks between the two countries.
examples.cn: 联合国同意在两国和平谈判中进行调解。

examples.en: She was asked to mediate in the dispute between her colleagues.
examples.cn: 她被要求在同事之间的争端中进行调解。

examples.en: The new policy aims to mitigate problems related to traffic congestion.
examples.cn: 新政策旨在缓解与交通拥堵相关的问题。

examples.en: We need to take steps to mitigate problems caused by climate change.
examples.cn: 我们需要采取措施缓解气候变化引起的问题。

examples.en: It's important to distinguish between facts and opinions in research.
examples.cn: 在研究中区分事实和观点很重要。

examples.en: Can you distinguish between the two species of birds?
examples.cn: 你能区分这两种鸟类吗？

examples.en: The journey through the mountains was fraught with danger.
examples.cn: 穿越山脉的旅程充满了危险。

examples.en: The project is fraught with challenges that need to be addressed.
examples.cn: 这个项目充满了需要解决的挑战。

examples.en: The sponge can soak up a lot of water quickly.
examples.cn: 海绵能快速吸收大量水。

examples.en: She loves to soak up the sun on the beach.
examples.cn: 她喜欢在海滩上吸收阳光。

examples.en: During her trip, she tried to soak up the local culture.
examples.cn: 在旅行期间，她试图沉浸于当地文化。

examples.en: He spent hours in the library to soak up information for his thesis.
examples.cn: 他在图书馆花了几个小时沉浸于论文所需的信息。

examples.en: We need to decide on a date for the meeting soon.
examples.cn: 我们需要尽快决定会议的日期。

examples.en: After much discussion, they decided on a new marketing strategy.
examples.cn: 经过多次讨论，他们决定采用新的营销策略。

examples.en: He had an accident while driving in the rain.
examples.cn: 他在雨中驾驶时发生了事故。

examples.en: If you're not careful, you might have an accident in the kitchen.
examples.cn: 如果你不小心，可能在厨房发生事故。

examples.en: The stadium was packed with enthusiastic sports fans.
examples.cn: 体育场挤满了热情的体育迷。

examples.en: Sports fans often follow their favorite teams closely.
examples.cn: 体育迷通常密切关注他们最喜欢的球队。

examples.en: More and more people are using renewable energy sources.
examples.cn: 越来越多的人在使用可再生能源。

examples.en: The city is becoming more and more crowded every year.
examples.cn: 这座城市每年都变得越来越拥挤。

examples.en: Can you work the new task in by the end of the week?
examples.cn: 你能在本周末前将新任务安排进去吗？

examples.en: She managed to work a short break in during her busy schedule.
examples.cn: 她在繁忙的日程中设法安排了一个短暂的休息。

examples.en: Gradually work the flour in to form a dough.
examples.cn: 逐渐将面粉融入以形成面团。

examples.en: You need to work the new ideas in without disrupting the existing plan.
examples.cn: 你需要将新想法融入而不打乱现有计划。

examples.en: The athlete broke the record for the fastest marathon time.
examples.cn: 这位运动员打破了最快马拉松时间的纪录。

examples.en: They hope to break the record for the largest charity fundraiser.
examples.cn: 他们希望打破最大慈善筹款活动的纪录。

examples.en: His teachings had a profound influence on modern philosophy.
examples.cn: 他的教义对现代哲学产生了深远影响。

examples.en: The invention of the internet has had a profound influence on society.
examples.cn: 互联网的发明对社会产生了深远影响。

examples.en: The old building was scheduled to blow up for demolition.
examples.cn: 旧建筑计划爆炸拆除。

examples.en: The gas leak caused the tank to blow up suddenly.
examples.cn: 气体泄漏导致储罐突然爆炸。

examples.en: Can you blow up this photo so we can see the details better?
examples.cn: 你能放大这张照片以便我们更好地查看细节吗？

examples.en: The image was blown up to poster size for the exhibition.
examples.cn: 这张图片被放大到海报尺寸用于展览。

examples.en: He tends to blow up over small mistakes at work.
examples.cn: 他倾向于在工作中因小错误而发脾气。

examples.en: Don't blow up at me; it was just an accident.
examples.cn: 别对我发脾气；那只是个意外。

examples.en: Only the manager is authorized to approve large expenses.
examples.cn: 只有经理被授权批准大额开支。

examples.en: She is authorized to sign contracts on behalf of the company.
examples.cn: 她被授权代表公司签署合同。

examples.en: This region is home to many endangered species.
examples.cn: 这个地区是许多濒危物种的家园。

examples.en: The city is home to several world-renowned universities.
examples.cn: 这座城市是几所世界知名大学的所在地。

examples.en: Those in authority must make fair decisions for everyone.
examples.cn: 掌权者必须为每个人做出公平的决定。

examples.en: She is the person in authority who can resolve this issue.
examples.cn: 她是掌权者，可以解决这个问题。

examples.en: The movie critic gave the film a glowing review in the newspaper.
examples.cn: 电影评论家在报纸上对这部电影给予了高度评价。

examples.en: As a movie critic, he watches hundreds of films each year.
examples.cn: 作为电影评论家，他每年观看数百部电影。

examples.en: The firefighters managed to get the blaze under control quickly.
examples.cn: 消防员设法迅速控制住了火势。

examples.en: She needs to get her spending under control to save money.
examples.cn: 她需要控制住开支以省钱。

examples.en: Can you give me a lift to the station?
examples.cn: 你能让我搭便车去车站吗？

examples.en: She gave her neighbor a lift to the grocery store.
examples.cn: 她让邻居搭便车去杂货店。

examples.en: His kind words gave her a lift during a tough time.
examples.cn: 他善意的话语在她困难时期让她振作起来。

examples.en: A good cup of coffee can give you a lift in the morning.
examples.cn: 一杯好咖啡能在早上让你精神振奋。

examples.en: It took hours to puzzle out the complex math problem.
examples.cn: 花了几个小时才解出这道复杂的数学题。

examples.en: She managed to puzzle out the mystery by analyzing the clues.
examples.cn: 她通过分析线索成功解开了这个谜团。

examples.en: The teacher stood in the front of the classroom.
examples.cn: 老师站在教室的前部。

examples.en: The engine is located in the front of the car.
examples.cn: 发动机位于汽车的前部。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's feet on the ground

examples.en: Despite his success, he always has his feet on the ground.
examples.cn: 尽管他成功了，但他总是脚踏实地。

examples.en: She has her feet on the ground and makes practical decisions.
examples.cn: 她脚踏实地，做出务实的决定。

definitions.meaning_cn: 对...造成严重损害或影响

examples.en: The pandemic took a heavy toll on the economy.
examples.cn: 疫情对经济造成了严重打击。

examples.en: Stress can take a heavy toll on your health.
examples.cn: 压力会对你的健康造成严重影响。

examples.en: Do you want to come along with us to the party?
examples.cn: 你想和我们一起去派对吗？

examples.en: He came along with his friend to the meeting.
examples.cn: 他和他的朋友一起来参加会议。

examples.en: You should steer clear of that dangerous neighborhood.
examples.cn: 你应该避开那个危险的街区。

examples.en: He steers clear of gossip at work.
examples.cn: 他在工作中远离八卦。

examples.en: I opened a checking account at the local bank.
examples.cn: 我在当地银行开了一个支票账户。

examples.en: She uses her checking account to pay bills online.
examples.cn: 她用她的支票账户在线支付账单。

examples.en: As many as 100 people attended the event.
examples.cn: 多达100人参加了这个活动。

examples.en: He has as many books as his brother.
examples.cn: 他的书和他哥哥的一样多。

examples.en: Do you have any milk left in the fridge?
examples.cn: 冰箱里还有牛奶剩下吗？

examples.en: After the sale, we have only a few items left.
examples.cn: 促销后，我们只剩下几件商品了。

examples.en: The company signed on a new employee last week.
examples.cn: 公司上周签约雇用了一名新员工。

examples.en: He signed on for a two-year contract with the team.
examples.cn: 他与团队签约了一份为期两年的合同。

examples.en: You need to sign on to access your email.
examples.cn: 你需要登录才能访问你的电子邮件。

examples.en: She signed on to the network using her password.
examples.cn: 她用密码登录到网络。

examples.en: The small startup evolved into a large corporation.
examples.cn: 这家小初创公司发展成了一家大公司。

examples.en: Over time, the idea evolved into a full-fledged project.
examples.cn: 随着时间的推移，这个想法演变成了一个成熟的项目。

examples.en: She worked her new ideas into the presentation.
examples.cn: 她将新想法逐渐融入了演示中。

examples.en: He worked exercise into his daily routine.
examples.cn: 他将锻炼逐渐融入了日常作息中。

examples.en: The police will inquire into the cause of the accident.
examples.cn: 警方将调查事故的原因。

examples.en: She inquired into the details of the contract before signing.
examples.cn: 她在签约前探究了合同的细节。

examples.en: He looks upon his mentor with great respect.
examples.cn: 他以极大的尊重看待他的导师。

examples.en: She looks upon this opportunity as a challenge.
examples.cn: 她将这个机会视为一个挑战。

examples.en: The cast had a dress rehearsal before the opening night.
examples.cn: 演员们在首演前进行了一次彩排。

examples.en: The dress rehearsal went smoothly without any issues.
examples.cn: 彩排进行得很顺利，没有任何问题。

examples.en: The suspect is in jail awaiting trial.
examples.cn: 嫌疑人在监狱中等待审判。

examples.en: She awaits trial for the charges against her.
examples.cn: 她因对她的指控而等待审判。

definitions.meaning_cn: 大错特错，需要重新考虑

examples.en: If you think I'll agree, you have another think coming.
examples.cn: 如果你认为我会同意，那你就大错特错了。

examples.en: He has another think coming if he believes it's easy.
examples.cn: 如果他认为这很容易，那他就需要重新考虑了。

examples.en: The new processor is an order of magnitude faster than the old one.
examples.cn: 新处理器的速度比旧处理器快一个数量级。

examples.en: The earthquake was an order of magnitude stronger than predicted.
examples.cn: 这次地震比预测的强一个数量级。

examples.en: She applied for a multiple entry visa to visit her family in Canada several times a year.
examples.cn: 她申请了多次入境签证，以便一年内多次去加拿大探望家人。

examples.en: Business travelers often prefer a multiple entry visa for flexibility during international trips.
examples.cn: 商务旅行者通常更喜欢多次入境签证，以便在国际旅行中更灵活。

examples.en: On second thoughts, I think I'll stay home instead of going to the party.
examples.cn: 再三考虑后，我想我还是待在家里，不去参加派对了。

examples.en: He agreed to the deal initially, but on second thoughts, he decided to negotiate further.
examples.cn: 他最初同意了这笔交易，但再三考虑后，他决定进一步谈判。

examples.en: Detectives pieced together the evidence to solve the mystery.
examples.cn: 侦探们拼凑证据来解开谜团。

examples.en: She pieced together the broken vase with glue.
examples.cn: 她用胶水把破碎的花瓶拼凑起来。

examples.en: It took years to piece together the history of the ancient civilization.
examples.cn: 花了多年时间才逐步理解这个古代文明的历史。

examples.en: He pieced together a plan from various suggestions.
examples.cn: 他从各种建议中逐步构建了一个计划。

examples.en: She was reluctant to accept the job offer because of the long commute.
examples.cn: 由于通勤时间长，她不情愿接受这份工作邀请。

examples.en: He is reluctant to share his personal details with strangers.
examples.cn: 他不情愿与陌生人分享他的个人细节。

examples.en: Journalists often travel to conflict zones to gather first-hand information.
examples.cn: 记者经常前往冲突地区收集第一手信息。

examples.en: Researchers gathered first-hand information by conducting interviews with local residents.
examples.cn: 研究人员通过采访当地居民收集了第一手信息。

examples.en: The construction of the new stadium involved enormous expenditure.
examples.cn: 新体育场的建设涉及巨大的开支。

examples.en: The company's enormous expenditure on marketing did not yield expected returns.
examples.cn: 公司在营销上的巨大开支没有带来预期的回报。

examples.en: Let's get back to the original topic of our discussion.
examples.cn: 让我们回到讨论的原始话题上。

examples.en: The essay strayed from the original topic and became confusing.
examples.cn: 这篇文章偏离了原始话题，变得令人困惑。

examples.en: Many professionals sacrifice family life to advance their careers.
examples.cn: 许多专业人士为了事业发展牺牲家庭生活。

examples.en: He had to sacrifice family life during the busy project period.
examples.cn: 在繁忙的项目期间，他不得不牺牲家庭生活。

examples.en: Traffic congestion in the city center is a major problem during rush hour.
examples.cn: 市中心的交通拥堵在高峰时段是一个主要问题。

examples.en: The new highway aims to reduce traffic congestion on existing roads.
examples.cn: 新高速公路旨在减少现有道路上的交通拥堵。

examples.en: She felt at her ease in the cozy café with her friends.
examples.cn: 在舒适的咖啡馆里和朋友们在一起，她感到轻松自在。

examples.en: He is at his ease when speaking in public, thanks to years of practice.
examples.cn: 由于多年的练习，他在公开演讲时感到轻松自在。

examples.en: The old jacket came apart at the seams after years of wear.
examples.cn: 这件旧夹克穿了多年后，接缝处裂开了。

examples.en: Their plan came apart at the seams when key members left the team.
examples.cn: 当关键成员离开团队时，他们的计划崩溃了。

examples.en: The new law will come into effect next month.
examples.cn: 新法律将于下个月生效。

examples.en: The policy came into effect immediately after approval.
examples.cn: 该政策在批准后立即开始实施。

examples.en: The Sanitation Department is responsible for waste collection in the city.
examples.cn: 环卫部门负责城市的垃圾收集工作。

examples.en: Residents can report sanitation issues to the Sanitation Department.
examples.cn: 居民可以向卫生局报告卫生问题。

examples.en: It's important to be honest with your friends about your feelings.
examples.cn: 对朋友诚实表达你的感受很重要。

examples.en: He was honest with his boss about the mistake he made.
examples.cn: 他诚实地向老板承认了自己犯的错误。

examples.en: One adverse aspect of the new policy is increased costs for small businesses.
examples.cn: 新政策的一个不利方面是增加了小企业的成本。

examples.en: The report highlights the adverse aspects of climate change on agriculture.
examples.cn: 报告强调了气候变化对农业的负面影响。

examples.en: He struggles to complete tasks on time because he lacks self-discipline.
examples.cn: 他因为缺乏自律而难以按时完成任务。

examples.en: Lack of self-discipline can lead to poor health habits.
examples.cn: 缺乏自律可能导致不良的健康习惯。

definitions.meaning_cn: 有自由处理权，不受限制

examples.en: The manager gave her a free hand to redesign the office layout.
examples.cn: 经理给了她自由处理权来重新设计办公室布局。

examples.en: He has a free hand in making decisions for the project.
examples.cn: 他在为项目做决定时有自由处理权。

examples.en: How many people attended the meeting yesterday?
examples.cn: 昨天有多少人参加了会议？

examples.en: She asked how many books are in the library.
examples.cn: 她问图书馆里有多少本书。

examples.en: He's always trying to make something out of nothing to start drama.
examples.cn: 他总是无中生有，挑起事端。

examples.en: Don't make something out of nothing; there's no evidence for your claim.
examples.cn: 别凭空捏造了，你的说法毫无证据。

definitions.meaning_cn: 变废为宝，从无到有创造

examples.en: With just some scrap wood, she made something out of nothing and built a beautiful shelf.
examples.cn: 只用一些废木头，她变废为宝，做了一个漂亮的架子。

examples.en: Entrepreneurs often make something out of nothing by identifying unmet needs.
examples.cn: 企业家常常通过发现未满足的需求，从无到有创造价值。

examples.en: Make no mistake, this decision will have serious consequences.
examples.cn: 毫无疑问，这个决定将带来严重后果。

examples.en: Make no mistake about it, she is the best candidate for the job.
examples.cn: 请务必明白，她是这份工作的最佳人选。

examples.en: Advances in technology have greatly increased global food production.
examples.cn: 技术进步极大地提高了全球食品生产。

examples.en: Sustainable food production is essential for future generations.
examples.cn: 可持续的粮食生产对后代至关重要。

valid_entries.original_phrase: keep one's eye on the ball

examples.en: During the exam, you need to keep your eye on the ball and avoid distractions.
examples.cn: 考试时，你需要集中注意力，避免分心。

examples.en: In business, it's important to keep your eye on the ball to stay competitive.
examples.cn: 在商业中，保持专注以保持竞争力很重要。

examples.en: He vowed to get even after being insulted in public.
examples.cn: 在公开场合被侮辱后，他发誓要报复。

examples.en: She got even by returning the favor with a prank of her own.
examples.cn: 她通过用自己的恶作剧回敬，扯平了。

examples.en: To solve the equation, you need to get even by adding the same number to both sides.
examples.cn: 解这个方程，你需要通过两边加相同的数来使平衡。

examples.en: The accountant worked to get even the accounts after the discrepancy was found.
examples.cn: 发现差异后，会计师努力使账目相等。

examples.en: In a word, the movie was fantastic.
examples.cn: 简而言之，这部电影太棒了。

examples.en: His performance? In a word, outstanding.
examples.cn: 他的表现？一句话概括，出色。

examples.en: We need to look ahead and plan for next year's budget.
examples.cn: 我们需要展望未来，规划明年的预算。

examples.en: Instead of dwelling on past mistakes, it's better to look ahead.
examples.cn: 与其纠结于过去的错误，不如向前看。

examples.en: Excuse me, I need to go to the bathroom.
examples.cn: 抱歉，我需要去洗手间。

examples.en: The child asked to go to the bathroom during the car ride.
examples.cn: 孩子在乘车途中要求上厕所。

examples.en: The director plans to shoot a film in New York next month.
examples.cn: 导演计划下个月在纽约拍摄一部电影。

examples.en: They spent six months to shoot a film about ancient history.
examples.cn: 他们花了六个月拍摄一部关于古代历史的电影。

examples.en: As a salesperson, she's always on the go, traveling between cities.
examples.cn: 作为销售人员，她总是忙碌中，在城市间旅行。

examples.en: I eat breakfast on the go to save time in the morning.
examples.cn: 我早上在移动中吃早餐以节省时间。

examples.en: This laptop is perfect for people on the go due to its lightweight design.
examples.cn: 这款笔记本电脑因其轻便设计，非常适合忙碌的人。

examples.en: On-the-go snacks are popular for busy professionals.
examples.cn: 便携零食在忙碌的专业人士中很受欢迎。

examples.en: She won a gold medal in the long jump at the Olympics.
examples.cn: 她在奥运会的跳远项目中赢得了金牌。

examples.en: The long jump requires both speed and precision.
examples.cn: 跳远需要速度和精确度。

examples.en: I get a kick out of watching old comedy shows.
examples.cn: 我从看老喜剧节目中获得乐趣。

examples.en: He gets a kick out of solving difficult puzzles.
examples.cn: 他享受解决难题的过程。

examples.en: The weather service warned us of the approaching storm.
examples.cn: 气象部门警告我们关于即将到来的风暴。

examples.en: I warned him of the potential risks before he invested.
examples.cn: 在他投资前，我警告了他潜在的风险。

examples.en: You should think out your career path before making a hasty decision.
examples.cn: 在做出草率决定前，你应该仔细考虑你的职业道路。

examples.en: The team thought out every detail of the project to ensure success.
examples.cn: 团队深思熟虑了项目的每个细节以确保成功。

examples.en: The assistant relieved the manager of some administrative tasks.
examples.cn: 助理解除了经理的一些行政任务负担。

examples.en: He was relieved of his duties after the investigation.
examples.cn: 调查后，他被免除了职责。

examples.en: This medication can relieve you of the headache symptoms.
examples.cn: 这种药物可以减轻你的头痛症状。

examples.en: Talking to a friend relieved her of some stress.
examples.cn: 和朋友交谈减轻了她的一些压力。

examples.en: The old saying 'practice makes perfect' still holds true today.
examples.cn: 古语“熟能生巧”今天仍然成立。

examples.en: His theory holds true under various experimental conditions.
examples.cn: 他的理论在各种实验条件下仍然有效。

examples.en: It takes years of practice to master another language fluently.
examples.cn: 需要多年的练习才能流利地掌握另一门语言。

examples.en: She aims to master another language to enhance her career opportunities.
examples.cn: 她旨在掌握另一门语言以增强职业机会。

examples.en: She received a letter of acceptance from Harvard University.
examples.cn: 她收到了哈佛大学的录取通知书。

examples.en: The letter of acceptance must be submitted to confirm enrollment.
examples.cn: 必须提交录取通知书以确认入学。

examples.en: The candidate has an extensive accounting background with 10 years of experience.
examples.cn: 这位候选人有10年经验的广泛会计背景。

examples.en: An extensive accounting background is required for this senior position.
examples.cn: 这个高级职位需要广泛的会计背景。

examples.en: During the hike, we encountered trouble when it started raining heavily.
examples.cn: 徒步时，当开始下大雨时，我们遇到了麻烦。

examples.en: The project encountered trouble due to budget cuts.
examples.cn: 由于预算削减，这个项目遭遇了困难。

examples.en: She is anxious about her upcoming job interview.
examples.cn: 她对即将到来的工作面试感到焦虑。

examples.en: He was anxious about the safety of his family during the storm.
examples.cn: 他在暴风雨期间为家人的安全感到担忧。

definitions.meaning_cn: 愿意付出巨大代价或牺牲来获得某物

examples.en: I'd give my right arm to meet my favorite author.
examples.cn: 我愿意付出巨大代价去见我最喜欢的作者。

examples.en: He said he'd give his right arm for a chance to travel the world.
examples.cn: 他说他愿意牺牲一切来获得环游世界的机会。

definitions.meaning_cn: 激励人们行动或团结的口号或号召

examples.en: "Freedom or death!" became the rallying cry of the revolution.
examples.cn: "不自由，毋宁死！"成为了革命的战斗口号。

examples.en: The coach's speech served as a rallying cry for the team before the big game.
examples.cn: 教练的演讲在大赛前成为了团队的激励口号。

examples.en: She has great faith in her doctor's abilities.
examples.cn: 她对医生的能力有极大的信心。

examples.en: We must maintain our faith in the justice system.
examples.cn: 我们必须保持对司法体系的信任。

definitions.meaning_cn: 开始吃或深入研究某事物

examples.en: He dug into the delicious meal with enthusiasm.
examples.cn: 他热情地开始享用这顿美餐。

examples.en: The journalist dug into the corruption scandal for months.
examples.cn: 记者深入调查这起腐败丑闻数月之久。

examples.en: You need to make up your mind about which college to attend.
examples.cn: 你需要决定上哪所大学。

examples.en: After much thought, she made up her mind to quit her job.
examples.cn: 经过深思熟虑，她决定辞职。

examples.en: In the future, we hope to travel to Mars.
examples.cn: 在未来，我们希望前往火星旅行。

examples.en: She plans to start her own business in the future.
examples.cn: 她计划在未来创办自己的企业。

examples.en: Hurry up, or we'll miss the bus!
examples.cn: 快点，否则我们要错过公交车了！

examples.en: Can you hurry up with that report? It's due soon.
examples.cn: 你能快点完成那份报告吗？很快就到期了。

examples.en: The project will cost in the region of $50,000.
examples.cn: 这个项目的成本大约在5万美元左右。

examples.en: The population is estimated to be in the region of 10 million.
examples.cn: 人口估计在1000万左右。

examples.en: Applicants must have relevant working experience in marketing.
examples.cn: 申请者必须具备市场营销的相关工作经验。

examples.en: Her relevant working experience made her a strong candidate for the job.
examples.cn: 她的相关工作经验使她成为这个职位的强有力候选人。

examples.en: The activists are pushing for stricter environmental laws.
examples.cn: 活动人士正在极力争取更严格的环境法律。

examples.en: He pushed for a raise after his successful project.
examples.cn: 在项目成功后，他极力争取加薪。

examples.en: The government decided to clamp down on illegal immigration.
examples.cn: 政府决定严厉打击非法移民。

examples.en: Police are clamping down on speeding in residential areas.
examples.cn: 警方正在严厉打击住宅区的超速行为。

examples.en: She used a tape recorder to capture the interview.
examples.cn: 她用磁带录音机录下了这次采访。

examples.en: In the 1980s, tape recorders were common for music playback.
examples.cn: 在20世纪80年代，磁带录音机常用于播放音乐。

definitions.meaning_cn: 全力以赴地表演或比赛

examples.en: The band played their hearts out at the concert.
examples.cn: 乐队在音乐会上全力以赴地演奏。

examples.en: He played his heart out in the championship game.
examples.cn: 他在冠军赛中全力以赴地比赛。

definitions.meaning_cn: 询问或打听关于...的信息

examples.en: I need to inquire about the availability of hotel rooms.
examples.cn: 我需要询问酒店房间的可用性。

examples.en: She inquired about the application process for the scholarship.
examples.cn: 她打听了奖学金的申请流程。

valid_entries.original_phrase: make a clean breast of sth.

examples.en: He decided to make a clean breast of his mistake to his boss.
examples.cn: 他决定向老板彻底坦白自己的错误。

examples.en: After years of guilt, she made a clean breast of the secret.
examples.cn: 在多年的内疚之后，她彻底坦白了那个秘密。

examples.en: I can't put up with his constant complaining anymore.
examples.cn: 我再也无法忍受他不断的抱怨了。

examples.en: She has to put up with a long commute to work every day.
examples.cn: 她不得不忍受每天长时间的通勤。

examples.en: She gave birth to a healthy baby boy last week.
examples.cn: 她上周生下了一个健康的男婴。

examples.en: The idea gave birth to a new scientific theory.
examples.cn: 这个想法催生了一个新的科学理论。

examples.en: If I had my druthers, I'd spend the whole day reading.
examples.cn: 如果可以选择的话，我会花一整天时间阅读。

examples.en: Given his druthers, he would travel the world instead of working.
examples.cn: 如果可以选择，他宁愿环游世界而不是工作。

examples.en: There are many surprises in store for you on this trip.
examples.cn: 这次旅行有很多惊喜在等着你。

examples.en: We don't know what the future has in store for us.
examples.cn: 我们不知道未来会有什么在等待着我们。

examples.en: You can find that product in store at our downtown location.
examples.cn: 你可以在我们市中心的店里找到那个产品。

examples.en: The items are available both online and in store.
examples.cn: 这些商品在线和店内都有售。

definitions.meaning_cn: 或许，可能（用于礼貌询问）

examples.en: Do you by any chance know where the nearest post office is?
examples.cn: 你或许知道最近的邮局在哪里吗？

examples.en: Are you by any chance free this weekend?
examples.cn: 你这个周末可能有空吗？

examples.en: A 10% salary increase is not to be sneezed at in this economy.
examples.cn: 在当前经济形势下，10%的加薪不容小觑。

examples.en: His contribution to the project was not to be sneezed at.
examples.cn: 他对项目的贡献值得重视。

examples.en: I like to add chocolate syrup to my milkshakes.
examples.cn: 我喜欢在奶昔里加巧克力糖浆。

examples.en: This dessert is topped with a drizzle of chocolate syrup.
examples.cn: 这道甜点上面淋了一层巧克力糖浆。

definitions.meaning_cn: 被录取进入，被允许进入

examples.en: She was admitted into Harvard University last year.
examples.cn: 她去年被哈佛大学录取了。

examples.en: Only members are admitted into the exclusive club.
examples.cn: 只有会员才被允许进入这个高级俱乐部。

valid_entries.original_phrase: go over sth. with a fine-tooth comb

examples.en: The editor went over the manuscript with a fine-tooth comb before publishing.
examples.cn: 编辑在出版前仔细检查了手稿。

examples.en: We need to go over the contract with a fine-tooth comb to avoid any mistakes.
examples.cn: 我们需要彻底审查合同以避免任何错误。

examples.en: His old-fashioned ideas about gender roles are no longer acceptable.
examples.cn: 他关于性别角色的过时观念已不再被接受。

examples.en: The company needs to update its old-fashioned ideas about marketing.
examples.cn: 公司需要更新其关于营销的老式想法。

examples.en: The new CEO plans to streamline the management layer to improve efficiency.
examples.cn: 新CEO计划精简管理层以提高效率。

examples.en: Decisions often get delayed due to too many management layers.
examples.cn: 由于管理层次过多，决策常常被延误。

examples.en: I prefer tea rather than coffee in the morning.
examples.cn: 我早上更喜欢喝茶而不是咖啡。

examples.en: He chose to walk rather than take the bus.
examples.cn: 他选择步行而不是乘公交车。

valid_entries.original_phrase: put in a good word for sb.

definitions.meaning_cn: 为某人说好话，推荐某人

examples.en: Can you put in a good word for me with the hiring manager?
examples.cn: 你能在招聘经理面前为我说句好话吗？

examples.en: She put in a good word for her friend during the promotion discussion.
examples.cn: 她在晋升讨论中为她的朋友说了好话。

examples.en: We have meetings every other Monday.
examples.cn: 我们每隔一个星期一开会。

examples.en: Every other student passed the exam except him.
examples.cn: 除了他，所有其他学生都通过了考试。

definitions.meaning_cn: 某人的书写质量，字迹好坏

examples.en: The teacher commented on the poor quality of his handwriting.
examples.cn: 老师评论了他糟糕的书写质量。

examples.en: Improving the quality of your handwriting can make your notes more legible.
examples.cn: 提高你的书写质量可以使笔记更易读。

examples.en: Please fill in the application form with your details.
examples.cn: 请用你的详细信息填写申请表。

examples.en: Can you fill me in on what happened at the meeting?
examples.cn: 你能告诉我会议上发生了什么吗？

examples.en: She will fill in for the manager while he is on vacation.
examples.cn: 经理度假期间，她将临时替代他。

examples.en: We need someone to fill in at the reception desk today.
examples.cn: 今天我们需要有人在前台临时顶班。

examples.en: He prides himself on his punctuality.
examples.cn: 他以守时为傲。

examples.en: The company prides itself on excellent customer service.
examples.cn: 这家公司以优质的客户服务为傲。

examples.en: Millions of people watched the live broadcast.
examples.cn: 数百万人观看了直播。

examples.en: The charity has helped millions of children worldwide.
examples.cn: 该慈善机构帮助了全球数百万儿童。

examples.en: After the exam, I plan to take it easy for a few days.
examples.cn: 考试后，我计划放松几天。

examples.en: Take it easy, everything will be fine.
examples.cn: 别紧张，一切都会好起来的。

examples.en: The author finally put her novel into print after years of work.
examples.cn: 经过多年的努力，作者终于将她的小说印刷出版了。

examples.en: We need to put the report into print by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 我们需要在明天之前将报告印刷出来。

examples.en: Avoid driving during peak time to miss the traffic.
examples.cn: 避开高峰时间驾驶以避开交通拥堵。

examples.en: The electricity rates are higher during peak time.
examples.cn: 高峰时间的电费更高。

examples.en: The music played on throughout the night.
examples.cn: 音乐整夜继续播放。

examples.en: He played on her sympathy to get what he wanted.
examples.cn: 他利用她的同情心得到了他想要的东西。

examples.en: The band will play on the main stage at the festival.
examples.cn: 乐队将在音乐节的主舞台上演奏。

examples.en: The team prefers to play on grass rather than artificial turf.
examples.cn: 这支球队更喜欢在草地上比赛而不是人造草皮。

definitions.meaning_cn: 请随意，像在自己家一样

examples.en: Please make yourself at home while I prepare some drinks.
examples.cn: 请随意，我去准备一些饮料。

examples.en: He quickly made himself at home in the new apartment.
examples.cn: 他很快就在新公寓里像在自己家一样自在了。

examples.en: I had to work extra hours to meet the project deadline.
examples.cn: 我不得不加班工作以赶上项目截止日期。

examples.en: She often works extra hours without overtime pay.
examples.cn: 她经常加班却没有加班费。

examples.en: He was going to quit his job, but he thought better of it.
examples.cn: 他本来打算辞职，但重新考虑后改变了主意。

examples.en: I thought better of buying that expensive car and saved the money instead.
examples.cn: 我重新考虑后决定不买那辆昂贵的车，而是把钱存了起来。

examples.en: We need to make plans for our summer vacation.
examples.cn: 我们需要为暑假制定计划。

examples.en: She is making plans for her retirement.
examples.cn: 她正在为退休制定计划。

examples.en: The prosecutor is building a case against the suspect.
examples.cn: 检察官正在收集证据指控嫌疑人。

examples.en: They built a strong case against him with multiple witnesses.
examples.cn: 他们通过多位证人建立了针对他的有力指控。

examples.en: The economic crisis brought the company to its knees.
examples.cn: 经济危机使这家公司濒临崩溃。

examples.en: Her illness brought her to her knees, but she fought back.
examples.cn: 疾病使她几乎崩溃，但她奋力抗争。

examples.en: The picnic was washed out by heavy rain.
examples.cn: 野餐因大雨被取消了。

examples.en: The flood washed out the bridge.
examples.cn: 洪水冲垮了桥梁。

examples.en: He washed out of the military training program.
examples.cn: 他在军事训练项目中被淘汰了。

examples.en: Many startups wash out in their first year.
examples.cn: 许多初创公司在第一年就失败了。

examples.en: I exercise every day to stay healthy.
examples.cn: 我每天锻炼以保持健康。

examples.en: She reads the newspaper every day.
examples.cn: 她每天读报纸。

examples.en: Many families in that region live in poverty.
examples.cn: 那个地区的许多家庭生活在贫困中。

examples.en: He lived in poverty for years before finding a stable job.
examples.cn: 在找到稳定工作前，他在贫困中生活了多年。

definitions.meaning_cn: 遭到厌恶或不满的眼神

examples.en: I got a dirty look when I cut in line.
examples.cn: 我插队时遭到了厌恶的眼神。

examples.en: She gave him a dirty look after his rude comment.
examples.cn: 在他发表粗鲁评论后，她给了他一个不满的眼神。

examples.en: She uses software to edit images for her blog.
examples.cn: 她使用软件为博客编辑图像。

examples.en: He edits images to remove imperfections.
examples.cn: 他编辑图像以去除瑕疵。

examples.en: I reached out to an old friend last week.
examples.cn: 我上周联系了一位老朋友。

examples.en: The organization reaches out to homeless people.
examples.cn: 该组织向无家可归者伸出援手。

definitions.meaning_cn: 批准或允许某人做某事

examples.en: The manager gave us the go-ahead to start the project.
examples.cn: 经理批准我们开始这个项目。

examples.en: She gave her son the go-ahead to go to the party.
examples.cn: 她允许儿子去参加派对。

examples.en: The event was organized in conjunction with local businesses.
examples.cn: 这次活动是与当地企业联合组织的。

examples.en: He works in conjunction with a team of experts.
examples.cn: 他与专家团队一起工作。

examples.en: Our negotiations ran into a stone wall when they refused to compromise.
examples.cn: 当他们拒绝妥协时，我们的谈判遇到了无法克服的障碍。

examples.en: He ran into a stone wall trying to get funding for his idea.
examples.cn: 他在为想法争取资金时遇到了无法克服的障碍。

examples.en: She shares her lunch with her friend.
examples.cn: 她与朋友分享午餐。

examples.en: He shared the news with his family.
examples.cn: 他与家人分享了这则消息。

examples.en: I can't afford to buy a new car right now.
examples.cn: 我现在负担不起买一辆新车。

examples.en: We can't afford to make any mistakes in this project.
examples.cn: 在这个项目中，我们承担不起任何错误。

examples.en: The government is struggling to balance its budget.
examples.cn: 政府正在努力平衡预算。

examples.en: She balances her budget by cutting unnecessary expenses.
examples.cn: 她通过削减不必要的开支来平衡预算。

examples.en: Education helps people become productive members of society.
examples.cn: 教育帮助人们成为社会的生产性成员。

examples.en: They are productive members of society, contributing through their work.
examples.cn: 他们是社会的生产性成员，通过工作做出贡献。

examples.en: Can you see to the arrangements for the meeting?
examples.cn: 你能负责处理会议安排吗？

examples.en: I'll see to it that the problem is fixed.
examples.cn: 我会负责确保问题得到解决。

examples.en: He attended elite schools and later became a successful lawyer.
examples.cn: 他上了精英学校，后来成为了一名成功的律师。

examples.en: Elite schools often have high tuition fees.
examples.cn: 精英学校通常学费高昂。

examples.en: He didn't stay for long because he had another appointment.
examples.cn: 他没有待很久，因为他还有另一个约会。

examples.en: The rain won't last for long; it should clear up soon.
examples.cn: 雨不会下很久，应该很快就会放晴。

examples.en: She was ever so grateful for the help you provided.
examples.cn: 她对你提供的帮助感激不尽。

examples.en: The cake is ever so delicious; you must try a piece.
examples.cn: 这蛋糕非常美味，你一定要尝一块。

definitions.meaning_cn: 转移注意力的事物，误导性线索

examples.en: The suspect's alibi turned out to be a red herring to mislead the police.
examples.cn: 嫌疑人的不在场证明原来是为了误导警方的转移注意力手段。

examples.en: In the debate, he introduced a red herring to avoid discussing the main issue.
examples.cn: 在辩论中，他引入了一个误导性话题来回避讨论主要问题。

examples.en: The tradition of Halloween is believed to originate with ancient Celtic festivals.
examples.cn: 万圣节的传统被认为起源于古代凯尔特人的节日。

examples.en: This innovative idea originated with a young engineer in our team.
examples.cn: 这个创新的想法起源于我们团队里的一位年轻工程师。

examples.en: Please insert the card into the ATM to begin your transaction.
examples.cn: 请将卡片插入自动取款机以开始您的交易。

examples.en: You need to insert the card correctly for the reader to scan it.
examples.cn: 您需要正确插入卡片以便读卡器扫描。

examples.en: He decided to knock on the door to see if anyone was home.
examples.cn: 他决定敲门看看是否有人在家。

examples.en: Please knock on the window to get her attention.
examples.cn: 请敲敲窗户以引起她的注意。

examples.en: I heard a faint knock on the wall from the next room.
examples.cn: 我听到隔壁房间传来轻微的敲墙声。

examples.en: The constant knock on the pipes kept me awake all night.
examples.cn: 管道上持续的敲击声让我整晚都睡不着。

examples.en: Recent technological breakthroughs in AI have revolutionized many industries.
examples.cn: 最近人工智能领域的技术突破彻底改变了许多行业。

examples.en: The company announced several technological breakthroughs in renewable energy.
examples.cn: 该公司宣布了在可再生能源方面的几项技术突破。

examples.en: All employees must comply with rules regarding workplace safety.
examples.cn: 所有员工都必须遵守有关工作场所安全的规则。

examples.en: The software is designed to help users comply with rules for data protection.
examples.cn: 该软件旨在帮助用户遵守数据保护规则。

examples.en: He thought the plan would fail, but on the contrary, it was a huge success.
examples.cn: 他认为计划会失败，但相反地，它取得了巨大成功。

examples.en: She isn't lazy; on the contrary, she works harder than anyone else.
examples.cn: 她并不懒惰；相反地，她比任何人都更努力工作。

definitions.meaning_cn: 因...而赞扬某人，认可某人的...

examples.en: You should give her credit for completing the project ahead of schedule.
examples.cn: 你应该赞扬她提前完成了项目。

examples.en: I give him credit for his honesty in admitting the mistake.
examples.cn: 我认可他承认错误的诚实态度。

examples.en: Many charitable organisations rely on donations to support their causes.
examples.cn: 许多慈善组织依靠捐款来支持他们的事业。

examples.en: She volunteers at several charitable organisations in her community.
examples.cn: 她在社区的几家慈善组织做志愿者。

examples.en: Employers value candidates who demonstrate a good work ethic.
examples.cn: 雇主看重表现出良好职业道德的候选人。

examples.en: His success is largely due to his a good work ethic and dedication.
examples.cn: 他的成功很大程度上归功于他良好的职业道德和奉献精神。

examples.en: She spends two hours each day traveling to and from work.
examples.cn: 她每天花两个小时上下班通勤。

examples.en: To save time, many people use public transport for travel to and from work.
examples.cn: 为了节省时间，许多人使用公共交通上下班通勤。

examples.en: In college, students are required to take subject courses related to their major.
examples.cn: 在大学里，学生需要修读与其专业相关的专业课程。

examples.en: She plans to take subject courses in biology to prepare for medical school.
examples.cn: 她计划修读生物学专业课程，为医学院做准备。

examples.en: That hairstyle has been out of style for years.
examples.cn: 那种发型已经过时好几年了。

examples.en: Some words become out of style as language evolves.
examples.cn: 随着语言的发展，一些词汇变得不再流行。

examples.en: He is currently working on a new novel.
examples.cn: 他目前正在致力于写一本新小说。

examples.en: The team needs to work on improving communication skills.
examples.cn: 团队需要致力于提高沟通技巧。

examples.en: The medicine works on reducing inflammation in the body.
examples.cn: 这种药物对减轻体内炎症起作用。

examples.en: Her advice really worked on changing his perspective.
examples.cn: 她的建议确实影响了他改变观点。

examples.en: Greenhouse gases trap heat from the sun, contributing to global warming.
examples.cn: 温室气体捕获太阳热量，导致全球变暖。

examples.en: Solar panels are designed to trap heat from the sun for energy conversion.
examples.cn: 太阳能电池板设计用于捕获太阳热量以进行能量转换。

examples.en: A healthy diet can strengthen your body's immune defense against infections.
examples.cn: 健康的饮食可以增强你身体对感染的免疫防御。

examples.en: Vaccines help boost the immune defense by introducing harmless antigens.
examples.cn: 疫苗通过引入无害抗原来帮助增强免疫防御。

examples.en: It's dangerous to get close to wild animals in the forest.
examples.cn: 在森林里接近野生动物是危险的。

examples.en: As they worked together, they began to get close to each other.
examples.cn: 随着他们一起工作，他们开始彼此接近。

definitions.meaning_cn: 几乎达到...，接近（某个状态或目标）

examples.en: The project is getting close to completion after months of hard work.
examples.cn: 经过数月的努力，这个项目接近完成。

examples.en: Her score was getting close to the record, but she didn't break it.
examples.cn: 她的得分接近纪录，但没有打破它。

examples.en: By wearing bright colors, she made herself conspicuous at the party.
examples.cn: 通过穿鲜艳的颜色，她在派对上使自己显眼。

examples.en: He tried not to make himself conspicuous during the meeting to avoid attention.
examples.cn: 他试图在会议期间不使自己显眼，以避免被注意。

examples.en: Keep your pants on, the bus will be here in five minutes.
examples.cn: 别着急，公交车五分钟后就到。

examples.en: He told his friend to keep his pants on while waiting for the results.
examples.cn: 他告诉朋友在等结果时要保持冷静。

examples.en: The rain kept us from going to the park.
examples.cn: 下雨阻止了我们去公园。

examples.en: She kept her children from eating too much candy.
examples.cn: 她阻止孩子们吃太多糖果。

examples.en: After the manager left, the company's performance went downhill.
examples.cn: 经理离开后，公司的业绩开始走下坡路。

examples.en: His health has been going downhill since the accident.
examples.cn: 事故后，他的健康状况一直在恶化。

examples.en: We all chipped in to buy a gift for our teacher.
examples.cn: 我们都凑钱给老师买了一份礼物。

examples.en: Can you chip in a few dollars for the pizza?
examples.cn: 你能为披萨贡献几美元吗？

examples.en: He chipped in with a useful suggestion during the meeting.
examples.cn: 他在会议上插话提出了一个有用的建议。

examples.en: Feel free to chip in if you have any ideas.
examples.cn: 如果你有任何想法，请随时插话。

examples.en: Her grandfather passed away peacefully in his sleep.
examples.cn: 她的祖父在睡梦中安详地去世了。

examples.en: He passed away after a long illness.
examples.cn: 他在长期患病后去世了。

examples.en: She sketched out the plan for the new project.
examples.cn: 她草拟了新项目的计划。

examples.en: Can you sketch out your ideas before the meeting?
examples.cn: 你能在会议前概述一下你的想法吗？

examples.en: The new evidence throws light on the mystery.
examples.cn: 新证据阐明了这个谜团。

examples.en: His explanation threw light on the complex issue.
examples.cn: 他的解释使这个复杂问题更清楚了。

examples.en: It's worthwhile to visit the museum while you're in town.
examples.cn: 你在城里时，值得去参观博物馆。

examples.en: It's worthwhile to learn a new language for career advancement.
examples.cn: 为了职业发展，值得学习一门新语言。

examples.en: The old house has gone to rack and ruin over the years.
examples.cn: 这座老房子多年来已经破败不堪。

examples.en: Without maintenance, the garden will go to rack and ruin.
examples.cn: 没有维护，花园将会荒废。

examples.en: He was blamed for the mistake in the report.
examples.cn: 他因报告中的错误而受责备。

examples.en: She shouldn't be blamed for the accident.
examples.cn: 她不应该因事故而受责备。

examples.en: He does odd jobs around the neighborhood to earn extra money.
examples.cn: 他在附近做零工来赚外快。

examples.en: I need someone to help with odd jobs like painting and cleaning.
examples.cn: 我需要有人帮忙做像刷漆和清洁这样的杂活。

examples.en: The documentary portrays the cruelty of hunting in graphic detail.
examples.cn: 这部纪录片以生动的细节描绘了狩猎的残酷性。

examples.en: Her novel portrays the cruelty of hunting through the eyes of an animal.
examples.cn: 她的小说通过动物的视角描绘了狩猎的残酷性。

examples.en: They had to resort to legal action to resolve the dispute.
examples.cn: 他们不得不诉诸法律行动来解决争端。

examples.en: In desperate situations, people may resort to extreme measures.
examples.cn: 在绝望的情况下，人们可能会采取极端措施。

examples.en: Her body language indicated that she was nervous.
examples.cn: 她的肢体语言表明她很紧张。

examples.en: Understanding body language is important in effective communication.
examples.cn: 理解肢体语言在有效沟通中很重要。

examples.en: The city is facing a severe housing shortage due to population growth.
examples.cn: 由于人口增长，该市正面临严重的住房短缺。

examples.en: The government is implementing policies to address the housing shortage.
examples.cn: 政府正在实施政策来解决住房短缺问题。

examples.en: He lost control of the car on the icy road.
examples.cn: 他在结冰的路上失去了对汽车的控制。

examples.en: She lost control of her emotions during the argument.
examples.cn: 她在争论中失去了对情绪的控制。

definitions.meaning_cn: 一吐为快，说出憋在心里的话

examples.en: I need to have this secret off my chest; it's been bothering me for years.
examples.cn: 我需要把这个秘密一吐为快，它困扰我多年了。

examples.en: After having his feelings off his chest, he felt much better.
examples.cn: 把感受说出来后，他感觉好多了。

examples.en: He took the rap for the team's failure, even though it wasn't entirely his fault.
examples.cn: 他为团队的失败承担责任，尽管这不完全是他的错。

examples.en: She refused to take the rap for her colleague's mistake.
examples.cn: 她拒绝为同事的错误背黑锅。

examples.en: She is optimistic about her chances of getting the job.
examples.cn: 她对获得这份工作的机会持乐观态度。

examples.en: We should be optimistic about the future despite the challenges.
examples.cn: 尽管有挑战，我们应该对未来持乐观态度。

examples.en: The bad weather put the kibosh on our picnic plans.
examples.cn: 恶劣的天气阻止了我们的野餐计划。

examples.en: The new regulations put the kibosh on the proposed project.
examples.cn: 新规定终止了拟议的项目。

examples.en: It occurred to me that I had left my keys at home.
examples.cn: 我突然想到我把钥匙忘在家里了。

examples.en: Did it ever occur to you to ask for help?
examples.cn: 你有没有想过要寻求帮助？

examples.en: Do up your coat before you go outside; it's cold.
examples.cn: 出门前把外套扣好，外面很冷。

examples.en: She did up the buttons on her dress quickly.
examples.cn: 她迅速扣好了裙子的纽扣。

examples.en: They decided to do up the old house before selling it.
examples.cn: 他们决定在出售前翻新这栋老房子。

examples.en: We're planning to do up the kitchen with new cabinets.
examples.cn: 我们计划用新橱柜来装饰厨房。

examples.en: I'll give you a buzz when I arrive at the station.
examples.cn: 我到车站时会给你打个电话。

examples.en: Give me a buzz if you need any help with the project.
examples.cn: 如果你在项目上需要帮助，就给我打个电话。

examples.en: There were ten people in all at the meeting.
examples.cn: 总共有十个人参加了会议。

examples.en: The trip cost $500 in all, including flights and hotels.
examples.cn: 这次旅行总共花费了500美元，包括机票和酒店。

examples.en: We need to dig down to find the roots of the problem.
examples.cn: 我们需要深入挖掘以找到问题的根源。

examples.en: The archaeologists dug down several meters to uncover the ancient artifacts.
examples.cn: 考古学家挖掘了几米深以发现古代文物。

definitions.meaning_cn: 努力付出（尤指金钱或资源）

examples.en: Everyone had to dig down to contribute to the charity event.
examples.cn: 每个人都得努力付出，为慈善活动做贡献。

examples.en: If you want to succeed, you have to dig down and work hard.
examples.cn: 如果你想成功，就必须努力付出并勤奋工作。

examples.en: I was late for the meeting because of traffic.
examples.cn: 因为交通堵塞，我开会迟到了。

examples.en: Don't be late for your flight; check-in closes an hour before departure.
examples.cn: 别误了航班；登机手续在起飞前一小时关闭。

examples.en: She always gives a helping hand to her neighbors in need.
examples.cn: 她总是对有需要的邻居伸出援手。

examples.en: Can you give me a helping hand with moving this heavy furniture?
examples.cn: 你能帮我搬一下这件沉重的家具吗？

examples.en: It's important to make a distinction between facts and opinions.
examples.cn: 区分事实和观点很重要。

examples.en: The law makes a distinction between intentional and accidental acts.
examples.cn: 法律区分了故意行为和意外行为。

examples.en: She impressed the judges with her excellent performance.
examples.cn: 她用出色的表演给评委留下了深刻印象。

examples.en: He impressed his boss with his innovative ideas.
examples.cn: 他用创新的想法给老板留下了深刻印象。

examples.en: The war deprived many children of their education.
examples.cn: 战争剥夺了许多儿童的教育机会。

examples.en: Poverty can deprive people of basic necessities like food and shelter.
examples.cn: 贫困可能剥夺人们食物和住所等基本必需品。

examples.en: Good communication skills are essential for effective teamwork.
examples.cn: 良好的沟通技巧对于有效的团队合作至关重要。

examples.en: She improved her communication skills by taking a public speaking course.
examples.cn: 她通过参加公开演讲课程提高了沟通技巧。

examples.en: I accidentally knocked into the table and spilled my coffee.
examples.cn: 我不小心撞到了桌子，把咖啡洒了。

examples.en: He knocked into an old friend while shopping at the mall.
examples.cn: 他在商场购物时偶然遇到了一位老朋友。

examples.en: The event went like clockwork, with no delays or issues.
examples.cn: 活动进展顺利，没有任何延误或问题。

examples.en: If we prepare well, the project should go like clockwork.
examples.cn: 如果我们准备充分，项目应该会顺利进行。

examples.en: We can dispense with formalities and get straight to the point.
examples.cn: 我们可以省去礼节，直接切入正题。

examples.en: Modern technology allows us to dispense with paper documents.
examples.cn: 现代技术使我们无需纸质文件。

examples.en: For the record, I disagree with the decision made by the committee.
examples.cn: 正式声明，我不同意委员会做出的决定。

examples.en: Let me state for the record that all allegations are false.
examples.cn: 我正式声明，所有指控都是虚假的。

examples.en: After the negotiations, our company came out ahead with a better deal.
examples.cn: 谈判后，我们公司以更优的条件最终获利。

examples.en: In the competition, she came out ahead by scoring the highest points.
examples.cn: 在比赛中，她以最高分最终占优势。

examples.en: The room was decorated with colorful balloons for the party.
examples.cn: 房间用彩色气球装饰以举办派对。

examples.en: The cake was decorated with intricate icing designs.
examples.cn: 蛋糕用精致的糖霜设计装饰。

examples.en: The conflict between the two countries came to a head, leading to war.
examples.cn: 两国之间的冲突达到顶点，导致了战争。

examples.en: The issue came to a head when employees went on strike.
examples.cn: 当员工罢工时，问题达到了危机点。

examples.en: She loves to lose herself in a good book on weekends.
examples.cn: 她喜欢在周末沉浸在一本好书中。

examples.en: He lost himself in his work and forgot about the time.
examples.cn: 他专注于工作，忘记了时间。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's nose to the grindstone

examples.en: With exams approaching, she has her nose to the grindstone every day.
examples.cn: 随着考试临近，她每天都埋头苦干。

examples.en: He had his nose to the grindstone to finish the project on time.
examples.cn: 他努力工作以按时完成项目。

examples.en: They bought the house at a low price during the recession.
examples.cn: 他们在经济衰退期间以低价买下了这栋房子。

examples.en: You can find quality products at a low price if you shop online.
examples.cn: 如果你在网上购物，可以找到物美价廉的产品。

examples.en: I congratulate you upon your recent promotion.
examples.cn: 我祝贺你最近的晋升。

examples.en: They congratulated her upon winning the award.
examples.cn: 他们因她获奖而祝贺她。

examples.en: I'm sort of tired after the long journey.
examples.cn: 长途旅行后我有点累。

examples.en: The movie was sort of interesting, but not great.
examples.cn: 这部电影有点意思，但不算很棒。

examples.en: This is a new sort of technology we haven't seen before.
examples.cn: 这是一种我们从未见过的新技术。

examples.en: What sort of music do you like?
examples.cn: 你喜欢哪种音乐？

examples.en: After his rival scored a goal, he went one better with two goals.
examples.cn: 对手进了一球后，他进了两球，更胜一筹。

examples.en: She always tries to go one better than her colleagues in presentations.
examples.cn: 她总是试图在演示中比同事做得更好。

examples.en: He decided to take a gamble and invest in the startup.
examples.cn: 他决定冒险投资这家初创公司。

examples.en: Taking a gamble on that stock paid off handsomely.
examples.cn: 在那只股票上赌一把获得了丰厚回报。

examples.en: You should avail yourself of the opportunity to learn from experts.
examples.cn: 你应该利用这个机会向专家学习。

examples.en: She availed herself of the library's resources for her research.
examples.cn: 她利用图书馆的资源进行研究。

examples.en: The company's profits went into a nose dive after the scandal.
examples.cn: 丑闻后，公司的利润急剧下降。

examples.en: The plane went into a nose dive before the pilot regained control.
examples.cn: 飞机在飞行员重新控制前急剧俯冲。

examples.en: High transport costs can make imported goods more expensive.
examples.cn: 高运输成本会使进口商品更贵。

examples.en: We need to reduce transport costs to improve profitability.
examples.cn: 我们需要降低运输成本以提高盈利能力。

examples.en: She is at the head of the marketing department.
examples.cn: 她领导着市场部。

examples.en: The CEO sits at the head of the table during meetings.
examples.cn: 会议期间，CEO坐在桌子的前头。

examples.en: We'll have a party at the end of the month.
examples.cn: 我们将在月底举办一个派对。

examples.en: The answers are provided at the end of the book.
examples.cn: 答案在书的末尾提供。

examples.en: He has been on medication for his high blood pressure for years.
examples.cn: 他因高血压服药多年。

examples.en: Patients should inform their doctor if they are on medication.
examples.cn: 患者如果正在服药，应告知医生。

examples.en: Before dealing, you need to shuffle the deck thoroughly.
examples.cn: 发牌前，你需要彻底洗牌。

examples.en: He shuffled the deck and then dealt the cards.
examples.cn: 他洗了牌，然后发牌。

examples.en: You must carry your driving license when operating a vehicle.
examples.cn: 驾驶车辆时必须携带驾驶执照。

examples.en: She applied for a driving license after passing the test.
examples.cn: 通过考试后，她申请了驾驶执照。

examples.en: This city is second only to the capital in population.
examples.cn: 这个城市的人口仅次于首都。

examples.en: Her dedication is second only to her talent in achieving success.
examples.cn: 她的奉献精神在取得成功方面仅次于她的天赋。

examples.en: They developed a lasting friendship during their college years.
examples.cn: 他们在大学期间建立了持久的友谊。

examples.en: A lasting friendship is built on trust and mutual respect.
examples.cn: 持久的友谊建立在信任和相互尊重的基础上。

examples.en: No doubt, she will succeed with her hard work.
examples.cn: 毫无疑问，凭借她的努力，她会成功。

examples.en: There is no doubt that climate change is a serious issue.
examples.cn: 毫无疑问，气候变化是一个严重的问题。

examples.en: Industrial emissions can cause air pollution in urban areas.
examples.cn: 工业排放会导致城市地区的空气污染。

examples.en: Burning fossil fuels is known to cause air pollution.
examples.cn: 已知燃烧化石燃料会导致空气污染。

examples.en: We need to call a technician to fix the heater before winter.
examples.cn: 我们需要在冬天前叫技术员来修理加热器。

examples.en: He managed to fix the heater himself using online tutorials.
examples.cn: 他利用在线教程自己修好了加热器。

examples.en: The medication can make you drowsy, so avoid driving.
examples.cn: 这种药会让你昏昏欲睡，所以避免驾驶。

examples.en: Warm weather often makes people drowsy in the afternoon.
examples.cn: 温暖的天气常常使人们在下午昏昏欲睡。

examples.en: His explanation doesn't make sense to me.
examples.cn: 他的解释对我来说没有道理。

examples.en: It makes sense to save money for emergencies.
examples.cn: 为紧急情况存钱是合乎逻辑的。

examples.en: The instructions need to make sense before we proceed.
examples.cn: 在我们继续之前，这些说明需要说得通。

examples.en: Her argument finally made sense after I read the report.
examples.cn: 我读了报告后，她的论点终于可理解了。

examples.en: She has excellent taste in art and often visits galleries.
examples.cn: 她对艺术有极佳的鉴赏力，经常参观画廊。

examples.en: He doesn't have much taste in music, preferring simple tunes.
examples.cn: 他对音乐没有太多品味，更喜欢简单的曲调。

examples.en: I need to look up the definition of this word in the dictionary.
examples.cn: 我需要在字典里查找这个词的定义。

examples.en: Can you look up the train schedule online?
examples.cn: 你能在网上查阅火车时刻表吗？

examples.en: I plan to look up my old friend when I visit New York.
examples.cn: 我计划在访问纽约时看望我的老朋友。

examples.en: He looked up his former teacher during the reunion.
examples.cn: 他在重聚期间拜访了他以前的老师。

examples.en: Brisk walking and cycling are examples of moderate intensity activities.
examples.cn: 快走和骑自行车是中等强度活动的例子。

examples.en: Doctors recommend at least 150 minutes of moderate intensity activities per week.
examples.cn: 医生建议每周至少进行150分钟的中等强度活动。

examples.en: The company is on the brink of bankruptcy due to poor management.
examples.cn: 由于管理不善，这家公司濒临破产。

examples.en: She was on the brink of tears after hearing the sad news.
examples.cn: 听到这个悲伤的消息后，她即将哭出来。

examples.en: I had words with my neighbor about the loud music last night.
examples.cn: 昨晚我和邻居就吵闹的音乐争吵了一番。

examples.en: She had words with her boss over the new policy.
examples.cn: 她就新政策与老板争论了。

examples.en: The manager gave us the green light to start the project.
examples.cn: 经理给我们开了绿灯，可以开始这个项目了。

examples.en: After reviewing the proposal, the committee gave it the green light.
examples.cn: 审查提案后，委员会批准了它。

examples.en: The children played in safety under their parents' supervision.
examples.cn: 孩子们在父母的监督下安全地玩耍。

examples.en: Ensure all equipment is stored in safety to prevent accidents.
examples.cn: 确保所有设备安全存放，以防止事故。

examples.en: He got the heave-ho from his job after missing too many deadlines.
examples.cn: 他错过了太多截止日期后，被解雇了。

examples.en: If you don't improve your performance, you might get the heave-ho.
examples.cn: 如果你不提高表现，可能会被开除。

examples.en: We need to pin down the exact date for the meeting.
examples.cn: 我们需要确定会议的确切日期。

examples.en: It's hard to pin down the cause of the problem without more data.
examples.cn: 没有更多数据，很难明确问题的原因。

examples.en: The wrestler managed to pin down his opponent for the win.
examples.cn: 摔跤手设法按住了对手以获胜。

examples.en: Strong winds pinned down the tent, making it difficult to set up.
examples.cn: 强风按住了帐篷，使其难以搭建。

examples.en: The artist gave shape to her ideas through sculpture.
examples.cn: 艺术家通过雕塑使她的想法成形。

examples.en: We need to give shape to our plans before presenting them.
examples.cn: 我们需要在展示之前使我们的计划具体化。

examples.en: She came into the room quietly to avoid disturbing others.
examples.cn: 她悄悄地进入房间，以免打扰他人。

examples.en: The new policy will come into effect next month.
examples.cn: 新政策将于下个月生效。

examples.en: He came into a large fortune after his uncle passed away.
examples.cn: 他叔叔去世后，他继承了一大笔财产。

examples.en: She came into the family business when she turned 25.
examples.cn: 她25岁时继承了家族生意。

examples.en: Maintaining eye contact during a conversation shows confidence.
examples.cn: 在对话中保持眼神接触显示出自信。

examples.en: He avoided eye contact when he was lying.
examples.cn: 他撒谎时避免了目光交流。

examples.en: The celebrity made an appearance at the charity event.
examples.cn: 这位名人在慈善活动上露面了。

examples.en: He promised to make an appearance at the party, but he never showed up.
examples.cn: 他承诺会在派对上出现，但从未露面。

examples.en: In negotiations, it's wise to have an out in case things go wrong.
examples.cn: 在谈判中，明智的做法是有退路，以防事情出错。

examples.en: She always has an out planned for risky situations.
examples.cn: 她总是为风险情况计划好逃脱的方法。

examples.en: The police let him off with a warning instead of a fine.
examples.cn: 警察放过了他，只给了警告而不是罚款。

examples.en: She let off her friend for being late, understanding the traffic was bad.
examples.cn: 她宽恕了朋友的迟到，理解交通状况糟糕。

examples.en: The factory let off steam into the atmosphere as part of its process.
examples.cn: 工厂作为其过程的一部分，向大气释放蒸汽。

examples.en: He let off the fireworks in the backyard for the celebration.
examples.cn: 他在后院放烟花庆祝。

examples.en: The store is open from 9 AM to 6 PM every day.
examples.cn: 这家商店每天从上午9点营业到下午6点。

examples.en: Prices range from $10 to $50 depending on the model.
examples.cn: 价格从10美元到50美元不等，取决于型号。

examples.en: Instead of working, he just idles around the office all day.
examples.cn: 他不工作，整天在办公室里闲逛。

examples.en: During the holiday, we idled around the park enjoying the sunshine.
examples.cn: 假期期间，我们在公园里闲逛，享受阳光。

examples.en: He made a fortune by investing in technology stocks early on.
examples.cn: 他通过早期投资科技股发了财。

examples.en: She hopes to make a fortune with her new business idea.
examples.cn: 她希望用她的新商业想法赚大钱。

examples.en: The criminals tried to shake down the shop owner for protection money.
examples.cn: 罪犯试图勒索店主交保护费。

examples.en: He was arrested for shaking down tourists in the city center.
examples.cn: 他因在市中心敲诈游客而被捕。

examples.en: The police shook down the suspect's apartment for evidence.
examples.cn: 警察彻底搜查了嫌疑人的公寓以寻找证据。

examples.en: Before the trip, we shook down the car to ensure it was safe.
examples.cn: 旅行前，我们彻底检查了汽车以确保安全。

examples.en: The lawyer will draw up the contract by tomorrow.
examples.cn: 律师将在明天前起草合同。

examples.en: We need to draw up a detailed plan before starting the project.
examples.cn: 在开始项目之前，我们需要制定一个详细的计划。

examples.en: The taxi drew up outside the hotel.
examples.cn: 出租车在酒店外停了下来。

examples.en: He drew up his car at the curb to let the pedestrians cross.
examples.cn: 他把车停在路边让行人过马路。

examples.en: She decided there and then to accept the job offer.
examples.cn: 她当场决定接受这份工作邀请。

examples.en: He paid for the car there and then without any hesitation.
examples.cn: 他毫不犹豫地当场付了车款。

examples.en: He was smiling all the while during the meeting.
examples.cn: 会议期间他一直面带微笑。

examples.en: All the while, she knew the truth but didn't say anything.
examples.cn: 她一直知道真相，但什么也没说。

examples.en: I do exercises every morning to stay healthy.
examples.cn: 我每天早上做运动以保持健康。

examples.en: She does exercises at the gym three times a week.
examples.cn: 她每周在健身房锻炼三次。

examples.en: Students need to do exercises to practice their math skills.
examples.cn: 学生需要做练习题来练习数学技能。

examples.en: The teacher assigned us to do exercises from the textbook.
examples.cn: 老师布置我们做课本上的练习题。

examples.en: In the accounting profession, accuracy is crucial.
examples.cn: 在会计行业中，准确性至关重要。

examples.en: She has worked in the accounting profession for over ten years.
examples.cn: 她在会计行业工作了十多年。

definitions.meaning_cn: 回顾或回忆过去的事情

examples.en: I often look back on my childhood with fondness.
examples.cn: 我常常深情地回顾我的童年。

examples.en: He looks back on his career achievements with pride.
examples.cn: 他自豪地回顾自己的职业成就。

definitions.meaning_cn: 整理自己的事务或生活

examples.en: After the divorce, he decided to put his house in order.
examples.cn: 离婚后，他决定整理自己的生活。

examples.en: The company needs to put its house in order before expanding.
examples.cn: 公司在扩张之前需要整理好内部事务。

examples.en: The office has central air conditioning.
examples.cn: 办公室有中央空调系统。

examples.en: We installed air conditioning to keep the house cool in summer.
examples.cn: 我们安装了空调以在夏天保持房屋凉爽。

examples.en: His experience put him in an advantageous position for the promotion.
examples.cn: 他的经验使他在晋升中处于有利地位。

examples.en: The new technology puts our company in an advantageous position in the market.
examples.cn: 这项新技术使我们公司在市场上处于有利地位。

examples.en: The dry leaves caught fire quickly.
examples.cn: 干叶子很快就着火了。

examples.en: Be careful with the candles so they don't catch fire to the curtains.
examples.cn: 小心蜡烛，以免窗帘着火。

examples.en: The new song caught fire on social media.
examples.cn: 这首新歌在社交媒体上变得非常流行。

examples.en: Her idea caught fire and everyone started supporting it.
examples.cn: 她的想法变得很受欢迎，大家都开始支持它。

examples.en: He left the country for good.
examples.cn: 他永久地离开了这个国家。

examples.en: She decided to quit smoking for good.
examples.cn: 她决定永远戒烟。

examples.en: You should put that mistake out of your mind and move on.
examples.cn: 你应该忘记那个错误，继续前进。

examples.en: He tried to put the bad news out of his mind.
examples.cn: 他试图不再想那个坏消息。

examples.en: She is conscious of her responsibilities as a leader.
examples.cn: 她意识到自己作为领导的责任。

examples.en: He is conscious of the time and doesn't want to be late.
examples.cn: 他注意到时间，不想迟到。

examples.en: This tool is designed to simplify the process.
examples.cn: 这个工具旨在简化流程。

examples.en: The course is designed to improve communication skills.
examples.cn: 这门课程旨在提高沟通技巧。

examples.en: The witness will take the stand tomorrow.
examples.cn: 证人明天将在法庭上作证。

examples.en: She took the stand and testified about what she saw.
examples.cn: 她出庭作证，讲述了她的所见。

examples.en: The audience rose to their feet to applaud.
examples.cn: 观众站起来鼓掌。

examples.en: He rose to his feet when the judge entered the room.
examples.cn: 法官进入房间时，他站了起来。

examples.en: The plane is scheduled to touch down at 3 PM.
examples.cn: 飞机计划在下午3点着陆。

examples.en: We touched down safely despite the bad weather.
examples.cn: 尽管天气恶劣，我们安全着陆了。

examples.en: He managed to touch down for a try in the rugby match.
examples.cn: 他在橄榄球比赛中成功触地得分。

examples.en: The player touched down just before the end of the game.
examples.cn: 球员在比赛结束前触地得分。

examples.en: The company's products are popular at home and abroad.
examples.cn: 该公司的产品在国内外都很受欢迎。

examples.en: The policy has significant implications both at home and abroad.
examples.cn: 这项政策在国内外都有重大影响。

examples.en: Please put the book down on the table.
examples.cn: 请把书放在桌子上。

examples.en: He put down his thoughts in a journal.
examples.cn: 他把自己的想法写在了日记里。

examples.en: She always puts down his ideas in meetings.
examples.cn: 她总是在会议上贬低他的想法。

examples.en: Don't put yourself down; you're doing great.
examples.cn: 不要贬低自己，你做得很好。

examples.en: The vet had to put the sick dog down.
examples.cn: 兽医不得不对那只生病的狗实施安乐死。

examples.en: It was a difficult decision to put the old cat down.
examples.cn: 给那只老猫安乐死是一个艰难的决定。

examples.en: At the time that I arrived, the meeting had already started.
examples.cn: 在我到达的时候，会议已经开始了。

examples.en: She was studying abroad at the time that the event occurred.
examples.cn: 事件发生时，她正在国外留学。

examples.en: He served out his prison sentence and was released.
examples.cn: 他服满了刑期并被释放。

examples.en: The president will serve out his term until the next election.
examples.cn: 总统将服满任期直到下次选举。

examples.en: The waiter served out the soup to all the guests.
examples.cn: 服务员给所有客人分发了汤。

examples.en: She served out the cake at the party.
examples.cn: 她在聚会上分发了蛋糕。

examples.en: Let's get rolling on this project as soon as possible.
examples.cn: 让我们尽快启动这个项目。

examples.en: The meeting got rolling after a brief introduction.
examples.cn: 简短介绍后，会议开始了。

examples.en: We need to get rolling if we want to arrive on time.
examples.cn: 如果我们想准时到达，就需要出发了。

examples.en: The caravan got rolling at dawn.
examples.cn: 车队在黎明时分出发了。

examples.en: He decided to join up and serve his country.
examples.cn: 他决定参军为国家服务。

examples.en: Many young people joined up during the war.
examples.cn: 战争期间许多年轻人入伍。

examples.en: The two roads join up at the intersection.
examples.cn: 两条道路在十字路口连接。

examples.en: We need to join up these pieces to complete the puzzle.
examples.cn: 我们需要把这些碎片拼起来完成拼图。

examples.en: She joined up with the local volunteer group.
examples.cn: 她加入了当地的志愿者团体。

examples.en: Why don't you join up for the hiking trip?
examples.cn: 你为什么不加入这次徒步旅行呢？

definitions.meaning_cn: 在公共场合；有他人在场时

examples.en: He behaves politely in company.
examples.cn: 他在公共场合举止礼貌。

examples.en: It's rude to argue in company.
examples.cn: 在他人面前争吵是不礼貌的。

examples.en: She works in company with a team of experts.
examples.cn: 她与一组专家在公司里共事。

examples.en: The decision was made in company with the board.
examples.cn: 这个决定是与董事会一起在公司里做出的。

examples.en: The host said, 'Take it away!' and the band started playing.
examples.cn: 主持人说：“开始吧！”乐队开始演奏。

examples.en: After the introduction, the speaker was told, 'Take it away!'
examples.cn: 介绍完后，演讲者被告知：“请开始吧！”

definitions.meaning_cn: 沉思；反复思考（通常指负面事情）

examples.en: He tends to brood on his mistakes for days.
examples.cn: 他倾向于花几天时间反复思考自己的错误。

examples.en: Don't brood on the past; focus on the future.
examples.cn: 不要沉湎于过去，专注于未来。

examples.en: Get ready for the exam by reviewing your notes.
examples.cn: 通过复习笔记为考试做好准备。

examples.en: We need to get ready before the guests arrive.
examples.cn: 我们需要在客人到达前准备好。

examples.en: It's important to maintain the integrity of the data.
examples.cn: 保持数据的完整性很重要。

examples.en: The engineer worked to maintain the integrity of the structure.
examples.cn: 工程师努力保持结构的完整性。

examples.en: Leaders must maintain the integrity of their organization.
examples.cn: 领导者必须维护组织的诚信。

examples.en: She always maintains the integrity in her business dealings.
examples.cn: 她在商业交易中总是保持诚信。

examples.en: They struggle for freedom and equality.
examples.cn: 他们为自由和平等而奋斗。

examples.en: She has been struggling for recognition in her field.
examples.cn: 她一直在为在自己领域获得认可而奋斗。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have the shoe on the other foot

examples.en: Now that he's the boss, he has the shoe on the other foot.
examples.cn: 现在他是老板了，情况反转了。

examples.en: After the argument, they had the shoe on the other foot and understood each other's perspectives.
examples.cn: 争论后，他们角色互换，理解了彼此的观点。

examples.en: The strong wind pushed over the fence.
examples.cn: 强风推倒了篱笆。

examples.en: He accidentally pushed over the vase.
examples.cn: 他不小心推倒了花瓶。

examples.en: The champion pushed over his opponent in the first round.
examples.cn: 冠军在第一轮就轻易击败了对手。

examples.en: Our team pushed over the competition with ease.
examples.cn: 我们队轻松击败了竞争对手。

examples.en: I am curious to know how the story ends.
examples.cn: 我好奇想知道故事如何结束。

examples.en: She was curious to see the new exhibit at the museum.
examples.cn: 她好奇想看看博物馆的新展览。

examples.en: He is used to waking up early for work.
examples.cn: 他习惯于早起工作。

examples.en: She is used to dealing with difficult customers.
examples.cn: 她习惯于处理难缠的顾客。

examples.en: Please bring back the book when you're done.
examples.cn: 请看完后把书带回来。

examples.en: He brought back souvenirs from his trip.
examples.cn: 他从旅行中带回了纪念品。

examples.en: The fashion trend brought back styles from the 80s.
examples.cn: 这种时尚潮流使80年代的风格重新流行。

examples.en: The new policy aims to bring back economic stability.
examples.cn: 新政策旨在恢复经济稳定。

examples.en: The smell brought back memories of childhood.
examples.cn: 这种气味唤起了童年的回忆。

examples.en: Seeing the photo brought back happy times.
examples.cn: 看到照片回忆起了快乐的时光。

examples.en: She showed the new employee around the office.
examples.cn: 她带领新员工参观了办公室。

examples.en: Can you show me around the city?
examples.cn: 你能带我参观一下这个城市吗？

examples.en: He searched in vain for his lost keys.
examples.cn: 他徒劳地寻找丢失的钥匙。

examples.en: Their efforts to save the business were in vain.
examples.cn: 他们拯救企业的努力白费了。

examples.en: Large numbers of people attended the concert.
examples.cn: 大量的人参加了音乐会。

examples.en: The company produces large numbers of products each year.
examples.cn: 该公司每年生产大量的产品。

examples.en: The road runs parallel to the river for several miles.
examples.cn: 这条路与河流平行延伸数英里。

examples.en: Her career development was parallel to his own in many ways.
examples.cn: 她的职业发展与他的在许多方面是平行的。

examples.en: His argument was parallel to the one made earlier by the professor.
examples.cn: 他的论点与教授早先提出的论点相似。

examples.en: The company's growth is parallel to industry trends.
examples.cn: 公司的增长与行业趋势类似。

examples.en: During the heated debate, she decided to hold her peace to avoid conflict.
examples.cn: 在激烈的辩论中，她决定保持沉默以避免冲突。

examples.en: If you have nothing constructive to add, it's better to hold your peace.
examples.cn: 如果你没有建设性的意见，最好保持沉默。

definitions.meaning_cn: 拥有（天赋、财富等），被赋予

examples.en: She is blessed with a beautiful singing voice.
examples.cn: 她拥有优美的歌喉。

examples.en: They are blessed with good health and a happy family.
examples.cn: 他们拥有健康的身体和幸福的家庭。

examples.en: We traveled to Paris by way of London.
examples.cn: 我们经由伦敦前往巴黎。

examples.en: The package was sent by way of express delivery.
examples.cn: 包裹是通过快递发送的。

examples.en: He explained the concept by way of a simple analogy.
examples.cn: 他通过一个简单的类比来解释这个概念。

examples.en: By way of introduction, let me share some background information.
examples.cn: 作为介绍，让我分享一些背景信息。

examples.en: The protest gave voice to the community's frustrations.
examples.cn: 抗议活动表达了社区的挫败感。

examples.en: She gave voice to her concerns during the meeting.
examples.cn: 她在会议上表达了她的担忧。

examples.en: He was mad at his friend for forgetting his birthday.
examples.cn: 他对朋友忘记他的生日感到生气。

examples.en: Don't be mad at me; it was an honest mistake.
examples.cn: 别生我的气，那是个无心之过。

examples.en: The baby was crawling on all fours across the floor.
examples.cn: 婴儿在地板上四肢着地爬行。

examples.en: After the fall, he got up on all fours before standing.
examples.cn: 摔倒后，他先四肢着地再站起来。

definitions.meaning_cn: 在法律或逻辑上平等或类似

examples.en: The court ruled that the two cases were on all fours and should be treated similarly.
examples.cn: 法院裁定这两个案件在法律上平等，应类似处理。

examples.en: The analogy is not on all fours with the current situation.
examples.cn: 这个类比与当前情况不完全类似。

examples.en: She received praise for her excellent performance in the play.
examples.cn: 她因在戏剧中的出色表现而受到赞扬。

examples.en: The company earned praise for its innovative products.
examples.cn: 公司因其创新产品而获得赞扬。

examples.en: We plan to go rock climbing in the mountains this weekend.
examples.cn: 我们计划这个周末去山里攀岩。

examples.en: He loves to go rock climbing as a way to challenge himself.
examples.cn: 他喜欢去攀岩作为挑战自己的方式。

examples.en: I need to concentrate on work to meet the deadline.
examples.cn: 我需要专注于工作以赶上截止日期。

examples.en: She finds it hard to concentrate on work with all the noise.
examples.cn: 在这么多噪音下，她发现很难专注于工作。

examples.en: The construction project is already underway.
examples.cn: 建筑工程已经在进行中。

examples.en: Preparations for the event are well underway.
examples.cn: 活动的准备工作正在顺利进行。

examples.en: He blamed the mistake on his assistant.
examples.cn: 他把错误归咎于他的助手。

examples.en: Don't blame the failure on others; take responsibility.
examples.cn: 别把失败归咎于他人，要承担责任。

examples.en: Stop messing around and get to work!
examples.cn: 别胡闹了，开始工作吧！

examples.en: The kids were messing around in the backyard all afternoon.
examples.cn: 孩子们整个下午都在后院胡闹。

examples.en: He's just messing around; he's not serious about the relationship.
examples.cn: 他只是在调情，对这段关系并不认真。

examples.en: They were messing around at the party last night.
examples.cn: 昨晚他们在派对上调情。

examples.en: They decided to convert the old factory into apartments.
examples.cn: 他们决定将旧工厂改造成公寓。

examples.en: You can convert the file to a PDF format.
examples.cn: 你可以将文件转换为PDF格式。

examples.en: She converted to Buddhism after years of study.
examples.cn: 经过多年学习后，她皈依了佛教。

examples.en: He converted to Christianity as an adult.
examples.cn: 他成年后皈依了基督教。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take a turn for the worse

examples.en: The patient's condition took a turn for the worse overnight.
examples.cn: 病人的情况在一夜之间恶化了。

examples.en: The weather took a turn for the worse, so we canceled the picnic.
examples.cn: 天气变糟了，所以我们取消了野餐。

examples.en: My kids love watching animated cartoons on Saturday mornings.
examples.cn: 我的孩子们喜欢在周六早上看动画片。

examples.en: This animated cartoon won an award for its creativity.
examples.cn: 这部动画片因其创意而获奖。

examples.en: He had a stroke last year but is recovering well.
examples.cn: 他去年中风了，但恢复得很好。

examples.en: If you experience sudden numbness, you might be having a stroke.
examples.cn: 如果你突然感到麻木，可能正在中风。

examples.en: I had a stroke of genius and solved the problem instantly.
examples.cn: 我灵机一动，立刻解决了问题。

examples.en: She had a stroke of luck and found her lost keys.
examples.cn: 她运气好，找到了丢失的钥匙。

definitions.meaning_cn: 如果真有的话，即使有也

examples.en: He rarely exercises, if at all.
examples.cn: 他很少锻炼，即使有也极少。

examples.en: The changes will be minor, if at all noticeable.
examples.cn: 变化将很小，即使有也几乎注意不到。

examples.en: Her speech made a deep impression on the audience.
examples.cn: 她的演讲给观众留下了深刻印象。

examples.en: The beautiful scenery made a deep impression on me during my trip.
examples.cn: 旅行中，美丽的风景给我留下了深刻印象。

examples.en: You can count upon him to finish the project on time.
examples.cn: 你可以指望他按时完成项目。

examples.en: We're counting upon good weather for the outdoor event.
examples.cn: 我们指望好天气来举办户外活动。

examples.en: The tourism boom has created many new jobs in the region.
examples.cn: 旅游业的繁荣为该地区创造了许多新工作。

examples.en: After the pandemic, we're expecting a tourism boom this summer.
examples.cn: 疫情过后，我们预计今年夏天会出现旅游业的繁荣。

examples.en: Her positive attitude is a good influence on the team.
examples.cn: 她积极的态度对团队有好的影响。

examples.en: Reading books can be a good influence on children's development.
examples.cn: 阅读书籍对儿童发展有好的影响。

examples.en: She's mad about classical music and attends every concert.
examples.cn: 她对古典音乐非常着迷，每场音乐会都参加。

examples.en: He's mad about football and never misses a game.
examples.cn: 他对足球非常狂热，从不错过任何比赛。
